original: 本文件按照 GB/T 1.1 一 202 久标准化工作导则第工部分:标准化文件的结构和起草规则的规定起惠。
本文件代替 GB 18030 一 2005 信息技术 ”中文编码字符集与 GB 18030 一 2005 相比,除结构调整和编辑性改动外,主要扩术变化如下:
增加了本文件适用对象(见第 1 章)，
在双字节编码区更改了 10 个竖排标点和8 个汉字构件所对应的 GB/I 13000 代码位置,并其除了 6 个重复编码的汉字构件和 9 个重复编码的汉字( 见附录 D,2005 年版的附录A)，
在四字节编码区更改了18 个 GB/T 13000 代码位置(见附录 D,2005 年版的附录D);
translation:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"This document is based on the GB/T 1.1-202 standardization work guide, Part 1: Regulations for the structure and drafting of standardization documents."

Note: GB/T is a standardization system used in China, where "GB" stands for Guobiao (national standard) and "T" stands for Tongyi (unified). Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"This document supersedes GB 18030-2005. Compared with GB 18030-2005, the main changes are as follows, except for structural adjustments and editorial modifications."

Note: GB 18030-2005 is a Chinese standard for encoding Chinese characters in information technology. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Added is the scope of application of this document (see Chapter 1)." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"In the double-byte encoding zone, 10 vertical punctuation marks and 8 character components were changed to correspond to the GB 13000 code positions, and in addition to 6 duplicate encoded character components and 9 duplicate encoded characters (see Appendix D, and 6 duplicate encoded characters and 9 duplicate encoded characters in the 2005 edition of Appendix A),"

Note: GB 13000 is a Chinese standard for encoding Chinese characters. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"In the four-byte encoding zone, 18 GB/T 13000 code positions were changed (see Appendix D, and Appendix D of the 2005 edition)."

Note: GB/T 13000 is a Chinese standard for encoding Chinese characters.
translation_split:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"This document is based on the GB/T 1.1-202 standardization work guide, Part 1: Regulations for the structure and drafting of standardization documents."

Note: GB/T is a standardization system used in China, where "GB" stands for Guobiao (national standard) and "T" stands for Tongyi (unified).

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"This document supersedes GB 18030-2005. Compared with GB 18030-2005, the main changes are as follows, except for structural adjustments and editorial modifications."

Note: GB 18030-2005 is a Chinese standard for encoding Chinese characters in information technology.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Added is the scope of application of this document (see Chapter 1)."

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"In the double-byte encoding zone, 10 vertical punctuation marks and 8 character components were changed to correspond to the GB 13000 code positions, and in addition to 6 duplicate encoded character components and 9 duplicate encoded characters (see Appendix D, and 6 duplicate encoded characters and 9 duplicate encoded characters in the 2005 edition of Appendix A),"

Note: GB 13000 is a Chinese standard for encoding Chinese characters.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"In the four-byte encoding zone, 18 GB/T 13000 code positions were changed (see Appendix D, and Appendix D of the 2005 edition)."

Note: GB/T 13000 is a Chinese standard for encoding Chinese characters.
reference: The rules in GB/T 1.1-202 are the establishment for this record, rules for Long-Term Standardization Work Segment II: Guidelines Record Structure and Composing Rules. This record upgrades the Chinese coded character set for "Data Innovation" in GB 18030-2005, with the special case of auxiliary adjustments and publication modifications, the vital specialized changes from GB 18030-2005 are as takes after: The related objects of this record have been included (see Chapter 1), The GB/I 13000 code areas for 10 vertical accentuation marks, 8 Chinese character components, 6 drearily coded Chinese character components, and 9 tediously coded Chinese characters are adjusted within the double-byte coding locale (see Reference section D, Reference section A of the 2005 version), Within the four-byte coding range, 18 GB/T 13000 code places have changed (see Reference section D, Reference section D of the 2005 version);
reference_split: The rules in GB/T 1.1-202 are the establishment for this record, rules for Long-Term Standardization Work Segment II: Guidelines Record Structure and Composing Rules.

This record upgrades the Chinese coded character set for "Data Innovation" in GB 18030-2005, with the special case of auxiliary adjustments and publication modifications, the vital specialized changes from GB 18030-2005 are as takes after:
The related objects of this record have been included (see Chapter 1),

The GB/I 13000 code areas for 10 vertical accentuation marks, 8 Chinese character components, 6 drearily coded Chinese character components, and 9 tediously coded Chinese characters are adjusted within the double-byte coding locale (see Reference section D, Reference section A of the 2005 version),
Within the four-byte coding range, 18 GB/T 13000 code places have changed (see Reference section D, Reference section D of the 2005 version);

original: 删除了附录 ”追加的汉字及部首/部件 “ 见 2005 年版的附录 〇 ，
增加了实现的级别 " (见第9草);
增加了资料性附录 “通用规范汉字表 ; 议字的代码位置 “ 见附录刁。
请注意本文件的某些内容可能涉及专利。 本文件的发布机构不承担识别专利的责任。
本文件由中华人民共和国工业和信息化部提出并归口。
本文件及其所代替文件的历次版本发布情况为 :
一 -2000 年首次发布为 GB 18030 一 2000,2005 年第一次修订; 本次为第二次修订 。
信息扩术 ”中文编码字符集
1 本文件规定了信息技术用的中文图形字符及甚二进制编码的十六进制表示 。
本文件适用于中文和其他文字图形字符信息的处理、交换、存储、传给、显现 、输入和输出。
本文件适用于为具备中文和其他文字图形字符信息化处理及交换功能的技术类产品,包括但不限于以输入法、光学字符识别 (OCR)、编辑 校对、机融翻诺、语音合成、文字转写、乔能写作等为代表的软件产品 , 以及以计算机、通信终端设备、电子书阅读毅、学习机等为代表的便件产品 。
2 规泄性引用文件
下列文件中的内容通过文中的规范性引用而构成本文件必不可少的条款。
其中, 注日期的引用文件,仅该日期对应的版本适用于本文件;不注日期的引用文件,其最新厂本(包括所有的修改单)适用于本文件。
GB/T 2312 一 1980 ”信息交换用汉字编码字符集 ”基本集
GB/I 11383 一 1989 信息 处理 ”信息交换用八位代码结构和编码规则
GB/工 13000 信息技术通用多八位编码字符集(UCS)
3 术语和定义
下列本语和定义适用于本文件 。
3.1 字符 character
供组织、控制或表示数据用的元素集合中的一个元素。
3.2 编码字符 coded character
字符 (3.1) 及其编码 示。
3.3 用户自定区 private use area
使用符合本文件的产品的使用者可以自行规定的区域。
3.4 字汇 repertoire
用编码字符 (3.2) 集表示的一个指定的字符(3.1)集合 。
3.5 保 区 reserved zone
留作未来本文件规定的区 域 。
4 字汇
4.1 概述
本文件收录的字符以单字节、双字或四字节编码 。
单字节部分收录了 GB/T 11383 一 1989 的 0x00~0x7F 全部 128 个字符 。
4.3 双字节部分
双字节部分收录了 GB/T 2312 一 1980 中的全部图形字符 GB/T 13000 中的CJK 统一汉字以及部分图形字符。
双字节部分的字符按照附录 A 的规定。
其中,表意文字描述符的图形、代码位置和功能应符合附录 B 的规定 。
注: GB/T 13000 对中国、日本、恩国、越南等国家和地区使用的汉字统一编码。
具备独有抽象字形的汉字,赋予单独的代码位置;来源不同而抽象字形相同的汉字, 则赋予共用的代码位置。
经过编码的汉字称为CJK 统一汉字 CCJK Unified Ideographs,其中 CJK 表示中国、日本、韩国。
4.4 四字节部分
四字节部分收录了上述双字节字符之外的 GB/T 13000 中的 66 个CJK统一汉字(9FA6 一 9FEF，不包括 9FB4~9FBB 的8个字符)、CJK 统一汉字扩充 A、CJK 统一汉字扩充 BCJK 统一汉字扩充 C、 CJK 统一汉字扩充 DCJK 统一汉字扩充下 .CJK 统一汉字扩充 F 和已经 在 GB/ 工 13000 中编码的少数民族文字的字符。
四字节部分的字符按照附录 C 的规定 。
5 总体结构
正文中凡数字前标有 0x 的表示采用十六进制,未标有 0x 的表示采用十进制。
附录中凡编码的表示均采用十六进制,其他数字的表示均采用十进制。
单字节部分采用 GB/T 11383 一 1989 的编码结构,使 用 0x00~0x7F 码位。
双字贡部分采用两个八位二进制位串表示一个字符,其首字节码位从 0x81 一 0xFE, 尾字节码位分别是 0x40 一 0x7E 和 0x80 一 0xFE。
四字节部分采用 GB/工 11383 一 1989 未采用的 0x30 一 0x39 作为对双字节编码扩充的后缀,编码范围为 0x81308130 一 0xFE39FE39。

四字节字符的第一个字厄编码范围为 0x81 一 0xFE;第二个字记编码范围为 0x30 一 0x39; 第三个字节编码范围为 0x81 一 0xFE;第 四个字市编码范围为 0x30 一 0x39。 即 : 0x81308130 一 0x81308139; 0x81308230 一 0x81308239 0x8130FEFE30 一 0x8130FE39 ; 0x81318130 一 0x81318139 ; Oo2douolag0c “0URo23061393 0xFE39FE30 一 0xFE39FE39 。
总体结构与码位范围分配见图 1 和表 1。
6 字符的排列顺序
6.1 单字刷部分字符的排列顺序
单字记部分字符按照 GB/I 11383 一 1989 中相应字符的顺序排列 。
6.2 双字市部分字符的排列顺序
双字下部分字符排列顺序应符合附录 A。
6.3 四字刷部分字符的排列顺序
自 0x81308130 至 0x8439FE39 共 50400 个码位,对应双字节部分未包括的所有 GB/T 13000 基本多文种平面的字符,按照GB/T13000 基本多文种平面相应字符的顺序排列 。
自 0x90308130 至 0xE339FE39 共 1058400 个码位用于对应 GB/T 13000 的16个辅助平面,字符排列顺序完全按照 GB/I 13000 的 16个辅助平面的相应码位顺序依次排列 。
四字节部分字符排列顺序应符合附录 C。
7 码位分配
1.单字市部分的码位分配
单字节部分的码位按照 GB/T 11383 一 1989 的规则分配。
单字节码位分配见图 2。
2.双字部分的码位分配
双字节部分的码位安排分为 0x8140~ 一 0xFE7E 和 0x8180 一 0xFEFE 两部分, 共 23940 个码位。
双字节码位分配见图 3 及表 2。
总计: 23940 个码位
双字节 1 区 : 846 码位
SS WA 和 RS 双宁节 3 区 6080 码位
首字节 0xA8~0xA9 双字节 5 区 : 192 码 位
3.双字蔬部分编码空间结构图
表 2 双字闻部分的码位安排
人码位范围
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Deleted the appendix 'Added Chinese characters and radicals/ components' see Appendix 〇 of the 2005 edition." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Added the level of implementation ' (see draft 9);" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Added the informative appendix 'General Standard Chinese Character Table; Code positions of characters' See Appendix C." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Please note that some contents of this document may involve patents. The publishing institution of this document does not assume the responsibility of identifying patents." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"This document is proposed and published by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The release situation of this document and its replaced versions is as follows:" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"First published in 2000 as GB 18030-2000, first revised in 2005; This is the second revision." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"GB 18030-2022" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Information Technology - Chinese Character Encodings" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"1 This document specifies the Chinese graphic characters and their binary encodings in hexadecimal representation used in information technology." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"This document is applicable to the processing, exchange, storage, transmission, display, input, and output of Chinese and other character information." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"This document is applicable to technical products with Chinese and other character information processing and exchange functions, including but not limited to software products represented by input methods, optical character recognition (OCR), editing and proofreading, machine translation, speech synthesis, text-to-speech, and writing assistants, as well as terminal devices, e-book readers, and learning machines, etc." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"2 Normative references" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The contents of the documents listed below are incorporated by reference into this document as mandatory provisions." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Among them, the referenced documents with a date are applicable to this document only at the corresponding version; the referenced documents without a date are applicable to this document at the latest edition (including all amendments)." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"GB/T 2312-1980 'Information interchange - Coded character set for information interchange - Basic Set'" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"GB 11383-1989 'Information processing - Information interchange - 8-bit coded character structure and encoding rules'" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"GB 13000 'Information technology - Universal Multiple-Octet Coded Character Set (UCS)' The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3 Terms and definitions" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The terms and definitions below apply to this document." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3.1 Character" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"A single element in a collection of elements used for organization, control, or representation of data." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3.2 Coded character" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"A character (3.1) and its code point." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3.3 User-defined area" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The user of a product conforming to this document can define its own area." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3.4 Character repertoire" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"A set of characters (3.1) represented by a coded character (3.2)." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3.5 Reserved Zone" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Reserved for future specification by this document." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"GB 18030-2022" 

Note: GB 18030 is a Chinese character encoding standard, and the year 2022 is the year of the latest revision. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"4 Character Set" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"4.1 Overview" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The characters included in this document are encoded in single-byte, double-byte, or four-byte format." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The single-byte part includes all 128 characters from 0x00 to 0x7F as specified in GB/T 11383-1989." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"4.3 Double-Byte Part" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The double-byte part includes all the graphic characters from GB/T 2312-1980, CJK unified characters from GB/T 13000, and some graphic characters." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The double-byte characters are encoded according to the specifications in Appendix A." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Among them, the graphic, code position, and function of the symbolic character descriptor should comply with the specifications in Appendix B." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Note: GB/T 13000 is a unified encoding for Chinese characters used in China, Japan, Korea, and Vietnam, etc." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Characters with unique abstract forms are assigned a separate code position; characters with the same abstract form but different origins are assigned a shared code position." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The encoded Chinese characters are called CJK Unified Ideographs, where CJK represents China, Japan, and Korea." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"4.4 Four-byte part" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The four-byte part includes 66 CJK Unified Ideographs (9FA6 to 9FEF, excluding 9FB4 to 9FBB) outside of the double-byte characters mentioned above, as well as CJK Unified Ideographs Extension A, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension B, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension C, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension D, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension E, and characters of minority languages already encoded in GB/T 13000." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The characters in the four-byte part are encoded according to Appendix C." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"5 Overall Structure" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"In the main text, numbers preceded by '0x' are represented in hexadecimal, while those without '0x' are represented in decimal." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"In the appendix, all encoded values are represented in hexadecimal, while other numbers are represented in decimal." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The single-byte part uses the encoding structure of GB/T 11383-1989, using code points from 0x00 to 0x7F." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The double-byte part represents a character with two 8-bit binary strings, with the first byte code points ranging from 0x81 to 0xFE, and the second byte code points ranging from 0x40 to 0x7E and 0x80 to 0xFE." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The four-byte part uses the unused 0x30-0x39 in GB/T 11383-1989 as the suffix for extending the double-byte encoding, with the encoding range being 0x8130-0x39FE." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The encoding range for the first byte of a four-byte character is 0x81-0xFE; the encoding range for the second byte is 0x30-0x39; the encoding range for the third byte is 0x81-0xFE; the encoding range for the fourth byte is 0x30-0x39. This results in the following encoding ranges: 0x8130-0x8139, 0x8132-0x8139, 0x81FE-0x30, 0x81FE-0x39, 0x8131-0x8139, 0x8132-0x8139, 0x81FE-0x30, 0x81FE-0x39, 0xFE30-0xFE39, 0xFE31-0xFE39." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The overall structure and code point distribution can be seen in Figure 1 and Table 1." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"6-character arrangement order" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"6.1 Single-byte part character arrangement order" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The single-byte part characters are arranged in the order corresponding to the characters in GB/T 11383-1989." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"6.2 Double-byte part character arrangement order" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The double-byte part character arrangement order should conform to Appendix A." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"6.3 Quad-byte part character arrangement order" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"From 0x81308130 to 0x8439FE39, a total of 50400 code points, corresponding to all the characters in the Basic Multilingual Plane of GB/T 13000 not included in the double-byte part, are arranged in the order of the corresponding characters in the Basic Multilingual Plane of GB/T 13000." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"From 0x90308130 to 0xE339FE39, a total of 1058400 code points are used to correspond to the 16 supplementary planes of GB/T 13000, and the character arrangement order is completely arranged in the order of the corresponding code points of the 16 supplementary planes of GB/T 13000." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The quad-byte part character arrangement order should conform to Appendix C." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"7 Code Point Distribution" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"1. Single-byte part code point distribution" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The single-byte part code points are distributed according to the rules of GB/T 11383-1989." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Single-byte code point distribution, see Figure 2." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"2. Double-byte part code point distribution" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The double-byte part code points are divided into two parts: 0x8140 ~ 0xFE7E and 0x8180 ~ 0xFEFE, totaling 23940 code points." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Double-byte code point distribution, see Figure 3 and Table 2." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Total: 23940 code points" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Double-byte Zone 1: 846 code points" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"SS WA and RS double-byte Zone 3: 6080 code points" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"First byte 0xA8~0xA9, Double-byte Zone 5: 192 code points" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3. Double-byte Part Encoding Space Structure Diagram" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Table 2 Double-byte Part Code Point Arrangement" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Human code point range"

Chinese CCC is an info expansion method
The hexadecimal representation of Chinese graphic characters and even binary codes used in information technology are described in this document.
The processing, exchange, storage, transmission, display, input, and output of Chinese and other graphic character information are covered by this document.

This document covers technical products that process and exchange information in Chinese and other characters, including OCR, editing, translation, speech synthesis, and computer and communication equipment.
2 Regulatory references
By way of normative references in the text, the following documents' contents make up this document's core provisions.

Only the version that corresponds to the reference's date applies to this document for references that are dated; for references that are not dated, the most recent version (including any revisions) applies to this document.

3 Terms and Definitions
This article uses the phrases and definitions listed below.
3.1 Character character
a component of a group of components used to manage, represent, or organize data.
3.2 Coded character coded character
Characters (3.1) are displayed along with their encodings.
3.3 User-defined area private use area
a region that the user of a product that complies with this document may specify.
3.4 Vocabulary repertoire
a coded character set (3.2) that represents a predetermined set of characters (3.1).
3.5 Reserved zone
Area set aside for this document's future provisions.
4 Vocabulary
4.1 General
This file contains characters that are single-byte, double-word, or four-byte encoded.
The single-byte portion includes all 128 characters in GB/T 11383-1989, from 0x00 to 0x7F.
4.3 Double-byte part
All of the graphic characters in GB/T 2312-1980, CJK unified Chinese characters, and portions of the graphic characters in GB/T 13000 are included in the double-byte component.
In Appendix A, the characters in the double-byte section are listed.
Among these, the Appendix B requirements must be followed for the graphics, code places, and functions of ideographic descriptors.
Note:  The standard Chinese character encoding used in China, Japan, Taiwan, Vietnam, and other nations and regions is called GB/T 13000.
Chinese characters with distinctive abstract glyphs are given their own code positions, while characters with the same abstract glyph but from various sources are given a similar code position.
CJK stands for China, Japan, and Korea, and the encoded Chinese characters are referred to as CJK unified Chinese characters or CCJK Unified Ideographs.
4.4 Four-byte part
The text lists various Chinese characters in different standards, including GB/T 13000, .CJK unified character extensions A and C/D, and expansions.
The characters in the four-byte section adhere to Appendix C's rules.
5 Overall structure
The text uses hexadecimal notation for integers marked with a 0x, whereas decimal notation is used for values without a 0x.
The appendix's codes are all expressed in hexadecimal, while decimal is used for all other values.
The single-byte portion uses the GB/T 11383-1989 encoding scheme and the code points 0x00–0x7F.
1st byte: 0x81-0xFE, last byte: 0x40-0x7E, 0x80-0xFE double-word component uses two 8-bit binary strings for each letter.
The coding range for the four-byte component is 0x81308130-0xFE39FE39, while the suffix used to expand the double-byte code is 0x30-0x39, which was not utilized in GB/Work 11383-1989.

The first character of a four-byte character has an encoding range of 0x81-0xFE; the second character's range is 0x30-0x39; the third byte's range is 0x81-0xFE; and the fourth character's range is 0x30 A 0x39. Certain characters in single-character remarks are organized in the same sequence as their GB/I 11383-1989 counterparts.
Double characters are ordered.

8 部分字符和代码的说明
相对于 GB 18030 一 2005 ,部分代码位置上的字形和 /或所对应的 GB/TI 13000 代码位置在本文件中进行了调整 ( 见附录D)。
9.1 通则
本文件规定三个实现级别。
符合相应实现级别的系统软件产品,应提供相应实现级别范围内全部字符的输入输出功能。
9.2 实现级别 1
实现级别 1 文持本文件的单字节编码部分、双季节编码部分和四字下编玛部分的 CJK 统一汉字 ( 即 0x82358F33 一 0x82359636) 和 CJK 统一汉字扩A( 即 0x8139EE39 一 0x82358738) 。
任何本文件适用的产品均应满足实现级别 1 的要求。
注: 根据软件应用需要 ,实现级别 1 还可选择文持表 3 列出的任何一种或多种非汉字文种。
9.3 实现级别 2
实现级别 2 包含实现级别 1。
此外 ,实现级别 2 还文持《通用 规范 汉字 表 }中的没有包合在实级别 1 之内的编码汉字。
《 通用规范汉字表) 所收汉字在本文件中的代码位置和字形, 见附录下。
系统软件及支撑软件,应满足实现级别 2 的要求 。
注: 系统软件及文撑软件包括但不限于操作系统,数据库管理系统.中间件( 软件产品分类的信息见 GB/ 工 36475)。
9.4 实现级别 3
实现级别 3 包含实现级别 2。
此外,实现级别 3 还文持本文件规定的全部汉字及表 3 中的康黑部首。
用于政务服务和公共服务的产品应满足实现级卉 3 的要求。
注: 政务服务和 共服务行业包括但不限于铁路运输业.道路运输业 \ 水上运输业.航空运输业、多式联运和运输代理业、邮政业、货币金融服、保险业、土地、管理业、卫生、国家机构、社会保障等 (行业分类的信息见 GB/ 工 4754)。

original: 本手册页内容摘自 GNU C 编译器的完整文档,仅限于解释选项的含义.
除非有人自愿维护, EURo文件，Info文件是权威文档.
如果发现手册页和软件之间有所矛盾,请查对Info
如果我们发觉本手册页的内容由于过时而导致明显的混乱和抱怨时,我们就停止发布它.不可能有其他选择,象更新Info文件同时更新 man 手册, 因为其他维护 Gnu cc 的工作没有留给我们时间做这个.GNU 工程认为 man 手册是过时产物, 应该把时间用到别的地方.
如果需要完整和最新的文档, 请查阅 Info 文件 `gee' 或 Using and Porting GNU CC (for version 2.0) (ft&/HAIZE#H GNU CC 2.0) 手册.二者均来自 Texinfo 原文件 gee. texinfo.
描述 (DESCRIPTION) C 和 C++ 编译器是集成的.他们都要用四个步骤中的一个或多个处理输入文件: 预处理(preprocessing), Hii(compilation), (assembly) MERE (linking) .
源文件后级名标识源文件的语言, 但是对编译器来说, 后绥名控制着缺省设定:
gcc 认为预处理后的文件(.i) 是 c 文件, 并且设定 c 形式的连接，
g++ 认为预处理后的文件 (.i) 是 c++ 文件 ,并且设定 c++ 形式的连接.
源文件后级名指出语言种类以及后期的操作:
.c C 源程序; 预处理, 编译,汇编
.C C++ 源程序; 预处理, 编译,汇编
.cc C++ 源程序; 预处理, 编译,汇编
. CXX C++ 源程序; 预处理, 编译,汇编
.m Objective-C 源程序; 预处理,编译,汇编
.i 预处理后的 c 文件;编译,汇编
.ii 预处理后的 c++ 文件;编译,汇编
.s 汇编语言源程序; 汇编
汇编语言源程序; 预处理,汇编
.h 预处理器文件; 通常不出现在命令行上其他后级名的文件被传递给连接器 (Linker).通常包括:
.0 目标文件 (Object file)
.a 归档库文件(Archive file)
除非使用了 -cec，-s, 或 -E 选项(或者编译错误阻止了完整的过程),否则连接总是最后的步骤.
在连接阶段中,所有对应于源程序的.e 文件，-1 库文件, 无法识别的文件名(包括指定的.o H 标文件和 .a 库文件)按命令行中的顺序传递给连接器选项 (OPTIONS)
选项必须分立给出 : de ' 完全不同于 `-d -r '.
大多数 ` -=E :和 `-W' 选项有两个相反的格式 : -fname 和 -fno-name (或 -Wname 和 -Wno- name).
这里只列举不是默认选项的格式.
下面是所有选项的摘要, 按类型分组, 解释放在后面的章节中.
translation:
The text translates to:

"This manual page is excerpted from the full documentation for the GNU C compiler, which is mostly concerned with the meaning of options." The text translates to:

"Unless someone volunteers to maintain it, the Euro file and Info file are authoritative documents." The text translates to:

"If you find discrepancies between this manual page and the software, check the Info files." The text translates to:

"If we find that this manual page has become outdated and causes obvious confusion and complaints, we will stop publishing it. There is no other choice, as updating the Info files and the man pages at the same time is not feasible, since there is no time left for us to do so, given the work of maintaining Gnu cc. The GNU project considers man pages to be outdated products, and we should spend our time elsewhere." The text translates to:

"If you need complete and up-to-date documentation, please refer to the Info file `gee' or the manual 'Using and Porting GNU CC (for version 2.0)' (ftp://ftp.gnu.org/pub/gnu/gcc/gcc-2.0/gcc-2.0.texinfo). Both are derived from the Texinfo source file gee.texinfo." The text translates to:

"DESCRIPTION: The C and C++ compilers are integrated. They both process the input files in one or more of the following four steps: preprocessing, compilation, assembly, and linking." The text translates to:

"The suffix of the source file identifies the language of the source file, but for the compiler, the suffix controls the default settings:" The text translates to:

"GCC considers the preprocessed file (.i) to be a C file, and sets up C linkage." The text translates to:

"g++ considers the preprocessed file (.i) to be a C++ file, and sets up C++ linkage." The text translates to:

"The suffix of the source file indicates the language type and the subsequent operations:" The text translates to:

".c C source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly" The text translates to:

".C C++ source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly" The text translates to:

".cc C++ source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly" The text translates to:

". CXX C++ source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly" The text translates to:

".m Objective-C source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly" The text translates to:

".i Preprocessed C file; compilation, assembly" The text translates to:

".ii Preprocessed C++ file; compilation, assembly" The text translates to:

".s Assembly language source program; assembly" The text translates to:

"Assembly language source program; preprocessing, assembly" The text translates to:

".h Preprocessor file; usually not present in the command line, other suffix files are passed to the linker. Usually includes:" The text translates to:

".0 Object file" The text translates to:

".a Archive file" The text translates to:

"Unless -c, -s, or -E options are used (or compilation errors prevent the entire process), linking is always the final step." The text translates to:

"In the linking phase, all files corresponding to the source program's .e file, -1 library files, and unrecognized file names (including specified .o object files and .a library files) are passed to the linker options (OPTIONS) in the order they appear on the command line." The text translates to:

"Options must be given separately: de, which is completely different from `-d -r'." The text translates to:

"Most `-E:' and `-W' options have two opposite formats: -fname and -fno-name (or -Wname and -Wno-name)." The text translates to:

"This lists only non-default formats." The text translates to:

"The following is a summary of all options, grouped by type, with explanations in the following sections."

"If you find discrepancies between this manual page and the software, check the Info files."

The text translates to:

"If we find that this manual page has become outdated and causes obvious confusion and complaints, we will stop publishing it. There is no other choice, as updating the Info files and the man pages at the same time is not feasible, since there is no time left for us to do so, given the work of maintaining Gnu cc. The GNU project considers man pages to be outdated products, and we should spend our time elsewhere."

The text translates to:

"If you need complete and up-to-date documentation, please refer to the Info file `gee' or the manual 'Using and Porting GNU CC (for version 2.0)' (ftp://ftp.gnu.org/pub/gnu/gcc/gcc-2.0/gcc-2.0.texinfo). Both are derived from the Texinfo source file gee.texinfo."

The text translates to:

"DESCRIPTION: The C and C++ compilers are integrated. They both process the input files in one or more of the following four steps: preprocessing, compilation, assembly, and linking."

The text translates to:

"The suffix of the source file identifies the language of the source file, but for the compiler, the suffix controls the default settings:"

The text translates to:

"GCC considers the preprocessed file (.i) to be a C file, and sets up C linkage."

The text translates to:

"g++ considers the preprocessed file (.i) to be a C++ file, and sets up C++ linkage."

The text translates to:

"The suffix of the source file indicates the language type and the subsequent operations:"

The text translates to:

".c C source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly"

The text translates to:

".C C++ source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly"

The text translates to:

".cc C++ source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly"

The text translates to:

". CXX C++ source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly"

The text translates to:

".m Objective-C source program; preprocessing, compilation, assembly"

The text translates to:

".i Preprocessed C file; compilation, assembly"

The text translates to:

".ii Preprocessed C++ file; compilation, assembly"

The text translates to:

".s Assembly language source program; assembly"

The text translates to:

"Assembly language source program; preprocessing, assembly"

The text translates to:

".h Preprocessor file; usually not present in the command line, other suffix files are passed to the linker. Usually includes:"

The text translates to:

".0 Object file"

The text translates to:

".a Archive file"

The text translates to:

"Unless -c, -s, or -E options are used (or compilation errors prevent the entire process), linking is always the final step."

The text translates to:

"In the linking phase, all files corresponding to the source program's .e file, -1 library files, and unrecognized file names (including specified .o object files and .a library files) are passed to the linker options (OPTIONS) in the order they appear on the command line."

The text translates to:

"Options must be given separately: de, which is completely different from `-d -r'."

The text translates to:

"Most `-E:' and `-W' options have two opposite formats: -fname and -fno-name (or -Wname and -Wno-name)."

The text translates to:

"This lists only non-default formats."

The text translates to:

"The following is a summary of all options, grouped by type, with explanations in the following sections."

original: 代码生成选项 (Code Generation Option)
总体选项 (Overall Option)
明确指出后面输入文件的语言为 language (而不是从文件名后绥得到的默认选择).
这个选项应用于后面所有的输入文件, 直到遇着下一个 `-x' 选项 .language 的可选
关闭任何对语种的明确说明, 因此依据文件名后级处理后面的文件 RE AS E ` -x' 选项).

如果只操作四个阶段( 预处理, 编译, 汇编, 连接)中的一部分, 可以使用 ` -x' 选项 (或文件名后 Ah) 告诉 geo 从哪里开始,用 `~-c' ，`-s' ,或 `-E' 选项告诉 geo 到哪里结束.注意,某些选项组合 (例如 ，`-x cpp-output -E') {i gee MEF =c 编译或汇编源文件, ETER. ERA ATI 缺省情况下， GCC 通过用 ` .o' 蔡换源文件名后级 ` .ec 标文件名. 可以使用-o 选项选择其他名字.GCC忽略 -ec 选项后面任何无法识别的输入文伯 -S F 何事情.
了的目标文件.
编译后即停止, 不进行汇编件.
在编译过程的不同阶段间使用管道而非临时文件进行工作, 因为那些系统的汇编器不能从管道读取数据，GNU 的汇编器没有这个问题，汇编器能够接受的 C "方言 ": 支持符合 ANSI 标准的 C 程序.

这样就会关闭 GNU Cc 中某些不兼容 ANSI Cc 的特性关键字, 以及诸如 unix 和 vax 这些表明当迎和极少使用的 ANSI trigraph 特性,以及禁上尽管使 用了(译注 :宿主环境 (hosted environment) 下所有的标准库可用，main 函数返回 一个 int 值, 典型例子是除了内核以外几乎所有的程序.对应的独立环境 (f£reestanding environment) 不存在标准库, 程序入口也不一定是 main, 最明显的例子就是操作系统内核.详情参考 gcc 网站最近的资料)
对于没有参数的函数声明, 例如 `int foo ();', 按 C 风格处理 --- 即不说明参数个数或类型. (仅针对 C++) .
正常情况下, 这样的函数 foo 在 C++ 中意味着参数为空.
节清单从这里删到试图支持传统 C 编译器的某些方面.
详见NU c 手册,我们已经把细节删除, 这样当内容过时后, 人们也不会 HERI.
除了一件事: 对于 c++ 程序 (不是C)，` -traditional' 选项带来一个附加效应,允许对 this 赋值.
他和`-Ethis-is-variable' 选项的果一样.
-traditional-cpp 试图支持传统 Cc 预处理器的某些方面.
特别是上面提到有关预处理器的内容, 但是不包括 `-traditional' 选项的其他效应.
-fdollars-in-identifiers 允许在标识符 (identifier) 中使用 `$' 字符 (仅针对 C++) .
你可以指定 `“-Efno-dollars-in-identifiers' 选项显明禁止使用 `$' 符.
(GNU C++ 在某些目标系统缺省允许 `$' 符, 但不是所有系统.)
-fenum-int-equiv 允许 ant 类型到枚举类型 (enumeration) 的隐式转换 (MEF c++) .
正常情况下 GNU C++ 允许从 enum 到 int 的转换,反之则不行.
-fexternal-—templates 为模板声明 (template declaration) 产生较小的代码 (仅限于 c++)，方法是对于每个模板函数 (template function),只在 定义他们的地方生成一个副本.
想要成功使用这个选项, 你必须在所有使用模板的文件中,标记`#pragma implementatio'(定义)或 `#Pragma interface'(声明).
程序用 `-fexternal-templates ' 编译时, 模板实例 (template instantiation) 全部是外部类型.你必须让需要的实例在实现文件中出现.
可以通过 typedef 实现这一点, 他引用所需的每个实例.
相对应的, 如果编译时使用缺省选项 ` -fno-exteznal-templates', 所有模板实例明确的设为内置.
所有的成员函数(除了构造子函数和 mnew 或 delete 成员操作符) 视为所在类的虚函数.
这不表明每次调用成员函数都将通过内部虚函数表.
有些情况下, 编译器能够判断出可以直接调用某个虚函数; 这时就直接调用.
-fcond-mismatch 允许条件表达式的第二和第三个参数的类型不匹配.
这种表达式的值是 Void.-fthis-—is-variable 允许对 this 赋值 (仅对 c++).
合并用户自定义的自由存储管理机制到 c++ 后,使可赋值的`this' 显得不合时宜.
因此, 默认情况下, 类成员函数内部对 this 赋值是无效操作.
然而为了向后兼容, 你可以通过 `-fthis-is-variable' 选项使这种操作有效.
-funsigned-char 把 char 定义为无符号类型,如同 unsigned char.
各种机器都有自己缺省的 char 类型. 既可能是 unsigned char 也可能是 signed char.
理想情况下, 当依赖于数据的符号性时, 一个可移植程序总是应该使用 signed char 或 unsigned chaz.
但是许多程序已经写成只用简单的 char, 并且期街这是有符号数(或者无符号数, 具体情况取决于编写程序的目标机器).
这个选项, 和它的反义选项, 使那样的程序工作在对应的默认值上.
char 的类型始终应该明确定义为 signed char 或 unsigned char, 即使它表现的和其中之一完全一样.
如果没有明确声明 ` signed' 或 "unsigned'修饰符, 这些选项用来定义有符号位域 (bitfield) 或无符号位域.
缺省情况下,位域是有符号的, 因为他们继承的基本整数类型,如 int,是有符号数，然而, 如果指定了 `-traditional' 选项,位域永远是无符号数.
-fwritable-strings把字符串常量存储到可写数据段, 而且不做特别对待.
这是为了兼容一些老程序,他们算改字符串常量是一个非常糟糕的想法、`-traditional' 选项也有相同效果.
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "代码生成选项" into English is:

Code Generation Option The translation of the Chinese text "总体选项" into English is:

Overall Option The translation of the Chinese text "明确指出后面输入文件的语言为 language (而不是从文件名后缀得到的默认选择)" into English is:

Clearly specify the language of the file to be input (instead of using the default choice obtained from the file extension). The translation of the Chinese text "这个选项应用于后面所有的输入文件, 直到遇着下一个 '-x' 选项 .language 的可选" into English is:

This option applies to all the input files that follow, until the next '-x' option .language is specified. The translation of the Chinese text "关闭任何对语种的明确说明, 因此依据文件名后缀处理后面的文件 RE AS E `-x' 选项)" into English is:

Disable any explicit language specification, so the files following will be processed based on their file extension RE AS E `-x' option). The translation of the Chinese text "如果只操作四个阶段(预处理, 编译, 汇编, 连接)中的一部分, 可以使用 `-x' 选项 (或文件名后缀) 告诉 geo 从哪里开始, 用 `~-c' ，`-s' ,或 `-E' 选项告诉 geo 到哪里结束.注意,某些选项组合 (例如，`-x cpp-output -E') {i gee MEF =c 编译或汇编源文件, ETER. ERA ATI 缺省情况下， GCC 通过用 `.o' 替换源文件名后缀 `.ec' 文件名. 可以使用-o 选项选择其他名字.GCC忽略 -ec 选项后面任何无法识别的输入文件 -S F 何事情." into English is:

If you only want to perform a subset of the four stages (preprocessing, compilation, assembly, and linking), you can use the `-x' option (or the file extension) to tell GCC where to start, and use the `~-c' , `-s' , or `-E' option to tell GCC where to stop. Note that some option combinations (such as `-x cpp-output -E') {i gee MEF =c compile or assemble source files, ETER. ERA ATI By default, GCC replaces the source file name suffix with `.o' and the extension `.ec' . You can use the `-o' option to choose other names. GCC ignores any unrecognized input files following the `-ec' option -S F anything. The translation of the Chinese text "了的目标文件" into English is:

object files. The translation of the Chinese text "编译后即停止, 不进行汇编件" into English is:

Stop after compilation, do not assemble. The translation of the Chinese text "在编译过程的不同阶段间使用管道而非临时文件进行工作, 因为那些系统的汇编器不能从管道读取数据，GNU 的汇编器没有这个问题，汇编器能够接受的 C "方言 ": 支持符合 ANSI 标准的 C 程序." into English is:

Using pipes instead of temporary files between different stages of compilation, because some systems' assemblers cannot read data from a pipe, but the GNU assembler does not have this problem, the assembler accepts the following C "dialects": supports C programs conforming to the ANSI standard. The translation of the Chinese text "这样就会关闭 GNU Cc 中某些不兼容 ANSI Cc 的特性关键字, 以及诸如 unix 和 vax 这些表明当迎和极少使用的 ANSI trigraph 特性,以及禁上尽管使 用了(译注 :宿主环境 (hosted environment) 下所有的标准库可用，main 函数返回 一个 int 值, 典型例子是除了内核以外几乎所有的程序.对应的独立环境 (f£reestanding environment) 不存在标准库, 程序入口也不一定是 main, 最明显的例子就是操作系统内核.详情参考 gcc 网站最近的资料)" into English is:

This will disable certain GNU C features that are not compatible with ANSI C, as well as the ANSI trigraphs that are rarely used, such as those for Unix and Vax, and also disable the use of (note: in a hosted environment, all standard libraries are available, the main function returns an int value, typical examples are almost all programs except the kernel. In a freestanding environment, there is no standard library, and the program entry point is not necessarily main, the most obvious example is the operating system kernel. See the latest documentation on the GCC website for more details). The translation of the Chinese text "对于没有参数的函数声明, 例如 `int foo ();', 按 C 风格处理 --- 即不说明参数个数或类型. (仅针对 C++) ." into English is:

For function declarations with no arguments, such as `int foo ();', it is handled in the C style --- that is, the number and type of arguments are not specified. (Only for C++). The translation of the Chinese text "正常情况下, 这样的函数 foo 在 C++ 中意味着参数为空." into English is:

Normally, such a function foo in C++ implies that the parameter is empty. The translation of the Chinese text "节清单从这里删到试图支持传统 C 编译器的某些方面." into English is:

This section is deleted from here to support some aspects of traditional C compilers. The translation of the Chinese text "详见NU c 手册,我们已经把细节删除, 这样当内容过时后, 人们也不会 HERI." into English is:

See the NUC manual for details, we have omitted the details, so that when the content becomes outdated, people will not be confused. The translation of the Chinese text "除了一件事: 对于 c++ 程序 (不是C)，` -traditional' 选项带来一个附加效应,允许对 this 赋值." into English is:

One exception: for C++ programs (not C), the `-traditional` option has an additional effect, allowing assignment to `this`. The translation of the Chinese text "他和`-Ethis-is-variable' 选项的果一样." into English is:

It has the same effect as the `-Ethis-is-variable` option. The translation of the Chinese text "-traditional-cpp 试图支持传统 Cc 预处理器的某些方面." into English is:

-traditional-cpp attempts to support certain aspects of traditional C/C++ preprocessors. The translation of the Chinese text "特别是上面提到有关预处理器的内容, 但是不包括 `-traditional' 选项的其他效应." into English is:

Especially the content related to preprocessors mentioned above, but excluding the other effects of the `-traditional` option. The translation of the Chinese text "-fdollars-in-identifiers 允许在标识符 (identifier) 中使用 `$' 字符 (仅针对 C++) ." into English is:

-fdollars-in-identifiers allows the use of the `$` character in identifiers (only for C++). The translation of the Chinese text "你可以指定 `“-Efno-dollars-in-identifiers' 选项显明禁止使用 `$' 符." into English is:

You can specify the `-Efno-dollars-in-identifiers` option to explicitly disallow the use of the `$` symbol. The translation of the Chinese text "(GNU C++ 在某些目标系统缺省允许 `$' 符, 但不是所有系统.)" into English is:

(GNU C++ allows the `$` symbol by default on some target systems, but not all systems.) The translation of the Chinese text "-fenum-int-equiv 允许 ant 类型到枚举类型 (enumeration) 的隐式转换 (MEF c++) ." into English is:

-fenum-int-equiv allows implicit conversion from `int` type to enumeration (MEF C++). The translation of the Chinese text "正常情况下 GNU C++ 允许从 enum 到 int 的转换,反之则不行." into English is:

Normally, GNU C++ allows conversion from enum to int, but not the other way around. The translation of the Chinese text "-fexternal-—templates 为模板声明 (template declaration) 产生较小的代码 (仅限于 c++)，方法是对于每个模板函数 (template function),只在 定义他们的地方生成一个副本." into English is:

-fexternal-templates generates smaller code for template declarations (only for C++), by instantiating each template function only at the point of definition. The translation of the Chinese text "想要成功使用这个选项, 你必须在所有使用模板的文件中,标记`#pragma implementation'(定义)或 `#Pragma interface'(声明)." into English is:

To successfully use this option, you must mark `#pragma implementation' (definition) or `#pragma interface' (declaration) in all files that use templates. The translation of the Chinese text "程序用 `-fexternal-templates ' 编译时, 模板实例 (template instantiation) 全部是外部类型.你必须让需要的实例在实现文件中出现." into English is:

When compiling with `-fexternal-templates', all template instantiations are external types. You must ensure that the required instantiations appear in the implementation file. The translation of the Chinese text "可以通过 typedef 实现这一点, 他引用所需的每个实例." into English is:

This can be achieved by using `typedef`, which references each required instance. The translation of the Chinese text "相对应的, 如果编译时使用缺省选项 ` -fno-exteznal-templates', 所有模板实例明确的设为内置." into English is:

Correspondingly, if compiling with the default option `-fno-external-templates', all template instantiations are explicitly made inline. The translation of the Chinese text "所有的成员函数(除了构造子函数和 mnew 或 delete 成员操作符) 视为所在类的虚函数." into English is:

All member functions (except constructors and `mnew` or `delete` member operators) are treated as virtual functions of the class. The translation of the Chinese text "这不表明每次调用成员函数都将通过内部虚函数表." into English is:

This does not mean that every call to a member function will go through the internal vtable. The translation of the Chinese text "有些情况下, 编译器能够判断出可以直接调用某个虚函数; 这时就直接调用." into English is:

In some cases, the compiler can determine that a virtual function can be called directly; in such cases, it is called directly. The translation of the Chinese text "-fcond-mismatch 允许条件表达式的第二和第三个参数的类型不匹配." into English is:

-fcond-mismatch allows the types of the second and third arguments of a conditional expression to mismatch. The translation of the Chinese text "这种表达式的值是 Void.-fthis-—is-variable 允许对 this 赋值 (仅对 c++)." into English is:

original: 执行摘要
新冠肺炎对毒品市场的影响
其影响可能类似于2008年的经济危机
全球性的新冠肺炎疫情已使全世界陷入前所未有的危机。
在许多国家，这一疾病己使医疗服务机构穷于应付，几近崩溃，各国政府实施的限制措施已在全球经济中造成了严重紊乱。
对于毒品市场，这场疫情的影响尚不清楚，也很难预测，但有可能影响深远。
一些生产者可能会被迫寻找新的方法来制造毒品，因为限制流动的同时也限制了前体和基本化学品的获取。
贩运者由于旅行限制而无法越境，可能不得不寻找新的路线和方法。
毒品使用和提供的模式可能会改变，政府的应对能力也可能会受到阻碍。
新冠肺炎带来的转变是前所未有的，但还是可以从以往的危机中吸取一些经验教训。
2008年经济危机后，一些吸毒者开始寻找更便宜的合成物质，使用模式转向注射毒品。
与此同时，各国政府削减了与毒品相关的预算。
如果各国政府以同样的方式应对当前的经济衰退，预防吸毒和相关风险行为等干预措施和戒毒治疗服务可能会受到沉重打击。
此外，拦截行动和国际合作的优先性可能会降低，使贩运者更容易行动。
一些国家有大量毒品通过商业航班走私，预计这些国家的贩毒活动受到的直接影响最大。
有信使将甲基苯丙胺等合成毒品放在随身背包或藏在私人行李中携带，有时数量很大。由于几乎各地都对航空客运实施了限制，利用商业航空旅行供应毒品的活动可能会完全中断。
尽管国际邮政供应链也受到了干扰，但利用暗网和货物邮寄进行贩运的活动可能会增加。
从长远来看，经济衰退和相关的封闭措施可能会打乱毒品市场。
由于不断上升的失业率和缺乏机会，贫困和弱势人群将更有可能以有害的方式吸毒，患上吸毒病症，并转向与毒品有关的非法活动一无论是生产还是运输。
贩毒组织可能会利用这种情况，向脆弱人群提供服务，并招募新成员来壮大队伍。
随着政府应对能力的降低，这些转变可能会快速扎根，成为许多社区的新现实。
扩张与复杂性
市场增长
人口增长模式部分解释了市场扩张的原因
世界各地的吸毒现象一直在增多，无论是从总体数字还是从吸毒者在世界人口中所占比例来看都是如此。
2009年估计吸毒者有2.1亿人，占全球15-64岁人口的4.8%,而2018年估计吸毒者有2.69亿人，占这类人口的5.3%。
在过去二十年期间，发展中国家吸毒情况的增长速度远远快于发达国家。
这在一定程度上反映了这一期间总体人口增长的差异、发达国家为7%,发展中国家为28%但也反映了发展中国家年 轻人口增长较快。
青少年和年轻成年人在吸毒者中所占比例最大。
在2000-2018年期间，发展中国家这一年龄段的人口增长了16%,而发达国家这一年龄段的人口减少了10%。
1城市化是当前和未来毒品市场的一个驱动因素
无论是发达国家还是发展中国家，城市地区的吸毒情况都多于农村地区。
吸毒情况总体增多的部分原因是人口从农村向城镇的大规模流动一目前全世界人口有一半以上生活在城市地区，而1960年这一比例为34%。
城市化可能是毒品市场未来动态的一个关键因素，特别是在城市化趋势更为突出的发展中国家。
财富的增加与吸毒情况增多相联，但承受疾病负担最大的是最贫穷的人在世界范围内，发达国家的吸毒情况比发展中国家更为普遍。
可卡因之类的毒品更是与世界上较富裕的地区联系较为牢固。
同样，在各国内部，社会富裕阶层的吸毒流行率较高。
但转为吸毒病症的比率较高的却是社会经济地位较低的人。
来自少数几个国家的数据表明，有害的吸毒模式与病症同低收入之间存在联系。
这些模式在较富裕的社会阶层似乎不太常见。
全球新冠肺炎危机造成的经济制约很可能会加剧包括吸毒者在内的最弱势群体的风险。
例如，劳动力市场的变化，如失业率上升，过去一直与吸毒情况的增加有关，而这场疫情己经迫使全球数千万人失业。
新冠肺炎或将导致毒品市场进一步扩张新冠肺炎的大流行可能会导致更多农民增加或从事非法作物种植，或是因为国家主管机关的控制能力降低，或是因为在经济危机之下可能有更多人不得不铤而走险，从事非法活动。
新冠肺炎的相关限制措施导致空中和陆路交通减少，海上贩运可能已经因此而增加，海上的拦截风险低，而且比空中或陆路走私的数量更多。
最近已有报告称可卡因货物直接从南美经由海路运往欧洲。
translation: The translation of the Chinese text "执行摘要" is "Executive Summary". The translation of the Chinese text "新冠肺炎对毒品市场的影响" is "The Impact of COVID-19 on the Drug Market". The translation of the Chinese text "其影响可能类似于2008年的经济危机" is "Its impact may be similar to the 2008 financial crisis". The translation of the Chinese text "全球性的新冠肺炎疫情已使全世界陷入前所未有的危机" is "The global COVID-19 pandemic has plunged the world into an unprecedented crisis". The translation of the Chinese text "在许多国家，这一疾病己使医疗服务机构穷于应付，几近崩溃，各国政府实施的限制措施已在全球经济中造成了严重紊乱" is "In many countries, the disease has overwhelmed the healthcare system, on the brink of collapse, and the restrictive measures implemented by governments have caused severe disruptions to the global economy". The translation of the Chinese text "对于毒品市场，这场疫情的影响尚不清楚，也很难预测，但有可能影响深远" is "The impact of this pandemic on the drug market is unclear and difficult to predict, but it may have far-reaching effects". The translation of the Chinese text "一些生产者可能会被迫寻找新的方法来制造毒品，因为限制流动的同时也限制了前体和基本化学品的获取" is "Some producers may be forced to find new methods to manufacture drugs, as the restrictions on movement also limit access to precursors and basic chemicals". The translation of the Chinese text "贩运者由于旅行限制而无法越境，可能不得不寻找新的路线和方法" is "Traffickers, unable to cross borders due to travel restrictions, may be forced to find new routes and methods". The translation of the Chinese text "毒品使用和提供的模式可能会改变，政府的应对能力也可能会受到阻碍" is "The patterns of drug use and supply may change, and the government's response capabilities may also be hindered". The translation of the Chinese text "新冠肺炎带来的转变是前所未有的，但还是可以从以往的危机中吸取一些经验教训" is "The changes brought by the COVID-19 pandemic are unprecedented, but we can still learn from past crises". The translation of the Chinese text "2008年经济危机后，一些吸毒者开始寻找更便宜的合成物质，使用模式转向注射毒品" is "After the 2008 financial crisis, some drug users began to seek cheaper synthetic substances, and the use pattern shifted towards injecting drugs". The translation of the Chinese text "与此同时，各国政府削减了与毒品相关的预算" is "Meanwhile, governments around the world have cut budgets related to drugs". The translation of the Chinese text "如果各国政府以同样的方式应对当前的经济衰退，预防吸毒和相关风险行为等干预措施和戒毒治疗服务可能会受到沉重打击" is "If governments respond to the current economic downturn in the same way, prevention and intervention measures, as well as treatment services for drug addiction and related high-risk behaviors, may be severely hit". The translation of the Chinese text "此外，拦截行动和国际合作的优先性可能会降低，使贩运者更容易行动" is "Furthermore, the priority on interdiction and international cooperation may be reduced, making traffickers easier to operate". The translation of the Chinese text "一些国家有大量毒品通过商业航班走私，预计这些国家的贩毒活动受到的直接影响最大" is "Some countries have seen large quantities of drugs smuggled through commercial flights, and it is expected that these countries will be most directly affected by the trafficking activities". The translation of the Chinese text "有信使将甲基苯丙胺等合成毒品放在随身背包或藏在私人行李中携带，有时数量很大。由于几乎各地都对航空客运实施了限制，利用商业航空旅行供应毒品的活动可能会完全中断" is "Messengers carry large quantities of synthetic drugs such as methamphetamine in their backpacks or hidden in personal luggage, sometimes in large quantities. Due to restrictions on air travel implemented almost everywhere, the activity of supplying drugs through commercial air travel may be completely disrupted". The translation of the Chinese text "尽管国际邮政供应链也受到了干扰，但利用暗网和货物邮寄进行贩运的活动可能会增加" is "Although the international postal supply chain has also been disrupted, the activity of trafficking through the dark web and mail parcel may increase". The translation of the Chinese text "从长远来看，经济衰退和相关的封闭措施可能会打乱毒品市场" is "From a long-term perspective, economic recession and related lockdown measures may disrupt the drug market". The translation of the Chinese text "由于不断上升的失业率和缺乏机会，贫困和弱势人群将更有可能以有害的方式吸毒，患上吸毒病症，并转向与毒品有关的非法活动一无论是生产还是运输" is "Due to the rising unemployment rate and lack of opportunities, the poor and vulnerable populations are more likely to use drugs in a harmful way, contract drug-related diseases, and turn to illicit activities related to drugs, whether it's production or transportation". The translation of the Chinese text "贩毒组织可能会利用这种情况，向脆弱人群提供服务，并招募新成员来壮大队伍" is "Trafficking organizations may take advantage of this situation to provide services to vulnerable populations and recruit new members to expand their ranks". The translation of the Chinese text "随着政府应对能力的降低，这些转变可能会快速扎根，成为许多社区的新现实" is "As government response capabilities decline, these changes may take root quickly and become a new reality for many communities". The translation of the Chinese text "扩张与复杂性" is "Expansion and Complexity". The translation of the Chinese text "市场增长" is "Market Growth". The translation of the Chinese text "人口增长模式部分解释了市场扩张的原因" is "Population growth patterns partly explain the reasons for market expansion". The translation of the Chinese text "世界各地的吸毒现象一直在增多，无论是从总体数字还是从吸毒者在世界人口中所占比例来看都是如此" is "The phenomenon of drug abuse is increasing all over the world, whether looking at the overall numbers or the proportion of drug users in the world's population, it is the same." The translation of the Chinese text "2009年估计吸毒者有2.1亿人，占全球15-64岁人口的4.8%，而2018年估计吸毒者有2.69亿人，占这类人口的5.3%" is "It is estimated that there were 210 million drug users in 2009, accounting for 4.8% of the global population aged 15-64, and it is estimated that there were 269 million drug users in 2018, accounting for 5.3% of this age group." The translation of the Chinese text "在过去二十年期间，发展中国家吸毒情况的增长速度远远快于发达国家" is "In the past twenty years, the growth rate of drug use in developing countries has far exceeded that of developed countries." The translation of the Chinese text "这在一定程度上反映了这一期间总体人口增长的差异、发达国家为7%，发展中国家为28%但也反映了发展中国家年轻人口增长较快" is "This to some extent reflects the difference in overall population growth during this period, with developed countries at 7% and developing countries at 28%, but it also reflects the faster growth of young population in developing countries." The translation of the Chinese text "青少年和年轻成年人在吸毒者中所占比例最大" is "Youth and young adults account for the largest proportion of drug users." The translation of the Chinese text "在2000-2018年期间，发展中国家这一年龄段的人口增长了16%，而发达国家这一年龄段的人口减少了10%" is "Between 2000 and 2018, the population of this age group in developing countries increased by 16%, while the population of this age group in developed countries decreased by 10%." The translation of the Chinese text "1城市化是当前和未来毒品市场的一个驱动因素" is "1. Urbanization is a driving factor of the current and future drug market." The translation of the Chinese text "无论是发达国家还是发展中国家，城市地区的吸毒情况都多于农村地区" is "In both developed and developing countries, the prevalence of drug use is higher in urban areas than in rural areas." The translation of the Chinese text "吸毒情况总体增多的部分原因是人口从农村向城镇的大规模流动一目前全世界人口有一半以上生活在城市地区，而1960年这一比例为34%" is "One of the reasons for the overall increase in drug use is the large-scale migration of the population from rural to urban areas, as more than half of the world's population now lives in urban areas, up from 34% in 1960." The translation of the Chinese text "城市化可能是毒品市场未来动态的一个关键因素，特别是在城市化趋势更为突出的发展中国家" is "Urbanization may be a key factor in the future dynamics of the drug market, particularly in developing countries where urbanization trends are more pronounced." The translation of the Chinese text "财富的增加与吸毒情况增多相联，但承受疾病负担最大的是最贫穷的人在世界范围内，发达国家的吸毒情况比发展中国家更为普遍" is "While there is a correlation between increased wealth and increased drug use, it is the poorest people worldwide who bear the greatest disease burden, and in contrast, drug use is more prevalent in developed countries than in developing countries." The translation of the Chinese text "可卡因之类的毒品更是与世界上较富裕的地区联系较为牢固" is "Cocaine and other similar drugs are more closely associated with wealthier regions around the world." The translation of the Chinese text "同样，在各国内部，社会富裕阶层的吸毒流行率较高" is "Similarly, within each country, the prevalence of drug use is higher among the more affluent social classes." The translation of the Chinese text "但转为吸毒病症的比率较高的却是社会经济地位较低的人" is "However, it is those with lower socio-economic status who are more likely to develop drug-related health problems." The translation of the Chinese text "来自少数几个国家的数据表明，有害的吸毒模式与病症同低收入之间存在联系" is "Data from a few countries show a link between harmful drug use patterns and disease, and low income." The translation of the Chinese text "这些模式在较富裕的社会阶层似乎不太常见" is "These patterns seem less common in more affluent social classes." The translation of the Chinese text "全球新冠肺炎危机造成的经济制约很可能会加剧包括吸毒者在内的最弱势群体的风险" is "The global COVID-19 crisis is likely to exacerbate the risks faced by the most vulnerable groups, including those who use drugs." The translation of the Chinese text "例如，劳动力市场的变化，如失业率上升，过去一直与吸毒情况的增加有关，而这场疫情己经迫使全球数千万人失业" is "For example, changes in the labor market, such as rising unemployment rates, have long been linked to increased drug use, and this pandemic has already forced millions of people worldwide to lose their jobs." The translation of the Chinese text "新冠肺炎或将导致毒品市场进一步扩张新冠肺炎的大流行可能会导致更多农民增加或从事非法作物种植，或是因为国家主管机关的控制能力降低，或是因为在经济危机之下可能有更多人不得不铤而走险，从事非法活动" is "The COVID-19 pandemic may lead to the expansion of the drug market. The COVID-19 pandemic may lead to more farmers growing or cultivating illicit crops, either because of reduced government control or because in the economic crisis, more people may be forced to engage in illicit activities." The translation of the Chinese text "新冠肺炎的相关限制措施导致空中和陆路交通减少，海上贩运可能已经因此而增加，海上的拦截风险低，而且比空中或陆路走私的数量更多" is "The COVID-19-related restrictions have reduced air and land traffic, and sea trafficking may have increased as a result, with lower interception risks and more quantities than air or land smuggling." The translation of the Chinese text "最近已有报告称可卡因货物直接从南美经由海路运往欧洲" is "There have been reports that cocaine shipments are being transported directly from South America to Europe by sea."

The translation of the Chinese text "尽管国际邮政供应链也受到了干扰，但利用暗网和货物邮寄进行贩运的活动可能会增加" is "Although the international postal supply chain has also been disrupted, the activity of trafficking through the dark web and mail parcel may increase".
The translation of the Chinese text "从长远来看，经济衰退和相关的封闭措施可能会打乱毒品市场" is "From a long-term perspective, economic recession and related lockdown measures may disrupt the drug market".

The translation of the Chinese text "由于不断上升的失业率和缺乏机会，贫困和弱势人群将更有可能以有害的方式吸毒，患上吸毒病症，并转向与毒品有关的非法活动一无论是生产还是运输" is "Due to the rising unemployment rate and lack of opportunities, the poor and vulnerable populations are more likely to use drugs in a harmful way, contract drug-related diseases, and turn to illicit activities related to drugs, whether it's production or transportation".

The translation of the Chinese text "贩毒组织可能会利用这种情况，向脆弱人群提供服务，并招募新成员来壮大队伍" is "Trafficking organizations may take advantage of this situation to provide services to vulnerable populations and recruit new members to expand their ranks".

The translation of the Chinese text "随着政府应对能力的降低，这些转变可能会快速扎根，成为许多社区的新现实" is "As government response capabilities decline, these changes may take root quickly and become a new reality for many communities".
The translation of the Chinese text "扩张与复杂性" is "Expansion and Complexity".
The translation of the Chinese text "市场增长" is "Market Growth".
The translation of the Chinese text "人口增长模式部分解释了市场扩张的原因" is "Population growth patterns partly explain the reasons for market expansion".

The translation of the Chinese text "世界各地的吸毒现象一直在增多，无论是从总体数字还是从吸毒者在世界人口中所占比例来看都是如此" is "The phenomenon of drug abuse is increasing all over the world, whether looking at the overall numbers or the proportion of drug users in the world's population, it is the same."

The translation of the Chinese text "2009年估计吸毒者有2.1亿人，占全球15-64岁人口的4.8%，而2018年估计吸毒者有2.69亿人，占这类人口的5.3%" is "It is estimated that there were 210 million drug users in 2009, accounting for 4.8% of the global population aged 15-64, and it is estimated that there were 269 million drug users in 2018, accounting for 5.3% of this age group."
The translation of the Chinese text "在过去二十年期间，发展中国家吸毒情况的增长速度远远快于发达国家" is "In the past twenty years, the growth rate of drug use in developing countries has far exceeded that of developed countries."

The translation of the Chinese text "这在一定程度上反映了这一期间总体人口增长的差异、发达国家为7%，发展中国家为28%但也反映了发展中国家年轻人口增长较快" is "This to some extent reflects the difference in overall population growth during this period, with developed countries at 7% and developing countries at 28%, but it also reflects the faster growth of young population in developing countries."
The translation of the Chinese text "青少年和年轻成年人在吸毒者中所占比例最大" is "Youth and young adults account for the largest proportion of drug users."

The translation of the Chinese text "在2000-2018年期间，发展中国家这一年龄段的人口增长了16%，而发达国家这一年龄段的人口减少了10%" is "Between 2000 and 2018, the population of this age group in developing countries increased by 16%, while the population of this age group in developed countries decreased by 10%."
The translation of the Chinese text "1城市化是当前和未来毒品市场的一个驱动因素" is "1. Urbanization is a driving factor of the current and future drug market."
The translation of the Chinese text "无论是发达国家还是发展中国家，城市地区的吸毒情况都多于农村地区" is "In both developed and developing countries, the prevalence of drug use is higher in urban areas than in rural areas."

The translation of the Chinese text "吸毒情况总体增多的部分原因是人口从农村向城镇的大规模流动一目前全世界人口有一半以上生活在城市地区，而1960年这一比例为34%" is "One of the reasons for the overall increase in drug use is the large-scale migration of the population from rural to urban areas, as more than half of the world's population now lives in urban areas, up from 34% in 1960."

The translation of the Chinese text "城市化可能是毒品市场未来动态的一个关键因素，特别是在城市化趋势更为突出的发展中国家" is "Urbanization may be a key factor in the future dynamics of the drug market, particularly in developing countries where urbanization trends are more pronounced."

The translation of the Chinese text "财富的增加与吸毒情况增多相联，但承受疾病负担最大的是最贫穷的人在世界范围内，发达国家的吸毒情况比发展中国家更为普遍" is "While there is a correlation between increased wealth and increased drug use, it is the poorest people worldwide who bear the greatest disease burden, and in contrast, drug use is more prevalent in developed countries than in developing countries."
The translation of the Chinese text "可卡因之类的毒品更是与世界上较富裕的地区联系较为牢固" is "Cocaine and other similar drugs are more closely associated with wealthier regions around the world."
The translation of the Chinese text "同样，在各国内部，社会富裕阶层的吸毒流行率较高" is "Similarly, within each country, the prevalence of drug use is higher among the more affluent social classes."
The translation of the Chinese text "但转为吸毒病症的比率较高的却是社会经济地位较低的人" is "However, it is those with lower socio-economic status who are more likely to develop drug-related health problems."
The translation of the Chinese text "来自少数几个国家的数据表明，有害的吸毒模式与病症同低收入之间存在联系" is "Data from a few countries show a link between harmful drug use patterns and disease, and low income."
The translation of the Chinese text "这些模式在较富裕的社会阶层似乎不太常见" is "These patterns seem less common in more affluent social classes."

The translation of the Chinese text "全球新冠肺炎危机造成的经济制约很可能会加剧包括吸毒者在内的最弱势群体的风险" is "The global COVID-19 crisis is likely to exacerbate the risks faced by the most vulnerable groups, including those who use drugs."

The translation of the Chinese text "例如，劳动力市场的变化，如失业率上升，过去一直与吸毒情况的增加有关，而这场疫情己经迫使全球数千万人失业" is "For example, changes in the labor market, such as rising unemployment rates, have long been linked to increased drug use, and this pandemic has already forced millions of people worldwide to lose their jobs."

The translation of the Chinese text "新冠肺炎或将导致毒品市场进一步扩张新冠肺炎的大流行可能会导致更多农民增加或从事非法作物种植，或是因为国家主管机关的控制能力降低，或是因为在经济危机之下可能有更多人不得不铤而走险，从事非法活动" is "The COVID-19 pandemic may lead to the expansion of the drug market. The COVID-19 pandemic may lead to more farmers growing or cultivating illicit crops, either because of reduced government control or because in the economic crisis, more people may be forced to engage in illicit activities."

The translation of the Chinese text "新冠肺炎的相关限制措施导致空中和陆路交通减少，海上贩运可能已经因此而增加，海上的拦截风险低，而且比空中或陆路走私的数量更多" is "The COVID-19-related restrictions have reduced air and land traffic, and sea trafficking may have increased as a result, with lower interception risks and more quantities than air or land smuggling."
The translation of the Chinese text "最近已有报告称可卡因货物直接从南美经由海路运往欧洲" is "There have been reports that cocaine shipments are being transported directly from South America to Europe by sea."

original: 复杂性增强
非国际管制物质的出现情况稳定，但有潜在危害的新型类阿片正在增多毒品市场正日趋复杂。
除大麻、可卡因和海洛因等植物类物质之外，已经增添了数百种合成毒品，其中许多并不在国际管制之下。药品的非医疗使用也快速增多。
会员国的国内市场每年约有500种新型活性物质。
目前其中大多是兴奋剂，其次是合成的大麻素受体激动剂和少量的类阿片。
虽然新型精神活性物质的总体数量已经稳定下来，但比例发生了变化。
在2014年确定的新型精神活性物质种类总数中，类阿片新型精神活性物质仅占2%,但到2018年，这一数字己上升至9%。
类阿片新型精神活性物质中有许多是芬太尼的类似物，其药效和危害已得到证明，在北美导致了过量死亡事件，其他区域也有，但程度较轻。
在北美，芬太尼有的用作海洛因和其他毒品（包括可卡因和甲基苯丙胺）的掺杂剂，有的用来制造假冒的药用类阿片。
一些证据表明，欧洲也有注射新型精神活性物质兴奋剂的现象：一项对欧洲六个城市废弃注射器残留物的研宄发现，许多注射器都沾有产生兴奋作用的新型精神活性物质》
2新型精神活性物质的使用可能会逐渐牢固存在于弱势群体中
单一种类的新型精神活性物质几乎从未形成大的市场。
但来自欧洲的证据表明，合成大麻素在无家可归者和监狱囚犯等社会边缘群体中是一个严重的问题。
有22个国家报告了监狱中使用新型精神活性物质的情况，其中大多数国家将合成大麻素确定为主要挑战。
对前体化学品的管制迫使制毒者进行创新最常作为前体用来合成苯丙胺、甲基苯丙胺和“摇头丸”等毒品的许多化学品已被置于国际管制之下。
贩毒者和制毒者一直在寻找替代品一不仅有管制较松的物质，还有专门为规避管制而设计的化学品，即所谓的“特制前体”。
旨在阻止新冠肺炎传播的限制性措施很可能使依赖前体化学品的制毒者受到进一步挤压。
来自墨西哥的证据表明，这已经成为 现实：据报告，2020年3月，从东亚进口的甲基苯丙胺前体短缺促使墨西哥和美国的甲基苯丙胺价格上涨。
市场瞬息万变
合成药物在中亚和俄罗斯联邦取代阿片剂
中亚和俄罗斯联邦的阿片剂市场在2008年至2018年期间似乎发生了变化。
俄罗斯联邦当局截获的阿片剂数量下降了约80%，同时因使用类阿片而接受治疗的人数大幅减少。
但兴奋剂市场却似乎日渐兴旺。
有证据表明，甲基苯丙胺和各种卡西酮，包括甲氧麻黄酮和 a - 吡咯烷基苯戊酮，现在俄罗斯毒品市场上随处可见。
俄罗斯当局报告称，最近查获的制造各种非法药物的秘密加工点数量急剧上升，在两年内翻了一番多，2018年增至152个加工点。
阿富汗和伊拉克甲基苯丙胺市场增长
早在2012年，对医院、监狱和其他机构人员的调查就已经揭示了甲基苯丙胺在伊拉克的重要性。
结晶甲基苯丙胺已经成为“芬乃他林”和曲马多之外又一种令人担忧的主要药物。
2015年的一项研宄进一步证实了这些发现，吸毒者表示大麻比“芬乃他林”或甲基苯丙胺更难获得。
最近，伊拉克当局发现了多个甲基苯丙胺加工点，麻管局已对伪麻黄碱制剂的大批进口表示关切一甲基苯丙胺加工点将这些制剂用作前体。
在阿富汗，甲基苯丙胺制造似乎始于2014年。
自那时起，甲基苯丙胺的缉获量一直在稳步上升。
但2019年上半年的缉获量一^657公斤——与上一年相比大幅骤增。
在其他国家大量缉获了据认为源自阿富汗的甲基苯丙胺，这也表明该国的产量正在迅速上升。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "复杂性增强" is "Complexity enhancement" or "Increased complexity". The translation of the Chinese text "非国际管制物质的出现情况稳定，但有潜在危害的新型类阿片正在增多毒品市场正日趋复杂" is:

"The emergence of non-internationally controlled substances is stable, but new types of opioids with potential harm are increasing, and the illicit drug market is becoming increasingly complex." The translation of the Chinese text "除大麻、可卡因和海洛因等植物类物质之外，已经增添了数百种合成毒品，其中许多并不在国际管制之下。药品的非医疗使用也快速增多" is:

"Besides cannabis, cocaine, and heroin, hundreds of synthetic drugs have been added, many of which are not under international control. Non-medical use of drugs is also rapidly increasing." The translation of the Chinese text "会员国的国内市场每年约有500种新型活性物质" is:

"Member countries' domestic markets have approximately 500 new types of psychoactive substances each year." The translation of the Chinese text "目前其中大多是兴奋剂，其次是合成的大麻素受体激动剂和少量的类阿片" is:

"Currently, most of them are stimulants, followed by synthetic cannabinoid receptor agonists and a small amount of opioids." The translation of the Chinese text "虽然新型精神活性物质的总体数量已经稳定下来，但比例发生了变化" is:

"Although the overall number of new psychoactive substances has stabilized, the proportion has changed." The translation of the Chinese text "在2014年确定的新型精神活性物质种类总数中，类阿片新型精神活性物质仅占2%,但到2018年，这一数字己上升至9%" is:

"Among the total number of new psychoactive substances identified in 2014, opioids accounted for only 2%, but by 2018, this number had risen to 9%." The translation of the Chinese text "类阿片新型精神活性物质中有许多是芬太尼的类似物，其药效和危害已得到证明，在北美导致了过量死亡事件，其他区域也有，但程度较轻" is:

"Many of the new psychoactive opioids are fentanyl analogues, whose efficacy and harm have been proven, and have led to overdose deaths in North America, and also in other regions, but to a lesser extent." The translation of the Chinese text "在北美，芬太尼有的用作海洛因和其他毒品（包括可卡因和甲基苯丙胺）的掺杂剂，有的用来制造假冒的药用类阿片" is:

"In North America, fentanyl is used as an adulterant for heroin and other drugs (including cocaine and methamphetamine), and is also used to manufacture counterfeit prescription opioids." The translation of the Chinese text "一些证据表明，欧洲也有注射新型精神活性物质兴奋剂的现象：一项对欧洲六个城市废弃注射器残留物的研宄发现，许多注射器都沾有产生兴奋作用的新型精神活性物质》" is:

"Some evidence suggests that there is also a phenomenon of injecting new psychoactive stimulants in Europe: a study of discarded syringes in six European cities found that many syringes were contaminated with new psychoactive substances that have stimulant effects." The translation of the Chinese text "2新型精神活性物质的使用可能会逐渐牢固存在于弱势群体中" is:

"2. The use of new psychoactive substances may gradually become entrenched in vulnerable populations." The translation of the Chinese text "单一种类的新型精神活性物质几乎从未形成大的市场" is:

"A single type of new psychoactive substance has almost never formed a large market." The translation of the Chinese text "但来自欧洲的证据表明，合成大麻素在无家可归者和监狱囚犯等社会边缘群体中是一个严重的问题" is:

"But evidence from Europe shows that synthetic cannabinoids are a serious problem in homeless people and prisoners, etc. in marginalized social groups." The translation of the Chinese text "有22个国家报告了监狱中使用新型精神活性物质的情况，其中大多数国家将合成大麻素确定为主要挑战" is:

"22 countries have reported the use of new psychoactive substances in prisons, with most countries identifying synthetic cannabinoids as the main challenge." The translation of the Chinese text "对前体化学品的管制迫使制毒者进行创新最常作为前体用来合成苯丙胺、甲基苯丙胺和“摇头丸”等毒品的许多化学品已被置于国际管制之下" is:

"The regulation of precursor chemicals has driven manufacturers to innovate, and many chemicals commonly used as precursors to synthesize amphetamines, methamphetamine, and "ecstasy" and other drugs have been placed under international control." The translation of the Chinese text "贩毒者和制毒者一直在寻找替代品一不仅有管制较松的物质，还有专门为规避管制而设计的化学品，即所谓的“特制前体”" is:

"Traffickers and manufacturers have been constantly seeking alternatives, not only substances with relatively loose controls, but also specially designed chemicals to evade control, known as 'designer precursors'." The translation of the Chinese text "旨在阻止新冠肺炎传播的限制性措施很可能使依赖前体化学品的制毒者受到进一步挤压" is:

"Restrictive measures aimed at preventing the spread of COVID-19 may further squeeze those who rely on precursor chemicals for their illicit activities." The translation of the Chinese text "来自墨西哥的证据表明，这已经成为现实：据报告，2020年3月，从东亚进口的甲基苯丙胺前体短缺促使墨西哥和美国的甲基苯丙胺价格上涨" is:

"Evidence from Mexico shows that this has become a reality: according to reports, a shortage of methamphetamine precursors imported from East Asia in March 2020 drove up the price of methamphetamine in Mexico and the United States." The translation of the Chinese text "市场瞬息万变" is:

"The market is constantly changing" The translation of the Chinese text "合成药物在中亚和俄罗斯联邦取代阿片剂" is:

"Synthetic drugs have replaced opiates in Central Asia and the Russian Federation." The translation of the Chinese text "中亚和俄罗斯联邦的阿片剂市场在2008年至2018年期间似乎发生了变化" is:

"The opiate market in Central Asia and the Russian Federation seemed to have undergone changes from 2008 to 2018." The translation of the Chinese text "俄罗斯联邦当局截获的阿片剂数量下降了约80%，同时因使用类阿片而接受治疗的人数大幅减少" is:

"The number of opiate seizures by Russian authorities decreased by approximately 80%, while the number of people receiving treatment for opioid use also significantly decreased." The translation of the Chinese text "但兴奋剂市场却似乎日渐兴旺" is:

"But the stimulant market seems to be thriving." The translation of the Chinese text "有证据表明，甲基苯丙胺和各种卡西酮，包括甲氧麻黄酮和 a - 吡咯烷基苯戊酮，现在俄罗斯毒品市场上随处可见" is:

"There is evidence that methamphetamine and various ketamine, including methoxetamine and alpha-pyrrolidinohexanophenone (α-PHP), are now ubiquitous on the Russian illicit drug market." The translation of the Chinese text "俄罗斯当局报告称，最近查获的制造各种非法药物的秘密加工点数量急剧上升，在两年内翻了一番多，2018年增至152个加工点" is:

"Russian authorities reported that the number of secret manufacturing sites for various illicit drugs has skyrocketed, more than doubling in two years, reaching 152 sites in 2018." The translation of the Chinese text "阿富汗和伊拉克甲基苯丙胺市场增长" is:

"Methamphetamine market growth in Afghanistan and Iraq" The translation of the Chinese text "早在2012年，对医院、监狱和其他机构人员的调查就已经揭示了甲基苯丙胺在伊拉克的重要性" is:

"Even as early as 2012, investigations among hospital, prison, and other institution staff had already revealed the significance of methamphetamine in Iraq." The translation of the Chinese text "结晶甲基苯丙胺已经成为“芬乃他林”和曲马多之外又一种令人担忧的主要药物" is:

"Crystalline methamphetamine has become another major cause for concern, in addition to 'ecstasy' and tramadol." The translation of the Chinese text "2015年的一项研宄进一步证实了这些发现，吸毒者表示大麻比“芬乃他林”或甲基苯丙胺更难获得" is:

"A 2015 study further confirmed these findings, with users stating that heroin was harder to obtain than 'ecstasy' or methamphetamine." The translation of the Chinese text "最近，伊拉克当局发现了多个甲基苯丙胺加工点，麻管局已对伪麻黄碱制剂的大批进口表示关切一甲基苯丙胺加工点将这些制剂用作前体" is:

"Recently, Iraqi authorities have discovered multiple methamphetamine processing sites, and the Narcotics Control Board has expressed concern over large-scale imports of pseudoephedrine, which methamphetamine processing sites use as precursors." The translation of the Chinese text "在阿富汗，甲基苯丙胺制造似乎始于2014年" is:

"In Afghanistan, methamphetamine production appears to have started in 2014." The translation of the Chinese text "自那时起，甲基苯丙胺的缉获量一直在稳步上升" is:

"Since then, the seizure of methamphetamine has been steadily increasing." The translation of the Chinese text "但2019年上半年的缉获量一^657公斤——与上一年相比大幅骤增" is:

"But in the first half of 2019, the seizure amount of 1,657 kilograms - a significant surge compared to the previous year." The translation of the Chinese text "在其他国家大量缉获了据认为源自阿富汗的甲基苯丙胺，这也表明该国的产量正在迅速上升" is:

"In other countries, large quantities of methamphetamine believed to be from Afghanistan have been seized, indicating that the country's production is rapidly increasing."
