reference: Fitness industry must address trust crisis Yet another significant gym "thunderstorm"? Recently, concerns over the protection of members' rights by the well-known fitness organization Zhongjian Fitness have garnered public attention. Members found their stores faulty since Spring Festival, group members panicked over rumors of closure, prompting intervention from safety, HR, and social security departments. In the end, the organization's relevant chief executive promised to make great efforts to safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of workers and members, and the uproar died down. Fitness stores in financial trouble are closed for now, customers can be patient, "Why is 'not good' common among members' responses?" The crisis of industry trust is the root cause of the controversy surrounding the protection of fitness club members' rights. Conventional domestic gyms often use a prepaid model, and their evolution was motivated by "making money from users who can't come." Although it appears that the process of generating cash flow by pre-selling membership cards and building additional locations on a regular basis may be repeated, it is actually hard to establish a sustainable business model. Consumer confidence is significantly impacted by the widespread distribution of unfavorable information about sectors like running in the gym. Of course, gyms might be seen as a good business with "money potential" from the perspective of market prospects. The fitness track has had its ups and downs, but capital has always been interested in it. Many statistics demonstrate that the market is still growing and that consumption in the arts, sports, and other professions is becoming more and more popular. With regard to the fitness market, there is a lot of room for growth given the steadily rising living standards of locals and the widespread acceptance of the value of a healthy lifestyle. The requirement for the industry to focus on development quality increases as the situation improves. Despite consumption recovery, some institutions were overly optimistic about the fitness market and invested all financing funds in new store construction. 5x5 The epidemic led to institutions withdrawing and business restructuring, big firms are restructuring and acquiring selectively, not a new opportunity. But, the sector must alter the conventional model and its business strategy if it hopes to enter a positive feedback loop and follow a steady and long-term course. We can only genuinely win the market and the future by working consistently and regaining the confidence and security of consumers. The fitness business needs to settle down to maximize services and stabilize users with high-quality development, as opposed to opening additional locations to capture the market. To keep users, it is first vital to rely on services. The essence of the service sector, which includes the gyms, is to uphold "user orientation," pay special attention to customer needs, and improve service quality. To enhance user experience, second, rely on digital transformation. For instance, the current and widely used Internet gym model allows consumers to pay per view and select their own locations. Body data and sports data can be used to address societal demands and create a seamless closed-loop service from online to offline at the same time. Users are less concerned about "running away" from exercise facilities because there is no personal training promotion and no large annual card, and their sense of trust has also increased. Also, we need to actively investigate other business forms. Nowadays, watching sports is more like watching a scenario than just one service, fitness centers are anticipated to emerge as new points of access for consumers, sports gear and fitness equipment are examples of peripheral goods that could develop into new profit centers and give consumers more options. Tianjiao Jiang

original: 买贵退差价！
南京楼市再现“差价赔付”-中新网
扬子晚报讯(记者 马祚波)扬子晚报/紫牛新闻记者10日在采访中发现，十余年未见的“保价协议”又重回了南京楼市，位于江北新区的一家楼盘宣称“差价赔付”，在交房前其他房源的优惠大于之前的折扣，开发商愿意为买房人换房并退还差价。
“保价协议”条件可不少
这家位于江北新区的楼盘名为保利扬子萃云台，看房人孙先生告诉记者，他在上周末逛楼盘时发现了一则“声明”。
他发给记者的图片上显示，该楼盘的开发商承诺，凡是在2月1日-2月28日期间购买房源的，自双方签订买卖合同之日起至对应房源交付，若该项目其他房源的优惠折扣大于之前购房所享折扣的(限与该商品房属于同一户型、同一楼栋、同一单元、同一物业类型的其他未售商品房)，开发商可以为购房者换房并退还差价。
孙先生表示，置业顾问表示这其实就是一份“保价协议”，目的是让买家放心出手，不用担心开发企业降价促销，“现在就怕买完了它就降价了，去售楼处闹吧没时间，不闹的话也确实窝心”。
还有不少买房人则认为，“保价协议”虽然是在给购房者吃“定心丸”，不过条件却不低。
打算在江北买一套刚需房的郑女士说，保价的房源首先是要同一户型，还得在同一楼栋、同一个单元，买家可以比价的房源寥寥，因此“门槛”还是蛮高的。
也有购房者认为，由于信息不对称，销售时不排除给出额外的让利，买家“维权”的难度不小。
能否留住买房人有待观察
记者在南京网上房地产上查询得知，该楼盘于去年11月首领两幢楼共计252套房源的销许，户型面积有105平方米、114平方米、129平方米等，全装修销许均价为39843元/㎡。
不过两个多月过去，网上房地产显示目前该楼盘的未售总套数为157套，占比为62.3%，其中8号楼共计128套，未售套数达113套，7号楼的124套中也有44套未售，项目的总成交套数只有33套，占比仅为13%。
市场人士介绍，“保价协议”在2008年也曾在南京出现过。
当年8月份，河西黄山路上的楼盘横塘西苑为了吸引买房人眼球，推出了《保价计划》，具体内容为“公司郑重承诺，若一年内项目优惠幅度扩大，由此产生的差额，公司将按差额退还给老业主”。
此后2011年4月，南京也有9家楼盘拿出部分房源承诺“差价赔付”。
“楼市在回暖，此时更需要一针‘强心剂’。
”南京地产行业一位资深操盘手沈先生表示，“保价协议”也是房企的营销方式之一。
他认为如今开发企业比买房人更需要信心，推出“保价协议”其实也是在给其打气。
至于能否留住买房人，他表示这取决于调控政策、贷款门槛等多重因素的影响，就目前来看仍有待观察。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "买贵退差价" is: "Buy at a higher price, refund the difference." The translation of the Chinese text "南京楼市再现“差价赔付”-中新网" is: "Nanjing Real Estate Market Sees "Price Difference Compensation" Again - Xinhua Net" The translation of the Chinese text "扬子晚报讯(记者 马祚波)扬子晚报/紫牛新闻记者10日在采访中发现，十余年未见的“保价协议”又重回了南京楼市，位于江北新区的一家楼盘宣称“差价赔付”，在交房前其他房源的优惠大于之前的折扣，开发商愿意为买房人换房并退还差价。" is:

Breaking news from Yangzi Evening News (Reporter Ma Zupo) Yangzi Evening News/Violet Bull News Reporter discovered through an interview on the 10th that the "price protection agreement" which had not been seen for over a decade has returned to the Nanjing real estate market. A property in Jiangbei New District claimed "price difference compensation", offering greater discounts on other properties before handover than previous discounts, and the developer is willing to exchange properties and refund the price difference to homebuyers. The translation of the Chinese text "" is: "The conditions of the 'price protection agreement' are not few." The translation of the Chinese text "这家位于江北新区的楼盘名为保利扬子萃云台，看房人孙先生告诉记者，他在上周末逛楼盘时发现了一则“声明”。" is:

This property, located in Jiangbei New District, is called Baoli Yangzi Cuiyuntai. Homebuyer Mr. Sun told the reporter that he discovered a "statement" while visiting the property over the weekend. The translation of the Chinese text "他发给记者的图片上显示，该楼盘的开发商承诺，凡是在2月1日-2月28日期间购买房源的，自双方签订买卖合同之日起至对应房源交付，若该项目其他房源的优惠折扣大于之前购房所享折扣的(限与该商品房属于同一户型、同一楼栋、同一单元、同一物业类型的其他未售商品房)，开发商可以为购房者换房并退还差价。" is:

The picture he sent to the reporter shows that the developer of the property promises that for any property purchased between February 1st and February 28th, from the date of signing the sales contract to the delivery of the corresponding property, if other properties in the project have a greater discount than the discount previously enjoyed by the buyer (limited to other unsold properties of the same type, same building, same unit, and same property type), the developer will exchange the property and refund the price difference to the buyer. The translation of the Chinese text "孙先生表示，置业顾问表示这其实就是一份“保价协议”，目的是让买家放心出手，不用担心开发企业降价促销，“现在就怕买完了它就降价了，去售楼处闹吧没时间，不闹的话也确实窝心”。" is:

Mr. Sun said that the property agent explained that this is actually a "price protection agreement", the purpose is to let the buyer feel at ease when making a purchase, without worrying about the developer reducing the price for promotion, "Now I'm worried that it will be cheaper after I buy it, I don't have time to go to the sales office to complain, and if I don't complain, I'll really be worried." The translation of the Chinese text "还有不少买房人则认为，“保价协议”虽然是在给购房者吃“定心丸”，不过条件却不低。" is:

Many homebuyers also think that "the price protection agreement" may be a "calming pill" for buyers, but the conditions are not low. The translation of the Chinese text "打算在江北买一套刚需房的郑女士说，保价的房源首先是要同一户型，还得在同一楼栋、同一个单元，买家可以比价的房源寥寥，因此“门槛”还是蛮高的。" is:

Mrs. Zheng, who plans to buy a necessary house in Jiangbei, said that the properties with price protection are first of all the same type, and also need to be in the same building and the same unit, and the number of comparable properties is scarce, so the "threshold" is still quite high. The translation of the Chinese text "也有购房者认为，由于信息不对称，销售时不排除给出额外的让利，买家“维权”的难度不小。" is:

Some homebuyers also think that due to the information asymmetry, it is not ruled out that the salesperson may offer additional concessions during the sale, and the difficulty for the buyer to "exercise their rights" is not small. The translation of the Chinese text "能否留住买房人有待观察" is:

Whether they can keep the homebuyers is yet to be observed. The translation of the Chinese text "记者在南京网上房地产上查询得知，该楼盘于去年11月首领两幢楼共计252套房源的销许，户型面积有105平方米、114平方米、129平方米等，全装修销许均价为39843元/㎡。" is:

The reporter searched online real estate in Nanjing and found that the project sold 252 units in two buildings in November last year, with unit types and areas of 105 square meters, 114 square meters, and 129 square meters, and the average price for fully furnished units was 39843 yuan per square meter. The translation of the Chinese text "不过两个多月过去，网上房地产显示目前该楼盘的未售总套数为157套，占比为62.3%，其中8号楼共计128套，未售套数达113套，7号楼的124套中也有44套未售，项目的总成交套数只有33套，占比仅为13%。" is:

However, two months have passed, and online real estate shows that the total number of unsold units in the project is 157, accounting for 62.3%, among which 8th building has 128 units, with 113 units unsold, and 7th building has 124 units, with 44 units unsold, the total number of transacted units is only 33, accounting for only 13%. The translation of the Chinese text "市场人士介绍，“保价协议”在2008年也曾在南京出现过。" is:

Market insiders introduced that "price protection agreement" also appeared in Nanjing in 2008. The translation of the Chinese text "当年8月份，河西黄山路上的楼盘横塘西苑为了吸引买房人眼球，推出了《保价计划》，具体内容为“公司郑重承诺，若一年内项目优惠幅度扩大，由此产生的差额，公司将按差额退还给老业主”。" is:

In August of that year, the project "Hengtang Xiyuan" on the west side of Huangshan Road launched a "price protection plan" to attract homebuyers, with specific content being "the company solemnly promises that if the preferential rate of the project is expanded within a year, the resulting difference will be returned to the original owners in proportion to the difference". The translation of the Chinese text "此后2011年4月，南京也有9家楼盘拿出部分房源承诺“差价赔付”。" is:

After that, in April 2011, Nanjing also had 9 projects that came out with some units promising "price difference compensation". The translation of the Chinese text ""楼市在回暖，此时更需要一针‘强心剂’。" is:

"The real estate market is warming up, and now it needs a "strong stimulant" at this time." The translation of the Chinese text ""南京地产行业一位资深操盘手沈先生表示，“保价协议”也是房企的营销方式之一。" is:

"A veteran real estate operator in Nanjing, Mr. Shen, stated that "price protection agreement" is also one of the marketing methods of real estate companies." The translation of the Chinese text "他认为如今开发企业比买房人更需要信心，推出“保价协议”其实也是在给其打气。" is:

He believes that developers need more confidence now, and launching a "price protection agreement" is actually a way to boost their morale. The translation of the Chinese text "至于能否留住买房人，他表示这取决于调控政策、贷款门槛等多重因素的影响，就目前来看仍有待观察。" is:

As for whether they can keep the homebuyers, he said it depends on the impact of multiple factors such as regulatory policies and loan thresholds, and it remains to be observed for now.

original: 多项数据衰退 台湾经济开年表现不佳-中新网
新华社台北2月11日电(记者赵博、黄扬)出口贸易额“连五黑”，制造业采购经理人指数(PMI)连续7个月紧缩，消费者物价指数(CPI)又见“3字头”……近期，台湾当局陆续发布2023年1月经济数据。
专家分析认为，台湾经济开年表现欠佳，增长压力不小。
据台当局财政事务主管部门公布，台湾地区今年1月出口315.1亿美元，年减21.2%，连续第5个月负增长。
11项主要出口货类的出口额与去年同期相比，均出现衰退。
塑橡胶及其制品、光学器材跌幅最深，分别年减37.6%、35.7%。
电子零组件出口年减20.1%，创11年来最大减幅。
其中，集成电路年减18.3%，创14年来最大跌势。
该部门统计处长蔡美娜表示，这显示消费性电子产业需求疲弱效应扩散，电子产业进入修正期。
统计显示，1月台湾地区进出口双降，出超金额仅23.4亿美元，创近3年来最低水平。
台当局财政事务主管部门认为，全球终端需求减少，产业调整库存抑制厂商购料意愿，出口颓势短期难见改善，台湾今年首季出口衰退恐高于预期。
据台湾中华经济研究院发布，今年1月台湾制造业采购经理人指数(PMI)经季节调整后为40.4%，较去年12月续跌3.3个百分点，连续7个月紧缩。
经济监测指标体系中，PMI以50%为荣枯线，指数大于50%，代表景气扩张，反之为紧缩。
1月台湾PMI五项组成指标中，新增订单、生产与人力雇佣紧缩，供应商交货时间下降，存货紧缩。
六大产业全数回报PMI紧缩，各产业依紧缩速度排序为电力暨机械设备产业(35.1%)、电子暨光学产业(35.2%)、化学暨生技医疗产业(39.2%)、基础原物料产业(42.4%)、交通工具产业(42.6%)与食品暨纺织产业(45.7%)。
物价方面，台当局“主计总处”公布，今年1月台湾CPI年增率为3.04%，自去年7月以来再度冲破3%。
其中，蔬菜价格飞涨28.25%，创17个月新高。
台“主计总处”专门委员曹志弘坦言，菜价涨幅确实超乎预期，排除春节因素，今年1月和2月平均CPI应接近去年12月的2.71%，通胀压力还是存在，且仍在高点。
展望今年台湾经济，综合《联合报》、“Yahoo财经”等岛内媒体报道，专家表示悲观。
台“中央大学”经济系教授吴大任分析，出口衰退可能造成出口制造业厂商现金流出现问题，债务违约风险上升。
同时，订单减少导致厂商削减人力成本，影响劳动市场和家庭经济，反过来冲击消费能力。
台湾经济研究院研究员邱达生认为，今年欧美通胀状况未解，需求持续萎缩，预估台湾出口衰退会延续到上半年。
由于台湾经济靠出口支撑，受出口低迷影响，全年经济增长表现将不如去年。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Multiple indicators decline Taiwan's economy performs poorly at the start of the year - Chinanews.com" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Xinhua News Agency Taipei, February 11 (reporters Zhao Bo, Huang Yang) "Five consecutive blacks" in export trade volume, the manufacturing industry purchasing managers' index (PMI) has been shrinking for 7 consecutive months, and the consumer price index (CPI) has seen a "three-digit" figure again... Recently, the Taiwanese authorities have successively released the economic data for January 2023. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Experts believe that Taiwan's economic performance at the start of the year is not good, and the pressure for growth is not small. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

According to the Taiwanese government's financial affairs authority, Taiwan's exports in January were $3.15 billion, a year-on-year decrease of 21.2%, marking the fifth consecutive month of negative growth. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

The export volume of the 11 major export categories all declined compared to the same period last year. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

The decline in rubber and plastic products and optical instruments was the most severe, with year-on-year decreases of 37.6% and 35.7% respectively. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Electronic component exports decreased by 20.1% year-on-year, the largest decline in 11 years. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Among them, integrated circuits decreased by 18.3% year-on-year, the largest decline in 14 years. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

The department's statistics director, Tsai Mei-na, said that this shows the weak demand effect of the consumer electronics industry is spreading, and the electronics industry is entering a correction period. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Statistics show that both imports and exports in Taiwan decreased in January, with exports totaling only $2.34 billion, the lowest level in nearly 3 years. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

The Taiwanese government's financial affairs authority believes that the global terminal demand decrease, industry adjustment and inventory suppression of manufacturers' purchasing willingness, the export downturn is unlikely to improve in the short term, and Taiwan's export decline in the first quarter of this year may be higher than expected. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

According to the Taiwan Institute of Economic Research, Taiwan's manufacturing purchasing managers' index (PMI) after seasonal adjustment was 40.4% in January, down 3.3 percentage points from last December, marking the seventh consecutive month of contraction. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

In the economic monitoring index system, the PMI uses 50% as the boom and bust line, with an index above 50% indicating an expansion of the economy, and below 50% indicating a contraction. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

In January, among the five components of Taiwan's PMI, new orders, production and employment contracted, supplier delivery times decreased, and inventory contracted. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

All six major industries reported a contraction in PMI, with the contraction speed ranking as follows: the electrical and mechanical equipment industry (35.1%), the electronics and optical industry (35.2%), the chemical and biopharmaceutical industry (39.2%), the basic materials industry (42.4%), the transportation equipment industry (42.6%), and the food and textile industry (45.7%). The translation of the Chinese text is: 

On the price side, the "Directorate-General of Budget, Accounting and Statistics" announced that Taiwan's January CPI year-on-year growth rate was 3.04%, breaking through 3% for the second time since last July. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Among them, vegetable prices surged by 28.25%, hitting a 17-month high. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Taiwan's "Directorate-General of Budget, Accounting and Statistics" special commissioner, Cao Zhihong, admitted that the price increase of vegetables was indeed beyond expectations, excluding the Spring Festival factor, the average CPI for January and February should be close to last December's 2.71%, and the inflationary pressure still exists and remains at a high point. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Looking ahead to Taiwan's economy, according to reports from local media such as the United Daily News and Yahoo Finance, experts expressed a pessimistic outlook. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Taiwan's Central University economics professor Wu Daren analyzed that the decline in exports may lead to cash flow problems for export manufacturers, and increase the risk of debt default. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

At the same time, the reduction in orders led manufacturers to cut labor costs, affecting the labor market and household economy, which in turn impacts consumption capacity. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Taiwanese research fellow, Chiu Ta-shin, of the Taiwan Institute of Economic Research, believes that the inflation situation in Europe and the US remains unresolved, and demand continues to contract, and estimates that Taiwan's export decline will continue into the first half of the year. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Due to Taiwan's economy being heavily reliant on exports, the economic growth performance for the year will be less than last year, affected by the sluggish exports.

original: “全球复苏的重要引擎”-中新网
“应对新冠疫情冲击，中国经济展现出了强大韧性。
近期市场预期表明，国际社会普遍看好中国未来发展。
”西班牙知名中国问题专家、中国政策观察网名誉顾问胡里奥·里奥斯日前接受本报记者采访时表示，当前中国疫情防控进入新阶段，经济社会发展活力将进一步得到释放。
里奥斯表示，面对各种超预期因素冲击，中国以非凡的经济治理经验和措施沉着应对，充分体现出其经济韧性和管理水平。
中国坚定不移扩大对外开放的同时，经济发展的内生动力不断增强，国有企业和民营企业协同发展。
每年中国全国两会召开，代表委员共商国家发展大计、共议民生热点问题，广泛凝聚共识、凝聚人心、凝聚智慧，为中国发展增添力量。
“自改革开放以来，中国实现了长期高速发展，目前进入了高质量发展阶段。
国际社会期待中国智慧和中国方案，期待中国发展为世界带来新机遇。
”里奥斯说，当前中国正全力推动科技创新，为经济社会发展注入新动力，“资金投入、人才培养、政策激励，这让中国在新的五年规划中继续充满活力”。
在里奥斯看来，经济体制改革对任何国家来说都是一项艰巨的任务。
在中国共产党领导下，中国既发挥市场经济的长处，又发挥社会主义制度的优越性，采取积极主动措施稳定经济。
围绕扩大内需的战略基点，加大金融支持实体经济的力度，支持民营、中小企业和制造业发展，坚持创新发展，促进就业、提高中国民众的收入和生活水平，满足人民多层次多样化消费需求……中国完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，着力推动高质量发展，构建新发展格局，将为世界带来更多增长机遇。
今年是共建“一带一路”倡议提出10周年。
“疫情后经济企稳复苏是国际社会的共同目标。
中国经济发展潜力不断释放，将给世界各国带来更多利好，成为全球复苏的重要引擎。
”里奥斯表示，期待共建“一带一路”合作继续发挥其改善各国基础设施水平、加强各领域互联互通的重要作用，继续释放更大动能。
(本报马德里电)
(人民日报 记者 颜 欢)
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Global Recovery's Important Engine" - chinanews.com The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Facing the impact of the new crown epidemic, China's economy has shown great resilience." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Recent market expectations show that the international community is generally optimistic about China's future development." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Recently, Spanish renowned China expert and honorary advisor to China Policy Watch, Julio Rios, stated in an interview with our reporter that, at present, China's epidemic prevention and control has entered a new stage, and the vitality of economic and social development will be further released." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Rios stated that, facing various unexpected factors, China has calmly responded with its extraordinary economic governance experience and measures, fully demonstrating its economic resilience and management level." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"China has been resolute in expanding its opening-up while its internal driving force for economic development has been continuously strengthened, with state-owned enterprises and private enterprises developing in tandem." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Every year when the National People's Congress convenes, representatives gather to discuss national development plans and hot issues concerning people's livelihood, widely gathering consensus, gathering people's hearts, and gathering wisdom, thereby adding strength to China's development." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Since the reform and opening-up, China has achieved long-term high-speed development, and has now entered the stage of high-quality development." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The international community is expecting China's wisdom and China's solutions, expecting China's development to bring new opportunities to the world." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Rios said that currently, China is fully driving technological innovation, injecting new momentum into economic and social development, 'investment, talent cultivation, and policy incentives, this has allowed China to continue to be full of vitality in the new five-year plan.'" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"In Rios' view, economic system reform is a daunting task for any country." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Under the leadership of the Communist Party of China, China has leveraged the advantages of a market economy and the superiority of the socialist system, and taken proactive measures to stabilize the economy." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Centering on the strategic point of expanding domestic demand, increasing financial support for the real economy, supporting the development of private, small and medium-sized enterprises and the manufacturing industry, adhering to innovative development, promoting employment, increasing the income and living standards of the Chinese people, and meeting the diverse and multi-level consumption needs of the people... China will comprehensively, accurately, and fully implement the new development concept, make efforts to promote high-quality development, build a new development pattern, and bring more growth opportunities to the world." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"This year marks the 10th anniversary of the Belt and Road Initiative." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The economic recovery and stability after the epidemic is a common goal of the international community." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"China's economic development potential is constantly being released, which will bring more benefits to countries around the world, becoming an important engine for global recovery." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Riós expressed the hope that the Belt and Road cooperation will continue to play an important role in improving the infrastructure levels of various countries, strengthening connectivity in various fields, and releasing more driving force." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"(This report is from Madrid)" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"(People's Daily reporter Yan Huan)"

original: 报告：2022年回国求职留学生数量再创新高-中新网
2022年回国求职应届留学生留学国前10 图源：《2022中国海归就业调查报告》
中新网北京2月11日电 (门睿)近日发布的《2022中国海归就业调查报告》(下称“报告”)显示，2022年应届留学生规模同比增长8.6%，回国求职留学生数量再创新高，我国企业对海外人才的需求亦呈上扬态势。
报告指出，自2020年以来，在中国国内求职的海归数量明显增长，回国求职的应届留学生数量增多。
与2021年相比，2022年应届留学生规模同比增长8.6%，回国求职留学生数量再创新高。
从回国求职留学生的留学国家分布来看，英国占比最高，为41.4%，其次是澳大利亚(20.3%)和美国(9%)，排名与2021年一致。
从同比增速来看，2022年来自马来西亚、日本、新加坡的应届留学生人数同比大幅上升，增速分别为66.1%、50.9%和37.7%。
来自加拿大、德国、美国、澳大利亚的应届留学生人数同比下降。
2023春节后第一周海归人才供需走势 图源：《2022中国海归就业调查报告》
调研显示，决定回国的留学生中，58%认为“国内生活更加便利”，40%因“更认同国内的文化环境”决定回国，32%认为“国内就业机会更多”，22%认为国内经济活动会加速复苏，能获得更多就业机会。
数据显示，当前国内企业对海外人才的需求快速释放，对海归人才的需求呈上升趋势。
2023年春节后首周，海归优先的职位数和在国内求职的海归人数均呈上扬态势，2月3日的海归优先职位数比1月28日增长11%，海归求职人数增长27%。
从行业看，2022年海归优先岗位中，来自教育/培训行业的职位数占比27.8%，位居第一位，专业服务/咨询、互联网/电子商务行业分别以14.3%、11.1%分列二三。
近几年在国内求职的海归人数变化 图源：《2022中国海归就业调查报告》
从薪酬看，海归优先职位的平均招聘薪酬连续三年走高，2022年达14680元/月(人民币，下同)，比2021年的13719元/月增加961元，增长7%。
分地域看，2022年海归群体前往新一线城市、二线城市和三线及以下城市发展的意愿均有提升，2022年的投递占比分别为31%、15.7%和14.3%，均高于2021年的投递占比。
对于留学的收获，52.7%的海归表示基本符合预期，相比上年(49.9%)提高了2.8个百分点。
有28.2%的海归表示高于或远高于预期，这一比例也高于2021年的25.4%。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Report: Overseas students returning to China for job hunting reach a new high in 2022 - chinanews.com" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Top 10 countries of origin for returning students in 2022 to seek employment - Source: '2022 China Returnee Employment Survey Report'" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"chinanews.com Beijing, February 11 (Rui) - The recently released '2022 China Returnee Employment Survey Report' (hereinafter referred to as 'the Report') shows that the number of returning students in 2022 increased by 8.6% compared to the previous year, and the number of students returning to China for job hunting reached a new high, with domestic enterprises' demand for overseas talent also on the rise." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The report points out that since 2020, the number of returnees seeking jobs in China has shown a significant increase, with the number of returning students seeking employment in China increasing." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Compared to 2021, the number of returning students in 2022 increased by 8.6% year-on-year, with the number of students returning to China for job hunting reaching a new high." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"From the distribution of countries of origin of students returning to China for job hunting, the UK has the highest proportion, at 41.4%, followed by Australia (20.3%) and the US (9%), which is consistent with the ranking in 2021." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"From a year-on-year growth perspective, the number of returning students from Malaysia, Japan, and Singapore in 2022 increased significantly, with growth rates of 66.1%, 50.9%, and 37.7% respectively." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The number of returning students from Canada, Germany, the US, and Australia decreased year-on-year." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The trend of supply and demand of returning talent in the first week after the 2023 Chinese New Year. (Source: 2022 China Returning Talent Employment Survey Report)" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The survey shows that among the students who decided to return to China, 58% think that "life in China is more convenient", 40% decided to return because they "identify more with the domestic cultural environment", 32% think that "there are more job opportunities in China", 22% think that the domestic economy will recover faster and they can get more job opportunities." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The data shows that domestic enterprises have rapidly released their demand for overseas talent, and the demand for returning talent is on the rise." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"In the first week after the 2023 Chinese New Year, the number of priority positions for returnees and the number of returnees looking for jobs in China both showed an upward trend. The number of priority positions for returnees on February 3 increased by 11% compared to January 28, and the number of returnees looking for jobs increased by 27%." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"From an industry perspective, in 2022, the proportion of returnee priority positions from the education/training industry accounted for 27.8%, ranking first, followed by professional services/consulting and internet/e-commerce industries with 14.3% and 11.1% respectively." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The change in the number of returnees looking for jobs in China in recent years (Source: 2022 China Returnee Employment Survey Report)" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"From a salary perspective, the average salary for returnee priority positions has been rising consecutively for three years, reaching 14,680 yuan/month (RMB, same below) in 2022, an increase of 961 yuan/month from 13,719 yuan/month in 2021, a 7% growth." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"From a regional perspective, in 2022, the willingness of the returnee group to develop in new first-tier cities, second-tier cities, and third-tier cities and below all showed an increase, with the delivery ratio in 2022 being 31%, 15.7%, and 14.3% respectively, all higher than the delivery ratio in 2021." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"For the gains from studying abroad, 52.7% of returnees said it basically met their expectations, a 2.8 percentage point increase from last year (49.9%)." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"28.2% of returnees said it exceeded or far exceeded their expectations, a proportion also higher than 25.4% in 2021." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"(End)"

original: 费用省一半甚至更多？
河南省规范整合口腔种植医疗服务价格-中新网
央视网消息：种植牙是很多缺牙患者的理想选择，但一直以来，动辄上万元一颗的价格让很多患者望而却步。
今年以来，随着种植牙集采的加速落地，各地也将种植牙降价提上日程。
从2月10日起，河南省单颗常规种植牙医疗服务价格全流程调控目标为4300元，单颗常规种植全流程费用不高于调控目标的97%。
种植牙齿指的是一种以植入骨组织内的下部结构为基础来支持、固位上部牙修复体的缺牙修复方式。
记者从郑州大学第一附属医院了解到，以单颗常规种植为例，从种植到最后修复，价格大概要一万六七千元左右。
患者 何莹：新政策之后，大夫跟我说，像我这种情况差不多就是8000多元、不到1万元，基本上能省一半。
在现行项目基础上，河南省还整合确定了“种植体植入费(单颗)”等15个口腔种植类医疗服务价格项目，并统一制定省管公立医疗机构价格和医保支付类别，取消或调整了牙种植体植入术等20个医疗服务价格项目。
郑州市医疗保障局医药价格和招标采购处处长 李云杰：受益的主要是四方，一个是医保，医保的支出少了；医院的占压少了，病人会适当增加；对供应商来说得到了一个市场；对我们患者来说是得利最大的一方，植一颗牙的费用可能要减半甚至更多。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "费用省一半甚至更多" into English is:

"Costs can be reduced by half or even more." The translation of the Chinese text "河南省规范整合口腔种植医疗服务价格-中新网" into English is:

"Henan Province Standardizes and Integrates Dental Implant Medical Service Prices - Xinhua Net" The translation of the Chinese text "央视网消息：种植牙是很多缺牙患者的理想选择，但一直以来，动辄上万元一颗的价格让很多患者望而却步" into English is:

"CCTV News: Dental implants are an ideal choice for many patients with missing teeth, but the price of over 10,000 yuan per tooth has deterred many patients from pursuing this option." The translation of the Chinese text "今年以来，随着种植牙集采的加速落地，各地也将种植牙降价提上日程" into English is:

"This year, with the accelerated implementation of dental implant group purchasing, many places have also put reducing dental implant prices on the agenda." The translation of the Chinese text "从2月10日起，河南省单颗常规种植牙医疗服务价格全流程调控目标为4300元，单颗常规种植全流程费用不高于调控目标的97%" into English is:

"From February 10th onwards, the target price for a single standard dental implant service in Henan Province is 4300 yuan, and the cost of a single standard dental implant procedure shall not exceed 97% of the target price." The translation of the Chinese text "种植牙齿指的是一种以植入骨组织内的下部结构为基础来支持、固位上部牙修复体的缺牙修复方式" into English is:

"Dental implants refer to a type of tooth replacement method that uses an implant structure inserted into the bone tissue as the foundation to support and stabilize the upper restorative component for tooth replacement." The translation of the Chinese text "记者从郑州大学第一附属医院了解到，以单颗常规种植为例，从种植到最后修复，价格大概要一万六七千元左右" into English is:

"A reporter from Zhengzhou University First Affiliated Hospital learned that, as an example of a single standard implant, the price from implantation to final restoration is approximately around 16,700 yuan." The translation of the Chinese text "患者何莹：新政策之后，大夫跟我说，像我这种情况差不多就是8000多元、不到1万元，基本上能省一半" into English is:

"Patient He Ying: After the new policy, the doctor told me that for a case like mine, the price would be around 8,000 to 9,000 yuan, which is almost half the original price." The translation of the Chinese text "在现行项目基础上，河南省还整合确定了“种植体植入费(单颗)”等15个口腔种植类医疗服务价格项目，并统一制定省管公立医疗机构价格和医保支付类别，取消或调整了牙种植体植入术等20个医疗服务价格项目" into English is:

"On the basis of the current projects, Henan Province has integrated and determined 15 oral implant-related medical service price projects, including "implantation fee (per tooth)", and uniformly formulated the prices for public hospitals under provincial management and the medical insurance payment categories. It has also cancelled or adjusted 20 medical service price projects, including dental implantation surgery." The translation of the Chinese text "郑州市医疗保障局医药价格和招标采购处处长李云杰：受益的主要是四方，一个是医保，医保的支出少了；医院的占压少了，病人会适当增加；对供应商来说得到了一个市场；对我们患者来说是得利最大的一方，植一颗牙的费用可能要减半甚至更多" into English is:

"Zhenzhou City Medical Insurance Bureau's Director of Medical and Pharmaceutical Price and Procurement, Li Yunjie: The main beneficiaries are four parties. One is the medical insurance, the medical insurance expenditure has decreased; the hospital's burden has decreased, patients will increase appropriately; for the suppliers, they have gained a market; and for our patients, it is the greatest benefit, the cost of implanting a tooth may be reduced by half or even more."

original: 深圳：打造国内第一、世界领先的极速先锋城市-中新网
中新网2月11日电 据“深圳工信”微信公众号10日消息，深圳市工业和信息化局近日印发《深圳市极速先锋城市建设行动计划》。
其中提出，2023年底前，建成高速率、大容量、低时延的超级宽带网络，实现“双千兆、全光网、1毫秒、万物联”网络建设目标，打造国内第一、世界领先的极速先锋城市。
《计划》提出，加快升级千兆光网。
2023年底前，10G PON端口占比达到100%，全光工业园区(产业园区)数量超过100家。
《计划》要求，全面提升5G网络能效。
研究制定深圳5G网络服务质量规范标准，开展5G网络测试评估，提升5G网络服务质量。
支持基础电信企业加大对重点区域、场所5G网络的优化力度，全年新增5G基站10000个，全市平均下载速率达到500Mbps、上行速率达到100Mbps，重点区域下载速率达到1000Mbps、上行速率达到200Mbps，网络速率和用户体验感大幅提升。
打造城市级高品质无线局域网。
制定公共场所无线局域网(WLAN)服务规范，推动全市各区人员密集和信息消费需求集中区域WLAN升级，提供千兆接入能力。
依托“深i网”建设全市公共无线局域网统一认证监管平台，实现“一次认证、无感漫游、智能切换”，支持运营主体将具有公共服务能力的社会自建AP(无线接入点)纳入认证监管平台。
2023年底前，升级接入AP总量不少于2万个。
此外，《计划》还提出，建设高品质全光运力网络、构建多层次算力供给体系、加快关键通信网络设施建设、提升互联网应用服务能力。
《计划》明确，协同构建物联感知体系。
探索以“开源鸿蒙”操作系统为基础，构建城市感知终端建设管理模式，降低对接成本，加快建设城市级物联感知平台，推动市区物联网平台、各领域专业物联网平台网络与数据互联互通。
深化物联感知在城市管理、民生服务、公共安全、交通出行等领域应用，拓展城市道路、建筑、公共设施等固定感知与智能网联汽车等移动感知采集渠道。
2023年底前，水电气物联网感知终端数量超过900万，打造20个多功能智能杆应用示范项目。
《计划》还提到，加强卫星与地面通信融合应用、布局低空网络基础设施建设、推进海上5G网络深度覆盖。
同时，推进海上5G网络深度覆盖、构建产业创新发展生态、支持举办顶级赛事和活动。
(中新财经)
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

Shenzhen: Building the No. 1 domestic and world-leading speed pioneer city - chinanews.com The translation of the Chinese text is:

Xinhua News Agency, February 11th. According to the "Shenzhen Industrial and Information Bureau" WeChat public account, the Shenzhen Municipal Industrial and Information Bureau recently issued the "Action Plan for Building Shenzhen into a Speed Pioneer City". The translation of the Chinese text is:

It proposes that by the end of 2023, a super broadband network with high speed, large capacity, and low latency will be built, achieving the goal of "dual-gigabit, all-optical network, 1 millisecond, and all-connected" network construction, and building Shenzhen into the No. 1 domestic and world-leading speed pioneer city. The translation of the Chinese text is:

The plan proposes to accelerate the upgrade to gigabit optical networks. The translation of the Chinese text is:

By the end of 2023, 10G PON ports will account for 100%, and the number of all-optical industrial parks (industrial parks) will exceed 100. The translation of the Chinese text is:

The plan requires a comprehensive improvement in the energy efficiency of 5G networks. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Research and formulate the quality standards for 5G network services in Shenzhen, conduct 5G network testing and evaluation, and improve the quality of 5G network services. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Supporting the telecommunications enterprises to increase the intensity of optimizing 5G networks in key areas and locations, adding 10,000 new 5G base stations throughout the year, achieving an average download speed of 500 Mbps and upload speed of 100 Mbps across the city, with download speeds of 1,000 Mbps and upload speeds of 200 Mbps in key areas, significantly improving network speeds and user experience. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Building a city-level high-quality wireless local area network. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Formulate the service standards for public place wireless local area networks (WLAN), promote the upgrading of WLAN in densely populated and high information consumption areas across the city, and provide gigabit access capabilities. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Relying on the "Shen i-net" construction, build a unified certification and regulation platform for the city's public wireless local area network, achieving "one-time certification, seamless roaming, intelligent switching", and supporting the main bodies of operation to incorporate socially built APs (wireless access points) with public service capabilities into the certification and regulation platform. The translation of the Chinese text is:

By the end of 2023, the total number of upgraded access points (APs) will not be less than 20,000. The translation of the Chinese text is:

In addition, the plan also proposes to build high-quality all-optical network capacity, construct a multi-level computing power supply system, accelerate the construction of key communication network facilities, and improve the ability of internet application services. The translation of the Chinese text is:

The plan clearly states that it will collaborate to build a thing-to-thing perception system. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Exploring the construction of a city perception terminal management model based on the "open-source HongMeng" operating system, reducing the cost of integration, accelerating the construction of the city-level IoT perception platform, and promoting the interconnection and intercommunication of the city-level IoT platform, and various domain-specific IoT platforms. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Deepen the application of IoT perception in urban management, people's livelihood services, public security, and traffic travel, etc., and expand the channels for fixed perception of urban roads, buildings, and public facilities, as well as mobile perception collection channels such as intelligent connected vehicles. The translation of the Chinese text is:

By the end of 2023, the number of water, electricity, and gas IoT perception terminals exceeded 9 million, and 20 multi-functional smart pole application demonstration projects were created. The translation of the Chinese text is:

The plan also mentions strengthening the integration of satellite and ground communication, laying out low-altitude network infrastructure construction, and promoting in-depth coverage of 5G networks at sea. The translation of the Chinese text is:

At the same time, promote in-depth coverage of 5G networks at sea, build an industrial innovation development ecosystem, and support the hosting of top-level events and activities. The translation of the Chinese text is:

(Xinhua Finance)

original: 中国电商行业涌现“新变量”，带货如何做到“内容为王”？
-中新网
中新网2月11日电 题：中国电商行业涌现“新变量”，带货如何做到“内容为王”？
中新财经记者 夏宾
“我们入局电商算是晚的，但从最开始就意识到，想要从千千万万的店铺中脱颖而出，内容很重要。
”来自广东的“90后”女生芳芳，现在在抖音电商运营一家滋补食材店铺，让一家有着30多年历史的线下店在线上“开花”。
模仿老港片影调、配上经典粤语歌，打开@芳芳一人食抖音账号，精美的视频令人耳目一新。
在近日举行的抖音电商“寻找同行者·优质内容分享专场”上，芳芳作为优质创作者代表到场发言，介绍了日常创作的经历和体会。
她在现场说：“精心打磨的视频收获了很多网友的关注，好多人对我家的食材感兴趣，想跟着一起做美食，销路就一下子打开了。
芳芳靠着煲汤视频让更多人爱上“老广的味道”，一场直播最多卖出30万件滋补食材，挽救了家里濒临倒闭的老店。
“无内容，不电商”，随着短视频和直播电商不断发展，人们对电商内容的要求和标准正步入新阶段。
直播带货发展初期，直播间往往用低价折扣吸引用户，价格优势似乎成了当时的唯一卖点。
近年来，既有刘畊宏、东方甄选等现象级大V，也有在垂直细分领域出现的不少非大众所知的达人和商家，他们通过持续打造符合自己品牌调性的优质内容，提升长期经营效益。
抖音电商明星作者运营负责人高亚轩介绍，过去一年有627万创作者通过抖音电商将内容变现，他们的内容创作量增长了252%，总成交额也翻了一倍以上。
“在这些数字背后，我们能感受到一个蓬勃生长、具有旺盛生命力的作者生态。
”高亚轩说。
北京师范大学传播创新与未来媒体实验平台此前发布了《电商行业内容生态健康指数(ECHI)报告》，从数据维度解析了当前电商行业中“新变量”——优质内容的重要性，运用指数对国内27家主流电商平台内容生态情况进行了评估。
根据上述报告的电商行业内容生态健康指数排名，抖音电商、快手、淘宝、拼多多、京东位居前五。
报告认为，电商行业内容生态是一个综合性概念，是将电商与内容进行整合，但并非所有内容都可与电商整合，好的PGC(专业生产内容)与UGC(用户原创内容)才是与电商进行整合的优质载体，内容平台价值越高，消费与推广的场景也就越来越丰富，电商植入的可能性也就越高，商业价值也就越强，这种公共领域和私人领域逐步集成分布的电商内容生产和内容消费的比例也就会越高。
现场，北京师范大学新闻传播学院教授、中国传媒经济与管理专业委员会理事长喻国明对《报告》做了分析解读。
他表示，就内容价值而言，当前电商行业已经从“消费可及性”过渡到“消费品质化”阶段，优质、专业、差异化的内容是电商行业的“硬通货”。
同时，内容成为电商发展新阶段的根本和抓手，知识付费、专业性知识、KOL(关键意见领袖)等PGC内容开始在电商直播中成为标配。
展望电商行业的未来发展，喻国明提出两方面的建议。
一个是从内容结构提升的角度看，推动电商内容生态健康程度和质量整体提升，打造正向内容创作和管理标准，实现电商行业内容生态健康系统指数与动态均衡。
另一个是从外部生态看，要实现内容电商行业的健康发展和外部环境的价值协同与共创。
“未来电商行业还需要更多的数据、人工智能方面的支持，形成对未来发展稳定性的预测；此外，为商家提供更规范、健康的成长空间，实现电商行业中企业、用户、产品与服务的价值协同，共创健康内容生态。
translation: The Chinese e-commerce industry has given birth to a "new variable", how to make "content the king" in delivery? Xinhua News Agency Xinhua News Agency, February 11 - The Chinese e-commerce industry has given birth to a "new variable", how to make "content the king" in delivery? Xinhua Financial Reporter, Xia Bin "We entered the e-commerce market a bit late, but from the very beginning, we realized that in order to stand out from the millions of stores, content is very important." A 90s girl from Guangdong, Fang Fang, now operates a Douyin e-commerce store for nourishing food materials, and has made a traditional offline store with over 30 years of history "bloom" online. Imitating old Hong Kong film tunes and pairing them with classic Cantonese songs, opening @Fang Fang's one-person food Douyin account, the exquisite videos are a refreshing sight to behold. At the recent Douyin e-commerce "Seeking Fellow Travelers · High-quality Content Sharing Session", Fang Fang, as a representative of high-quality creators, attended and shared her experiences and insights on her daily content creation. She said on the scene: "After carefully polishing the videos, I gained a lot of attention from netizens, many people are interested in our food materials, and they want to make dishes together, so the sales just opened up suddenly. She said that after carefully polishing the videos, she gained a lot of attention from netizens, and many people are interested in her family's food materials, wanting to make dishes together, so the sales just opened up suddenly. Fang Fang relied on her soup-making videos to make more people fall in love with the "old Guangdong flavor", and in a single live broadcast, she sold as many as 300,000 nourishing food materials, saving her family's old store from the brink of bankruptcy. "The content is not there, there is no e-commerce", as short videos and live e-commerce continue to develop, people's requirements and standards for e-commerce content are entering a new stage. In the early stages of live streaming e-commerce, live streaming rooms often used low prices and discounts to attract users, and the price advantage seemed to be the only selling point at the time. In recent years, there have been phenomenon-level big V's like Liu Genghong and Dongfang Zhenxuan, as well as many lesser-known experts and merchants in the vertical and niche fields, who have achieved long-term business benefits by continuously creating high-quality content that matches their brand tone. Douyin e-commerce star author operation director Gao Yaxuan introduced that in the past year, 6.27 million creators have monetized their content through Douyin e-commerce, with their content creation volume increasing by 252%, and their total transaction volume doubling or more. "Behind these numbers, we can feel the vibrant and thriving creator ecosystem. "Gao Yaxuan said. Beijing Normal University's Innovation and Future Media Experimental Platform previously released the "E-commerce Industry Content Ecosystem Health Index (ECHI) Report", which analyzed the importance of high-quality content, a "new variable" in the current e-commerce industry, from a data perspective, and evaluated the content ecosystem of 27 major domestic e-commerce platforms using the index. According to the E-commerce Industry Content Ecosystem Health Index ranking in the aforementioned report, Douyin e-commerce, Kuaishou, Taobao, Pinduoduo, and JD.com ranked in the top five. The report believes that the e-commerce content ecosystem is a comprehensive concept, which integrates e-commerce and content, but not all content can be integrated with e-commerce. Only high-quality Professional Generated Content (PGC) and User-Generated Content (UGC) can be integrated with e-commerce. The higher the value of the content platform, the more diverse the scenarios for consumption and promotion, and the higher the possibility of e-commerce integration, and the stronger the commercial value. As a result, the proportion of e-commerce content production and consumption that integrates public and private fields will also increase. On the scene, Professor Yu Guoming, a professor at the School of Journalism at Beijing Normal University and chairman of the China Media Economics and Management Committee, analyzed and interpreted the report. He stated that, in terms of content value, the current e-commerce industry has transitioned from "consumption accessibility" to "consumption quality", and high-quality, professional, and differentiated content is the "hard currency" of the e-commerce industry. At the same time, content has become the fundamental and key driver of e-commerce's new stage of development, with paid knowledge, professional knowledge, and KOL (Key Opinion Leader) content, etc. of PGC (Professional Generated Content) becoming a standard feature in e-commerce live streaming. Looking to the future development of the e-commerce industry, Yu Guoming put forward two suggestions. One is from the perspective of improving content structure, to drive the overall improvement of the health and quality of the e-commerce content ecosystem, to create positive content creation and management standards, and to achieve a healthy and dynamic balance of the e-commerce industry content ecosystem index. The other is from the external ecosystem perspective, to achieve the healthy development of the content e-commerce industry and the value co-creation and collaboration with the external environment. "The future e-commerce industry also needs more support from data and artificial intelligence to form predictions for stable development in the future; in addition, to provide merchants with a more standardized and healthy growth space, and to achieve value co-creation and a healthy content ecosystem among enterprises, users, products, and services in the e-commerce industry." "(Complete)"

The top five e-commerce retailers based on their content ecological health index are Douyin E-commerce, Kuaishou, Taobao, Pinduoduo, and JD com. The article suggests that while not all content is relevant to e-commerce, there is a strong connection between e-commerce and content, user-generated and professional content can serve as a valuable tool for integrating e-commerce, the more opportunities for consumption and promotion, the more valuable the content platform becomes, as the distinction between public and private domains becomes less clear, there will be an increase in e-commerce content development and consumption. Professor Yu Guoming, head of the China Media Economics and Management Professional Council and dean of Beijing Normal University's School of Journalism and Communication, conducted an analysis and interpretation of the "Report" on the spot. At the same time, PGC content such knowledge payments, professional knowledge, and KOL (Key Opinion Leader) has started to become the norm in e-commerce live broadcasts, serving as the cornerstone and launch point of the future stage of e-commerce development. Yu Guoming made two recommendations in anticipation of the e-commerce sector's future growth. The first is to encourage the general improvement of the ecological health and quality of e-commerce content from the perspective of content structure improvement, develop positive standards for content creation and management, and achieve the index and dynamic balance of the e-commerce industry content ecological health system. From the standpoint of external ecology, it is important to realize the healthy development of the content e-commerce sector as well as the value synergy and co-creation of the external environment. To ensure stability and growth in the e-commerce sector, data and artificial intelligence will be crucial, this will create a standardized and healthy environment for businesses, consumers, and products to integrate, the focus should be on developing a strong content ecosystem that emphasizes the value of services. "(over)

original: 北交所融资融券交易业务下周启动-中新网
本报讯(记者 孙杰)昨晚，北交所发布消息，经中国证监会批准，北京证券交易所融资融券交易业务将于2月13日正式启动，届时已取得北交所融资融券交易权限的证券公司可接受投资者委托，向北交所进行融资融券交易申报。
首批56只融资融券标的股票名单以2023年1月31日为计算基准日确定。
北交所表示，融资融券标的股票名单和可充抵保证金证券名单将通过北交所官网的“信息披露-融资融券信息”栏目公布，方便投资者查询。
融资融券是证券市场重要的基础性制度，也是国际证券市场中较为成熟的交易方式。
去年9月2日，在宣布设立一周年之际，北交所对融资融券业务公开征求意见。
北交所融资融券交易的启动是持续推进北交所市场制度建设、完善交易机制、提升二级市场定价功能的重要举措。
融资融券制度有利于丰富投资者交易策略，满足投资者多元交易需求，促进市场价格发现，进一步提升市场流动性。
下一步，北交所将在中国证监会的领导下，持续做好融资融券业务各项保障工作，以投资者需求为导向丰富交易制度工具，完善相关配套机制，着力打造服务创新型中小企业的一流交易所。
translation:
The text in Chinese is: "北交所融资融券交易业务下周启动-中新网"

The translation in English is: "Northbound Interbank Market to Launch Financing and Securities Lending Business Next Week - Xinhua Net" The text in Chinese is: "本报讯(记者 孙杰)昨晚，北交所发布消息，经中国证监会批准，北京证券交易所融资融券交易业务将于2月13日正式启动，届时已取得北交所融资融券交易权限的证券公司可接受投资者委托，向北交所进行融资融券交易申报。"

The translation in English is: "Our newspaper reported (Reporter Sun Jie) last night, the Northbound Interbank Market announced that, after approval from the China Securities Regulatory Commission, the financing and securities lending business of the Beijing Securities Exchange will officially launch on February 13. At that time, securities companies that have obtained the financing and securities lending trading permission of the Northbound Interbank Market can accept investor entrustments and submit financing and securities lending trading applications to the Northbound Interbank Market." The text in Chinese is: "首批56只融资融券标的股票名单以2023年1月31日为计算基准日确定。"

The translation in English is: "The list of the first batch of 56 stocks eligible for financing and securities lending was determined based on January 31, 2023, as the benchmark date." The text in Chinese is: "北交所表示，融资融券标的股票名单和可充抵保证金证券名单将通过北交所官网的“信息披露-融资融券信息”栏目公布，方便投资者查询。"

The translation in English is: "The Northbound Interbank Market stated that the list of stocks eligible for financing and securities lending and the list of securities that can be used as margin will be published on the "Financing and Securities Lending Information" section of the Northbound Interbank Market's official website, for the convenience of investors to inquire." The text in Chinese is: "融资融券是证券市场重要的基础性制度，也是国际证券市场中较为成熟的交易方式。"

The translation in English is: "Financing and securities lending is an important foundational system in the securities market, and it is also a relatively mature trading method in the international securities market." The text in Chinese is: "去年9月2日，在宣布设立一周年之际，北交所对融资融券业务公开征求意见。"

The translation in English is: "On September 2 last year, on the occasion of the first anniversary of its establishment, the Northbound Interbank Market solicited public opinions on the financing and securities lending business." The text in Chinese is: "北交所融资融券交易的启动是持续推进北交所市场制度建设、完善交易机制、提升二级市场定价功能的重要举措。"

The translation in English is: "The launch of financing and securities lending transactions on the Northbound Interbank Market is an important measure to continuously promote the construction of the Northbound Interbank Market's market system, improve the trading mechanism, and enhance the pricing function of the secondary market." The text in Chinese is: "融资融券制度有利于丰富投资者交易策略，满足投资者多元交易需求，促进市场价格发现，进一步提升市场流动性。"

The translation in English is: "The financing and securities lending system is beneficial to enrich investors' trading strategies, meet the diversified trading needs of investors, promote market price discovery, and further improve market liquidity." The text in Chinese is: "下一步，北交所将在中国证监会的领导下，持续做好融资融券业务各项保障工作，以投资者需求为导向丰富交易制度工具，完善相关配套机制，着力打造服务创新型中小企业的一流交易所。"

The translation in English is: "In the next step, the Northbound Interbank Market will, under the leadership of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, continue to do a good job in ensuring the various aspects of the financing and securities lending business, with investor demand as the guide, enrich trading system tools, improve relevant supporting mechanisms, and strive to build a world-class exchange that serves innovative small and medium-sized enterprises."

reference_split: “Beijing Financial Exchange's margin trading and securities lending business to launch next week - China News Network”

(Reporter Sun Jie) Last night, the Beijing Stock Exchange (BSE) issued a news release, approved by the China Securities Regulatory Commission, the Beijing Stock Exchange financing and securities trading business will be officially launched on February 13, when the securities companies that have obtained the BSE's financing and securities trading authority can accept investors' entrustment and declare financing and securities trading to the BSE.
The initial list of 56 margin trading and securities lending eligible stocks was determined as of January 31, 2023.

"According to the BSE, the list of stocks subject to financing and financing and the list of securities eligible for margin will be published through the ""Information Disclosure - Financing and Financing Information"" section of the BSE's official website for the convenience of investors."
Margin trading and securities lending is an important foundational system in the securities market and is also a more mature trading method in international securities markets.

On September 2 of last year, on the occasion of its first anniversary since establishment, Beijing Financial Exchange (Beijing Exchange) publicly solicited opinions regarding the margin trading and securities lending business.

The launch of margin trading and securities lending trading by Beijing Financial Exchange (Beijing Exchange) is an important measure in the continuous promotion of market system construction, improvement of trading mechanisms, and enhancement of the pricing function of the secondary market for the Beijing Exchange.

The margin trading and securities lending system is beneficial for enriching investors' trading strategies, meeting diverse trading demands, promoting market price discovery, and further enhancing market liquidity.

In the next step, under the leadership of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, the Beijing Stock Exchange will continue to enhance various safeguards for margin trading and securities lending business, enrich trading system tools based on investor demand, improve relevant supporting mechanisms, and strive to build a first-class exchange that serves innovative small and medium-sized enterprises.

original: 第十六届中日节能环保综合论坛在京举办 何立峰出席主论坛并发表主旨演讲-中新网
新华社北京2月11日电 2月11日，第十六届中日节能环保综合论坛以线上线下相结合方式在北京举办。
中共中央政治局委员、国家发展改革委主任何立峰出席主论坛并发表主旨演讲。
何立峰指出，举办本届论坛是落实习近平主席和岸田文雄首相曼谷会晤共识、加强中日绿色发展合作的重要举措。
中国将全面贯彻落实中共二十大精神，加快发展方式绿色转型，深入推进环境污染防治，全面加强资源节约，积极稳妥推进碳达峰碳中和，协同推进降碳、减污、扩绿、增长，推进生态优先、节约集约、绿色低碳发展。
中国愿同日方一道，继续深化绿色低碳产业合作、技术合作、政策对话和人文交流，推动两国绿色发展合作不断迈上新台阶。
日本经济产业大臣西村康稔出席主论坛并发表主旨演讲。
论坛由中国国家发展改革委、商务部与日本经济产业省、日中经济协会共同举办，包括主论坛和能效提高、汽车电动化智能化、氢能、中日长期贸易4个分论坛。
来自中日两国政府、企业、机构的代表进行了交流。
translation: The 16th China-Japan Energy and Environment Comprehensive Forum was held in Beijing. He Lifeng attended the main forum and delivered a keynote speech. - chinanews.com Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, February 11 - The 16th China-Japan Energy and Environment Comprehensive Forum was held in Beijing in a combination of online and offline formats on February 11. He Lifeng, a member of the Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China and the Director of the National Development and Reform Commission, attended the main forum and delivered a keynote speech. He Lifeng pointed out that holding this forum is an important measure to implement the consensus reached by President Xi Jinping and Prime Minister Fumio Kishida at their meeting in Bangkok and to strengthen China-Japan green development cooperation. China will comprehensively implement the spirit of the 20th CPC National Congress, accelerate the green transformation of development, deeply promote environmental pollution prevention and control, comprehensively strengthen resource conservation, actively and steadily promote carbon peaking and carbon neutrality, and promote the coordinated development of reducing carbon emissions, reducing pollution, expanding green space, and increasing growth, and promote the development of prioritizing ecology, conserving and intensifying, and being low-carbon green. China is willing to work with Japan to deepen cooperation in green low-carbon industries, technology, policy dialogue, and cultural exchanges, and promote China-Japan green development cooperation to continue to make new progress. Japanese Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry, Nishimura Yasutaka, attended the main forum and delivered a keynote speech. The forum was co-hosted by the National Development and Reform Commission, the Ministry of Commerce of China, the Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry of Japan, and the Japan-China Economic Association, and included the main forum and four sub-forums on energy efficiency improvement, electric and intelligent vehicle, hydrogen energy, and long-term trade between China and Japan. Representatives from the governments, enterprises, and institutions of China and Japan participated in the exchange.

original: 中国救援队在土耳其持续开展救援行动 已营救4名被困人员-中新网
中新网2月11日电 据应急管理部网站11日消息，2月10日，正在土耳其搜救的中国救援队派出3个行动分队、45名救援队员，营救出1名被困人员。
同时派出2个搜索评估组，对沃达巴什大街15栋建筑进行评估排查。
截至目前，共营救4名被困人员，搜寻出5名遇难者，对25栋倒塌严重的建筑进行生命迹象和风险评估。
救援队将根据灾区实际和救援现场情况，科学调整救援力量，持续深入开展救援工作。
救援队通过使馆、当地政府、联合国救援组织等多种渠道获取救援求助信息，通过线上询情、现场搜索等多种方式进行逐一核实。
向中国香港救援队介绍目前救援环境和建筑坍塌等情况，联合开展搜索行动。
目前与意大利救援队联合负责区域协调(SSC5)，同时派遣3名队员参加5号区域救援协调中心工作，与意大利、英国、塞尔维亚、斯洛伐克、阿曼等多支队伍进行沟通，了解了联合国救援组织和各国救援队救援工作情况。
救援队持续强化安全管理和队伍保障，按照“统一指挥、安全第一”原则，加强救援现场安全管控，强化救援工作纪律要求，明确安全注意事项。
持续运行轮值备勤和岗哨工作制度，强化营区安全管理。
救援队医疗人员每天为队员提供体检服务，加强重点人员医疗保障，目前救援队全员身体健康，开展营区消杀。
自营地建立后，后勤保障队员共搭建了指挥通信、装备存放、医疗洗消、生活住宿及犬舍等4大类26顶野战帐篷，保障现场救援装备30余套件。
translation: China's rescue team continues to carry out rescue operations in Turkey, having already rescued 4 trapped individuals - Xinhua Net. Xinhua Net, February 11 - According to the website of the Ministry of Emergency Management, on February 10, China's rescue team in Turkey dispatched 3 rescue teams and 45 rescue personnel, and rescued 1 trapped person. Meanwhile, two search assessment teams were dispatched to evaluate and inspect the 15-storey building on Vodabash Street. As of now, a total of 4 trapped individuals have been rescued, 5 victims have been found, and life signs and risk assessments have been conducted on 25 severely collapsed buildings. The rescue team will adjust the rescue forces according to the actual situation in the disaster area and the rescue site, and continue to conduct in-depth rescue work. The rescue team obtained rescue assistance information through various channels such as the embassy, local government, and the United Nations relief organizations, and verified the information through online inquiries, on-site searches, and other methods one by one. The rescue team briefed the Hong Kong rescue team on the current rescue environment and the situation of the collapsed buildings, and jointly conducted a search operation. Currently, the team is jointly responsible for regional coordination (SSC5) with the Italian rescue team, and has dispatched 3 members to participate in the work of the 5th Area Rescue Coordination Center, and communicated with the Italian, British, Serbian, Slovak, Omani, and other teams to understand the rescue work of the United Nations relief organizations and various national rescue teams. The rescue team has continued to strengthen safety management and team security, adhering to the principle of "unified command, safety first," to enhance safety control at the rescue site, strengthen the discipline of rescue work, and clarify safety precautions. The team has continued to implement the system of rotating duty and sentry duty, and strengthened camp security management. The rescue team's medical personnel provide daily health checks for team members, strengthen medical protection for key personnel, and currently, all team members are in good health, and disinfection and sterilization work is being carried out in the camp. After the camp was established, the logistics support team set up 26 large tents in four categories, including command and communication, equipment storage, medical and sanitation, living and accommodation, and kennels, to ensure that over 30 sets of rescue equipment are available on site.

So far, four trapped people have been rescued, five victims have been searched for, and vital signs and risk assessments have been conducted on 25 buildings that collapsed severely.

The rescue team will adjust the rescue forces based on the actual situation in the disaster area and the conditions at the rescue site, and will continue to carry out rescue operations in a comprehensive and thorough manner.

The rescue teams will obtain rescue requests and information through various channels, such as embassies, local governments, and the United Nations rescue organizations, and  verify the information one by one through methods like online inquiries and on-site searches.
Introduce the current rescue environment and the situation of building collapses to the Hong Kong rescue team from China, and jointly carry out search operations.

Currently jointly responsible for regional coordination with the Italian rescue team (SSC5), while sending three members to participate in the work of the regional rescue coordination center 5, and communicate with Italy, Britain, Serbia, Slovakia, Oman and many other teams to understand the rescue work of the United Nations rescue organizations and national rescue teams.

The rescue team continues to strengthen safety management and team security, in accordance with the principle of "unified command, safety first", strengthen the safety control of the rescue site, strengthen the discipline requirements of rescue work, clear safety precautions.
The rotation duty and sentry work system are being continuously implemented to ensure the ongoing operation and security management of the camp area.

The medical personnel of the rescue team provide daily physical examinations for team members, strengthen medical support for key personnel, also, all members of the rescue team are in good health, and disinfection and sanitation measures are being carried out in the base camp.

After the establishment of the self -operated place, the logistics support players have set up 4 major categories of 26 field tents such as command communication, equipment storage, medical cleaning, accommodation, and dog house to ensure more than 30 sets of rescue equipment on -site rescue equipment.

original: 新华社评论员：推进中国式现代化是一个系统工程——四论深刻领会习近平总书记在学习贯彻党的二十大精神研讨班开班式重要讲话-中新网
新华社北京2月11日电 题：推进中国式现代化是一个系统工程——四论深刻领会习近平总书记在学习贯彻党的二十大精神研讨班开班式重要讲话
新华社评论员
“推进中国式现代化是一个系统工程，需要统筹兼顾、系统谋划、整体推进，正确处理好顶层设计与实践探索、战略与策略、守正与创新、效率与公平、活力与秩序、自立自强与对外开放等一系列重大关系。
”在新进中央委员会的委员、候补委员和省部级主要领导干部学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想和党的二十大精神研讨班开班式上，习近平总书记科学把握现代化建设规律，深入系统阐明实践中需要处理好的一系列重大关系，为我们大力推进中国式现代化提供了科学方法论。
推进中国式现代化涉及经济、政治、文化、社会、生态文明等各个领域，关系治党治国治军、内政外交国防等方方面面，既要做好系统谋划，又要勇于改革创新，不断实现整体推进。
进行顶层设计，需要深刻洞察世界发展大势，准确把握人民群众的共同愿望，深入探索经济社会发展规律，使制定的规划和政策体系体现时代性、把握规律性、富于创造性，做到远近结合、上下贯通、内容协调。
推进中国式现代化是一个探索性事业，还有许多未知领域，需要在实践中去大胆探索，通过改革创新来推动事业发展，决不能刻舟求剑、守株待兔。
战略问题是一个政党、一个国家的根本性问题。
推进中国式现代化，要增强战略的前瞻性，以科学的战略预见未来、引领未来；要增强战略的全局性，着眼于解决事关党和国家事业兴衰成败、牵一发而动全身的重大问题；要增强战略的稳定性，战略一经形成，就要长期坚持、一抓到底、善作善成。
要科学把握战略和策略的辩证统一关系，把战略的原则性和策略的灵活性有机结合起来，灵活机动、随机应变、临机决断，在因地制宜、因势而动、顺势而为中把握战略主动。
中华民族是守正创新的民族。
处理好守正与创新的关系，既要守好中国式现代化的本和源、根和魂，毫不动摇坚持中国式现代化的中国特色、本质要求、重大原则，确保中国式现代化的正确方向，又要把创新摆在国家发展全局的突出位置，顺应时代发展要求，着眼于解决重大理论和实践问题，积极识变应变求变，大力推进改革创新，不断塑造发展新动能新优势，充分激发全社会创造活力。
效率是公平的重要基础，公平是效率的有力保证。
我们推进中国式现代化，既要创造比资本主义更高的效率，又要更有效地维护社会公平，更好实现效率与公平相兼顾、相促进、相统一。
处理好效率与公平的关系，不断实现发展为了人民、发展依靠人民、发展成果由人民共享，让现代化建设成果更多更公平惠及全体人民。
推进中国式现代化，需要处理好活力与秩序的关系，让社会既充满活力又安定有序。
要统筹好发展和安全两件大事，贯彻总体国家安全观，健全国家安全体系，增强维护国家安全能力，坚定维护国家政权安全、制度安全、意识形态安全和重点领域安全。
既在发展中更多考虑安全因素，通过发展提升国家安全实力，运用发展成果来夯实国家安全的基础，又善于营造有利于经济社会发展的安全环境，不断激发发展活力，实现高质量发展和高水平安全的良性互动。
推进中国式现代化，既要坚持走自己的路，又要拓展世界眼光，坚持对外开放，不断拓展中国式现代化的广度和深度。
要坚持独立自主、自立自强，坚持把国家和民族发展放在自己力量的基点上，坚持把我国发展进步的命运牢牢掌握在自己手中。
要不断扩大高水平对外开放，深度参与全球产业分工和合作，用好国内国际两种资源，拓展中国式现代化的发展空间，在互利共赢中共享发展机遇、共创美好未来。
循道而行，方能致远。
让我们在以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导下、在习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引下，把握规律、笃行不怠，充分发挥积极性、主动性、创造性，正确处理好一系列重大关系，在全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程上奋发有为，不断开辟中国式现代化新境界。
translation:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Xinhua Commentator: Advancing China's Modernization is a Systemic Project - Four Points on Deeply Understanding General Secretary Xi Jinping's Important Speech at the Opening Ceremony of the Study Session on Implementing the Spirit of the 20th CPC National Congress - Xinhua Net Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Xinhua News Agency Beijing, February 11 - Title: Advancing China's Modernization is a Systemic Project - Four Points on Deeply Understanding General Secretary Xi Jinping's Important Speech at the Opening Ceremony of the Study Session on Implementing the Spirit of the 20th CPC National Congress Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Xinhua Commentator Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Advancing China's modernization is a systemic project, which requires comprehensive coordination, systematic planning, and overall promotion, and properly handling major relationships such as top-level design and practical exploration, strategy and tactics, upholding principles and innovation, efficiency and fairness, vitality and order, self-reliance and opening up to the outside world." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"At the opening ceremony of the study session on learning and implementing the spirit of the 20th CPC National Congress and Xi Jinping's new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics, General Secretary Xi Jinping scientifically grasped the laws of modernization construction, profoundly and systematically expounded on the major relationships that need to be handled in practice, and provided a scientific methodology for our efforts to vigorously promote Chinese-style modernization." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Promoting Chinese-style modernization involves various fields such as the economy, politics, culture, social development, and ecological civilization, and is related to all-round aspects of governing the Party, the country, and the military, as well as domestic and foreign affairs, national defense, etc. It requires both systematic planning and the courage to reform and innovate, and to continuously achieve overall progress." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"To conduct top-level design, it is necessary to have a profound understanding of the trend of world development, accurately grasp the common aspirations of the people, and deeply explore the laws of economic and social development, so that the formulated plans and policy systems reflect the timeliness, grasp the laws, and are rich in creativity, and achieve a combination of long-term and short-term goals, a connection between the upper and lower levels, and a coordination of content." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Promoting Chinese-style modernization is an exploratory endeavor, and there are many unknown areas that need to be boldly explored in practice, and through reform and innovation to drive the development of the cause, and must not be like trying to find a sword in a boat that has already sailed away or waiting for a rabbit to come to the tree." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"A strategic issue is a fundamental issue for a political party and a country." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Promoting Chinese-style modernization requires enhancing the forward-looking nature of the strategy, using scientific strategic foresight to predict the future and lead the way; it requires enhancing the overall nature of the strategy, focusing on solving major issues that concern the rise and fall, success or failure of the Party and the country's undertakings, and that affect the whole body when one part is moved; it requires enhancing the stability of the strategy, once formed, it should be consistently adhered to, pursued to the end, and brought to a successful conclusion." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It is necessary to scientifically grasp the dialectical unity of strategy and tactics, combining the principled nature of strategy with the flexible nature of tactics, being flexible and adaptable, responding to changing circumstances, making timely decisions, and grasping the initiative in strategy by adapting to local conditions, responding to changing circumstances, and going with the flow." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"The Chinese nation is a nation that upholds tradition and innovates." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It is necessary to handle the relationship between upholding tradition and innovation well, both upholding the essence, source, root, and soul of Chinese-style modernization, firmly adhering to the Chinese characteristics, essential requirements, and major principles of Chinese-style modernization, ensuring the correct direction of Chinese-style modernization, and placing innovation in a prominent position in the overall development of the country, responding to the requirements of the times, focusing on solving major theoretical and practical problems, actively adapting to changes and seeking changes, vigorously promoting reform and innovation, and continuously creating new driving forces and new advantages, fully unleashing the creative vitality of the whole society." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Efficiency is an important foundation of fairness, and fairness is a powerful guarantee of efficiency." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"We promote Chinese-style modernization, both creating a higher efficiency than capitalism and more effectively maintaining social fairness, and better achieving a balance, promotion, and unity of efficiency and fairness." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It is necessary to handle the relationship between efficiency and fairness well, continuously achieving development that benefits the people, relies on the people, and shares the fruits of development with the people, so that the achievements of modernization construction are more and more fairly beneficial to all the people." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Promoting Chinese-style modernization requires handling the relationship between vitality and order well, so that society is both full of vitality and stable and orderly." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It is necessary to coordinate the two major tasks of development and security, implement the overall national security concept, improve the national security system, enhance the ability to maintain national security, and firmly maintain the security of the state's power, system, ideological, and key areas." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It is necessary to consider security factors more in development, to enhance national security through development, and to use the fruits of development to solidify the foundation of national security, as well as to create a favorable environment for economic and social development, constantly stimulating development vitality, and achieving a harmonious interaction between high-quality development and high-level security." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Promoting Chinese-style modernization requires both adhering to our own path and expanding our global vision, adhering to opening up to the outside world, and continuously expanding the breadth and depth of Chinese-style modernization." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It is necessary to adhere to independence and self-reliance, self-strengthening, and to put the development and progress of the country and the nation on the basis of our own strength, and to firmly grasp the destiny of China's development and progress in our own hands." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It is necessary to continuously expand high-level opening up to the outside world, deepen participation in global industrial division of labor and cooperation, make good use of domestic and international resources, expand the development space of Chinese-style modernization, and share development opportunities and create a beautiful future through mutual benefit and win-win cooperation." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Following the path, one can achieve far-reaching goals." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, and guided by the scientific theory of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the New Era, we must grasp the laws, work diligently without faltering, fully unleash our initiative, creativity, and enthusiasm, and properly handle a series of major relationships, and strive to make new and greater contributions on the new journey of building a modern socialist country, and continuously open up new horizons for Chinese-style modernization."
