original: Google AI聊天机器人“答错问题” 母公司股价蒸发千亿美元
（综合11日电）
Google新推出的人工智能聊天机器人Bard出师不利，在宣传短片中“答错问题”，导致Google母公司Alphabet股价周三一度急挫8.9%，跌破100美元大关，市值蒸发1100亿美元（约4765亿令吉），截至周五闭市报94.57美元。
市场担心Alphabet不及竞争对手微软。
根据《路透社》报道，google较早时在社交媒体发布AI聊天机器人Bard的宣传短片，片中有人询问Bard：“我可以告诉我9岁的孩子关于James Webb太空望远镜 (JWST) 的哪些新发现？
”Bard在回答中提到该望远镜曾拍摄到太阳系外行星的第一张照片。
不过，根据美国国家航空航天局资料，太阳系外行星的第一张照片是由欧洲南方天文台的“甚大望远镜”于2004年所拍。
《路透社》更以“Bard回答错误后Alphabet股价暴跌”为题报道。
另一方面，Google指出，Bard的回应“突显了严格测试过程的重要性”，会把外部反馈与自己的内部测试结合起来，以确保Bard的回应“在质量、安全和真实信息的基础上达到高标准”。
translation: Google AI chatbot "Answering wrong questions" Parent company stock price evaporates $1 trillion (Comprehensive report, 11th day) (Comprehensive report, 11th day) Google's newly released AI chatbot Bard made a poor debut, incorrectly answering questions in a promotional video, causing Alphabet, the parent company of Google, to plummet 8.9% on Wednesday, breaking through the $100 barrier, with a market value of $110 billion (approximately RM 476.5 billion) evaporating, closing at $94.57 on Friday. The market is worried that Alphabet is lagging behind its competitor Microsoft. According to a report by Reuters, Google had earlier released a promotional video for its AI chatbot Bard on social media, in which someone asked Bard: "What new discoveries can you tell me about the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) that a 9-year-old can understand?" "Bard mentioned in its response that the telescope had captured the first-ever photo of an exoplanet in our solar system." However, according to NASA data, the first photo of an exoplanet was actually taken by the Very Large Telescope (VLT) at the European Southern Observatory in 2004. Reuters reported on the story with the headline "Alphabet stock plummets after Bard's incorrect answer". On the other hand, Google noted that the incident highlighted the importance of a rigorous testing process, and that it would combine external feedback with its internal testing to ensure that Bard's responses meet high standards in terms of quality, safety, and verifiable information.
translation_split: Google AI chatbot "Answering wrong questions" Parent company stock price evaporates $1 trillion
(Comprehensive report, 11th day)

(Comprehensive report, 11th day) Google's newly released AI chatbot Bard made a poor debut, incorrectly answering questions in a promotional video, causing Alphabet, the parent company of Google, to plummet 8.9% on Wednesday, breaking through the $100 barrier, with a market value of $110 billion (approximately RM 476.5 billion) evaporating, closing at $94.57 on Friday.
The market is worried that Alphabet is lagging behind its competitor Microsoft.

According to a report by Reuters, Google had earlier released a promotional video for its AI chatbot Bard on social media, in which someone asked Bard: "What new discoveries can you tell me about the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) that a 9-year-old can understand?"
"Bard mentioned in its response that the telescope had captured the first-ever photo of an exoplanet in our solar system."
However, according to NASA data, the first photo of an exoplanet was actually taken by the Very Large Telescope (VLT) at the European Southern Observatory in 2004.
Reuters reported on the story with the headline "Alphabet stock plummets after Bard's incorrect answer".

On the other hand, Google noted that the incident highlighted the importance of a rigorous testing process, and that it would combine external feedback with its internal testing to ensure that Bard's responses meet high standards in terms of quality, safety, and verifiable information.
reference: Google AI chatbot 'answers the wrong questions', parent company's stock price drops by $100 billion (General 11) Google's new artificial intelligence chat robot Bard got off to a bad start and "answered the wrong question" in the promotional video, causing Google's parent company Alphabet's stock price to plummet 8.9% on Wednesday, falling below the $100 mark, and its market value evaporated by $110 billion (approximately 4765 billion ringgit), at US$94.57 as of Friday’s close. The market is concerned that Alphabet may not be able to compete with its rival, Microsoft. According to Reuters, Google earlier released a promotional video for Bard, an AI chatbot, on social media in which Bard is asked, "What can I tell my 9-year-old about the new discoveries of the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST)? In its response, Bard mentioned that the telescope had captured the first-ever photograph of an exoplanet outside our solar system." However, according to data from NASA, the first photograph of an exoplanet outside our solar system was actually taken by the Very Large Telescope (VLT) of the European Southern Observatory in 2004. Reuters reported with the headline "Alphabet stock plunges after Bard gives incorrect answer." On the other hand, Google pointed out that Bard's response "highlighted the importance of rigorous testing processes" and stated that they would combine external feedback with their internal testing to ensure that Bard's responses "meet high standards in terms of quality, safety, and accurate information."
reference_split: Google AI chatbot 'answers the wrong questions', parent company's stock price drops by $100 billion
(General 11)

Google's new artificial intelligence chat robot Bard got off to a bad start and "answered the wrong question" in the promotional video, causing Google's parent company Alphabet's stock price to plummet 8.9% on Wednesday, falling below the $100 mark, and its market value evaporated by $110 billion (approximately 4765 billion ringgit), at US$94.57 as of Friday’s close.
The market is concerned that Alphabet may not be able to compete with its rival, Microsoft.

According to Reuters, Google earlier released a promotional video for Bard, an AI chatbot, on social media in which Bard is asked, "What can I tell my 9-year-old about the new discoveries of the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST)?
In its response, Bard mentioned that the telescope had captured the first-ever photograph of an exoplanet outside our solar system."
However, according to data from NASA, the first photograph of an exoplanet outside our solar system was actually taken by the Very Large Telescope (VLT) of the European Southern Observatory in 2004.
Reuters reported with the headline "Alphabet stock plunges after Bard gives incorrect answer."

On the other hand, Google pointed out that Bard's response "highlighted the importance of rigorous testing processes" and stated that they would combine external feedback with their internal testing to ensure that Bard's responses "meet high standards in terms of quality, safety, and accurate information."

original: 新加坡旅游业复苏强劲 入境旅客比2021年增长19倍
（综合11日电）新加坡旅游局近日公布，预计2023年到访新加坡的国际旅客人次可达1200万至1400万，将带来约180亿至210亿新元的旅游收益；旅客人次和旅游收入将恢复到2019年新冠疫情前约67%至75%的水平；2024年旅游业实现全面复苏的可能性很大。
2022年新加坡旅游市场逐步重新启动和恢复。
新加坡旅游局最新发布的统计数据显示，2022年入境旅客从2021年的33.06万人次增长19倍，达到630万人次，超越旅游局早前预估的400万至600万人次，游客已经恢复至疫情前33%的水平。
2022年1月至9月，新加坡旅游收入共计89.6亿新元，预计2022年全年旅游收入可达138亿至143亿新元，比2021年的18.9亿新元增长6倍至7倍，已经恢复到2019年新冠疫情前约50%至52%的水平。
新加坡政府多措并举，加速旅游业复苏。
2022年4月，政府宣布拨款近5亿新元用来刺激旅游业复苏。
旅游局日前宣布，将计划在未来两年从这笔预算中拨出1.1亿新元，推出更多商业和休闲活动吸引旅客回流。
为了使健康养生成为新加坡的旅游亮点之一，新加坡旅游局在2022年11月23日发布了一份意向征集活动，计划在新加坡南部海岸开发一个健康养生景点。
新加坡旅游局体育与康养旅游执行署长王凌丽说，近年来，越来越多的游客把身体健康放在各项考虑因素的首位。
在拥有滨海湾花园、滨海堤坝的滨海南区开发一个健康养生景点，有望为新加坡的旅游业和经济作出贡献，让游客在新加坡消费并逗留更久。
新加坡旅游局局长陈建隆表示，未来几年内，健康养生将成为新加坡旅游产品的重要组成部分。
新冠疫情提升了公众对于身体和心理健康的认知和需求。
为此，过去两年旅游局一直向本地公众和国际游客推广健康养生项目。
2022年6月，新加坡旅游局举办了首届健康养生节，为公众提供了130多项各类健康活动和体验。
新加坡将持续为游客提供新的旅行体验。
除新开放的新加坡儿童博物馆、滨海湾花园的阿凡达世界、圣淘沙中央海滩市集、艺术科学博物馆新增的“探索新领域”展厅，以及夜间野生动物园新建的露天剧场外，旅游局将支持万态野生动物世界的飞禽公园等项目发展与更新，使新加坡成为具有吸引力的国际旅行地。
按照计划，新加坡将于2023年年内制定会议、会展与奖励旅游业可持续发展的相关行业标准，并着重改善废物处理和碳排放两大方面的问题，进一步优化旅游环境。
新加坡旅游业的复苏加快了航空业复苏。
数据显示，截至2022年12月18日，樟宜机场客流量强劲复苏，每天接待的乘客已多达15万人次，每周约100万人次，相当于新冠疫情前的75%左右，航空业员工在岗数量也已经恢复到疫情前约90%的水平。
数据显示，2022年1月至10月新加坡已接待旅客2360万人次，相当于新冠疫情前的42%，起降航班17万架次，是疫情前的53%。
旅游业快速复苏，也带动了住宿、交通、餐饮和购物等行业的复苏步伐。
新加坡政府和旅游业对中国市场寄予厚望。
新加坡旅游局国际司助理局长柯淑丹说，中国旅行平台的一项调查显示，新加坡的安全指数位列全球前三，这也是新加坡深受中国游客喜爱的原因之一。
新冠疫情前，中国每年有约360万人次到新加坡旅行度假。
随着中国放宽边境政策，预计今年中国游客人次可恢复至2019年的三成至六成。
柯淑丹指出，接下来，旅游局将密切关注中国针对出境旅行政策进一步释放的信号，以应对游客需求的变化。
新加坡旅游局除与携程等中国线上旅行平台、旅行社强化伙伴关系外，将针对中国境外游出现的新趋势，积极做好接待中国游客的准备。
展望2023年旅游市场，新加坡旅游局充满信心，认为全球经济只要不出现显著衰退影响公众收入，以及不再有新的大面积致命疫情暴发等情况出现，旅游业复苏步伐将快于预期。
translation: The tourism industry in Singapore is recovering strongly, with a 19-fold increase in tourist arrivals compared to 2021. (Comprehensive report on 11th) The Singapore Tourism Board recently announced that it is estimated that the number of international visitors to Singapore in 2023 will reach 12-14 million, bringing in approximately SGD 18-21 billion in tourism revenue; the number of visitors and tourism revenue will recover to around 67-75% of the pre-pandemic level in 2019; the possibility of the tourism industry fully recovering in 2024 is very high. The Singapore tourism market gradually restarted and recovered in 2022. The latest statistics released by the Singapore Tourism Board show that the number of international visitors in 2022 increased 19 times from 330,600 in 2021 to 6.3 million, exceeding the board's earlier estimate of 4-6 million, and tourists have recovered to 33% of pre-pandemic levels. From January to September 2022, Singapore's tourism revenue totaled SGD 8.96 billion, and it is estimated that the total tourism revenue for 2022 will reach SGD 13.8-14.3 billion, a 6-7 times increase from SGD 1.89 billion in 2021, and has recovered to around 50-52% of the pre-pandemic level in 2019. The Singapore government has taken multiple measures to accelerate the recovery of the tourism industry. In April 2022, the government announced that it would allocate SGD 500 million to stimulate the recovery of the tourism industry. The Singapore Tourism Board recently announced that it plans to allocate SGD 110 million from the budget over the next two years to launch more business and leisure activities to attract tourists back. To make health and wellness a highlight of Singapore's tourism, the Singapore Tourism Board launched a call for proposals on November 23, 2022, to develop a wellness destination along the southern coast of Singapore. Singapore Tourism Board's executive director for sports and wellness tourism, Wang Ling Li, said that in recent years, more and more tourists have been prioritizing their physical health among their considerations. Developing a wellness destination in the southern coast area, which features the Marina Bay Gardens and Marina Barrage, is expected to contribute to Singapore's tourism and economy, and encourage tourists to spend more and stay longer in Singapore. Singapore Tourism Board's CEO, Keith Tan, said that in the coming years, health and wellness will be a key component of Singapore's tourism product. The COVID-19 pandemic has heightened public awareness and demand for physical and mental health. In response, the Singapore Tourism Board has been promoting health and wellness initiatives to both local residents and international visitors over the past two years. In June 2022, the Singapore Tourism Board hosted its first-ever Health and Wellness Festival, offering over 130 health-related activities and experiences to the public. Singapore will continue to offer new travel experiences to tourists. In addition to the newly opened Singapore Children's Museum, the Avatar World at Gardens by the Bay, the Siloso Beach Walk, the ArtScience Museum's new "Explorations" gallery, and the Night Safari's new outdoor amphitheater, the Singapore Tourism Board will also support the development and upgrading of attractions such as the Jurong Bird Park, making Singapore an attractive international destination. In line with plans, Singapore aims to establish industry standards for sustainable development of the meetings, incentives, conferences, and exhibitions (MICE) and reward tourism industries by the end of 2023, with a focus on improving waste management and carbon emissions, further enhancing the tourism environment. The recovery of Singapore's tourism industry has accelerated the recovery of the aviation industry. Data shows that as of December 18, 2022, passenger traffic at Changi Airport has made a strong recovery, with daily passenger numbers reaching 150,000 and weekly numbers around 1 million, equivalent to about 75% of pre-pandemic levels, while the number of aviation staff on duty has also recovered to around 90% of pre-pandemic levels. Data shows that from January to October 2022, Singapore welcomed 23.6 million passengers, equivalent to 42% of pre-pandemic levels, and handled 170,000 flight movements, which is 53% of pre-pandemic levels. The rapid recovery of the tourism industry has also driven the recovery of the accommodation, transportation, dining, and shopping sectors. The Singapore government and tourism industry have high hopes for the Chinese market. Singapore Tourism Board's Assistant Director-General, Mrs. Koh Teck Ching, said that a survey by a Chinese travel platform showed that Singapore's safety index ranked among the top three globally, which is one of the reasons why Singapore is so popular with Chinese tourists. Before the COVID-19 pandemic, around 3.6 million Chinese tourists visited Singapore for travel each year. With China relaxing its border policies, it is expected that the number of Chinese tourists this year will recover to 30% to 60% of the 2019 level. Mrs. Koh Teck Ching noted that the tourism board will closely monitor the signals from China's further relaxation of outbound travel policies to adapt to the changing needs of tourists. In addition to strengthening partnerships with online travel platforms such as Ctrip and travel agencies in China, the Singapore Tourism Board will actively prepare to welcome Chinese tourists by taking into account the new trends in outbound travel from China. Looking ahead to the 2023 tourism market, the Singapore Tourism Board is optimistic, believing that as long as there are no significant economic downturns affecting public income and no new large-scale deadly outbreaks, the tourism industry's recovery pace will be faster than expected.

(Comprehensive report on 11th) The Singapore Tourism Board recently announced that it is estimated that the number of international visitors to Singapore in 2023 will reach 12-14 million, bringing in approximately SGD 18-21 billion in tourism revenue; the number of visitors and tourism revenue will recover to around 67-75% of the pre-pandemic level in 2019; the possibility of the tourism industry fully recovering in 2024 is very high.
The Singapore tourism market gradually restarted and recovered in 2022.

The latest statistics released by the Singapore Tourism Board show that the number of international visitors in 2022 increased 19 times from 330,600 in 2021 to 6.3 million, exceeding the board's earlier estimate of 4-6 million, and tourists have recovered to 33% of pre-pandemic levels.

From January to September 2022, Singapore's tourism revenue totaled SGD 8.96 billion, and it is estimated that the total tourism revenue for 2022 will reach SGD 13.8-14.3 billion, a 6-7 times increase from SGD 1.89 billion in 2021, and has recovered to around 50-52% of the pre-pandemic level in 2019.
The Singapore government has taken multiple measures to accelerate the recovery of the tourism industry.
In April 2022, the government announced that it would allocate SGD 500 million to stimulate the recovery of the tourism industry.

The Singapore Tourism Board recently announced that it plans to allocate SGD 110 million from the budget over the next two years to launch more business and leisure activities to attract tourists back.

To make health and wellness a highlight of Singapore's tourism, the Singapore Tourism Board launched a call for proposals on November 23, 2022, to develop a wellness destination along the southern coast of Singapore.

Singapore Tourism Board's executive director for sports and wellness tourism, Wang Ling Li, said that in recent years, more and more tourists have been prioritizing their physical health among their considerations.

Developing a wellness destination in the southern coast area, which features the Marina Bay Gardens and Marina Barrage, is expected to contribute to Singapore's tourism and economy, and encourage tourists to spend more and stay longer in Singapore.
Singapore Tourism Board's CEO, Keith Tan, said that in the coming years, health and wellness will be a key component of Singapore's tourism product.
The COVID-19 pandemic has heightened public awareness and demand for physical and mental health.
In response, the Singapore Tourism Board has been promoting health and wellness initiatives to both local residents and international visitors over the past two years.
In June 2022, the Singapore Tourism Board hosted its first-ever Health and Wellness Festival, offering over 130 health-related activities and experiences to the public.
Singapore will continue to offer new travel experiences to tourists.

In addition to the newly opened Singapore Children's Museum, the Avatar World at Gardens by the Bay, the Siloso Beach Walk, the ArtScience Museum's new "Explorations" gallery, and the Night Safari's new outdoor amphitheater, the Singapore Tourism Board will also support the development and upgrading of attractions such as the Jurong Bird Park, making Singapore an attractive international destination.

In line with plans, Singapore aims to establish industry standards for sustainable development of the meetings, incentives, conferences, and exhibitions (MICE) and reward tourism industries by the end of 2023, with a focus on improving waste management and carbon emissions, further enhancing the tourism environment.
The recovery of Singapore's tourism industry has accelerated the recovery of the aviation industry.

Data shows that as of December 18, 2022, passenger traffic at Changi Airport has made a strong recovery, with daily passenger numbers reaching 150,000 and weekly numbers around 1 million, equivalent to about 75% of pre-pandemic levels, while the number of aviation staff on duty has also recovered to around 90% of pre-pandemic levels.

Data shows that from January to October 2022, Singapore welcomed 23.6 million passengers, equivalent to 42% of pre-pandemic levels, and handled 170,000 flight movements, which is 53% of pre-pandemic levels.
The rapid recovery of the tourism industry has also driven the recovery of the accommodation, transportation, dining, and shopping sectors.
The Singapore government and tourism industry have high hopes for the Chinese market.

Singapore Tourism Board's Assistant Director-General, Mrs. Koh Teck Ching, said that a survey by a Chinese travel platform showed that Singapore's safety index ranked among the top three globally, which is one of the reasons why Singapore is so popular with Chinese tourists.
Before the COVID-19 pandemic, around 3.6 million Chinese tourists visited Singapore for travel each year.
With China relaxing its border policies, it is expected that the number of Chinese tourists this year will recover to 30% to 60% of the 2019 level.
Mrs. Koh Teck Ching noted that the tourism board will closely monitor the signals from China's further relaxation of outbound travel policies to adapt to the changing needs of tourists.

In addition to strengthening partnerships with online travel platforms such as Ctrip and travel agencies in China, the Singapore Tourism Board will actively prepare to welcome Chinese tourists by taking into account the new trends in outbound travel from China.

Looking ahead to the 2023 tourism market, the Singapore Tourism Board is optimistic, believing that as long as there are no significant economic downturns affecting public income and no new large-scale deadly outbreaks, the tourism industry's recovery pace will be faster than expected.

original: 金正恩父女互动亲密 老婆遭冷落一旁
（综合11日电）朝鲜8日晚间举行建军节第75周年阅兵仪式，领导人金正恩的女儿金主爱不仅出席，还与父亲一同站上主席台。
朝鲜官媒9日公布影片，金主爱依偎在父亲身边，数次温情对视、讲悄悄话，她用双手轻捧老爸的脸颊，甚至摸著父亲胸口，父女互动画面播送至举国上下。
然而，第一夫人李雪主只能退到一旁。
综合韩国“朝鲜新闻”等报导，金正恩、李雪主夫妇7日带著女儿金主爱出席晚宴的官方合照中，金主爱不仅罕见坐在父母正中间C位，在隔日晚间建军节第75周年阅兵仪式上，她还与金正恩一起登上主席台。
朝鲜官媒“朝鲜中央电视台”事后释出阅兵式影片，曝光了更多父女情深的画面。
金正恩在主席台上数次与女儿对望，两人脸上的笑容从未退去，还互相在耳边讲悄悄话，金主爱一度以双手捧起老爸的两颊，金正恩也以灿笑回应。
其他官媒画面也显示，金主爱与金正恩坐在室内沙发椅上时，用手不断摸著父亲的脸；她与父亲挽著手走路时，一边用手摸在金正恩的胸口。
而第一夫人李雪主全程只能走在后头或是坐在一旁，总是距离丈夫和女儿有几步之差。
韩国媒体指出，金主爱自去年11月18日试射火星17飞弹首次在公开露脸以来，3个月以来曝光机率越来越高，至今已是第5度出现于正式场合。
朝鲜官媒提及金主爱时使用了最亲爱的子弟、尊贵的子弟等极高尊称，也播出金主爱在看台上俯瞰阅兵行进时反覆高喊誓死拥护白头血统的片段。
这些迹象让外界怀疑金主爱是否已经被内定为金氏政权的继承人，《华盛顿邮报》分析认为“这是金正恩把中学年纪的女儿推上接班人地位的讯号”，不过也有观点认为，这样的判断仍为时过早，在金正恩膝下有儿子的情况中，仍保有各种可能性。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Kim Jong-un's father-daughter interaction is intimate, his wife is left out in the cold. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

(Comprehensive report on the 11th, North Korea held a military parade on the 8th to celebrate the 75th anniversary of the founding of the army, Kim Jong-un's daughter, Kim Ju Ae, not only attended, but also stood on the podium with her father. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

North Korean state media released a video on the 9th, showing Kim Ju Ae leaning against her father's side, exchanging affectionate glances and whispering to each other several times. She gently cupped her father's cheek with her hands and even touched his chest, the heartwarming scene of father-daughter interaction was broadcast nationwide. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

However, First Lady Ri Sol-ju had to step aside. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

According to reports from South Korean media outlet "Chosun Ilbo", in the official photo of Kim Jong-un and his wife Ri Sol-ju attending a banquet on the 7th with their daughter Kim Ju Ae, Kim Ju Ae not only sat in the middle between her parents, but also stood on the podium with Kim Jong-un the next day at the 75th anniversary of the founding of the army military parade. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

North Korean state media "Korean Central Television" later released the video of the military parade, revealing more heartwarming scenes of the father-daughter bond. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Kim Jong-un gazed at his daughter several times from the podium, and the smiles on their faces never faded. They whispered to each other in each other's ears, and Kim Ju Ae even cupped her father's cheeks with both hands, with Kim Jong-un responding with a beaming smile. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Other state media footage also showed Kim Ju Ae constantly touching her father's face with her hand while sitting on an indoor sofa with Kim Jong-un, and when walking with her father, she had her hand on his chest. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

Meanwhile, the First Lady Ri Sol-ju followed behind or sat to the side throughout, always keeping a few steps away from her husband and daughter. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

According to South Korean media, Kim Ju Ae has appeared in public more frequently since her first public appearance on November 18 last year when she witnessed the test of the Hwasong-17 missile, with her visibility increasing over the past three months, marking her fifth appearance at a formal event. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

North Korean state media used the highest honorific titles such as "dearly beloved child" and "noble child" when referring to Kim Ju Ae, and broadcast footage of her repeatedly shouting "I will die for the white-headed leader" while watching the military parade from the stands. The translation of the Chinese text is: 

These signs have led to speculation that Kim Ju Ae may have been designated as the heir to the Kim regime, with The Washington Post analyzing that "this is a signal that Kim Jong-un is pushing his teenage daughter to the position of successor", however, there are also views that this judgment is premature, and in the situation where Kim Jong-un has a son, there are still various possibilities.

original: 重阳问答︱如何看待美国1月非农就业数据大超预期及未来趋势 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
Q：请问重阳投资，如何看待美国1月非农就业数据大超预期及未来趋势？
A：2月3日美国劳工部公布2023年1月非农就业数据，新增非农就业51.7万人，大幅高于市场预期的18.9万人；失业率降至3.4%，为近50年以来的最低位；时薪同比增速4.4%，环比增速0.3%，略有放缓。
从总量上来看，本次数据存在很多一次性和技术性因素的扰动，比如罢工返岗的教职工、调查统计口径的修正、季调因子的更新，后续可能将有所修正（参考2022年1月新增非农由50.4万人下修至36.4万人），非农就业或不像数据体现的那样强劲。
从结构上来看，高科技企业裁员影响仍在，但占比较低；高接触性服务业如休闲酒店、教育保健等新增就业大幅回升，数据显示服务业劳动力缺口仍存。
结合同样大超预期的服务业PMI、岗位空缺和劳动力缺口数据的回升和消费信贷数据的强势，我们判断经过极端天气和节假日后美国服务业迎来了快速修复。
我们认为，在不经过衰退的情况下美国就业市场的供需紧张难以改善。
目前美国劳动力市场尚有500余万的供给缺口，而劳动参与率上行缓慢，尤其是25-54岁劳动参与率已经接近疫情前高点。
除此之外，由于美国居民超额储蓄和消费信贷的强势，消费需求的强劲将促使紧缩政策对就业市场的影响进一步滞后。
美国就业市场供需持续紧张将是2023年美国经济的底色。
叠加目前临近加息结束，通胀预期不断反复，我们对薪资增速的持续下降并不乐观。
本次数据公布前，美国股债汇市场对于美联储加息路径的预期过于乐观。
随着通胀数据的持续改善，美联储在缩短加息步伐的同时还不断维系着市场通胀预期脆弱的平衡，但市场对于美联储偏向鹰派的表述视而不见，不仅预期提前停止加息，还预期年末两次降息。
在劳动力市场供需紧张，紧缩政策影响不明的情况下，我们认为美联储年末对于加息的指引是相对合理的，市场极端预期的调整和交易的拥挤或将对市场产生一定伤害。
尽管如此，薪资增速的顽固难改当前通胀快速下降的趋势，随着M2数据同比转负以及各个CPI分项领先指标的逐渐转好，自10月份以来美国CPI数据已经转向快速下降阶段，薪资增速的顽固仅会对以后的通胀数据形成托底，当前的市场预期难以证伪，在下一期通胀数据公布后市场或进入新一轮博弈。
translation:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Chong Yang Wen Da | How to view the US non-agricultural employment data exceeding expectations in January and future trends - Economic Observer | Professional financial news website" Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Q: How does Chong Yang Investment view the US January non-agricultural employment data exceeding expectations and future trends? Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

A: On February 3, the US Labor Department released the non-agricultural employment data for January 2023, with 517,000 new non-agricultural jobs added, significantly exceeding the market's expectation of 189,000; the unemployment rate fell to 3.4%, the lowest in nearly 50 years; average hourly earnings rose 4.4% year-over-year, and 0.3% month-over-month, with a slight slowdown. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

From a quantitative perspective, this data is subject to many one-time and technical factors that may distort the results, such as teachers returning to work after a strike, adjustments to the survey statistics scope, and updates to seasonal adjustment factors, which may be revised in the future (referencing the downward revision of January 2022 non-agricultural employment from 504,000 to 364,000). Non-agricultural employment may not be as strong as the data suggests. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

From a structural perspective, the impact of layoffs in high-tech companies is still present, but the proportion is relatively low; high-contact service industries such as leisure hotels, education, and healthcare have seen a significant rebound in new employment, indicating that the labor gap in the service industry still exists. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Considering the significant beat of the service industry PMI, the rebound in job openings and labor gap data, and the strong consumption credit data, we judge that the US service industry has experienced a rapid recovery after the extreme weather and holidays. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

We believe that the labor market tightness in the US is unlikely to ease without a recession. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Currently, the US labor market still has a supply gap of over 5 million, and labor participation is rising slowly, especially the labor participation rate for those aged 25-54, which is close to its pre-pandemic high. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

In addition, due to the strong excess savings and consumption credit of American residents, the strong consumption demand will further delay the impact of tightening policies on the labor market. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

The persistent labor market tightness in the US will be the underlying tone of the US economy in 2023. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Given that interest rate hikes are nearing an end and inflation expectations are repeatedly revised, we are not optimistic about the continued decline in wage growth. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Prior to the release of this data, the US stock, bond, and currency markets had overly optimistic expectations for the Fed's interest rate hike path. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

As inflation data continues to improve, the Fed has maintained a delicate balance of keeping market inflation expectations fragile while shortening the pace of interest rate hikes. However, the market has ignored the Fed's hawkish tone, not only expecting an earlier end to rate hikes, but also expecting two rate cuts by the end of the year. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Given the labor market's tightness and the unclear impact of the tightening policies, we believe the Fed's guidance on interest rate hikes at the end of the year is relatively reasonable, and the adjustment of extreme market expectations and crowded trades may cause some harm to the market. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Although this is the case, the stubborn wage growth is unlikely to change the current trend of rapid decline in inflation, as the M2 data has turned negative year-over-year and various CPI leading indicators have gradually improved. Since October, US CPI data has shifted to a rapid decline phase, and the stubborn wage growth will only provide a floor for future inflation data, making it difficult to disprove current market expectations. After the release of the next round of inflation data, the market may enter a new round of game.

reference: Chongyang Q&A ︱ How do you think the US January non-farm payrolls data greatly exceeded expectations and future trends - Q: May I ask Chongyang Investment, what do you think of the US non-agricultural employment data in January exceeding expectations and the future trend? A: On February 3, the U.S. Department of Labor released January 2023 nonfarm payrolls data, adding 517,000 new nonfarm jobs, significantly higher than market expectations of 189,000; the unemployment rate fell to 3.4%, the lowest in nearly 50 years; hourly earnings grew at a slightly slower rate of 4.4% year-over-year and 0.3% year-over-year. In terms of overall figures, this data may be influenced by several one-time and technical factors, such as the return of striking teachers to work, revisions in survey statistical methods, and updates in seasonal adjustment factors. There could be subsequent revisions to the data (as seen in January 2022 when the initial figure of 504,000 new non-farm jobs was later revised down to 364,000 jobs). Therefore, the non-farm employment situation may not be as robust as the data initially suggests. From the structural point of view, the impact of layoffs in high-tech enterprises is still there, but it accounts for a lower percentage; new employment in high-touch services such as leisure and hotel, education and health care has rebounded sharply, and the data shows that there is still a labor gap in the service industry. Combined with the rebound in service industry PMI, job vacancies, and labor gap data, which also exceeded expectations, and the strength of consumer credit data, we judge that the US service industry has ushered in a quick recovery after extreme weather and holidays. We believe that the tight supply and demand in the US job market will hardly improve without going through a recession. There is still a supply gap of more than 5 million in the US labor market, and the labor force participation rate is moving slowly upward, especially for 25-54 year olds, which is already near its pre-epidemic high. In addition, due to the strength of excess savings of American residents and consumer credit, strong consumer demand will further lag the impact of tightening policies on the job market. The ongoing tightness in the US job market's supply and demand will be a prevailing characteristic of the US economy in 2023. Considering the impending end of interest rate hikes and the continuous fluctuations in inflation expectations, we are not optimistic about the sustained decline in wage growth. Prior to the release of this data, the US stock, bond, and currency markets had overly optimistic expectations regarding the Federal Reserve's path of interest rate hikes. As inflation data continues to improve, the Fed has continued to maintain the fragile balance of market inflation expectations while shortening the pace of rate hikes, but the market has turned a blind eye to the Fed's hawkish statements, expecting not only an early halt to rate hikes, but also two year-end rate cuts. In the case of tight labor market supply and demand, the impact of tightening policy is unknown, we believe that the Fed's year-end guidance on rate hikes is relatively reasonable, the adjustment of extreme market expectations and the crowded trading may cause some harm to the market. Nevertheless, the stubbornness of payroll growth is difficult to change the current trend of rapid decline in inflation, with M2 data turning negative year-on-year and the gradual improvement of each CPI sub-leading indicators, since October the US CPI data has turned to a rapid decline in the phase, the stubbornness of payroll growth will only form the bottom of future inflation data, the current market expectations are difficult to falsify, the market may enter a new round of gaming after the next release of inflation data.
reference_split: Chongyang Q&A ︱ How do you think the US January non-farm payrolls data greatly exceeded expectations and future trends -
Q: May I ask Chongyang Investment, what do you think of the US non-agricultural employment data in January exceeding expectations and the future trend?

A: On February 3, the U.S. Department of Labor released January 2023 nonfarm payrolls data, adding 517,000 new nonfarm jobs, significantly higher than market expectations of 189,000; the unemployment rate fell to 3.4%, the lowest in nearly 50 years; hourly earnings grew at a slightly slower rate of 4.4% year-over-year and 0.3% year-over-year.

In terms of overall figures, this data may be influenced by several one-time and technical factors, such as the return of striking teachers to work, revisions in survey statistical methods, and updates in seasonal adjustment factors. There could be subsequent revisions to the data (as seen in January 2022 when the initial figure of 504,000 new non-farm jobs was later revised down to 364,000 jobs). Therefore, the non-farm employment situation may not be as robust as the data initially suggests.

From the structural point of view, the impact of layoffs in high-tech enterprises is still there, but it accounts for a lower percentage; new employment in high-touch services such as leisure and hotel, education and health care has rebounded sharply, and the data shows that there is still a labor gap in the service industry.

Combined with the rebound in service industry PMI, job vacancies, and labor gap data, which also exceeded expectations, and the strength of consumer credit data, we judge that the US service industry has ushered in a quick recovery after extreme weather and holidays.
We believe that the tight supply and demand in the US job market will hardly improve without going through a recession.

There is still a supply gap of more than 5 million in the US labor market, and the labor force participation rate is moving slowly upward, especially for 25-54 year olds, which is already near its pre-epidemic high.
In addition, due to the strength of excess savings of American residents and consumer credit, strong consumer demand will further lag the impact of tightening policies on the job market.
The ongoing tightness in the US job market's supply and demand will be a prevailing characteristic of the US economy in 2023.
Considering the impending end of interest rate hikes and the continuous fluctuations in inflation expectations, we are not optimistic about the sustained decline in wage growth.
Prior to the release of this data, the US stock, bond, and currency markets had overly optimistic expectations regarding the Federal Reserve's path of interest rate hikes.

As inflation data continues to improve, the Fed has continued to maintain the fragile balance of market inflation expectations while shortening the pace of rate hikes, but the market has turned a blind eye to the Fed's hawkish statements, expecting not only an early halt to rate hikes, but also two year-end rate cuts.

In the case of tight labor market supply and demand, the impact of tightening policy is unknown, we believe that the Fed's year-end guidance on rate hikes is relatively reasonable, the adjustment of extreme market expectations and the crowded trading may cause some harm to the market.

Nevertheless, the stubbornness of payroll growth is difficult to change the current trend of rapid decline in inflation, with M2 data turning negative year-on-year and the gradual improvement of each CPI sub-leading indicators, since October the US CPI data has turned to a rapid decline in the phase, the stubbornness of payroll growth will only form the bottom of future inflation data, the current market expectations are difficult to falsify, the market may enter a new round of gaming after the next release of inflation data.

original: 杉杉创始人郑永刚因突发心脏疾病过世 曾带领中国服装第一股转型 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
经济观察网 记者 郑淯心 2月11日，认证主体为杉杉控股有限公司（以下简称“杉杉控股 ” ） 的微信公众号发布讣告，杉杉企业创始人、杉杉控股董事局主席郑永刚因突发心脏疾病救治无效，于2023年2月10日去世，享年65岁。
上世纪80年代，郑永刚担任国营棉纺厂的厂长，随着调任，1989年郑永刚成为杉杉股份的前身宁波云港服装总厂的厂长。
2022年12月，在第二十届中国企业领袖年会暨第二十二届中国企业未来之星年会上，郑永刚在演讲中称，在上世纪90年代的中国西服市场，杉杉品牌的市占率曾高达37 % 。
1996年杉杉股份（600884.SH）上市，成为中国服装业第一家上市公司。
就在服装业务如日中天时，杉杉集团却开始转型，因为郑永刚意识到 ， “ 一旦市场放开，中国品牌自然会形成一个梯队式品牌市场，杉杉西服想一直独领风骚，长期成为国人的国服的可能性不大 ” 。
1999年，杉杉开始研究企业转型，郑永刚回忆当年 ， “ 我们来到上海，寻求到底转型做什么，专门找了很多专家学者，连续不断地开一些诸葛亮会、务虚研讨会。
最后，我们设定了两个大的战略方向。
第一个方向是新能源新材料，另外一个是大健康有未来 ” 。
战略方向确定后，杉杉开始寻找合作，那时候鞍山热能院为鞍钢配套的炭素研究所在做国家863课题，科研经费不够，于是杉杉和鞍山热能院碳素研究所签署合作协议，共同推动国家863课题“中间相炭微球”项目产业化，从事负极材料的研发、生产和销售，在国内实现负极材料的商用推广。
2001年，杉杉股份实现中间相炭微球的规模化生产，开始国产化替代，取代日本成为国内中间相炭微球主要供应商。
这是中国第一家锂离子电池负极材料生产企业，实现了锂离子电池负极材料国产化。
随着锂电池的应用迅速普及，杉杉股份的锂电池业务开始逐步发展，2007年锂电材料业务被写入了杉杉股份的主营业务，服装业务营收占比逐年减少，直至2013年，杉杉股份的锂电材料业务收入全面超过服装业务。
2021年2月，杉杉股份成功并购LG化学偏光片业务，进军LCD偏光片市场，并成立偏光片企业杉金光电，该领域技术含量比较高，杉杉的主要的竞争对手都是世界500强，如韩国三星、日本的住友化学、日东电工。
郑永刚曾分享过投后管理的心得 ， “ 中国的民营企业收购国际上的一些高科技企业，成功概率比较低，为什么那些收购会失败？
因为大家都会去考虑，我花了那么多钱，我得去派人管对吧，这是通常会做的一个行为 ” ， 然而郑永刚则不同，杉杉收购成功的那一天，郑永刚就到杉金光电当众宣布，杉杉作为杉金的大股东，决定实施一企两制，除了郑永刚担任董事长，杉杉企业的人不派到杉金，采取授权经营的方式，原有的分配制度、企业文化、各项管理等模式不变。
ICC鑫椤资讯发布2022年负极数据显示，杉杉负极2022年出货量突破20万吨，同比增幅100 % ， 市场份额达16 % ， 人造石墨负极材料出货量蝉联榜首。
在偏光片业务方面，Yano Research统计显示，公司旗下杉金光电2022年全球市场份额达到29 % ， 预计2023年市场份额将达到32 % ， 持续位列全球第一。
2022年前三季度，杉杉股份的营收为158.41亿元，净利润为23.13亿元，2月10日，杉杉股份的股价为19.24元/股，总市值为436亿元。
2月9日，杉杉股份在互动平台表示，2022年底，公司石墨化有效产能约10万吨，眉山项目的石墨化产能尚在爬坡中。
万得显示，目前郑永刚仍为杉杉股份的董事长和实际控制人。
天眼查显示，郑永刚持有杉杉控股有限公司的总股权比例是40.1 % 。
杉杉股份的总经理为李智华，1968年生，历任东莞市杉杉电池材料有限公司,宁波杉杉新材料科技有限公司,湖南杉杉能源科技有限公司董事长,宁波杉杉股份有限公司副总经理。
杉杉股份2月10日在投资者互动平台表示，本公司高级管理人员与本公司实际控制人不存在亲属关系。
translation: The founder of Sugi Sugi, Zheng Yonggang, passed away due to a sudden heart disease. He once led China's first clothing stock to transform - Economic Observer - Professional financial news website Economic Observer reporter Zheng Yu Xin, On February 11, the WeChat public account certified as Sugi Sugi Holdings Limited (hereinafter referred to as "Sugi Sugi Holdings") released a death notice, stating that Sugi Sugi founder and Chairman of the Board of Directors, Zheng Yonggang, died of a sudden heart disease on February 10, 2023, at the age of 65, after failing to receive medical treatment. In the 1980s, Zheng Yonggang served as the general manager of a state-owned cotton spinning mill. Following a transfer, in 1989, Zheng Yonggang became the general manager of Ningbo Yun Gang Clothing Factory, the predecessor of Sugi Sugi. In 2022, at the 20th China Enterprise Leaders Conference and the 22nd China Enterprise Future Stars Conference, Zheng Yonggang stated in his speech that in the 1990s Chinese suit market, Sugi Sugi's market share once reached as high as 37%. In 1996, Sugi Sugi (600884.SH) went public, becoming the first listed company in the Chinese clothing industry. Just as the clothing business was thriving, Sugi Sugi Group began to transform, as Zheng Yonggang realized that "once the market opens up, a tiered brand market for Chinese brands will naturally form, and it is unlikely that Sugi Sugi suits will continue to be the trendsetter and long-term become the national dress of the Chinese people." In 1999, Sugi Sugi began to research on corporate transformation, Zheng Yonggang recalled that year, "We came to Shanghai, seeking to find out what to transform into, and we specially invited many experts and scholars, holding one after another Zhuge Liang meetings and virtual discussion meetings. Finally, we set two major strategic directions. The first direction is new energy and new materials, and the other is "big health with a future". After the strategic direction was determined, Sugi Sugi began to look for cooperation. At that time, the Carbon Institute of Anshan Thermal Power Institute, which was affiliated with Anshan Steel, was working on a national 863 project, and the research funding was insufficient. Therefore, Sugi Sugi and the Carbon Institute of Anshan Thermal Power Institute signed a cooperation agreement, jointly promoting the industrialization of the national 863 project "mesophase carbon microspheres", engaging in the research, production, and sales of negative electrode materials, and achieving the commercial promotion of negative electrode materials in China. In 2001, Sugi Sugi achieved the large-scale production of mesophase carbon microspheres, began to domesticize and replace imports, and replaced Japan to become the main supplier of mesophase carbon microspheres in China. This was China's first domestic producer of lithium-ion battery negative electrode materials, achieving the domesticization of lithium-ion battery negative electrode materials. As lithium batteries rapidly became widely used, Sugi Sugi's lithium battery business began to gradually develop, and by 2007, the lithium battery materials business was included in Sugi Sugi's main business. The revenue from the clothing business gradually decreased year by year, until 2013, when the revenue from Sugi Sugi's lithium battery materials business surpassed that of the clothing business. In February 2021, Sugi Sugi successfully acquired LG Chemical's polarizing plate business, entered the LCD polarizing plate market, and established the polarizing plate company Sugi Gold Electronics. This field has a high technical content, and Sugi Sugi's main competitors are all Fortune 500 companies, such as South Korea's Samsung, Japan's Mitsui Chemicals, and Hitachi Chemical. Zhen Yonggang has shared his experience in post-acquisition management, "The probability of success is relatively low for Chinese private enterprises to acquire high-tech companies abroad, why do some acquisitions fail?" Because everyone would think, "I spent so much money, I have to send people to manage it, right?" This is a common behavior. However, Zhen Yonggang was different. On the day Sugi Sugi successfully acquired Sugi Gold Electronics, Zhen Yonggang publicly announced at Sugi Gold Electronics that as the major shareholder of Sugi Gold, he decided to implement a dual-management system. In addition to Zhen Yonggang serving as chairman, Sugi Sugi would not send people to Sugi Gold, instead adopting an authorized management approach, with the original distribution system, corporate culture, and management systems remaining unchanged. According to the data released by ICC Xinpu Information in 2022, Sugi's cathode output in 2022 exceeded 200,000 tons, with a year-on-year growth rate of 100%, and market share reached 16%. The output of artificial graphite cathode materials ranked first for the second consecutive year. In the polarizing plate business, according to Yano Research statistics, Sugi Gold Electronics, a subsidiary of the company, achieved a global market share of 29% in 2022, and is expected to reach 32% in 2023, maintaining its position as the global leader. In the first three quarters of 2022, Sugi Sugi's revenue reached 15.841 billion yuan, and net profit was 2.313 billion yuan. On February 10, the stock price of Sugi Sugi was 19.24 yuan per share, with a total market value of 43.6 billion yuan. On February 9, Sugi Sugi stated on the interactive platform that by the end of 2022, the company's effective graphite production capacity was approximately 100,000 tons, and the production capacity of the Mianyang project was still in the ramp-up phase. According to Wandian, Zheng Yonggang is still the chairman and actual controller of Sugi Sugi. According to Tianyancha, Zheng Yonggang holds a total equity ratio of 40.1% in Sugi Holdings Limited. The general manager of Sugi Sugi is Li Zhihua, born in 1968. He has served as the chairman of Dongguan Sugi Battery Materials Co., Ltd., Ningbo Sugi New Materials Technology Co., Ltd., Hunan Sugi Energy Technology Co., Ltd., and vice general manager of Ningbo Sugi Co., Ltd. On February 10, Sugi Sugi stated on the investor interactive platform that there is no family relationship between the company's senior management personnel and the company's actual controller.
translation_split: The founder of Sugi Sugi, Zheng Yonggang, passed away due to a sudden heart disease. He once led China's first clothing stock to transform - Economic Observer - Professional financial news website

Economic Observer reporter Zheng Yu Xin, On February 11, the WeChat public account certified as Sugi Sugi Holdings Limited (hereinafter referred to as "Sugi Sugi Holdings") released a death notice, stating that Sugi Sugi founder and Chairman of the Board of Directors, Zheng Yonggang, died of a sudden heart disease on February 10, 2023, at the age of 65, after failing to receive medical treatment.

In the 1980s, Zheng Yonggang served as the general manager of a state-owned cotton spinning mill. Following a transfer, in 1989, Zheng Yonggang became the general manager of Ningbo Yun Gang Clothing Factory, the predecessor of Sugi Sugi.

In 2022, at the 20th China Enterprise Leaders Conference and the 22nd China Enterprise Future Stars Conference, Zheng Yonggang stated in his speech that in the 1990s Chinese suit market, Sugi Sugi's market share once reached as high as 37%.
In 1996, Sugi Sugi (600884.SH) went public, becoming the first listed company in the Chinese clothing industry.

Just as the clothing business was thriving, Sugi Sugi Group began to transform, as Zheng Yonggang realized that "once the market opens up, a tiered brand market for Chinese brands will naturally form, and it is unlikely that Sugi Sugi suits will continue to be the trendsetter and long-term become the national dress of the Chinese people."

In 1999, Sugi Sugi began to research on corporate transformation, Zheng Yonggang recalled that year, "We came to Shanghai, seeking to find out what to transform into, and we specially invited many experts and scholars, holding one after another Zhuge Liang meetings and virtual discussion meetings.
Finally, we set two major strategic directions.
The first direction is new energy and new materials, and the other is "big health with a future".

After the strategic direction was determined, Sugi Sugi began to look for cooperation. At that time, the Carbon Institute of Anshan Thermal Power Institute, which was affiliated with Anshan Steel, was working on a national 863 project, and the research funding was insufficient. Therefore, Sugi Sugi and the Carbon Institute of Anshan Thermal Power Institute signed a cooperation agreement, jointly promoting the industrialization of the national 863 project "mesophase carbon microspheres", engaging in the research, production, and sales of negative electrode materials, and achieving the commercial promotion of negative electrode materials in China.

In 2001, Sugi Sugi achieved the large-scale production of mesophase carbon microspheres, began to domesticize and replace imports, and replaced Japan to become the main supplier of mesophase carbon microspheres in China.
This was China's first domestic producer of lithium-ion battery negative electrode materials, achieving the domesticization of lithium-ion battery negative electrode materials.

As lithium batteries rapidly became widely used, Sugi Sugi's lithium battery business began to gradually develop, and by 2007, the lithium battery materials business was included in Sugi Sugi's main business. The revenue from the clothing business gradually decreased year by year, until 2013, when the revenue from Sugi Sugi's lithium battery materials business surpassed that of the clothing business.

In February 2021, Sugi Sugi successfully acquired LG Chemical's polarizing plate business, entered the LCD polarizing plate market, and established the polarizing plate company Sugi Gold Electronics. This field has a high technical content, and Sugi Sugi's main competitors are all Fortune 500 companies, such as South Korea's Samsung, Japan's Mitsui Chemicals, and Hitachi Chemical.

Zhen Yonggang has shared his experience in post-acquisition management, "The probability of success is relatively low for Chinese private enterprises to acquire high-tech companies abroad, why do some acquisitions fail?"

Because everyone would think, "I spent so much money, I have to send people to manage it, right?" This is a common behavior. However, Zhen Yonggang was different. On the day Sugi Sugi successfully acquired Sugi Gold Electronics, Zhen Yonggang publicly announced at Sugi Gold Electronics that as the major shareholder of Sugi Gold, he decided to implement a dual-management system. In addition to Zhen Yonggang serving as chairman, Sugi Sugi would not send people to Sugi Gold, instead adopting an authorized management approach, with the original distribution system, corporate culture, and management systems remaining unchanged.

According to the data released by ICC Xinpu Information in 2022, Sugi's cathode output in 2022 exceeded 200,000 tons, with a year-on-year growth rate of 100%, and market share reached 16%. The output of artificial graphite cathode materials ranked first for the second consecutive year.

In the polarizing plate business, according to Yano Research statistics, Sugi Gold Electronics, a subsidiary of the company, achieved a global market share of 29% in 2022, and is expected to reach 32% in 2023, maintaining its position as the global leader.

In the first three quarters of 2022, Sugi Sugi's revenue reached 15.841 billion yuan, and net profit was 2.313 billion yuan. On February 10, the stock price of Sugi Sugi was 19.24 yuan per share, with a total market value of 43.6 billion yuan.

On February 9, Sugi Sugi stated on the interactive platform that by the end of 2022, the company's effective graphite production capacity was approximately 100,000 tons, and the production capacity of the Mianyang project was still in the ramp-up phase.
According to Wandian, Zheng Yonggang is still the chairman and actual controller of Sugi Sugi.
According to Tianyancha, Zheng Yonggang holds a total equity ratio of 40.1% in Sugi Holdings Limited.

The general manager of Sugi Sugi is Li Zhihua, born in 1968. He has served as the chairman of Dongguan Sugi Battery Materials Co., Ltd., Ningbo Sugi New Materials Technology Co., Ltd., Hunan Sugi Energy Technology Co., Ltd., and vice general manager of Ningbo Sugi Co., Ltd.
On February 10, Sugi Sugi stated on the investor interactive platform that there is no family relationship between the company's senior management personnel and the company's actual controller.

original: “基金E账户”来了：证监会授权开发 投资者名下所有基金实现归集和查询 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
经济观察网 记者 陈姗 基金购买渠道繁杂导致账户信息归集不易？
总是遗忘“小金库”？
基民的这些问题即将得到解决。
2月10日，证监会公告称，“基金E账户”APP在各手机应用商店上架并开展公开试运行。
据介绍，“基金E账户”为个人投资者提供公募基金账户及份额信息的“一站式”查询服务，旨在解决广大中小投资者遗忘账户、查询繁琐等行业服务痛点。
据Wind数据显示，截至2022年底，国内共有公募基金管理人156家，管理基金规模约26万亿元；公募基金份额登记机构167家，公募基金销售机构411家。
各份额登记机构账户体系相互独立，缺乏行业统一的查询渠道。
有行业人士表示，2021年末我国基金投资者超过7.2亿人，也就是说，全国有一半人都投资了基金产品。
此前，投资者需要通过不同销售机构查询购买情况，而通过“基金E账户”可以查询所有销售渠道购买的情况，持有基金情况一目了然。
“基金E账户”APP是什么？
据相关文件介绍，“基金E账户”APP 是中国结算经中国证监会批准开发建设的公募基金行业门户手机应用，可为投资者提供全市场公募基金产品场外份额持有情况的一站式查询。
投资者可以通过“基金E账户”方便、快捷地掌握自己通过全市场各销售渠道购买的各基金管理人旗下公募基金产品场外份额的持有情况，全面提升查询效率。
具体来说，投资者可以通过“基金E账户”查询到的信息包括：在全市场各公募基金管理人处开立的基金账户信息、在公募基金销售机构处开立的交易账户信息以及持有的包括公开募集证券投资基金以及证券公司设立管理的投资者人数不受200人限制的集合资产管理计划等产品的场外份额持有情况。
上海证券基金评价研究中心业务负责人刘亦千向经济观察网记者表示，投资者可以通过“基金E账户”App一站式获知其所有的场外公募基金持有情况，帮助其找回“被遗忘的资产”，更重要的是为客户实现了综合基金投资情况的全账户信息归集，帮助客户更及时、准确、完整的掌握自身投资情况，从而更好地优化自身的基金组合配置，更好地规划自身的财务安排。
如何注册使用？
记者注意到，目前，“基金E账户”APP已在华为、苹果、小米、OPPO、vivo等手机应用商店上架，但APP尚处于公开试运行阶段，注册需要填写邀请码，投资者可以联系所持有基金的基金管理人获取。
上海一家中大型公募基金客服人员向经济观察网记者提供了一个6位数的邀请码，并告诉记者，“APP试运行阶段，中国结算提供给每个基金管理人一定数量的邀请码，投资者电话过来获取，我们都会提供。
等试运行结束后，开放用户注册时就不用邀请码了。
记者根据证监会官网公示的“基金E账户”下载及使用说明相关文件进行了账户注册并完成查询，整个过程耗时仅几分钟，主要分为四步：用户注册、实名认证、基金账户绑定、公募基金查询。
通过实名认证这一步之后，点击“资产”基金绑定按钮，记者通过各个基金销售平台购买的所有基金产品都呈现在绑定选项列表中（可绑定账户），完成绑定后就可以直观看到所投基金总资产并可以开始使用查询功能了。
值得注意的是，“基金E账户”仅为投资者提供查询服务，并不能进行申赎买卖。
“基金 E 账户”所显示的数据日期一般为用户进行查询的日期（T日)往前推三个交易日。
比如，在2 月10日打开“基金E账户”，资产页所显示的总资产、基金份额、基金净值对应日期为该日期往前推三个交易日，即2月7日。
版权声明：以上内容为《经济观察报》社原创作品，版权归《经济观察报》社所有。
未经《经济观察报》社授权，严禁转载或镜像，否则将依法追究相关行为主体的法律责任。
translation:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Fund E-account" is here: CSRC authorizes the development of fund aggregation and inquiry for all funds under an investor's account - Economic Observer Network - Professional Financial News Website Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Economic Observer Network reporter Chen Shan: Multiple channels for fund purchases lead to difficulties in aggregating account information? Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Always forgetting the "small treasury"? Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

These problems of the common people will soon be solved. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

On February 10, the China Securities Regulatory Commission announced that the "Fund E-account" APP has been launched on various mobile app stores and is conducting a public trial operation. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

According to the introduction, the "Fund E-account" provides a "one-stop" query service for personal investors to check their public fund accounts and share information, aiming to solve the pain points of account forgetfulness and cumbersome queries for the vast majority of individual investors. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

According to Wind data, as of the end of 2022, there were 156 domestic public fund management companies, managing a total of approximately 26 trillion yuan in assets; there were 167 public fund registration institutions and 411 public fund sales institutions. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Each share registration institution has an independent account system, lacking a unified query channel across the industry. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Industry insiders have stated that by the end of 2021, there were over 720 million fund investors in China, which means that half of the country's population has invested in fund products. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Previously, investors needed to query their purchase situation through different sales institutions, but with the "Fund E-account", they can query their purchase situation across all sales channels, and their holdings are clear at a glance. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

What is the "Fund E-account" APP? Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

According to relevant documents, the "Fund E-account" APP is a mobile application for the public fund industry portal, approved by the China Securities Regulatory Commission, which provides a one-stop query service for investors to check their holdings of public fund products across the entire market. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Investors can use the "Fund E-account" to conveniently and efficiently grasp their holdings of public fund products from various fund management companies across the entire market, purchased through all sales channels, and significantly improve query efficiency. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Specifically, the information that investors can query through the "Fund E-account" includes: account information of the fund accounts opened with various public fund management companies across the entire market, trading account information opened with public fund sales institutions, and holdings of publicly offered securities investment funds and other products, such as investment plans with more than 200 investors, managed by securities companies, in non-publicly traded shares. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Liu Yi Qian, business director of the Shanghai Securities Fund Evaluation Research Center, told an Economic Observer reporter that investors can use the "Fund E-account" APP to obtain a one-stop view of their entire holdings of publicly offered funds in non-publicly traded shares, helping them to recover "lost assets". More importantly, it has achieved comprehensive collection of fund investment information across all accounts, enabling clients to have a more timely, accurate, and complete grasp of their own investment situation, and thus optimize their fund portfolio configuration and better plan their financial arrangements. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

How to register and use it? Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

The reporter noticed that the "Fund E-account" APP has been listed on the app stores of Huawei, Apple, Xiaomi, OPPO, and Vivo, but it is currently in a public trial operation phase, and registration requires filling in an invitation code. Investors can contact the fund management company of the funds they hold to obtain the code. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

A customer service personnel from a large public fund in Shanghai provided an Economic Observer reporter with a 6-digit invitation code and told the reporter that "the APP is in a trial operation phase, China Clearing provides a certain number of invitation codes to each fund management company, and we will provide them to investors when they call in." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

After the trial operation ends, users will no longer need to use an invitation code to register. It seems like there is no Chinese text provided. Please provide the Chinese text you would like me to translate into English. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

The reporter registered for an account and completed the inquiry based on the "Fund E-account" download and usage guide documents published on the China Securities Regulatory Commission's official website, and the entire process took only a few minutes, which mainly consisted of four steps: user registration, real-name verification, fund account binding, and inquiry of publicly offered funds. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

After real-name verification, clicking on the "Assets" binding button, all fund products purchased through various sales platforms appear in the binding option list (can bind accounts), and after completing the binding, the total assets of the invested funds can be directly viewed, and the inquiry function can be used. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

What's worth noting is that the "Fund E-account" only provides inquiry services for investors and does not allow for redemption, purchase, or sale. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

The data displayed on the "Fund E-account" is generally three trading days prior to the date of the user's inquiry (T day). Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

For example, when opening the "Fund E-account" on February 10th, the total assets, fund shares, and fund net value displayed on the asset page correspond to the date three trading days prior to that date, which is February 7th. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Copyright Notice: The above content is an original work of Economic Observer, and the copyright belongs to Economic Observer. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Without the authorization of Economic Observer, any unauthorized reproduction or mirroring is strictly prohibited, and the relevant parties will be held liable according to the law. Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Copyright cooperation, please call: [010-60910566-1260].

Previously, investors needed to query their purchase situation through different sales institutions, but with the "Fund E-account", they can query their purchase situation across all sales channels, and their holdings are clear at a glance.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

What is the "Fund E-account" APP?

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

According to relevant documents, the "Fund E-account" APP is a mobile application for the public fund industry portal, approved by the China Securities Regulatory Commission, which provides a one-stop query service for investors to check their holdings of public fund products across the entire market.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Investors can use the "Fund E-account" to conveniently and efficiently grasp their holdings of public fund products from various fund management companies across the entire market, purchased through all sales channels, and significantly improve query efficiency.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Specifically, the information that investors can query through the "Fund E-account" includes: account information of the fund accounts opened with various public fund management companies across the entire market, trading account information opened with public fund sales institutions, and holdings of publicly offered securities investment funds and other products, such as investment plans with more than 200 investors, managed by securities companies, in non-publicly traded shares.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

Liu Yi Qian, business director of the Shanghai Securities Fund Evaluation Research Center, told an Economic Observer reporter that investors can use the "Fund E-account" APP to obtain a one-stop view of their entire holdings of publicly offered funds in non-publicly traded shares, helping them to recover "lost assets". More importantly, it has achieved comprehensive collection of fund investment information across all accounts, enabling clients to have a more timely, accurate, and complete grasp of their own investment situation, and thus optimize their fund portfolio configuration and better plan their financial arrangements.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

How to register and use it?

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

The reporter noticed that the "Fund E-account" APP has been listed on the app stores of Huawei, Apple, Xiaomi, OPPO, and Vivo, but it is currently in a public trial operation phase, and registration requires filling in an invitation code. Investors can contact the fund management company of the funds they hold to obtain the code.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

A customer service personnel from a large public fund in Shanghai provided an Economic Observer reporter with a 6-digit invitation code and told the reporter that "the APP is in a trial operation phase, China Clearing provides a certain number of invitation codes to each fund management company, and we will provide them to investors when they call in."

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

After the trial operation ends, users will no longer need to use an invitation code to register.
It seems like there is no Chinese text provided. Please provide the Chinese text you would like me to translate into English.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

The reporter registered for an account and completed the inquiry based on the "Fund E-account" download and usage guide documents published on the China Securities Regulatory Commission's official website, and the entire process took only a few minutes, which mainly consisted of four steps: user registration, real-name verification, fund account binding, and inquiry of publicly offered funds.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

After real-name verification, clicking on the "Assets" binding button, all fund products purchased through various sales platforms appear in the binding option list (can bind accounts), and after completing the binding, the total assets of the invested funds can be directly viewed, and the inquiry function can be used.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

What's worth noting is that the "Fund E-account" only provides inquiry services for investors and does not allow for redemption, purchase, or sale.

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

The data displayed on the "Fund E-account" is generally three trading days prior to the date of the user's inquiry (T day).

Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

For example, when opening the "Fund E-account" on February 10th, the total assets, fund shares, and fund net value displayed on the asset page correspond to the date three trading days prior to that date, which is February 7th.

original: 同抗中共 美日菲达成防卫共识
亚洲 – 2月9日，菲律宾总统小马科斯（Bongbong Marcos）造访日本，与首相岸田文雄会谈。
双方就反对中共侵犯南海与东海达成共识，菲日领导人在会后发布共同声明表示，将通过和美国签署三边防卫协议，进行实质防务交流，反对中共霸权政策。
根据日本媒体的说法，岸田文雄希望藉这次会晤帮助日菲两国建立针对台海危机的政策。
小马科斯今年1月初曾访华，并且获得价值200亿美元的协议。
但在这之后，中菲关系不仅没好转，反倒下滑。
本月初，菲律宾与美国签署协议，同意对美军开放更多基地，保障南海安全。
新增加的一个基地距离台湾300公里，也是最接近中国的一个地点。
如果台湾出现危机，美军可能会在菲律宾的基地发动行动。
日本媒体认为，现在日韩台澳乃至菲律宾都与美国形成轴心，构建西太平洋的“对抗中共弧线”，以推动地区合作。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Japan, the US, and the Philippines reach a consensus on defense cooperation." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Asia - On February 9, Philippine President Bongbong Marcos visited Japan and held talks with Prime Minister Fumio Kishida." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Both sides reached a consensus on opposing China's infringement on the South China Sea and the East China Sea. After the meeting, the leaders of the Philippines and Japan issued a joint statement, stating that they will sign a trilateral defense agreement with the US, conduct substantive defense exchanges, and oppose China's hegemonic policy." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"According to Japanese media reports, Fumio Kishida hopes to use this meeting to help Japan and the Philippines establish a policy towards the Taiwan crisis." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Bongbong Marcos visited China in January this year and secured a deal worth $20 billion." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"But after that, the China-Philippines relationship did not improve, but instead deteriorated." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"At the beginning of this month, the Philippines signed an agreement with the US, agreeing to open more military bases to the US military to ensure the security of the South China Sea." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The newly added base is 300 kilometers away from Taiwan and is the closest location to China." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"If a crisis occurs in Taiwan, the US military may take action from the Philippines' base." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Japanese media believe that Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, Australia, and the Philippines have all formed an axis with the US, building a 'counter-China arc' in the Western Pacific to promote regional cooperation."

"Asia - On February 9, Philippine President Bongbong Marcos visited Japan and held talks with Prime Minister Fumio Kishida."

The two sides reached a consensus on opposing Chinese Communist aggression in the South and East China Seas, and the Philippine and Japanese leaders issued a joint statement after the meeting saying that they will conduct substantive defense exchanges through the signing of a trilateral defense agreement with the United States to oppose Chinese Communist hegemonic policies.
"According to Japanese media reports, Fumio Kishida hopes to use this meeting to help Japan and the Philippines establish policies regarding the Taiwan Strait crisis."
"Bongbong Marcos visited China in early January this year and obtained a deal worth 20 billion US dollars."
"However, after that, the relationship between China and the Philippines not only did not improve but instead deteriorated."

"The newly added base is located 300 kilometers away from Taiwan, and it is also the closest location to China."
"If there is a crisis in Taiwan, the US military may potentially launch operations from bases in the Philippines."

"Japanese media believe that currently, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, Australia, and even the Philippines have formed an axis with the United States, creating a 'curve of countering the Chinese Communist Party' in the Western Pacific to promote regional cooperation."

original: 国民党副主席夏立言访中传达宋涛语：九二共识下欢迎绿营访陆
台湾中国国民党副主席夏立言今次访中先后会见中国国台办主任宋涛与中共中央政治局常委王沪宁。
国民党官方机构国政基金会资深顾问赵春山昨天晚上接受台湾中央社采访，积极评价宋涛对夏立言所说，只要认同“九二共识”与反台独，中国欢迎绿营人士到访大陆。
国民党方面评价认为是新鲜事物。
夏立言稍早会见宋涛当日新闻没有提及此说法。
台湾执政的民进党连日澄清拒绝接受“九二共识”。
据中央社今天称，国民党副主席夏立言率团访陆，在北京期间，分别会见中共中央政治局常委王沪宁、新任国台办主任宋涛，与北京市委书记尹力。
夏立言与宋涛会面谈到国共的政治基础是“九二共识”与反台独，国民党国政基金会资深顾问赵春山则在会中表示，国民党的“九二共识”是原汁原味的“九二共识”。
赵春山分析，这与前几次参与的会议感受不同。
近期与大陆学界视讯座谈，以及这次的座谈，没有听到涉台学者讲武统与“反分裂法”，取而代之的是恢复交流与对话。
赵春山指出，两岸兵凶战危，中国大陆盼能透过国民党转达改善关系的意向。
因为民共之间没有互信，对方仍愿做好对台湾人工作，代表不希望两岸关系搞坏。
据赵春山也说，王沪宁也亲自下指示向宋涛讲“他们（台湾农渔民）提的要求，你们一定要落实”，若无法通盘解决，也要采个案处理。
该报道没有提及国民党人访大陆是否当面提及中国军机军舰每日扰台，台湾少数县市的农渔问题，以及中央社记者采访是否提问此类问题。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Kuomintang Vice Chairman Hsu Li-teh said: 'We welcome the DPP (Democratic Progressive Party) to visit the mainland under the 1992 Consensus.'" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Taiwanese Kuomintang Vice Chairman Hsu Li-teh's current visit to China has seen him meet with Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council, Song Tao, and Politburo member of the Communist Party of China, Wang Huning." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Kuomintang-affiliated think tank, the National Policy Foundation's senior advisor, Zhao Chunshan, was interviewed by the Central News Agency of Taiwan yesterday evening, and positively evaluated Song Tao's words to Hsu Li-teh, saying that as long as they acknowledge the '1992 Consensus' and oppose Taiwan independence, China welcomes DPP members to visit the mainland." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The Kuomintang side considers it a new development." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Hsu Li-teh's meeting with Song Tao earlier in the day did not mention this statement in the news." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), which is in power in Taiwan, has been clarifying in recent days that it refuses to accept the '1992 Consensus'." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"According to the Central News Agency today, Kuomintang Vice Chairman Hsu Li-teh led a delegation to visit the mainland, and during his stay in Beijing, met separately with Communist Party of China Politburo member Wang Huning, the newly appointed Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council, Song Tao, and Beijing Municipal Committee Secretary Yin Li." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Hsu Li-teh and Song Tao discussed in their meeting that the political foundation of cross-strait relations is the '1992 Consensus' and opposition to Taiwan independence. Meanwhile, National Policy Foundation senior advisor Zhao Chunshan stated in the meeting that the Kuomintang's '1992 Consensus' is the original and authentic '1992 Consensus'." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Zhao Chunshan analyzed that this is different from the feelings he had in previous meetings." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Recently, in video conferences with mainland scholars, and in this latest meeting, there has been no mention of 'unification by force' and the 'Anti-Secession Law' from Taiwan scholars, instead, there has been a focus on resuming exchanges and dialogue." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Zhao Chunshan pointed out that the situation across the strait is tense and dangerous, and the mainland is hoping that through the Kuomintang, they can convey their intentions to improve relations." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Because there is a lack of mutual trust between the two sides, the other party still wants to do a good job for the people of Taiwan, and the representative does not want to ruin cross-strait relations." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"According to Zhao Chunshan, Wang Huning also personally instructed Song Ta to tell them ('the Taiwanese fishermen') that 'the demands they have raised, you must implement them', and if it's impossible to solve the problem comprehensively, you should handle it on a case-by-case basis." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The report did not mention whether the Kuomintang people mentioned to the mainland whether the Chinese military aircraft and warships are disturbing Taiwan every day, or the agricultural and fishing problems in some counties and cities in Taiwan, or whether the Central News Agency reporter asked such questions during the interview."

reference: Kuomintang vice chairman Xia Liyan visit to convey Song Tao language: under the 1992 Consensus welcome the green camp to visit the mainland Xia Liyan, the Vice Chairman of the Chinese Kuomintang (KMT) from Taiwan, met with Song Tao, the Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the Communist Party of China (CPC), and Wang Huning, a member of the CPC Central Committee's Political Bureau, during his visit to China. In an interview with Taiwan's Central News Agency last night, Chiu Chun-shan, a senior advisor to the KMT's official National Government Foundation, commented positively on Song Tao's statement to Xia Liyan that China welcomes green campers to visit the mainland as long as they agree with the "1992 Consensus" and oppose Taiwan independence. The (KMT) considers this evaluation as a new development. Earlier, when Xia Liyan met with Song Tao, there was no mention of this statement in the news on the same day. Taiwan's ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) has for days clarified its refusal to accept the 1992 Consensus. According to the Central News Agency (CNA) today, KMT Vice Chairman Xia Liyan led a delegation to visit the mainland, and during his stay in Beijing, he met with Wang Huning, a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, Song Tao, the new Director of the State Council Taiwan Affairs Office, and Yin Li, Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee. The meeting between Xia Liyan and Song Tao talked about the political basis of the Communist Party is the "1992 Consensus" and anti-Taiwan independence, while Chiu Chun-shan, a senior advisor to the KMT National Government Foundation, said at the meeting that the KMT's "1992 Consensus" is the original "1992 Consensus". Zhao Chunshan analyzed that this meeting was different from previous ones in terms of the perceptions and experiences involved. In recent video talks with mainland scholars, as well as this one, I did not hear Taiwan-related scholars speak of armed reunification and the "anti-secession law," but rather the resumption of exchanges and dialogue. Zhao Chunshan pointed out that the two sides of the strait are fighting fiercely, and mainland China hopes to convey its intention to improve relations through the Kuomintang. Due to the lack of mutual trust between the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and the Communist Party of China (CPC), Zhao Chunshan stated that the CPC still wishes to work for the benefit of the people of Taiwan, indicating that they do not want to worsen cross-strait relations. According to Zhao Chunshan also said that Wang Huning also personally gave instructions to Song Tao to say "they (Taiwan farmers and fishermen) put forward the request, you must implement", if the overall solution can not be adopted, but also to adopt a case-by-case approach. The report did not mention whether the Kuomintang members discussed the daily military provocations by Chinese aircraft and warships near Taiwan, the agricultural and fishing issues in certain counties and cities of Taiwan, or if these topics were raised by journalists from the Central News Agency during the interviews.
