original: 阿拉斯加上空被击落的 “物体”究竟是什么？
扑朔迷离，猜测纷纷
美国军方周五（2月10日）下午再次动用美国最先进的隐身喷气战机F-22击落了一个在美国阿拉斯加上空飞行的尚未确定身份的物体。
击落的地点距离阿拉斯加海岸十英里。
这是美军在不到一周的时间里第二次击落空中飞行物体。
上周六，来自中国的一个间谍气球在美国领空上漂移数日后在美国南卡罗莱纳州沿岸附近上空被击毁。
五角大楼说，第二个被击落的物体于周四晚上首次进入美国领空，在阿拉斯加东北部上空移动时被美国军方跟踪，飞行高度为1.2万米（4万英尺），其大小与一辆小型汽车差不多，与先前被击落的那个中国间谍气球相比要小很多。
五角大楼还认为，目前没有迹象显示，这个物体是可操纵的。
白宫国家安全委员会战略沟通协调员约翰·科比周五表示，虽然这个在高空飞行的物体的具体样子尚不清楚，但它“对民航飞机的安全构成了合理的威胁”。
科比表示，这个物体与美国境内发现的那个间谍气球不同，它上面没有悬挂“有效载荷”。
科比说，“我们把它称为一个‘物体’是我们目前能够作出的最好的描述”。
拜登总统在下令击落这个物体之前听取了五角大楼的建议，他作出这个决定的时候“非常谨慎”，科比补充说。
美国官方对这个物体的描述大致可以归纳为：大小相当于一辆小汽车，没有操纵杆，没有悬挂装置，飞行高度为一万米左右。
但这些信息还无法回答基本问题，比如这个物体究竟是什么东西，它属于哪个国家，它在执行什么任务。
目前网上许多的分析和猜测认为，这可能又是一只中国气球。
它可能与入侵美国领空的那只间谍气球和在拉美上空飘动的那只中国气球一样都来自中国，它们在不同地点执行某种任务。
也有人把阿拉斯加的这个“物体”与“不明飞行物”（UFO）联系在一起。
美国新闻周刊的报道引用美国前众议员彼得·梅杰（Peter Meijer）周五在推特上发出的推文说，“真希望这个‘不明飞行物’也是一个间谍气球，而不是一个合法的UFO”。
“将外星飞船与气象气球混为一谈的讽刺意味很令人惊讶，但这不值得引发一场星际冲突，”梅杰说。
梅杰是在科比证实阿拉斯加的这个物体被击落之后不久发出这个推文的。
新闻周刊说，怀疑这个物体是UFO的不止是梅杰一人。
田纳西共和党籍众议员蒂姆·伯切特（Tim Burchett）批评政府上个月的掩盖情报的做法，要求国家情报总监办公室 (DNI)公布有关“不明飞行物”的报告。
translation:
The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"What was the object that crashed in Alaska?" The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Confusion reigns, speculations abound" The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The US military used the advanced F-22 stealth fighter jet for the second time on Friday (February 10) to shoot down an unidentified object flying in the airspace of Alaska, US." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The location of the shootdown is 10 miles off the coast of Alaska." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"This is the second time in less than a week that the US military has shot down an airborne object." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Last Saturday, a Chinese spy balloon that had drifted in US airspace for several days was shot down near the coast of South Carolina." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The Pentagon said that the second object shot down entered US airspace on Thursday evening, was tracked by US military while moving in the airspace over northeastern Alaska, flying at an altitude of 12,000 meters (40,000 feet), and was roughly the size of a small car, much smaller than the Chinese spy balloon shot down earlier." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The Pentagon also believes that there is no indication that this object was maneuverable." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"White House National Security Council Strategic Communications Coordinator John Kirby said on Friday that while the exact appearance of the object flying in the high altitude is unclear, it 'posed a reasonable threat to the safety of civilian aircraft.'" The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Kirby said that this object is different from the spy balloon found within the US, as it did not have a 'payload' suspended from it." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Kirby said, 'We call it an "object" is the best description we can make at this time.'" The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Before ordering the object to be shot down, President Biden received advice from the Pentagon, and when he made the decision, he was 'very cautious', Kirby added." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The US officials described the object as roughly the size of a small car, without a control stick, no suspended device, and flying at an altitude of around 10,000 meters." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"But these details still do not answer the basic questions, such as what the object is, which country it belongs to, and what mission it was carrying out." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Many online analyses and speculations currently believe that this could be another Chinese balloon." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"It may be from China, like the spy balloon that invaded US airspace and the Chinese balloon floating over Latin America, and they were carrying out some kind of mission in different locations." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Some people have linked the 'object' in Alaska to 'Unidentified Flying Object' (UFO)." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"According to a report by US News & World Report, former US Representative Peter Meijer tweeted on Friday, 'I hope this "UFO" is a spy balloon, not a legitimate one.'" The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"'The irony of confusing a UFO with a weather balloon is quite astonishing, but it's not worth sparking an intergalactic conflict,' Meijer said." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Meijer made this tweet shortly after the object in Alaska was confirmed to have been shot down by a US military." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"According to US News & World Report, it's not just Meijer who suspects the object is a UFO." The English translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Tennessee Republican Rep. Tim Burchett criticized the government's handling of intelligence last month, calling for the Office of the Director of National Intelligence (ODNI) to release a report on the 'unidentified flying object'."

reference: The "object" that was shot down over Alaska was what? confused, speculative On Friday afternoon (February 10) the US military once more brought down an unidentified flying object over Alaska using the F-22 its most sophisticated stealth fighter plane. Ten miles off Alaska's coast, it was shot down. The American military has shot down an aerial object twice in less than a week. Last Saturday, a Chinese surveillance balloon that had been circling the US airspace for days was shot down close to the South Carolina coast. The second downed item first entered U.S airspace on Thursday night, was followed by American military personnel as it flew across northeast Alaska, at a height of 12,000 meters (40,000 feet), according to the Pentagon, the Chinese surveillance balloon that was earlier shot down is considerably smaller than the automobile, which is around the same size. Additionally, according to the Pentagon, there is currently no proof that the item is manipulatable. Although the high-flying object's precise appearance remained unknown, according to White House National Security Council strategic communications coordinator John Kirby, it "posed a legitimate threat to the safety of civilian aircraft." In contrast to the spy balloon discovered in the United States, the object, according to Bryant, did not have a "payload" suspended from it. "The most accurate description we can currently provide is what we refer to as a 'object'," said Bryant. Before deciding to send the object down, President Biden followed the Pentagon's counsel, a choice he made "very carefully," according to Bryant. This object's official US description can be summed up roughly as follows: The flying height is around 10,000 meters, the size is comparable to a compact automobile, there is no joystick, and there is no suspension system. However, at this time, the information does not adequately address fundamental queries such what the object is, to which nation it belongs, and what function it serves. Many analyses and conjectures on the Internet at the moment suggest that this could be another Chinese balloon. It might have originated in China, just like the spy balloon that violated American airspace and the Chinese balloon that flew across Latin America and carried out some sort of operation elsewhere. This "object" in Alaska has also been linked by some individuals to a "unidentified flying object" (UFO). Former US Representative Peter Meijer tweeted on Friday, "Wish this 'UFO' was also a spy balloon and not a legitimate UFO," according to a US Newsweek story. Major remarked, "although it would be ironic to mistake an extraterrestrial spacecraft for a weather balloon, it would not be worth starting an interstellar war." The item in Alaska had been shot down, Bryant had just confirmed before Major's tweet. According to Newsweek, Major was not the only person who thinks the object was a UFO. Rep Tim Burchett a Republican from Tennessee, condemned the administration's cover-up last month and demanded that the Office of the Director of National Intelligence (DNI) disclose a report on "unidentified flying objects."
reference_split: The "object" that was shot down over Alaska was what?
confused, speculative
On Friday afternoon (February 10) the US military once more brought down an unidentified flying object over Alaska using the F-22 its most sophisticated stealth fighter plane.
Ten miles off Alaska's coast, it was shot down.
The American military has shot down an aerial object twice in less than a week.
Last Saturday, a Chinese surveillance balloon that had been circling the US airspace for days was shot down close to the South Carolina coast.

The second downed item first entered U.S airspace on Thursday night, was followed by American military personnel as it flew across northeast Alaska, at a height of 12,000 meters (40,000 feet), according to the Pentagon, the Chinese surveillance balloon that was earlier shot down is considerably smaller than the automobile, which is around the same size.
Additionally, according to the Pentagon, there is currently no proof that the item is manipulatable.

Although the high-flying object's precise appearance remained unknown, according to White House National Security Council strategic communications coordinator John Kirby, it "posed a legitimate threat to the safety of civilian aircraft."
In contrast to the spy balloon discovered in the United States, the object, according to Bryant, did not have a "payload" suspended from it.
"The most accurate description we can currently provide is what we refer to as a 'object'," said Bryant.
Before deciding to send the object down, President Biden followed the Pentagon's counsel, a choice he made "very carefully," according to Bryant.

This object's official US description can be summed up roughly as follows: The flying height is around 10,000 meters, the size is comparable to a compact automobile, there is no joystick, and there is no suspension system.
However, at this time, the information does not adequately address fundamental queries such what the object is, to which nation it belongs, and what function it serves.
Many analyses and conjectures on the Internet at the moment suggest that this could be another Chinese balloon.
It might have originated in China, just like the spy balloon that violated American airspace and the Chinese balloon that flew across Latin America and carried out some sort of operation elsewhere.
This "object" in Alaska has also been linked by some individuals to a "unidentified flying object" (UFO).
Former US Representative Peter Meijer tweeted on Friday, "Wish this 'UFO' was also a spy balloon and not a legitimate UFO," according to a US Newsweek story.
Major remarked, "although it would be ironic to mistake an extraterrestrial spacecraft for a weather balloon, it would not be worth starting an interstellar war."
The item in Alaska had been shot down, Bryant had just confirmed before Major's tweet.
According to Newsweek, Major was not the only person who thinks the object was a UFO.

Rep Tim Burchett a Republican from Tennessee, condemned the administration's cover-up last month and demanded that the Office of the Director of National Intelligence (DNI) disclose a report on "unidentified flying objects."

original: 亚马逊的客服态度让我难以相信
估计很少有人看到这里，但是我也要稍微说一下。
这件衣服当时我们购买的时候是一件拉链帽衫，最后送给我确是一件短袖。
收到衣服后立即与亚马逊客服取得了联系，当时确认衣服还是有库存的，我要求换货，客服说去解决一下，然后立即看到商品名称变成了短袖，原来我买的链接下架。
接着客服通知要么保留货品补偿一定金额，要么退货。
这就是亚马逊的处理方式？
真的很难以置信，本身衣物发错并不是我的问题，作为一个消费者我要求获得我应获得的商品，并没有提出什么很夸张的要求，亚马逊却改名字，说无库存。
这是我的第一个长评，希望这不是我的最后一个。
translation: The customer service of Amazon has made me lose faith. I guess very few people will see this, but I'll say it anyway. This shirt was a zip-up hoodie when we bought it, but what I received was a short-sleeve shirt. After receiving the clothes, I immediately contacted Amazon customer service. At that time, they confirmed that the item was still in stock, and I requested an exchange. The customer service said they would handle it, but then I immediately saw that the product name had changed to short-sleeve, and it turned out that the link I bought was out of stock. Then the customer service told me that I could either keep the item and receive a certain amount of compensation, or return it. Is this how Amazon handles things? It's really hard to believe. The fact that the wrong item was shipped is not my problem, as a consumer, I simply want to receive the item I ordered, and I didn't make any outrageous demands, but Amazon changed the name of the item and said it was out of stock. This is my first review, and I hope it's not my last.
translation_split: The customer service of Amazon has made me lose faith.
I guess very few people will see this, but I'll say it anyway.
This shirt was a zip-up hoodie when we bought it, but what I received was a short-sleeve shirt.

After receiving the clothes, I immediately contacted Amazon customer service. At that time, they confirmed that the item was still in stock, and I requested an exchange. The customer service said they would handle it, but then I immediately saw that the product name had changed to short-sleeve, and it turned out that the link I bought was out of stock.
Then the customer service told me that I could either keep the item and receive a certain amount of compensation, or return it.
Is this how Amazon handles things?

It's really hard to believe. The fact that the wrong item was shipped is not my problem, as a consumer, I simply want to receive the item I ordered, and I didn't make any outrageous demands, but Amazon changed the name of the item and said it was out of stock.
This is my first review, and I hope it's not my last.
reference: I find Amazon's customer service attitude to be unbelievable Although it is believed that few people would view this, I still want to add a little. When we purchased this dress, it had a zipper hood, but I ended up wearing a short-sleeved version. I immediately contacted Amazon customer support after getting the garments, it was determined at that time that there was still inventory of the clothing, I made a replacement request, after telling the customer care to fix it, they instantly saw that the product's name had been altered to short sleeves, it turned out that the link I purchased from had been withdrawn from the inventory. The customer service then informed the consumer to either keep the items and get a specified amount of compensation, or return the things. Does Amazon handle it in this manner? That wearing the wrong clothes is not a concern for me is very unbelievable, I make reasonable requests as a consumer and don't make any inflated demands,  Amazon claims it's out of stock and alters the name. My first lengthy review, which I hope won't be my last.
reference_split: I find Amazon's customer service attitude to be unbelievable
Although it is believed that few people would view this, I still want to add a little.
When we purchased this dress, it had a zipper hood, but I ended up wearing a short-sleeved version.

I immediately contacted Amazon customer support after getting the garments, it was determined at that time that there was still inventory of the clothing, I made a replacement request, after telling the customer care to fix it, they instantly saw that the product's name had been altered to short sleeves, it turned out that the link I purchased from had been withdrawn from the inventory.
The customer service then informed the consumer to either keep the items and get a specified amount of compensation, or return the things.
Does Amazon handle it in this manner?

That wearing the wrong clothes is not a concern for me is very unbelievable, I make reasonable requests as a consumer and don't make any inflated demands,  Amazon claims it's out of stock and alters the name.
My first lengthy review, which I hope won't be my last.

original: 让人无法理解的袖子
说是牛皮的，也确实比较硬，但仔细看的话，局部有很多细小的裂痕，搞不清楚是否是真皮的，另外这个衣服的袖子真是让人无法理解，通常夹克的袖子要比衣摆长一些，不过通常也就1-2厘米，这件衣服足足长了5厘米，手臂自然下垂应该在手掌虎口的位置，但这件衣服的袖子都盖过手指了。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "让人无法理解的袖子" is:

"The sleeves that are hard to understand."

However, a more idiomatic translation would be:

"The sleeves that defy understanding."

In this context, "让人无法理解的袖子" is likely an idiomatic expression that means something that is mysterious or incomprehensible. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's said to be leather, and indeed it's quite hard, but upon closer inspection, there are many small cracks in some areas, making it unclear whether it's real leather. Another thing that's hard to understand is the sleeves of this jacket - usually, the sleeves of a jacket are a bit longer than the hem, but only by about 1-2 cm. However, this jacket's sleeves are 5 cm longer, and when your arm hangs down, it should be at the wrist crease, but this jacket's sleeves cover your fingertips."

Note: The translation is quite literal, but the idiomatic expression "让人无法理解" is used again, which means "hard to understand" or "defies understanding" as mentioned earlier.

"The sleeves that are hard to understand."

However, a more idiomatic translation would be:

In this context, "让人无法理解的袖子" is likely an idiomatic expression that means something that is mysterious or incomprehensible.

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's said to be leather, and indeed it's quite hard, but upon closer inspection, there are many small cracks in some areas, making it unclear whether it's real leather. Another thing that's hard to understand is the sleeves of this jacket - usually, the sleeves of a jacket are a bit longer than the hem, but only by about 1-2 cm. However, this jacket's sleeves are 5 cm longer, and when your arm hangs down, it should be at the wrist crease, but this jacket's sleeves cover your fingertips."

Note: The translation is quite literal, but the idiomatic expression "让人无法理解" is used again, which means "hard to understand" or "defies understanding" as mentioned earlier.
reference: The mysterious sleeve Although it is stated to be made of cowhide and is in fact fairly hard, if you look closely, you will notice that there are numerous tiny fractures in the surrounding area, making it unclear whether the leather is real, additionally, the sleeves on this garment are completely puzzling, the sleeves of coats are typically 1-2 centimeters longer than the hem of the clothing; however, the sleeves of this dress are a full 5 centimeters long, as a result, the arms should naturally hang down in the palm of the hand, but the sleeves of this dress cover the fingers.

Although it is stated to be made of cowhide and is in fact fairly hard, if you look closely, you will notice that there are numerous tiny fractures in the surrounding area, making it unclear whether the leather is real, additionally, the sleeves on this garment are completely puzzling, the sleeves of coats are typically 1-2 centimeters longer than the hem of the clothing; however, the sleeves of this dress are a full 5 centimeters long, as a result, the arms should naturally hang down in the palm of the hand, but the sleeves of this dress cover the fingers.

original: 买衣服容易，退货也容易。
但是要退还钱真不知何时？
衣服做工不错，因为版型偏小，只得退货，但是退了货以后，至今一个多星期过去了，还没有收到退款？
而且要购买者自已和那个诚信度不怎么样的全峰快递联系，这是自购亚马逊的物品以来最糟糕的一次购物！
但店家还是不错的，积极配合催促快递及时退款，但是这个全峰快递实在的工作是做的相当让人愤怒，拖拉半个月左右才退款，这种合作伙伴是要拖亚马逊的后腿的，工作效率差，没有服务意识！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

Buying clothes is easy, returning them is also easy. The translation of the Chinese text is:

But when will I get my money back? The translation of the Chinese text is:

The clothes are well-made, but the size is a bit small, so I had to return them. However, it's been over a week since I returned the item, and I still haven't received the refund yet. The translation of the Chinese text is:

What's more, the buyer has to contact the untrustworthy Full Express themselves, which is the worst shopping experience I've had since buying items from Amazon. The translation of the Chinese text is:

However, the store is still good, actively cooperating and urging the express company to refund on time. But the work of Full Express is really infuriating, taking about half a month to refund, which is a partner that is dragging Amazon down, with poor efficiency and no sense of service.

original: 更适合年轻人
99秒杀的。
毛裤的做工、颜色、手感都不错，柔软/薄厚适中，没有煤油味儿。
遗憾的是版型属于瘦型的，更适合年轻人。
3XL，平铺腰围2尺5，拉伸最大尺寸4尺，1.79/80公斤穿着腰有点紧。
似乎腰间没有松紧带，想加松点腰围还挺困难。
另外，贴身穿是不舒服的。

original: 亚马逊自营不应该出现这样商品
产品特价的时候购买，价格不低，看评论也是很不错的产品。
实际收到产品的时候让我目瞪口呆，商品表面大面积磨损，多处其他地方都有磨损，不是次品就是旧品，稍后上图。
我申请退货，厂家的人看到图片后说是运输导致，这不是瞎说吗？
商品内部怎么可能磨损？
只有两种可能，要么次品旧品，要么就是我故意损坏商品，然后拿去退货。
客观来讲，我没有证据证明我没有损坏商品，但是以我在亚马逊购物的信用记录来讲，我认为这样的商品不应该出现在亚马逊自营商品中，客户选择亚马逊自营就是信任，customer win，we win，客户的胜利就是厂商的胜利，希望大家一起努力改进，谢谢。
translation:
It seems like you want me to translate a Chinese sentence into English. However, you haven't provided the Chinese text yet. Please go ahead and provide the text, and I'll be happy to translate it for you. The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"Buying products on sale, the price is not low, and reading reviews is also a good product." The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"When I actually received the product, I was left speechless, the product had significant surface wear and tear, and there were scratches in many other places, it's either a defective product or a used one, I'll post the pictures later." The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"I applied for a return, and the manufacturer said it was due to transportation after seeing the pictures, is that just a lie?" The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"How could the product inside be worn out?" The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"There are only two possibilities, either it's a defective or used product, or I intentionally damaged the product and then returned it." The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"Objectively speaking, I don't have evidence to prove that I didn't damage the product, but based on my shopping record on Amazon, I think a product like this shouldn't be sold on Amazon's self-fulfilled items. Customers choose Amazon self-fulfilled because they trust, customer win, we win, the customer's victory is the manufacturer's victory. I hope we can all work together to improve, thank you."

I was shocked when I really received the thing, A sizable portion of the product's surface was worn, and there was wear in numerous other locations as well, Either the item was faulty or it was an outdated one, Later the image will be displayed. I requested a return, and when the manufacturer's representatives saw the image they claimed that transportation was to blame, This is nonsense right? How does anything get worn down inside? original: 我使用该产品不到一年，就出现两个E2，我不知道如何处理?
我是2015年7月30日购买该商品的，但在2016年3月份接收器右边两组就经常出现红色E2，应是发射模块出现问题吧，这与亚马逊网站上讲的发射模块可持续工作7年不大相符吧，在亚马逊网站上又找不到售后，现不知如何是好?
translation: I've used the product for less than a year, and I've already had two E2s, I don't know how to handle it. I purchased the product on July 30, 2015, but since March 2016, the right side of the receiver has been frequently displaying a red E2, which I suspect is a problem with the transmitter module. This doesn't seem to match the 7-year lifespan of the transmitter module mentioned on the Amazon website. I've also been unable to find any after-sales support on the Amazon website, and I'm not sure what to do now.
translation_split: I've used the product for less than a year, and I've already had two E2s, I don't know how to handle it.

This doesn't seem to match the 7-year lifespan of the transmitter module mentioned on the Amazon website. I've also been unable to find any after-sales support on the Amazon website, and I'm not sure what to do now.

I purchased this item on July 30, 2015, but in March 2016, red E2 started to show on the two groups on the receiver's right side, the transmitter module ought to be the source of the issue, this is consistent with the transmitter module's ongoing operation, as was noted on the Amazon website, I don't know what to do now because 7 years doesn't quite match and I can't find after-sales support on the Amazon website?

original: 还行吧
第一次购买是坏的。
感觉不像新的。
盒子上的标签被撕了，机身上标签也破了。
而且老是白屏。
换了以后好了。
换货挺迅速，晚上有点模糊，视角不是很广，但是普通家用够了。
不足就是没有卡，自己买的，还有就是以前在亚马逊买过手机。
包装上会有贴纸，防止包装被打开，这次没有，买手机时候还有个贴纸一样的章，可以贴在保修卡上，这次没有。
不知道是不是东西便宜了就没有，很困惑。
translation: The translation of the Chinese text "还行吧" is: "It's okay" or "It's alright". The translation of the Chinese text "第一次购买是坏的" is: "The first time I bought it, it was bad." The translation of the Chinese text "感觉不像新的" is: "It doesn't feel like new." The translation of the Chinese text "盒子上的标签被撕了，机身上标签也破了" is: "The box's label was torn, and the machine's label was also damaged." The translation of the Chinese text "而且老是白屏" is: "And it's always blank (or black screen)." The translation of the Chinese text "换了以后好了" is: "After replacing it, it's fine." The translation of the Chinese text "换货挺迅速，晚上有点模糊，视角不是很广，但是普通家用够了" is: "The replacement was quite fast, it's a bit blurry at night, the viewing angle isn't very wide, but it's good enough for general home use." The translation of the Chinese text "不足就是没有卡，自己买的，还有就是以前在亚马逊买过手机" is: "The only shortcomings are that it doesn't have a card slot, and I bought it myself, and also I've bought a phone from Amazon before." The translation of the Chinese text "包装上会有贴纸，防止包装被打开，这次没有，买手机时候还有个贴纸一样的章，可以贴在保修卡上，这次没有" is: "There is usually a sticker on the packaging to prevent it from being opened, but this time there wasn't one, and when I bought the phone, there was a similar sticker that can be stuck on the warranty card, but this time there wasn't one." The translation of the Chinese text "不知道是不是东西便宜了就没有，很困惑" is: "I'm not sure if it's because the thing is cheap, but it's missing, it's very puzzling."
translation_split: The translation of the Chinese text "还行吧" is: "It's okay" or "It's alright".
The translation of the Chinese text "第一次购买是坏的" is: "The first time I bought it, it was bad."
The translation of the Chinese text "感觉不像新的" is: "It doesn't feel like new."
The translation of the Chinese text "盒子上的标签被撕了，机身上标签也破了" is: "The box's label was torn, and the machine's label was also damaged."
The translation of the Chinese text "而且老是白屏" is: "And it's always blank (or black screen)."
The translation of the Chinese text "换了以后好了" is: "After replacing it, it's fine."

The translation of the Chinese text "换货挺迅速，晚上有点模糊，视角不是很广，但是普通家用够了" is: "The replacement was quite fast, it's a bit blurry at night, the viewing angle isn't very wide, but it's good enough for general home use."

The translation of the Chinese text "不足就是没有卡，自己买的，还有就是以前在亚马逊买过手机" is: "The only shortcomings are that it doesn't have a card slot, and I bought it myself, and also I've bought a phone from Amazon before."

The translation of the Chinese text "包装上会有贴纸，防止包装被打开，这次没有，买手机时候还有个贴纸一样的章，可以贴在保修卡上，这次没有" is: "There is usually a sticker on the packaging to prevent it from being opened, but this time there wasn't one, and when I bought the phone, there was a similar sticker that can be stuck on the warranty card, but this time there wasn't one."
The translation of the Chinese text "不知道是不是东西便宜了就没有，很困惑" is: "I'm not sure if it's because the thing is cheap, but it's missing, it's very puzzling."
reference: Not bad at all The initial buy wasn't good. It doesn't seem brand-new. Both the label on the fuselage and the label on the box were torn. And the screen is always white. Once changed, everything will be fine. Although the viewing angle is not very wide, the replacement is extremely quick, and it is a little hazy at night; it is sufficient for everyday home use. The drawback is that there is no card; I paid for it out of pocket and previously purchased a phone from Amazon. To prevent the package from being opened, there will be a sticker on it, No not now, there is a sticker that resembles a chapter that may be placed to the warranty card when purchasing a mobile phone, No not now. I'm perplexed, I'm not sure if it's because products are so inexpensive.

The initial buy wasn't good.
It doesn't seem brand-new.
Both the label on the fuselage and the label on the box were torn.
And the screen is always white.
Once changed, everything will be fine.
Although the viewing angle is not very wide, the replacement is extremely quick, and it is a little hazy at night; it is sufficient for everyday home use.
The drawback is that there is no card; I paid for it out of pocket and previously purchased a phone from Amazon.

To prevent the package from being opened, there will be a sticker on it, No not now, there is a sticker that resembles a chapter that may be placed to the warranty card when purchasing a mobile phone, No not now.
I'm perplexed, I'm not sure if it's because products are so inexpensive.

original: 日本亚马逊因为客服问题导致买家的利益严重受损（8c的毛毛虫发货为8cm的毛毛虫）（8c=14cm，8cm=2c）
承认错误，但是一直在推诿，始终强调货物为第三方，不能约束第三方。
我当初购买的页面尺码选项为7c，8，9c，当时觉得这就是个陷阱，打电话给日亚中文客服，明确告知8就是8c，但是等商品回到中国才发现，只有8cm，我觉得这完全是故意设下的陷阱来坑中国人（按照亚马逊的售后），现在查看页面已没有这个选项。
中方客服：很抱歉，给你带来损失了，我们给你两条路走：
1，你退货，买家承担所有运费。
2，你不退货，我们补偿你1000日元。
（我算一下账，鞋子4000多日元，算作200rmb，选择1，我没有鞋子，损失在200元。
选择2，我有鞋子，最后补偿了我2000日元，最后损失在150rmb 客服：我们已记录下来，我们会认真处理，次日回了封邮件，说我不接受中方客服调解，就这么完了。
我提出：购买的页面为7c，8，9c这样具有迷惑性的选项时，中方客服帮我说起了日本常用码是不会带c这样的，类似140这样的，但是你们特么有去其他毛毛虫页面看吗？
都有美码，日码混标的情况出现。
再说，你8cm为什么放在7c和9c中间，明明最小的尺码，你放那里算什么意思。
中方客服：我们提供中文服务，但是不知道你要运回国，所以你的运费我们是不予理赔的。
这个逻辑我又不懂了，我是日本人，我还要中文客服，生活在日本的中国也不需要中文客服，去日本游客，没有那个功夫打国际长途，那么问题来了，什么人需要打亚马逊海外购中文电话，无非像我这样日淘的。
亚马逊中文客服不就是方便了我们海淘的这些人吗？
translation:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Amazon Japan suffered severe losses to customers due to customer service issues (shipping 8cm long caterpillars as 8cm long caterpillars, where 8cm is equivalent to 14cm, and 8cm is equivalent to 2cm)." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Admitting the mistake, but always shifting the blame, and consistently emphasizing that the goods are from a third-party, and cannot be held accountable by the third-party." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Order number: 503-4265464-1830254." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"I initially chose the size option as 7c, 8, 9c when I made the purchase, and at that time I thought it was a trap. I called Amazon Japan's Chinese customer service and clearly informed them that 8 means 8c, but when the goods arrived in China, I found that it was only 8cm. I think this is a deliberate trap set to cheat Chinese people (according to Amazon's after-sales service). Now, I've checked the page and the option is no longer available." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Chinese customer service: Sorry to have caused you a loss, we give you two options: " Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"1. You return the goods, and the buyer bears all the shipping costs." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"2. You don't return the goods, and we will compensate you 1000 Japanese yen." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"(I calculate the account, the shoes are over 4000 Japanese yen, calculated as 200 RMB, choose option 1, I don't have the shoes, the loss is 200 yuan." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Choose option 2, I have the shoes, and finally compensated me 2000 Japanese yen, and the loss is 150 RMB. Customer Service: We have recorded it, and we will handle it seriously. The next day, we sent an email saying that I don't accept the mediation from the Chinese customer service, and that's it." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"I pointed out: The purchase page has options like 7c, 8, 9c, which are misleading. The Chinese customer service helped me explain that in Japan, the usual code is not like this, it's more like 140, etc. But do you guys even check other websites?" Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"All have US codes, but with Japanese codes marked." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Furthermore, why did you put 8cm in the middle of 7c and 9c, when it's the smallest size? What's the meaning of putting it there?" Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Chinese customer service: We provide Chinese service, but since we don't know you're shipping it back to your country, we won't compensate for the shipping cost." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"I don't understand this logic. I'm Japanese, and I need Chinese customer service. Even Chinese people living in Japan don't need Chinese customer service. Tourists visiting Japan wouldn't have the time to make international long-distance calls. So, who needs to call Amazon's overseas shopping Chinese customer service? It's only people like me who shop on Taobao from Japan." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Isn't Amazon's Chinese customer service just for people like us who shop from overseas?"

reference: Due to customer service issues (8c caterpillars are supplied as 8cm caterpillars) (8c=14cm, 8cm=2c), Amazon Japan has significantly harmed the interests of buyers Acknowledging errors but consistently denying and highlighting the fact that the items belong to a third party and cannot be restrained. Chinese customer service: We offer Chinese service, but since we are unsure whether you'll be sending it back to your own nation, we are unable to cover your shipping expenses. This reasoning baffles me once more, I need Chinese customer service despite being Japanese, Customer service from Chinese speakers in Japan is unnecessary, the ability to place international long-distance calls is not a talent that visitors to Japan possess, who needs to call, This then becomes a question, nothing more than regular purchasing for me, Amazon is buying Chinese phones from other countries. Isn't Amazon's Chinese customer service simply more practical for those of us who shop from abroad?

Customer service in Chinese: We apologize for your loss and offer two solutions:
1, You return the merchandise, and the buyer is responsible for all shipping charges.
2, We will give you a reward of 1,000 yen if you do not return the goods.
(I'll calculate it for you: the shoes cost more than 4,000 yen, which is equivalent to 200 rmb; pick 1, I don't have shoes; the loss is 200 yuan.

Option 2, I have shoes, and they finally gave me 2,000 yen in compensation; my final loss was 150 rmb, Customer service: We have it on file and will treat it with care, the following day, I replied to an email and ended the conversation by stating that I would not accept the Chinese customer service's mode of resolution.

I suggested: Have you folks gone to see the caterpillar page where the buy page contains perplexing possibilities like 7c, 8, and 9c, and Chinese customer support helped me inform you that Japanese common codes do not include c, similar to 140?
Both have a mixed label scenario with American and Japanese codes.
In addition, why do you place 8 cm between 7 cm and 9 cm when it is definitely the smallest size.
Chinese customer service: We offer Chinese service, but since we are unsure whether you'll be sending it back to your own nation, we are unable to cover your shipping expenses.

This reasoning baffles me once more, I need Chinese customer service despite being Japanese, Customer service from Chinese speakers in Japan is unnecessary, the ability to place international long-distance calls is not a talent that visitors to Japan possess, who needs to call, This then becomes a question, nothing more than regular purchasing for me, Amazon is buying Chinese phones from other countries.
Isn't Amazon's Chinese customer service simply more practical for those of us who shop from abroad?

original: 这次购买不是很满意
这是第二次从亚马逊上购买帮宝适尿布，曾经在宝宝2个月的时候买过一箱，选择了欧洲进口纸张的尿布，第一次购买经历还是比较满意的，宝宝整夜就用一张尿布，的确可以满足12个小时不换尿布。
但是这次购买L号的尿布，一箱里面有2包分开包装，打开后就觉得纸张比较松，跟进口帮宝适有明显区别，给宝宝用了之后，还算可以，没有漏尿也没有红疹等迹象。
但是到了第二包尿布，开始使用后宝宝的大腿内侧立马就出现了红疹，至今还没有褪去。
怀疑1箱里面的2包，质量还不一样啊。
以后应该不会继续购买了！
translation: This time the purchase is not very satisfactory. This is the second time I've bought Pampers diapers from Amazon. I bought a pack of diapers for my baby when they were 2 months old, and I chose the European-imported paper diapers. The first time I purchased, I was quite satisfied, as the diapers could last through the whole night, and indeed, they could meet the 12-hour non-changing requirement. However, this time I bought the L size diapers, and there are 2 packs in one box, each pack is separately wrapped. After opening, I found that the paper is relatively loose, which is quite different from the imported Pampers. After using it on my baby, it's still acceptable, there's no leakage and no signs of diaper rash. However, when I started using the second pack of diapers, red rashes appeared immediately on the inner side of my baby's thighs, and they still haven't faded away yet. I suspect that the two packs in one box have different quality. I won't be buying it again after this!
translation_split: This time the purchase is not very satisfactory.

This is the second time I've bought Pampers diapers from Amazon. I bought a pack of diapers for my baby when they were 2 months old, and I chose the European-imported paper diapers. The first time I purchased, I was quite satisfied, as the diapers could last through the whole night, and indeed, they could meet the 12-hour non-changing requirement.

However, this time I bought the L size diapers, and there are 2 packs in one box, each pack is separately wrapped. After opening, I found that the paper is relatively loose, which is quite different from the imported Pampers. After using it on my baby, it's still acceptable, there's no leakage and no signs of diaper rash.
However, when I started using the second pack of diapers, red rashes appeared immediately on the inner side of my baby's thighs, and they still haven't faded away yet.
I suspect that the two packs in one box have different quality.
I won't be buying it again after this!
reference: This acquisition falls short of expectations I've purchased Pampers diapers from Amazon twice already, my baby was 2 months old when I purchased a box of diapers, I decided on diapers made of imported European paper, I was happy with my first buy in general, All night, the infant used them, without changing diapers, one diaper can last 12 hours. However, I purchased L-size diapers this time, 2 packs, each packed separately, are contained in a box, When I opened it, the paper felt loose, which is certainly not the case with imported Pampers, red rash and further symptoms. But after using the second pack of diapers, the infant developed a rash on the inside of his thighs that hasn't yet disappeared. The 2 products in 1 box might not be of the same quality, in my opinion. Should not make further purchases in the future!
reference_split: This acquisition falls short of expectations

I've purchased Pampers diapers from Amazon twice already, my baby was 2 months old when I purchased a box of diapers, I decided on diapers made of imported European paper, I was happy with my first buy in general, All night, the infant used them, without changing diapers, one diaper can last 12 hours.

However, I purchased L-size diapers this time, 2 packs, each packed separately, are contained in a box, When I opened it, the paper felt loose, which is certainly not the case with imported Pampers, red rash and further symptoms.
But after using the second pack of diapers, the infant developed a rash on the inside of his thighs that hasn't yet disappeared.
The 2 products in 1 box might not be of the same quality, in my opinion.
Should not make further purchases in the future!

original: 希望重视包裹的运输保护
这是我网购这么久以来，看到最差的一次包装运输，完全没有什么保护措施，缓冲泡沫，包裹缓冲层材料等，什么都没有。
就一个压变形的箱子。
而且里面的软胶盒包装的，卡盒都压开了压到变形了。
希望是正品 质量有保证，以后是不怎么敢亚马孙买东西的了。
宁愿国内贵一半，有保障点。
而且商品产品包装问题，我看评论2016年就有人评论过，到现在19年，还是老样子。
说明亚马逊根本就不重视服务反馈这一块，和国内的京东、天猫等差太远了。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Hope to pay attention to the transportation protection of the package." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"This is the worst packaging and shipping experience I've had since I started online shopping. There is no protection measure at all, no bubble wrap, no cushioning material, nothing." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Just a crushed box." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"And the soft foam box packaging inside is also crushed and deformed, the cardboard box is also bent and deformed." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I hope it's a genuine product with a quality guarantee. After this experience, I won't dare to shop on Amazon anymore." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I'd rather pay double the price to buy it domestically, at least there's some guarantee." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Moreover, the packaging problem of the product has been mentioned in the comments since 2016, and it's still the same even up to 2019." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"This shows that Amazon doesn't take customer feedback seriously at all, and it's far behind domestic e-commerce platforms like JD.com and Taobao."

"Just a crushed box."

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"And the soft foam box packaging inside is also crushed and deformed, the cardboard box is also bent and deformed."

"I hope it's a genuine product with a quality guarantee. After this experience, I won't dare to shop on Amazon anymore."

"I'd rather pay double the price to buy it domestically, at least there's some guarantee."

"This shows that Amazon doesn't take customer feedback seriously at all, and it's far behind domestic e-commerce platforms like JD.com and Taobao."
reference: Hope to be mindful of package shipment protection Since I've been doing a lot of internet shopping, this is the worst wrapping and shipping I've ever encountered, there are absolutely no protective measures, such as cushioning foam, wrapping materials, or cushioning layer materials, etc, nothing at all. Just a box that is crumpled and distorted. Additionally, the card box had been forced open and twisted, and the soft plastic box within had been packed. I'm hoping it's real and of guaranteed quality, In the future, I won't have the guts to order anything from Amazon. I'd rather pay half as much in China and get a warranty. And the issue with product packaging hasn't changed in 19 years, according to comments I read in 2016, Someone left a comment about it. It demonstrates how poorly Amazon responds to customer complaints and how far behind domestic rivals JD dot com and Tmall it is.

Since I've been doing a lot of internet shopping, this is the worst wrapping and shipping I've ever encountered, there are absolutely no protective measures, such as cushioning foam, wrapping materials, or cushioning layer materials, etc, nothing at all.
Just a box that is crumpled and distorted.
Additionally, the card box had been forced open and twisted, and the soft plastic box within had been packed.
I'm hoping it's real and of guaranteed quality, In the future, I won't have the guts to order anything from Amazon.
I'd rather pay half as much in China and get a warranty.
And the issue with product packaging hasn't changed in 19 years, according to comments I read in 2016, Someone left a comment about it.
It demonstrates how poorly Amazon responds to customer complaints and how far behind domestic rivals JD dot com and Tmall it is.

original: 好看，但有点点小遗憾
整个杯子的颜色是我狠喜欢的，橘红色，虽然我家是男宝，但是还是觉得橘红配黄色很亮眼。
比我想象的小一些，不过本来就是拿来带出门用的，所以还可以接受。
昨晚拿回家试了一下，瓶盖推开之后，吸管和盖子之间的距离太近了，因为吸管的位置是正向垂直的，所以儿子总是要把盖子上面的凸起含住喝水，觉得这个地方是否可以改进一下。
看来其他牌子的吸管杯把吸管做的倾斜还是有道理的，小孩子的东西，真的就是在乎安全和舒适。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "好看，但有点点小遗憾" is:

"It's good, but a bit disappointing." The translation of the Chinese text "整个杯子的颜色是我狠喜欢的，橘红色，虽然我家是男宝，但是还是觉得橘红配黄色很亮眼" is:

"I really like the color of the whole cup, it's orange-red. Although I have a boy, but I still think orange-red and yellow go well together." The translation of the Chinese text "比我想象的小一些，不过本来就是拿来带出门用的，所以还可以接受" is:

"It's a bit smaller than I imagined, but since it's meant to be taken out, I can still accept it." The translation of the Chinese text "昨晚拿回家试了一下，瓶盖推开之后，吸管和盖子之间的距离太近了，因为吸管的位置是正向垂直的，所以儿子总是要把盖子上面的凸起含住喝水，觉得这个地方是否可以改进一下" is:

"I tried it at home last night, after opening the lid, the distance between the straw and the lid is too close. Because the straw is positioned vertically, my son always has to put the protrusion on the lid in his mouth to drink, I wonder if this can be improved." The translation of the Chinese text "看来其他牌子的吸管杯把吸管做的倾斜还是有道理的，小孩子的东西，真的就是在乎安全和舒适" is:

"It seems that other brands' straw cups have the straw slanted, which makes sense. When it comes to kids' things, safety and comfort are really the top priorities."
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text "好看，但有点点小遗憾" is:

"It's good, but a bit disappointing."

The translation of the Chinese text "整个杯子的颜色是我狠喜欢的，橘红色，虽然我家是男宝，但是还是觉得橘红配黄色很亮眼" is:

"I really like the color of the whole cup, it's orange-red. Although I have a boy, but I still think orange-red and yellow go well together."

The translation of the Chinese text "比我想象的小一些，不过本来就是拿来带出门用的，所以还可以接受" is:

"It's a bit smaller than I imagined, but since it's meant to be taken out, I can still accept it."

The translation of the Chinese text "昨晚拿回家试了一下，瓶盖推开之后，吸管和盖子之间的距离太近了，因为吸管的位置是正向垂直的，所以儿子总是要把盖子上面的凸起含住喝水，觉得这个地方是否可以改进一下" is:

"I tried it at home last night, after opening the lid, the distance between the straw and the lid is too close. Because the straw is positioned vertically, my son always has to put the protrusion on the lid in his mouth to drink, I wonder if this can be improved."

The translation of the Chinese text "看来其他牌子的吸管杯把吸管做的倾斜还是有道理的，小孩子的东西，真的就是在乎安全和舒适" is:

"It seems that other brands' straw cups have the straw slanted, which makes sense. When it comes to kids' things, safety and comfort are really the top priorities."
reference: It's encouraging to see, although there is some disappointment The color of the entire cup is my favorite, orange red, and even though my family is all boys, I believe orange red and yellow are extremely appealing. It's smaller than I expected, but it's designed to be removed, so it's fine. I brought it home and gave it a shot last night, the space between the straw and the bottle cap was too close when the bottle cap was pushed off, because the straw is vertical, my son had to catch the bump on the top to sip water, I believe this location can be enhanced. Other manufacturers of straw cups appear to tilt the straw, which makes sense, children's items are very concerned with safety and comfort.

The color of the entire cup is my favorite, orange red, and even though my family is all boys, I believe orange red and yellow are extremely appealing.
It's smaller than I expected, but it's designed to be removed, so it's fine.

I brought it home and gave it a shot last night, the space between the straw and the bottle cap was too close when the bottle cap was pushed off, because the straw is vertical, my son had to catch the bump on the top to sip water, I believe this location can be enhanced.
Other manufacturers of straw cups appear to tilt the straw, which makes sense, children's items are very concerned with safety and comfort.

original: 假货，假的特别厉害
亚马逊卖假货，我也是服了。
客服说因为用了所以不能退货，我没用怎么知道是假货。
因为信任，所以伤心，毕竟是抹脸的用品，真的去实体店买吧，认可贵一点。
因为是秒杀，所以没有看评论，我已经提交国家工商总局的电商平台了，我们一起维权吧。

The translation of the Chinese text "假货，假的特别厉害" into English is:

Counterfeit goods, very fake. The translation of the Chinese text "亚马逊卖假货，我也是服了" into English is:

Amazon sells counterfeit goods, I'm fed up. The translation of the Chinese text "客服说因为用了所以不能退货，我没用怎么知道是假货" into English is:

The customer service said it's because I used it, so I can't return it, but I didn't use it, how can I know it's a fake. The translation of the Chinese text "因为信任，所以伤心，毕竟是抹脸的用品，真的去实体店买吧，认可贵一点" into English is:

Because of trust, I'm heartbroken. After all, it's a product for wiping one's face, it's better to buy from a physical store, even if it's a bit expensive. The translation of the Chinese text "因为是秒杀，所以没有看评论，我已经提交国家工商总局的电商平台了，我们一起维权吧" into English is:

Because it was a flash sale, so I didn't read the reviews. I've already reported it to the e-commerce platform of the State Administration for Market Regulation, let's fight for our rights together.

original: 坏了？
假货？
总之悲剧。
用第二片的时候选的毛孔细致的，但是一打开就一股怪味，以为是正常的，因为没用过这款，然后往脸上贴的时候就整个受不了了，非常冲的味道，无法形容，熏到立马咳嗽了出来，眼睛也很痛，流眼泪，马上摘了去洗脸。
不信邪又开了一片同款的，没有那么重的味道了，现在正在敷。
回想起有点像发廊里劣质烫发水的味道。
真无法想象，难倒亚马逊自营的护肤品从此也得避而远之了吗？
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "坏了" is: 

"Ruined" or "Broken" The translation of the Chinese text "假货" is: 

"Counterfeit goods" or "Fake goods" The translation of the Chinese text "总之悲剧" is: 

"In short, a tragedy" or "In short, it's a tragedy" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"When I used the second sheet, I chose one with fine pores, but as soon as I opened it, a strange smell came out. I thought it was normal because I had never used this brand before. But when I applied it to my face, I couldn't bear it, the smell was extremely strong and unbearable, I couldn't describe it, it made me cough immediately, my eyes also hurt, I was crying, and I quickly took it off to wash my face." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I don't believe it, I opened another sheet of the same brand, and the smell isn't as strong as before. Now I'm applying it." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I remember it smells a bit like the low-quality hair dye used in a bad hair salon." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I'm really unable to imagine, will I have to avoid Amazon's self-operated skincare products from now on?"

original: 奸商啊
当时购买的时候，活动页面上是说满99元赠送“三体全集”，收到货没有这个赠品，打客服电话说要给他们看当时活动的截图，问题是谁买东西还把网页截图保存啊，你们自己做过的活动，还需要顾客帮你们提供啊，各位买家下次要留个心眼，保存证据。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "奸商啊" is: 

"Unscrupulous merchant" or "Shrewd merchant" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"When I bought it, the activity page said that it came with a 'Three-Body Trilogy' set for 99 yuan, but when I received the goods, there was no gift. I called the customer service and asked them to look at the screenshot of the activity at the time, but who takes a screenshot of the webpage when buying things? You guys should keep records of your own activities, not rely on customers to provide evidence. Buyers, please be aware and keep records for next time."

I called the customer service and asked them to look at the screenshot of the activity at the time, but who takes a screenshot of the webpage when buying things? You guys should keep records of your own activities, not rely on customers to provide evidence. Buyers, please be aware and keep records for next time."

original: 用后感受
第一次在亚马逊买东西，分别感受有几点，先来说下用完商品的感受吧，第一确实是无痛，也没有刺激味道的东西，总体来说很不错的，静等8分钟左右一擦就掉了，只是会有少量的汗毛渣在上面，不细看是看不出来的，所以说总体是不错的，至于之后都就用一次还要继续观察，继续用才会知道。
反正我觉得这个东西确实不错。
第二从27号下单，12号收到货，总共15天也就是半个月，亚马逊的送货员服务态度也很好。
第三，亚马逊的什么黑色星期五就不要相信了，星期五下单，等了2天就便宜了接近12块钱，也就是我买成170多（加上运费什么的），有一种搞活动就提价格的感觉样。
客服说什么价格波动，我关注了10多天价格也就是这个样，波动也不大的。
translation:
The translation of "用后感受" is "After use feeling" or "Post-use feeling". Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"This is my first time buying something on Amazon, and I'll share my experience. After using the product, I have a few points to say. Firstly, it was indeed painless and didn't have any irritating smell. Overall, it's quite good. It took about 8 minutes to fall off after waiting, and there's a small amount of hair residue left on the skin, which is not noticeable if you don't look closely. So, overall, it's good. As for the long-term effect, I'll continue to observe and use it to see the results." The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"Anyway, I think this thing is quite good." The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"The second time, I ordered on the 27th and received the goods on the 12th, which took a total of 15 days, or half a month. The delivery service from Amazon was also very good." The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"Thirdly, don't believe in Amazon's Black Friday sales. I ordered on a Friday and waited for 2 days, and it was discounted by nearly 12 dollars, making the total price around 170 dollars (including shipping, etc.). It feels like they just raised the price to make it look like there's a discount." The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"The customer service said it's due to price fluctuations, but I've been monitoring the price for over 10 days and it's been around this price, with not much fluctuation."

original: 价格实惠，日原产，有中文标签，带颗粒，绝对回购！
膏体里带颗粒的，清爽感恰到好处，用后牙齿爽滑，上比某二手东强太多啦，那里说是进口的东西，可好多东西没有中文标签，不知从哪里批发的。
以后只要亚马逊有的，绝不再去二手东。
给个建议，亚马逊的app 上晒单怎么有时晒不了，希望能改进一些应用，会做的越来越好的！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Affordable price, made in Japan, with Chinese labels, with granules, absolutely returnable!"

Here's a more polished version:

"Competitively priced, made in Japan, with Chinese labels, comes with granules, and comes with a 100% return guarantee!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The paste has granules, refreshing to the right extent, and after use, the teeth feel smooth. It's much better than some second-hand products from the East, and it's said to be imported, but many products don't have Chinese labels, and it's unclear where they're sourced from."

Here's a more polished version:

"The paste has a pleasant texture with granules, providing a refreshing sensation that's just right. After use, my teeth feel smooth and silky. Compared to some second-hand products from the East, this one is a significant improvement. Although it's claimed to be an imported product, many of the items lack Chinese labels, making it unclear where they're sourced from." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"From now on, I'll only buy from Amazon, and never go to second-hand stores again."

This sentence is a declaration of intent to switch to buying from a reputable online retailer (Amazon) and avoid buying from second-hand stores in the future. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I have a suggestion, sometimes I'm unable to post reviews on the Amazon app, I hope you can improve the app a bit, and it will get better and better!"

This sentence is a polite suggestion to the Amazon app developers to improve the app's functionality, specifically the ability to post reviews, and expresses hope for future improvements.

original: 卓越这些年，越来越差，根本没有服务质量可言！
垃圾卓越不顾及客户需求 下订单的时候特别配送时间19:00-22:00。
因家里有术后卧床不方便的老人在，所以只有晚上可以方便收件。
结果竟然中午12点就直接上门送了，也不事先电话告知。
如果配送时间是你们快递员随心所欲的想几点就几点送，何必假惺惺弄个时间让客户选择？
如果自己的物流没办法保证服务的，那就干脆不要做电商了！
让一个身上3处伤口的老人下床开门收快递还要找零钱付费！
明明订单上有联系电话！
从头到底也没有人来电话联系一下给个解释！
卓越网所谓的投诉客服就是一帮子外地人在那里装样子，敷衍你的投诉然后给你一个所谓的答复。
不会有任何改变或者补偿！
之前也是遇到这样子了类似配送时间不对的问题也就忍了，但这次无法忍受，太过分了！
新书买的预售到货后竟然封面和封底是反的，这样子明显得质量问题就这样子闭眼把书发给顾客了？
留言差评也不会有人来联系你。
卓越这些年，越来越差，根本没有服务质量可言！
不会再在卓越上花一毛钱。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Over the years, it's been getting worse and worse, and there's no service quality to speak of!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The garbage service doesn't care about customer needs, and when placing an order, the delivery time is especially 19:00-22:00." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"There's an elderly person at home who is recovering from surgery and can't get out of bed, so it's only convenient to receive packages at night." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"As a result, they came to the door at 12:00 noon without even giving a prior phone call to inform." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"If the delivery time is up to the courier's discretion, why bother to provide a time for customers to choose?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"If you can't guarantee the logistics service, then just don't do e-commerce at all!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Making an elderly person with 3 wounds on their body get out of bed to open the door to receive the package and then pay with change!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's clearly listed on the order with a contact phone number!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Not a single phone call from anyone to explain from start to finish!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The so-called customer service of Zhubao (a Chinese e-commerce platform) is just a group of people from other places pretending to be helpful, making a show of listening to your complaints and then giving you a so-called response." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"There will be no change or compensation at all!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I've tolerated similar delivery time issues in the past, but this time I just can't take it, it's too much!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I bought a new book on pre-sale, and when it arrived, the front and back covers were reversed. Is it acceptable to just ignore the quality issue and send the book to the customer like this?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Even if you leave a negative comment, no one will contact you." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Zhubao has been getting worse and worse over the years, and there's no service quality to speak of!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I will never spend a single penny on Zhubao again."

Garbage Excellence does not regard the demands of the consumer, when placing an order, please specify the specific delivery time of 19:00-22:00. Mail delivery is only practical at night since some elderly individuals find it uncomfortable to stay in bed after surgery. Surprisingly, the outcome is delivered without prior telephone communication at 12:00 noon, immediately to the door. A bunch of imposters that pose as employees at Excellence dot com so-called complaint customer care will quickly listen to your issue before offering you a purported solution. There will be no modification or payment! Similar issues have occurred before, and I was able to tolerate them, such as an incorrect delivery date, but this time it is too much for me to handle! You shipped the book to the client while still not paying attention to the fact that the back cover and front cover of the new book were sideways when it came after the pre-sale? No one will contact you if you leave a negative comment. Over the years, Excellence has deteriorated to the point where there is no quality of service to speak of! No more money will be spent on Excellence.

Mail delivery is only practical at night since some elderly individuals find it uncomfortable to stay in bed after surgery.
Surprisingly, the outcome is delivered without prior telephone communication at 12:00 noon, immediately to the door.
Why bother making a time for the consumer to choose if the delivery time is that your courier may deliver it whenever he wants?
Don't undertake any e-commerce if your own logistics can't ensure the service!
Allow an elderly man with 3 wounds to get out of bed and open the door for the messenger, and then he must locate change to for the cost!
Clearly, the order includes a phone number!
Nobody contacted to explain anything from the start to the finish!
A bunch of imposters that pose as employees at Excellence dot com so-called complaint customer care will quickly listen to your issue before offering you a purported solution.
There will be no modification or payment!
Similar issues have occurred before, and I was able to tolerate them, such as an incorrect delivery date, but this time it is too much for me to handle!
You shipped the book to the client while still not paying attention to the fact that the back cover and front cover of the new book were sideways when it came after the pre-sale?
No one will contact you if you leave a negative comment.
Over the years, Excellence has deteriorated to the point where there is no quality of service to speak of!
No more money will be spent on Excellence.

original: 图片质量实在不能接受
作为“古地图集”这样的标题，本书在图片的选择、排版、印刷上实在令人难以接受，有些图片甚至有马赛克，模糊到无法辨识。
即便本书不是专业的地图册，即便是小画幅插图，也应该对得起目录中祖先留下来的洋洋大观的中古文献资料！
（况且很多图片是可以从相关行业资源中获取清晰的原始文件的），用这样的图片来拼凑图书与不使用图片有何差别？
！我为这样的治学精神感到遗憾。
文字方面不予评价，方家各有分辨。
整体2星。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "图片质量实在不能接受" into English is:

"The picture quality is simply unacceptable." The translation of the Chinese text "作为“古地图集”这样的标题，本书在图片的选择、排版、印刷上实在令人难以接受，有些图片甚至有马赛克，模糊到无法辨识" into English is:

"As a book titled "Collection of Ancient Maps", the selection, layout, and printing of the pictures in this book are simply unacceptable, with some images even having mosaic and being blurry to the point of being unrecognizable." The translation of the Chinese text "即便本书不是专业的地图册，即便是小画幅插图，也应该对得起目录中祖先留下来的洋洋大观的中古文献资料！" into English is:

"Even if this book is not a professional atlas, even if it's just a small illustration, it should at least do justice to the grand and magnificent medieval historical materials left behind by our ancestors as listed in the catalog!" The translation of the Chinese text "(况且很多图片是可以从相关行业资源中获取清晰的原始文件的)，用这样的图片来拼凑图书与不使用图片有何差别？" into English is:

"(Furthermore, many of the images can be obtained from clear original files from relevant industry resources), what's the difference between using such images to compile the book and not using any images at all?" The translation of the Chinese text "！我为这样的治学精神感到遗憾。" into English is:

"! I am disappointed by such an academic spirit." The translation of the Chinese text "文字方面不予评价，方家各有分辨。" into English is:

"As for the text, I won't comment, as each family has its own interpretation." The translation of the Chinese text "整体2星。" into English is:

"Overall 2 stars."

original: 高二的时候看的这本书当时只是抱着无聊看看玩的心态，感觉这样的书自己应该不会沉迷吧，毕竟起点的网文以往还是不太吸引我的。
然后...就掉坑里了。
按着这个剧情来说，整本书都是比较轻松愉快的，前部分叶修还在网游里的时候，即使是公会之间勾心斗角，也因为往往被叶神狗血，搞得一点也不沉重。
至于到了比赛的部分，写出了时代的变迁新旧交替的一点点心酸之感（可能是我多愁善感）。
看整部书花了我高二许多学习时间，可是就是停不下来。
全职对人物和感情线的描写让人十分惊艳，有的人物只是偶尔带过，也会给人留下很深的影响，像比较重点描写的角色叶修黄少天苏沐橙都有大量的粉丝，而不在写作中心的角色例如江波涛楚云秀等等也十分找人喜欢，在一个电竞的爽文中竟然让人找不到一个让人讨厌至极的人物，这是全职在人物描写上的成功。
而在感情线上，全职也没有一般网文所令人诟病的后宫佳丽三千万要么美女要么腐的毛病，全文所有人的感情，都有一个共同的地方就是他们喜欢着荣耀这个游戏，并且大都想要堂堂正正的胜利。
小计量有却没有什么大阴谋，每个人看上去都那么单纯可爱。
这或许也是为什么全职没有什么令人讨厌的角色。
全职的IP很大，也归功于此。
撇开网文这个文化现象不谈，全职不失为一本不错的书。
多少他真的会给人提供一些热血，一点点感动。
今年4月份全职要动漫化。
其实想要买齐这套书很久了，碍于永远钱包不够厚都没狠下心下手，然后想要买的时候就发现，tb上简直是假货猖獗，其实全职最近出了另一个版本，封面图吧我自己是蛮喜欢的，但还是打算先买老的版本，所以就在亚马逊上看了看，一次性买下来了一套。
接下来简单说一下货的情况。
●第四本的塑封没有，但书是新的。
●第十七本塑封是在但是被打开了，书的质感也很奇怪感觉没有其他的硬。
●第23本和第十七本情况一样，但是也比第十七本硬，但十分的旧。
●个别几本书的出版社不同好像第23和17就是同一个出版社，和其他的不同。
●整体来讲还算满意，24本很大一箱，很满足。
translation:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"When I was in high school, I read this book with a casual, bored attitude, thinking that I wouldn't get hooked on it. After all, web novels from Qidian (起点) haven't really caught my attention before." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"And then... I fell into the trap." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"As for the plot, the whole book is relatively light-hearted and pleasant. In the early part, Ye Xiu was still in the game, even the power struggles between guilds were made to seem trivial and comical by Ye's antics." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"As for the competitive parts, it touched on a hint of wistfulness for the passing of time and the transition from old to new (maybe I'm just being overly sentimental)." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"I spent a lot of my high school second year studying this book, but I just couldn't stop reading it." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"The portrayal of characters and their relationships in the novel is truly stunning. Even minor characters who only appear occasionally leave a deep impression, while the main characters like Ye Xiu, Huang Shaotian, Su Muqing, and Su Muqing have a large fan base. On the other hand, the supporting characters like Jiang Pao, Chu Yunxiu, etc. are also very likable. In a typical sports novel, it's rare to find a character that you dislike to the extreme, which is a testament to the author's success in character development." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"As for the romantic relationships, the novel avoids the common problem of harem novels where there are thousands of beautiful women or the 'either a beauty or a pervert' trope. In this novel, every character's emotional storyline has one thing in common: they all love the game of Glory and want to achieve a fair and honorable victory." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"The plot is simple and lacks grand schemes, and every character appears to be so innocent and lovable." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"This may also be why there are no unlikeable characters in the novel." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"The large popularity of the novel's IP is also due to this." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Setting aside the phenomenon of web novels, 'Glory' is still a good book in its own right." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Many times, it will give you a sense of passion and a little bit of emotional resonance." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"'Glory' is going to be animated in April this year." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"In fact, I've wanted to buy the complete set of books for a long time, but I've always hesitated due to not having enough money, and then when I wanted to buy it, I found that there were a lot of counterfeit products on Taobao. In fact, 'Glory' has recently released another version, and I quite like the cover art, but I still plan to buy the original version first, so I looked at it on Amazon and ended up buying the complete set." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Next, I'll briefly describe the condition of the goods." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"● The fourth book has no plastic wrapping, but the book is new." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"● The seventeenth book has plastic wrapping, but it's been opened, and the texture of the book feels strange, not as hard as the others." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"● The 23rd book and the 17th book are in the same condition, but it's harder than the 17th book, but it's extremely old." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"● Some of the books have different publishers, it seems that the 23rd and 17th are from the same publisher, but different from the others." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"● Overall, I'm quite satisfied, the 24th is a big box, very satisfying."

Let's now briefly discuss the state of the products. ●The fourth book doesn't have a plastic cover, but it is brand-new. ●The seventeenth book is still in its plastic packaging, but it has been opened, its texture is also quite odd, and it is not as hard as the others. ●The 23rd book is identical to the 17th book, however, it is older and harsher than the 17th book. ●Individual novels are published by various companies, in contrast to the others, it appears that the 23rd and 17th are published by the same company. ●Overall, I'm happy with the outcome, a sizable box contains 24 books, and I am pleased with my purchase.

Subsequently...it fell into the pit.

This premise makes it seem like the entire book is rather carefree and joyful, because of Ye Xiu's blood in the first half, while Ye Xiu was still playing the online game, even the guild intrigue was not overly intense.
Regarding the competition portion, I wrote about the passage of time and the juxtaposition of the old and modern with a hint of melancholy (maybe I am sentimental).
I read the entire book in my second year of high school, which required a lot of study time, but I couldn't put it down.

The character and emotional lines described in Full-time are truly wonderful, Some characters, who are only sporadically introduced, have a profound effect on the audience, for instance, Ye Xiu, Huang Shaotian, and Su Mucheng have a lot of followers since they are more concentrated characters, even the characters that are not part of the writing core, such Jiang Botao and Chu Yunxiu, are endearing, nobody can discover a particularly grating character in a cool piece on e-sports, this character description is a complete success.

Regarding the emotional line, there aren't any of the 30 million harem beauties who are decried in common web publications, either they are gorgeous or they are evil, everyone's feelings are expressed in the complete language, and they all share the desire to triumph honorably and enjoy the game of glory.

●Overall, I'm happy with the outcome, a sizable box contains 24 books, and I am pleased with my purchase.

original: 落寞的小狮子
拿到书的时候，以为会像是《失落的一角》那么简单，结果文字还很多哎！
先后念了三次，才给小朋友念完这本书，一只会开枪的小狮子，爱吃果汁软糖的小狮子。
当看到狮子吃掉猎人这个情节的时候，心里略有不适，现代都市人对于被动物吃掉这样的安排有点接受不了。
看到最后，这个在人类社会成功了的小狮子，迷失了自己，他已经不是完全的狮子，也不是完全的人。
最后，只有小狮子的背影，不知道他去哪儿了。
可能多年以后，这个小狮子的形象还留在长大了的小朋友的印象中，在某一天不经意的时候被想起，或许对她会有触动或是启发。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "落寞的小狮子" is "Lonely Little Lion". The translation of the Chinese text "拿到书的时候，以为会像是《失落的一角》那么简单，结果文字还很多哎！" is:

"When I got the book, I thought it would be as easy as 'The Lost Corner', but it turned out there are many more words!" The translation of the Chinese text "先后念了三次，才给小朋友念完这本书，一只会开枪的小狮子，爱吃果汁软糖的小狮子" is:

"I had to read it three times before I could finish reading it to the kids. A lion who can shoot, a lion who loves fruit juice and candy." The translation of the Chinese text "当看到狮子吃掉猎人这个情节的时候，心里略有不适，现代都市人对于被动物吃掉这样的安排有点接受不了" is:

"When I saw the scene where the lion eats the hunter, I felt a bit uneasy, as modern city people have a hard time accepting the idea of being eaten by an animal." The translation of the Chinese text "看到最后，这个在人类社会成功了的小狮子，迷失了自己，他已经不是完全的狮子，也不是完全的人" is:

"Seeing the end, this lion who succeeded in human society has lost himself, he is no longer a complete lion, nor a complete human." The translation of the Chinese text "最后，只有小狮子的背影，不知道他去哪儿了" is:

"Finally, all that's left is the back of the little lion, and I don't know where he went." The translation of the Chinese text "可能多年以后，这个小狮子的形象还留在长大了的小朋友的印象中，在某一天不经意的时候被想起，或许对她会有触动或是启发" is:

"Perhaps many years later, the image of the little lion will still be etched in the minds of the grown-up children, and one day, it may suddenly come to mind, and may even inspire or move her."

"When I got the book, I thought it would be as easy as 'The Lost Corner', but it turned out there are many more words!"

The translation of the Chinese text "先后念了三次，才给小朋友念完这本书，一只会开枪的小狮子，爱吃果汁软糖的小狮子" is:

"I had to read it three times before I could finish reading it to the kids. A lion who can shoot, a lion who loves fruit juice and candy."

"Finally, all that's left is the back of the little lion, and I don't know where he went."

The translation of the Chinese text "可能多年以后，这个小狮子的形象还留在长大了的小朋友的印象中，在某一天不经意的时候被想起，或许对她会有触动或是启发" is:

"Perhaps many years later, the image of the little lion will still be etched in the minds of the grown-up children, and one day, it may suddenly come to mind, and may even inspire or move her."
reference: The abandoned lion cub I assumed the book would be as straightforward as "The Lost Corner" when I first acquired it, but there are actually a lot of words! I had to read this book to the kids three times before I was done, A small lion that is proficient with a firearm, a small lion who adores marshmallows. I was a little uneasy when I saw the plot about the lion eating the hunter, Animals eating humans is an arrangement that modern urbanites cannot support. This tiny lion who thrived in human civilization ultimately lost himself, Both a whole lion and a full man, he is no longer. In the end, all that was left was the small lion's back, and I have no idea what happened to him. Maybe the grown-up kids will still remember this small lion years from now, and if she is unintentionally reminded of it one day, it might move or inspire her.
reference_split: The abandoned lion cub
I assumed the book would be as straightforward as "The Lost Corner" when I first acquired it, but there are actually a lot of words!
I had to read this book to the kids three times before I was done, A small lion that is proficient with a firearm, a small lion who adores marshmallows.
I was a little uneasy when I saw the plot about the lion eating the hunter, Animals eating humans is an arrangement that modern urbanites cannot support.
This tiny lion who thrived in human civilization ultimately lost himself, Both a whole lion and a full man, he is no longer.
In the end, all that was left was the small lion's back, and I have no idea what happened to him.
Maybe the grown-up kids will still remember this small lion years from now, and if she is unintentionally reminded of it one day, it might move or inspire her.

original: 性价比很高的作品集
1、以前还不知道TASCHEN，最近买了不少他们的书，原因就是太强悍，不论是选题还是制作本身。
本作先后出过3个版本，最大的版本和那本米开朗基罗全集一样，都是接近50厘米长34厘米宽的；中版本大概是36厘米长23厘米宽；而这版是最小，而且配有书盒的两册书版。
个人觉得还可以接受，一来价格便宜，且700多页分成两本，作为平装本也较好翻阅；二来是不同于米开朗基罗全集那本，画作占了主体，达芬奇这本黑白手稿占了大部分，对于预算有限的、非美术专业读者而言，这版作为欣赏画作和手稿的性价比是最高的。
2、绘画部分的解说很棒，有构图分析、草稿分析和历史背景（比如最后的晚餐），但不知道是印刷还是书尺寸问题，有些阴影部分县的太深了，看不清细节，有点遗憾。
3、对比米开朗基罗的手稿，达芬奇的手稿内容就丰富的多。
前者已经是天才了，后者涉猎之广、成就之高，不足以天才来形容。
如果以前只看画作只能体会一半的达芬奇，看完手稿就彻底没语言了。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "性价比很高的作品集" into English is:

"High-value collection" or "High-quality collection" The translation of the Chinese text "1、以前还不知道TASCHEN，最近买了不少他们的书，原因就是太强悍，不论是选题还是制作本身" into English is:

"1. I didn't know TASCHEN before, but I've bought a lot of their books recently, and it's because they're too powerful, whether it's the selection of topics or the production itself." The translation of the Chinese text "本作先后出过3个版本，最大的版本和那本米开朗基罗全集一样，都是接近50厘米长34厘米宽的；中版本大概是36厘米长23厘米宽；而这版是最小，而且配有书盒的两册书版" into English is:

"This work has been published in three versions, with the largest version being similar in size to the complete works of Michelangelo, approximately 50 cm long and 34 cm wide; the middle version is about 36 cm long and 23 cm wide; and this version is the smallest, and it comes with a slipcase for the two-volume set." The translation of the Chinese text "个人觉得还可以接受，一来价格便宜，且700多页分成两本，作为平装本也较好翻阅；二来是不同于米开朗基罗全集那本，画作占了主体，达芬奇这本黑白手稿占了大部分，对于预算有限的、非美术专业读者而言，这版作为欣赏画作和手稿的性价比是最高的" into English is:

"Personally, I think it's acceptable, one reason is that it's affordable, and with over 700 pages divided into two volumes, it's also easy to flip through as a paperback; another reason is that it's different from the Michelangelo complete works, where the paintings take center stage, but in this Da Vinci edition, the black and white manuscripts take up most of the space, and for readers with limited budgets and non-art professionals, this edition has the highest value for money in terms of appreciating the paintings and manuscripts." The translation of the Chinese text "2、绘画部分的解说很棒，有构图分析、草稿分析和历史背景（比如最后的晚餐），但不知道是印刷还是书尺寸问题，有些阴影部分县的太深了，看不清细节，有点遗憾" into English is:

"2. The explanation of the paintings is excellent, with composition analysis, draft analysis, and historical background (such as the Last Supper), but I'm not sure if it's a printing or book size issue, some of the shaded areas are too dark and the details are hard to see, a bit disappointing." The translation of the Chinese text "3、对比米开朗基罗的手稿，达芬奇的手稿内容就丰富的多" into English is:

"3. Compared to Michelangelo's manuscripts, Da Vinci's manuscripts have much more content." The translation of the Chinese text "前者已经是天才了，后者涉猎之广、成就之高，不足以天才来形容" into English is:

"The former is already a genius, but the latter's breadth of interests and high achievements cannot be described as a genius." The translation of the Chinese text "如果以前只看画作只能体会一半的达芬奇，看完手稿就彻底没语言了" into English is:

"If I had only seen his paintings before, I could only appreciate half of Da Vinci, but after seeing his manuscripts, I'm speechless."

reference: Portfolio that is economical 1, I wasn't familiar with TASCHEN previously, but recently I bought a lot of their books, This is because they are simply too effective, whether it's the choice of topics or the quality of the production. This piece of work has undergone 3 revisions, The three sizes are: the largest, which is roughly 50 cm long and 34 cm wide, the medium, which is roughly 36 cm long and 23 cm wide, and the smallest, which is this version, A book box for two volumes is also included. Personally, I believe it to be appropriate, First off, it's inexpensive, and it comes in two paperback volumes with a combined total of more than 700 pages, It differs from Michelangelo's full works, which are primarily made up of paintings, in two ways, the majority of Da Vinci's manuscripts are in black and white, this edition is the most affordable for readers with tight budgets and non-art majors to appreciate paintings and writings. 2, The painting section explanation is excellent, including composition analysis, draft analysis, and historical context (such as the Last Supper), but I'm not sure if it's the printing or the book's size, The details cannot be properly seen because of certain too-dark shadows, pity. 3, The manuscripts of Da Vinci include a lot more information than those by Michelangelo. reference_split: Portfolio that is economical

1, I wasn't familiar with TASCHEN previously, but recently I bought a lot of their books, This is because they are simply too effective, whether it's the choice of topics or the quality of the production.

This piece of work has undergone 3 revisions, The three sizes are: the largest, which is roughly 50 cm long and 34 cm wide, the medium, which is roughly 36 cm long and 23 cm wide, and the smallest, which is this version, A book box for two volumes is also included.

Personally, I believe it to be appropriate, First off, it's inexpensive, and it comes in two paperback volumes with a combined total of more than 700 pages, It differs from Michelangelo's full works, which are primarily made up of paintings, in two ways, the majority of Da Vinci's manuscripts are in black and white, this edition is the most affordable for readers with tight budgets and non-art majors to appreciate paintings and writings.

2, The painting section explanation is excellent, including composition analysis, draft analysis, and historical context (such as the Last Supper), but I'm not sure if it's the printing or the book's size, The details cannot be properly seen because of certain too-dark shadows, pity.
3, The manuscripts of Da Vinci include a lot more information than those by Michelangelo.
The former is already a genius, whereas the latter's body of work and accomplishments are insufficient to qualify them as geniuses.
You will be rendered absolutely dumbfounded after reading the manuscripts if you could only comprehend half of Da Vinci from the artwork before.
