original: 目前找不到亚马逊官方反馈渠道，所以只能在商品评价里反馈
1. 在 3 月 29 号，通过预购途径使用 31 元购买了此书，显示 3 月 31 号会推送到设备上，此时亚马逊官网上还无法预览该书（因为还未发布）；
2. 3 月 31 号推送到设备上的书，内容是空白，只有敬请期待，而亚马逊上该书电子版降价到了 18 元；
3. 这两天反复尝试将设备上的下载的空白的书进行删除，再次同步，都无法获取到包含实际内容的电子版《商业的本质》，但是看到亚马逊官网已经可以预览该书。
目前我有几点感想
1. 价格的问题其实并不是最重要的，关键是现在怎么将kindle上空白的书换成有实际内容的书，而不是永远下载下来都是“敬请期待”
2. 预购的书以后应该不会再买了，毕竟万一跳票，再下载一本空内容的书，手续看起来非常复杂；
3. 希望亚马逊给到一个可以反馈此类问题的正常渠道，当对电子书下载、或者使用提出疑义的时候可以有地方反馈（工单、线上客服都可以，可以参考微软官方商城是怎么做的）
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Currently, there is no official feedback channel from Amazon, so feedback can only be given in the product review section." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"1. On March 29th, I purchased this book for 31 yuan through pre-order, showing that it will be pushed to the device on March 31st. At that time, the book was not yet available for preview on the Amazon website (since it had not been released)." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"2. The book pushed to the device on March 31st was blank, with only 'Please wait' content, while the e-book version on Amazon had dropped to 18 yuan." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3. Over the past two days, I have repeatedly tried to delete the blank book downloaded on the device and resync, but I was unable to obtain the e-book version of 'The Essence of Business' with actual content, although I can see that the book is now available for preview on the Amazon website." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Currently, I have a few thoughts." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"1. The price issue is not the most important thing, the key is how to replace the blank book on Kindle with a book that has actual content, rather than downloading 'Please wait' forever." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"2. I won't buy pre-ordered books anymore, because if the release is delayed, I'll have to download another blank book, and the process looks complicated." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3. I hope Amazon can provide a normal channel for users to feedback issues like this, so that when there are problems with e-book downloads or usage, users can have a place to report them (such as submitting a ticket or contacting online customer service, similar to how Microsoft does it on their official store)."
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Currently, there is no official feedback channel from Amazon, so feedback can only be given in the product review section."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"1. On March 29th, I purchased this book for 31 yuan through pre-order, showing that it will be pushed to the device on March 31st. At that time, the book was not yet available for preview on the Amazon website (since it had not been released)."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"2. The book pushed to the device on March 31st was blank, with only 'Please wait' content, while the e-book version on Amazon had dropped to 18 yuan."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3. Over the past two days, I have repeatedly tried to delete the blank book downloaded on the device and resync, but I was unable to obtain the e-book version of 'The Essence of Business' with actual content, although I can see that the book is now available for preview on the Amazon website."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Currently, I have a few thoughts."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"1. The price issue is not the most important thing, the key is how to replace the blank book on Kindle with a book that has actual content, rather than downloading 'Please wait' forever."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"2. I won't buy pre-ordered books anymore, because if the release is delayed, I'll have to download another blank book, and the process looks complicated."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3. I hope Amazon can provide a normal channel for users to feedback issues like this, so that when there are problems with e-book downloads or usage, users can have a place to report them (such as submitting a ticket or contacting online customer service, similar to how Microsoft does it on their official store)."

The price of the book's electronic version on Amazon has been lowered to 18 yuan, and the content of the book that was pushed to the device on March 31 is blank; 3. I have tried several times over the past two days to remove the downloaded blank book from the device and synchronize it again, but I am unable to download "The Essence of Business" in its entirety, however, I can see that the book can be previewed on Amazon's official website. So far, I have a few ideas 1. The price issue is not the most crucial one, the trick is to figure out how to swap out the empty books on Kindle with books that have actual substance rather than just downloading them indefinitely and saying "stay tuned" 2. The book that was preordered shouldn't be purchased again in the future, after all, the process appears to be exceedingly difficult if the ticket is bypassed, followed by the download of a book with no content; 3. 1. I bought the book for 31 yuan through the pre-order channel on March 29, and it says it would be delivered to my device on March 31, the book cannot be previewed on Amazon's official website at this moment (since it has not yet been released);
2. The price of the book's electronic version on Amazon has been lowered to 18 yuan, and the content of the book that was pushed to the device on March 31 is blank;

3. I have tried several times over the past two days to remove the downloaded blank book from the device and synchronize it again, but I am unable to download "The Essence of Business" in its entirety, however, I can see that the book can be previewed on Amazon's official website.
So far, I have a few ideas

1. The price issue is not the most crucial one, the trick is to figure out how to swap out the empty books on Kindle with books that have actual substance rather than just downloading them indefinitely and saying "stay tuned"

2. The book that was preordered shouldn't be purchased again in the future, after all, the process appears to be exceedingly difficult if the ticket is bypassed, followed by the download of a book with no content;

3. I'm hoping that Amazon will make a regular channel available for input on these problems, there will be a place to provide feedback when there are questions concerning the download or use of e-books (you can refer to Microsoft's official mall for instructions on how to do so through work orders or online customer care, both of which are appropriate)

original: 不是很推荐阅读
很久前读的，恰巧看见了凭记忆写点读后感吧。
这本书与其说是短篇小说集，不如说是生活中关于爱情的碎片收集。
本书的笔调极其平淡，是那种白开水一样的平淡，遣词造句对简约追求到了极致，情节也是像夏日午后的大街一样，寂静平淡。
每一个短篇都是平凡生活中的一小段时间的剪影，没有开头，没有结局。
最后收集在一起，冠名《当我们谈论爱情时我们在谈论什么》。
我想，这个小说集，以及它的标题，像是一种行为艺术，作者想表达的是，爱情不止是舞台上的悲欢离合，都市传说中的海枯石烂，也不只是你侬我侬的如胶似漆，爱情不止是以上也不应该被以上代表，爱情也是平淡如水的生活，枯燥无味的日复一日，也有对生活的无措，现实的逃避，未来的茫然。
阅读这本书时你脑海里可能回想起你身旁吵架的夫妻，认识的人的索然无味的婚姻，以及不如意的感情。
这正是我不推荐阅读的原因，从审美的角度上讲，本书的文笔和情节都索然无味，除非你的生活惊涛骇浪或者甜蜜得如生活在糖果城堡，否则你得阅读时的感觉就是见怪不怪和无聊。
而从思想深度上，日常情节并没有让人眼前一亮或者扩展一个人的思路和视野（这点不同于马尔克斯的《霍乱时期的爱情》），短暂的片段也没有探讨任何问题，比如是什么样的错误导致了爱情的失败？
主角婚姻的破裂来源于那些原因？
所以我不推荐阅读这本书，读不读都没什么太大意义。
作者的想法更多地通过技巧和体裁表达而不是故事情节，也是本书阅读体验比较差的原因。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "不是很推荐阅读" is:

"Not very recommended to read." The translation of the Chinese text "很久前读的，恰巧看见了凭记忆写点读后感吧" is:

"I just happened to see this while going through my old notes, so I'll write a brief impression of what I thought after reading it a long time ago." The translation of the Chinese text "这本书与其说是短篇小说集，不如说是生活中关于爱情的碎片收集" is:

"This book is not so much a collection of short stories as a collection of fragments about love from life." The translation of the Chinese text "本书的笔调极其平淡，是那种白开水一样的平淡，遣词造句对简约追求到了极致，情节也是像夏日午后的大街一样，寂静平淡" is:

"The tone of this book is extremely plain, a kind of plainness like plain water, the language and sentence structure are simplified to the extreme, and the plot is also as quiet and plain as a street on a summer afternoon." The translation of the Chinese text "每一个短篇都是平凡生活中的一小段时间的剪影，没有开头，没有结局" is:

"Each short story is a fleeting moment in ordinary life, without a beginning or an end." The translation of the Chinese text "最后收集在一起，冠名《当我们谈论爱情时我们在谈论什么》" is:

"Finally, they are collected together and titled 'What Are We Talking About When We Talk About Love'." The translation of the Chinese text "我想，这个小说集，以及它的标题，像是一种行为艺术，作者想表达的是，爱情不止是舞台上的悲欢离合，都市传说中的海枯石烂，也不只是你侬我侬的如胶似漆，爱情不止是以上也不应该被以上代表，爱情也是平淡如水的生活，枯燥无味的日复一日，也有对生活的无措，现实的逃避，未来的茫然" is:

"I think this collection of short stories, along with its title, is a form of performance art, and the author wants to express that love is not just the dramatic highs and lows on stage, nor the eternal love in urban legends, nor the romantic love that's stuck together like glue, love is not just what's above, nor should it be represented by what's above, love is also the dull, monotonous life, the daily routine, the confusion about life, the escape from reality, and the uncertainty of the future." The translation of the Chinese text "阅读这本书时你脑海里可能回想起你身旁吵架的夫妻，认识的人的索然无味的婚姻，以及不如意的感情" is:

"While reading this book, you may think of the quarreling couples around you, the unfulfilling marriages of people you know, and the unhappy relationships." The translation of the Chinese text "这正是我不推荐阅读的原因，从审美的角度上讲，本书的文笔和情节都索然无味，除非你的生活惊涛骇浪或者甜蜜得如生活在糖果城堡，否则你得阅读时的感觉就是见怪不怪和无聊" is:

"This is the reason I don't recommend reading this book, from an aesthetic perspective, the writing and plot of this book are dull and uninteresting, unless your life is turbulent and dramatic or sweet and like living in a candy castle, otherwise, you'll feel like you've seen it all and get bored while reading." The translation of the Chinese text "而从思想深度上，日常情节并没有让人眼前一亮或者扩展一个人的思路和视野（这点不同于马尔克斯的《霍乱时期的爱情》），短暂的片段也没有探讨任何问题，比如是什么样的错误导致了爱情的失败？" is:

"And from a depth of thought, the ordinary plot doesn't give you a sudden insight or expand one's perspective (this is different from Gabriel Garcia Marquez's 'Love in the Time of Cholera'), nor do the short fragments discuss any issues, such as what kind of mistakes lead to the failure of love?" The translation of the Chinese text "主角婚姻的破裂来源于那些原因？" is:

"What are the reasons for the breakdown of the main characters' marriages?" The translation of the Chinese text "所以我不推荐阅读这本书，读不读都没什么太大意义" is:

"So I don't recommend reading this book, it doesn't really matter whether you read it or not." The translation of the Chinese text "作者的想法更多地通过技巧和体裁表达而不是故事情节，也是本书阅读体验比较差的原因" is:

"The author's ideas are more expressed through techniques and genre rather than the plot, which is also one of the reasons why the reading experience of this book is not so good."

reference: Reading is not highly advised I happened to notice it because I read about it a long time ago, so I'll just write from memory. This book is more of a collection of fragments about love in life than it is a compilation of short stories. The plot of this novel is as quiet and flat as a street in the middle of a summer afternoon, the tone of the book is similar to that of plain water, and the words and sentences used strive for the utmost simplicity. Each short narrative is a snapshot of a moment in everyday life that has no beginning or end. In the end, they were compiled under the heading "What We Talk About When We Talk About Love." I consider the title of this anthology of novels to be a type of performance art, the author aims to convey that love is more than only the emotions experienced on stage, the rocks and dry sea in urban tales, and the bond that binds you and I together, not only should the aforementioned not be seen as a representation of love, but also of a life that is dull day in and day out, as plain as water, with a loss of life, denial of reality, and uncertainty about the future. While you read this book, images of the quarreling couples around you, the uninteresting marriages of individuals you know, and the unsatisfying relationships can be running through your head. Since the writing and plot of this book are dull from an artistic standpoint, I do not advocate reading it, unless your life is difficult or sweet, like living in a candy castle, you will feel uncomfortable when you are forced to read it, not strange and dull. In contrast to Marquez's "Love in the Time of Cholera," the daily narratives did not engage viewers or broaden their perspectives in terms of depth of thought, and the brief clips did not address any issues, such as What type of error caused the failure of love? What led to the marriage of the main character's failure? Because this book doesn't make much sense whether you read it or not, I do not suggest reading it. This book's reading experience is generally subpar since the author's thoughts are conveyed more effectively through technique and genre than through a clear narrative.

While you read this book, images of the quarreling couples around you, the uninteresting marriages of individuals you know, and the unsatisfying relationships can be running through your head.

original: 适合粗读,不能细看。
本书的逻辑性很好,但是内容不够丰满。
解释了很多销售理论是什么、为什么,但在怎么办方面却很薄弱,只是指出了方向但是没有给出具体的做法。
另外,本书感觉像是拼凑而成。
举例既有国内的又有国外的;既有知名企业家或销售员又有名不见经传的人。
不知道是不是为了举例而编纂的故事，如果举一些作者亲历的案例会更有信服力。
在顾客还是客户的称谓上变来变去。
标题上还是顾客,正文中就变成客户了。
电子书中还出现了错别字、标点符号缺失、编号错误的问题。
总之,这本书作为理论入门是个不错的选择,但对于已经从事销售工作想要提高销售水平的人就不太适用了。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Suitable for rough reading, not for close reading." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The book has good logical structure, but the content is not rich enough." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"It explained what sales theory is and why, but it is very weak in terms of how to do it, only pointing out the direction but not providing specific methods." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Additionally, the book feels like it was pieced together." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"It includes both domestic and foreign examples; both well-known entrepreneurs or salespeople and unknown individuals." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I'm not sure if the stories were compiled just for examples, if the author shared some personal cases they experienced, it would be more convincing." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The terminology of 'customer' or 'client' keeps changing." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"It's 'customer' in the title, but 'client' in the content." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"There are also issues of typos, missing punctuation, and incorrect numbering in e-books." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"In short, this book is a good choice for those who are new to sales theory, but it may not be suitable for those who are already working in sales and want to improve their sales skills."

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Suitable for rough reading, not for close reading."

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The book has good logical structure, but the content is not rich enough."

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"It explained what sales theory is and why, but it is very weak in terms of how to do it, only pointing out the direction but not providing specific methods."

"In short, this book is a good choice for those who are new to sales theory, but it may not be suitable for those who are already working in sales and want to improve their sales skills."
reference: It is appropriate for skimming, not for close reading. This book's logic is sound, but it lacks sufficient content. It provides an explanation of what and why numerous sales philosophies exist, However, it is lacking in practical advice, it does not offer any concrete solutions; it only indicates the direction. Furthermore, the book feels like a patchwork. There are both domestic and foreign entrepreneurs or salespeople, for example, as well as unknown individuals. I'm not sure if it's fiction compiled for the sake of illustration, but it would be more believable if certain cases experienced by the author were provided. We modify the title of customer or client. The text becomes a customer, but the title continues to be a client. The e-book also contained errors, missing punctuation marks, and improper numbers. In essence, while this book is a fantastic introduction to theory, it is not appropriate for individuals who are currently in sales and want to enhance their sales level.

original: 快速了解互联网金融的导读书
这本书很浅，可以说只是一个入门课，可以帮助大家快速了解互联网金融的全貌，但要深入了解，还是要按图索骥，自己去深挖。
且成书时间较早，后来的支付宝微信借补贴大战培养用户习惯的内容还没提及，如今的第三方支付份额只怕已不是书中所说的占比这么小了吧。
现在好多人外出吃饭都是带个手机就好，商家也因为银行流水太高的原因，弃用银联了。
但还是非常感谢作者写出这本入门书，看得出作者起码有多年的金融观察经验，对国内外的金融发展史都十分熟悉，所以才能写成如此通俗易懂的内容。
写高大空很容易，难的是写的通俗易懂。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Introduction to Internet Finance" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"This book is quite introductory, it can be said to be a basic course, it can help people quickly understand the overall picture of internet finance, but to gain a deeper understanding, one still needs to delve deeper on their own." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Moreover, the book was published relatively early, and the content about how Alipay and WeChat cultivated user habits through subsidies in the later period has not been mentioned, and the current market share of third-party payments may not be as small as what is described in the book." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Now, many people go out to eat with just their phone, and merchants have also stopped using UnionPay due to high bank transaction volumes." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"However, I would still like to express my gratitude to the author for writing this introductory book, it can be seen that the author has at least many years of financial observation experience and is very familiar with the development history of finance at home and abroad, which is why they were able to write such easy-to-understand content." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"It's easy to write something profound, but the difficulty lies in making it easy to understand."

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Introduction to Internet Finance"

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"This book is quite introductory, it can be said to be a basic course, it can help people quickly understand the overall picture of internet finance, but to gain a deeper understanding, one still needs to delve deeper on their own."

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Moreover, the book was published relatively early, and the content about how Alipay and WeChat cultivated user habits through subsidies in the later period has not been mentioned, and the current market share of third-party payments may not be as small as what is described in the book."

"It's easy to write something profound, but the difficulty lies in making it easy to understand."

Because the book was written earlier, it does not include information about Alipay and WeChat's subsidy war to shape user habits, the third-party payment share in use today is most likely not as low as the book claimed. original: 欣赏你，更想让你知道！
决定一个人工作满意度的第一要素不是薪水高低，而是在工作中是否得到了足够重视和赏识。
根据马斯洛需求层次理论，在人的基本生存需要得到满足后，最迫切的就是心理需要的满足——希望被理解、被肯定、被赏识。
确实，对于国人来说，大部分是“爱你在心口难开”，即便是怀有爱、感激与赞赏也是默默放在心里不会说出来。
作者在本书中阐述了五种赞赏的语言：肯定的言辞、精心时刻、服务的行为、称心的礼物、身体接触。
我觉得重要的不是你知道赞赏的五种语言到底是什么，而是你能随时随地发自内心地用这五种语言去赞赏，去感恩身边的人，不管是家人，朋友还是同事。
其实越是亲密的人越需要赞赏和感恩，这样我们的生活才会变得更加美好。
学会赞赏，企业也能在一定程度上挽留住人才，降低辞职率。
感谢译者给我们带来了精彩的国外的思想和世界。
由于中西方文化背景等原因，语言之间或多或少会存在差异，如果有机会能看到作者原版相信会收获更多。
再次谢谢作者和译者以及编辑们的辛勤劳动！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "欣赏你，更想让你知道！" is:

"Appreciate you, and I want you to know!" The translation of the Chinese text "决定一个人工作满意度的第一要素不是薪水高低，而是在工作中是否得到了足够重视和赏识" is:

"The first factor that determines a person's job satisfaction is not their salary, but whether they are valued and recognized enough in their work." The translation of the Chinese text "根据马斯洛需求层次理论，在人的基本生存需要得到满足后，最迫切的就是心理需要的满足——希望被理解、被肯定、被赏识" is:

"According to Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs theory, after basic survival needs are met, the most urgent need is the satisfaction of psychological needs – the desire to be understood, acknowledged, and recognized." The translation of the Chinese text "确实，对于国人来说，大部分是“爱你在心口难开”，即便是怀有爱、感激与赞赏也是默默放在心里不会说出来" is:

"Indeed, for the Chinese people, most of the time, 'love is hard to express', even if they have love, gratitude, and appreciation, they are often silently kept in their hearts and not spoken out loud." The translation of the Chinese text "作者在本书中阐述了五种赞赏的语言：肯定的言辞、精心时刻、服务的行为、称心的礼物、身体接触" is:

"The author discusses five forms of appreciation in this book: positive words, thoughtful moments, serving actions, thoughtful gifts, and physical touch." The translation of the Chinese text "我觉得重要的不是你知道赞赏的五种语言到底是什么，而是你能随时随地发自内心地用这五种语言去赞赏，去感恩身边的人，不管是家人，朋友还是同事" is:

"I think what's more important is not knowing what the five languages of appreciation are, but being able to use them from the heart at any time and in any place to appreciate and express gratitude to the people around you, whether they are family, friends, or colleagues." The translation of the Chinese text "其实越是亲密的人越需要赞赏和感恩，这样我们的生活才会变得更加美好" is:

"In fact, the closer the people are to us, the more they need appreciation and gratitude, and it's only then that our lives will become more beautiful." The translation of the Chinese text "学会赞赏，企业也能在一定程度上挽留住人才，降低辞职率" is:

"Learning to appreciate, a company can to some extent retain talent and lower the resignation rate." The translation of the Chinese text "感谢译者给我们带来了精彩的国外的思想和世界" is:

"We thank the translators for bringing us fascinating foreign ideas and perspectives." The translation of the Chinese text "由于中西方文化背景等原因，语言之间或多或少会存在差异，如果有机会能看到作者原版相信会收获更多" is:

"Due to the differences in cultural backgrounds between the East and the West, there will be some differences in language. If you have the opportunity to see the original version, you will gain more." The translation of the Chinese text "再次谢谢作者和译者以及编辑们的辛勤劳动！" is:

"Thank you again to the authors, translators, and editors for their hard work!"

The translation of the Chinese text "欣赏你，更想让你知道！" is:

"Appreciate you, and I want you to know!"

The translation of the Chinese text "决定一个人工作满意度的第一要素不是薪水高低，而是在工作中是否得到了足够重视和赏识" is:

"The first factor that determines a person's job satisfaction is not their salary, but whether they are valued and recognized enough in their work."

The translation of the Chinese text "根据马斯洛需求层次理论，在人的基本生存需要得到满足后，最迫切的就是心理需要的满足——希望被理解、被肯定、被赏识" is:

"According to Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs theory, after basic survival needs are met, the most urgent need is the satisfaction of psychological needs – the desire to be understood, acknowledged, and recognized."

"Indeed, for the Chinese people, most of the time, 'love is hard to express', even if they have love, gratitude, and appreciation, they are often silently kept in their hearts and not spoken out loud."

"The author discusses five forms of appreciation in this book: positive words, thoughtful moments, serving actions, thoughtful gifts, and physical touch."

The translation of the Chinese text "我觉得重要的不是你知道赞赏的五种语言到底是什么，而是你能随时随地发自内心地用这五种语言去赞赏，去感恩身边的人，不管是家人，朋友还是同事" is:

"I think what's more important is not knowing what the five languages of appreciation are, but being able to use them from the heart at any time and in any place to appreciate and express gratitude to the people around you, whether they are family, friends, or colleagues."

The translation of the Chinese text "其实越是亲密的人越需要赞赏和感恩，这样我们的生活才会变得更加美好" is:

"In fact, the closer the people are to us, the more they need appreciation and gratitude, and it's only then that our lives will become more beautiful."

The translation of the Chinese text "学会赞赏，企业也能在一定程度上挽留住人才，降低辞职率" is:

"Learning to appreciate, a company can to some extent retain talent and lower the resignation rate."

The translation of the Chinese text "感谢译者给我们带来了精彩的国外的思想和世界" is:

"We thank the translators for bringing us fascinating foreign ideas and perspectives."

The translation of the Chinese text "由于中西方文化背景等原因，语言之间或多或少会存在差异，如果有机会能看到作者原版相信会收获更多" is:

"Due to the differences in cultural backgrounds between the East and the West, there will be some differences in language. If you have the opportunity to see the original version, you will gain more."

The translation of the Chinese text "再次谢谢作者和译者以及编辑们的辛勤劳动！" is:

"Thank you again to the authors, translators, and editors for their hard work!"
reference: I value you and wish to tell you more! Not the amount of pay, but rather whether or not a person feels valued and given enough attention at work, is the primary determinant of job happiness. Maslow's hierarchy of needs theory states that when people's basic needs for survival are met, it is imperative to meet their psychological needs-- in order to feel understood, validated, and valued. In fact, the majority of Chinese people are "I love you hard to express" people who will keep their feelings of adoration, thanks, and appreciation to themselves and refrain from expressing them out loud. The author of this book explains the five languages of appreciation: physical touch, words of affirmation, acts of service, quality time, and desirable gifts. Not knowing the five languages of appreciation, in my opinion, is more significant than being able to express appreciation and gratitude to those around you whenever and wherever you are, whether they be close friends, family members, or coworkers. In fact, the closer individuals are to us, the more we need to show them respect and appreciation for them, in order for our lives to improve. Recognize your worth so that you can help businesses keep people on board longer and cut down on turnover. We are grateful to the translator for introducing us to such amazing foreign ideas and cultures. There are more or less linguistic distinctions,, because of factors like the cultural backgrounds of Chinese and Western people, I think you will learn more if you have the chance to see the author's original work. Once more, I'd want to thank the authors, translators, and editors for their labor of love!

original: 疑为伪劣商品，请亚马逊严格审核
质量超级差，包装松垮，没有分量，甚至不如路边地摊产品，没有克重，没有条码，十袋包装也是松松垮垮，完全不是合格产品的特征；是亚马逊最糟糕的购物体验，已经申请退货；完全属于质量问题；建议商家擦亮眼睛，拒绝劣质货；补充：又买了心相印，超市23元/10卷，加了几张对比照片，进一步验证了该产品的伪劣，为了给消费者更明确的参考，避免经济损失和进一步的心情不快！
再度期望亚马逊能够一丝不苟，严把商品源头。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Please have Amazon conduct a strict audit for suspected counterfeit or substandard products." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The quality is extremely poor, the packaging is loose, and it's even worse than products sold on the street stalls. There's no weight, no barcode, and the packaging of the ten bags is also loose. It's completely not the characteristics of a qualified product. It's the worst shopping experience on Amazon, and I've already applied for a return. It's a quality issue. I suggest the seller be more careful and reject substandard goods. Addendum: I also bought the same product from a supermarket for 23 yuan per 10 rolls, and added a few comparison photos to further verify the product's counterfeiting. In order to provide consumers with a clearer reference, avoid economic losses, and prevent further disappointment!" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I hope Amazon can be meticulous and strictly control the source of the products once again."

original: 小包装

"The e-commerce trick is deep, I'll just go to the supermarket to buy it next time." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"That's it." or "That's that." (a casual way to express resignation or acceptance)

original: 味道不喜欢
小孩很不喜欢牙膏的味道，每次都说辣，也许用别的词形容才更贴切，小孩的词库里暂时只有这个词。
搞活动时候买的，很便宜，所以也不好意思给差评了，四星吧，不过不会再买了。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "味道不喜欢" is:

"I don't like the taste" The translation of the Chinese text "小孩很不喜欢牙膏的味道，每次都说辣，也许用别的词形容才更贴切，小孩的词库里暂时只有这个词" is:

"The child really dislikes the taste of toothpaste, every time he says it's spicy, maybe a more suitable word would be used, but for now, that's the only word in the child's vocabulary." The translation of the Chinese text "搞活动时候买的，很便宜，所以也不好意思给差评了，四星吧，不过不会再买了" is:

"I bought it during a sale, it was very cheap, so I don't feel like giving it a bad review, I'll give it 4 stars, but I won't buy it again."

"The child really dislikes the taste of toothpaste, every time he says it's spicy, maybe a more suitable word would be used, but for now, that's the only word in the child's vocabulary."

The translation of the Chinese text "搞活动时候买的，很便宜，所以也不好意思给差评了，四星吧，不过不会再买了" is:

"I bought it during a sale, it was very cheap, so I don't feel like giving it a bad review, I'll give it 4 stars, but I won't buy it again."

original: 正品哟 包装好
包装很完整，里面加了充气袋，没有网上评论的只有光秃秃一个产品的样子。
瓶子外包装上还有一层塑料膜像图片上描述的一样，快递也很快，拍下第二天就来了。
是正品，只是没货了，不知道什么时候再上架。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "正品哟 包装好" is:

"Authentic product, well-packaged." The translation of the Chinese text "包装很完整，里面加了充气袋，没有网上评论的只有光秃秃一个产品的样子" is:

"The packaging is very complete, with an inflatable bag inside. It looks exactly like the product in the online reviews, no extra accessories." The translation of the Chinese text "瓶子外包装上还有一层塑料膜像图片上描述的一样，快递也很快，拍下第二天就来了" is:

"The outer packaging of the bottle has a layer of plastic film just like the picture shows, and the delivery was also very fast, it arrived the next day after I ordered." The translation of the Chinese text "是正品，只是没货了，不知道什么时候再上架" is:

"It's a genuine product, but it's out of stock, I don't know when it will be restocked."

"It's a genuine product, but it's out of stock, I don't know when it will be restocked."

There is still a coating of plastic film on the bottle's outside packing, as shown in the photograph, and the express shipping is also very swift, arriving the next day after I took the photo. It's authentic, but it's out of stock, and I'm not sure when it'll come back.

original: 糟心的一次购物体验
黑五的时候下的单，结果等了好久都没收到，后面一查询，包裹早已被签收，问了身边的同事都说没有帮签收，赶紧联系快递公司，却说要寄件方才能发起查询，联系了亚马逊客服，又等了十多天，终于搞清楚是快递被误投给别人了，又几番周转才终于取回快递，外包装已经被拆，商品还算是完整，也不知道被用过没有，总之挺糟心的
translation: The translation of the Chinese text is: "A terrible shopping experience." The translation of the Chinese text is: "I placed an order on Black Friday, but it took a long time to arrive, and after checking, I found out that the package had already been signed for, but my colleagues around me said they didn't sign for it. I quickly contacted the courier company, but they said only the sender could initiate the inquiry. I contacted Amazon customer service, and after waiting for over ten days, I finally figured out that the package was mistakenly delivered to someone else. After several rounds of handling, I was finally able to retrieve the package, but the outer packaging was torn open and the goods were still intact, but I don't know if they were used or not. In short, it was a terrible experience."
translation_split: The translation of the Chinese text is: "A terrible shopping experience."

The translation of the Chinese text is: "I placed an order on Black Friday, but it took a long time to arrive, and after checking, I found out that the package had already been signed for, but my colleagues around me said they didn't sign for it. I quickly contacted the courier company, but they said only the sender could initiate the inquiry. I contacted Amazon customer service, and after waiting for over ten days, I finally figured out that the package was mistakenly delivered to someone else. After several rounds of handling, I was finally able to retrieve the package, but the outer packaging was torn open and the goods were still intact, but I don't know if they were used or not. In short, it was a terrible experience."
reference: A poor shopping encounter I ordered on Black Friday, but despite waiting a long time, I never got the item, the box had already been signed for when I checked it later, my coworkers denied signing for it when I questioned them about it, I called the courier service right away, but they told the sender should make the inquiry, over ten days passed after I contacted Amazon customer service, the messenger was inadvertently sent to someone else, I finally realized, I eventually recovered the courier after a few rounds, the product is still intact despite the removal of the outer packing, I'm not sure if it was ever used, No, it's still fairly horrible

original: 错误的配图
我以为自己能够收到图1这样的耳机，没想到却收到了图2这样的耳机，图物不一致也就算了，耳机左右声音大小不一又是什么意思？
虽然名称都是一样的，但还是希望大家能够小心注意，另外还请亚马逊负责人及时更换正确的配图，万分感谢。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "错误的配图" is:

"Wrong image" or "Incorrect image" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I thought I would receive a headphone like picture 1, but I received a headphone like picture 2 instead. The product and the picture don't match, and to make things worse, the sound volume on the left and right sides is also different, what does it mean?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Although the names are the same, I still hope that everyone can be careful and pay attention. Additionally, I would like to request the Amazon staff to update the correct images as soon as possible, thank you very much."
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text "错误的配图" is:

"Wrong image" or "Incorrect image"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I thought I would receive a headphone like picture 1, but I received a headphone like picture 2 instead. The product and the picture don't match, and to make things worse, the sound volume on the left and right sides is also different, what does it mean?"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Although the names are the same, I still hope that everyone can be careful and pay attention. Additionally, I would like to request the Amazon staff to update the correct images as soon as possible, thank you very much."
reference: Wrong photo I expected to get a headset similar to Figure 1, but instead I got a headset like Figure 2, the visuals being inconsistent is acceptable, but what does it imply that the volume on the left and right earbuds differ? Despite the fact that the names are the same, I still hope that everyone will pay attention, to add, I also request that the Amazon administrator quickly replaces the appropriate image, I appreciate you.

Despite the fact that the names are the same, I still hope that everyone will pay attention, to add, I also request that the Amazon administrator quickly replaces the appropriate image, I appreciate you.

original: 操作系统一般般
用了一段时间，总体来说画面还可以，感觉不出什么差别来，就是这个系统让人看着纠结，开机时间明显有点慢，也没法进行很好的设置，再带的软件更是不用评论了，响应速度那就更一般了，和同事家的比起来那不是一个数量级的。
看评论说很人性化的设计，我没有找到哪里人性化，遥控器这个常用的上下左右，返回键设计的位置实在是不敢恭维。
所以呢，就当个电视吧，再外加电视盒之类的用吧。
translation:
The translation of "操作系统一般般" is: 

"Generally speaking" or "Ordinary" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"After using it for a while, overall, the performance is still acceptable, but I don't feel a significant difference. However, this system is confusing to look at, the boot time is noticeably slow, and it's hard to set it up well. The additional software is not worth commenting on, and the response speed is even more general. Compared to my colleague's, it's not even on the same level." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"People say it has a very user-friendly design, but I couldn't find anything user-friendly about it. The position of the up, down, left, right, and back buttons on the remote control is really not to be praised." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"So, I'll just use it as a TV, and add a TV box to it."
translation_split:
The translation of "操作系统一般般" is: 

"Generally speaking" or "Ordinary"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"After using it for a while, overall, the performance is still acceptable, but I don't feel a significant difference. However, this system is confusing to look at, the boot time is noticeably slow, and it's hard to set it up well. The additional software is not worth commenting on, and the response speed is even more general. Compared to my colleague's, it's not even on the same level."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"People say it has a very user-friendly design, but I couldn't find anything user-friendly about it. The position of the up, down, left, right, and back buttons on the remote control is really not to be praised."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"So, I'll just use it as a TV, and add a TV box to it."
reference: Moderate operating system After using it for a while, I can't really see the difference, but overall the picture is not horrible, however this system makes people look jumbled, boots up slowly, I can't make proper settings, and the software I bring is not required, when compared to my colleagues' responses, the response time is not significantly slower after commenting. Although it is described as having a very user-friendly design in the comments, I couldn't discover any examples of a human-friendly design, Up, down, left, and right are the often utilized remote control directions, and the back button's placement is actually not very attractive. So, just utilize it as a TV, and use a TV box or something similar.
reference_split: Moderate operating system

After using it for a while, I can't really see the difference, but overall the picture is not horrible, however this system makes people look jumbled, boots up slowly, I can't make proper settings, and the software I bring is not required, when compared to my colleagues' responses, the response time is not significantly slower after commenting.

Although it is described as having a very user-friendly design in the comments, I couldn't discover any examples of a human-friendly design, Up, down, left, and right are the often utilized remote control directions, and the back button's placement is actually not very attractive.
So, just utilize it as a TV, and use a TV box or something similar.

original: 降价太厉害了
降价太厉害了，一百多入现在99！
在亚马逊积累了很多未评价的订单，所以我统一用复制的一段话作为评价内容。
如果我用这段话来评价，说明这款产品至少85分以上。
而比较差的产品，我绝对不会偷懒到复制粘贴评价，这样其他消费者在购买的时候会作为参考，而商家也会因此改进商品质量。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "降价太厉害了" is:

"The price is too low."

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 降价 (jiàng jià) means "to lower the price"
- 太 (tài) means "too" or "very"
- 厉害 (lì hài) means "serious" or "severe", but in this context, it's used to emphasize the degree of something, similar to "very" or "extremely"
- 了 (le) is a grammatical particle used to indicate completion or emphasis. The translation of the Chinese text "降价太厉害了，一百多入现在99！" is:

"The price is too low, over a hundred is now 99!"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 降价太厉害了 (jiàng jià tài lì hài le) means "The price is too low" (as previously translated)
- 一百多 (yī bǎi duō) means "over a hundred" or "more than a hundred"
- 入 (rù) is a verb that means "to enter" or "to go into", but in this context, it's used to indicate a price range or a discount
- 现在 (xiàn zài) means "now"
- 99 (jiǔ jiǔ) is the price, which is 99 units (likely yuan, the Chinese currency)

The sentence is likely expressing surprise or excitement that an item that originally cost over a hundred yuan is now on sale for 99 yuan. The translation of the Chinese text "在亚马逊积累了很多未评价的订单，所以我统一用复制的一段话作为评价内容。" is:

"I have accumulated many unreviewed orders on Amazon, so I'm using a copied text as the review content."

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 在 (zài) means "on" or "in"
- 亚马逊 (yà mǎ xùn) is the Chinese name for Amazon
- 积累 (jī lěi) means "to accumulate" or "to pile up"
- 订单 (dìng dān) means "order"
- 多 (duō) means "many"
- 未 (wèi) means "un" or "not yet"
- 评价 (píng jià) means "evaluation" or "review"
- 所以 (suǒ yǐ) means "so" or "therefore"
- 我 (wǒ) means "I"
- 统一 (tǒng yī) means "uniform" or "standardized"
- 用 (yòng) means "to use"
- 复制 (fù zì) means "to copy"
- 的 (de) is a possessive particle
- 段 (duàn) means "paragraph" or "section"
- 话 (huà) means "words" or "text"
- 作为 (zuò wèi) means "as" or "as a"
- 评价内容 (píng jià nèi róng) means "review content" The translation of the Chinese text "如果我用这段话来评价，说明这款产品至少85分以上。" is:

"If I use this text to evaluate, it means this product is at least 85 points above."

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 如果 (rú guǒ) means "if" or "in case"
- 我 (wǒ) means "I"
- 用 (yòng) means "to use"
- 这段话 (zhè duàn huà) means "this text" or "this paragraph"
- 来 (lái) means "to come" or "to use"
- 评价 (píng jià) means "evaluation" or "review"
- 说明 (shuō míng) means "to explain" or "to indicate"
- 这款 (zhè kuǎn) means "this product"
- 产品 (chǎn pǐn) means "product"
- 至少 (zhì shǎo) means "at least"
- 85分 (bā shí wǔ fēn) means "85 points"
- 以上 (shàng yǐ) means "above" or "over"

Note: In this context, "分" (fēn) likely refers to a rating system, such as a 100-point scale. The translation of the Chinese text "而比较差的产品，我绝对不会偷懒到复制粘贴评价，这样其他消费者在购买的时候会作为参考，而商家也会因此改进商品质量。" is:

"As for products that are relatively poor, I will absolutely not copy and paste reviews, this way, other consumers will use it as a reference when making a purchase, and the merchants will also improve the quality of their products as a result."

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 而 (ér) is a conjunction that means "and" or "but"
- 比较 (bǐ jiào) means "relatively" or "comparatively"
- 差 (chà) means "poor" or "inferior"
- 的 (de) is a possessive particle
- 产品 (chǎn pǐn) means "product"
- 我 (wǒ) means "I"
- 绝对 (jué duì) means "absolutely" or "certainly"
- 不会 (bù huì) means "will not"
- 偷懒 (tōu lǎn) means "to be lazy" or "to slack off"
- 到 (dào) means "to" or "up to"
- 复制 (fù zì) means "to copy"
- 粘贴 (niān tiē) means "to paste"
- 评价 (píng jià) means "evaluation" or "review"
- 这样 (zhè yàng) means "this way" or "in this manner"
- 其他 (qí tā) means "other" or "else"
- 消费者 (xiāo fèi zhě) means "consumer"
- 在 (zài) means "in" or "during"
- 购买 (gòu mǎi) means "to buy" or "to purchase"
- 的时候 (de shí hou) means "when" or "at the time"
- 会 (huì) means "will" or "will be"
- 作为 (zuò wèi) means "as" or "as a"
- 参考 (cān kǎo) means "reference"
- 而 (ér) is a conjunction that means "and" or "but"
- 商家 (shāng jiā) means "merchant" or "business"
- 也 (yě) means "also" or "too"
- 会 (huì) means "will" or "will be"
- 因为 (yīn wèi) means "because of" or "as a result of"
- 改进 (gǎi jìn) means "to improve"
- 商品 (shāng pǐn) means "product" or "commodity"
- 质量 (zhì liàng) means "quality"

I have a ton of unreviewed orders on Amazon, so I use a paraphrased passage as the evaluation content.
If I evaluate based on this section, it indicates that the product has at least 85 points or higher.

If a product is subpar, I will never be so lazy to copy and paste reviews so that future customers can use them as a guide when making a purchase and the seller can raise the standard of the product as a result.

这么便宜的线，但是却应该是达到了hdmi认证标准的，亲身对比秒杀国内秋叶原这些狗屁玩意（价格都是贵一倍了），线身粗壮，也比较柔软，7米传输没有噪点，以后低价线认准倍思了！

original: 东西还可以，但是亚马逊的售后服务真的比其他网站差太多了
下单后发现下错了，但是取消订单已经取消不了，网页联系在线客服一直显示错误链接，联系不上。
到货后送货员给我打电话，我说我不要了，想取消订单的没取消成功，派送员就拿回去了，说先给我签收上，让我申请退货。
申请退货时才告知食品类一旦签收不能退货，没办法打电话给亚马逊客服，也是一样说法，签收不能退货。
我以前在京东和苏宁都买过政策上不能退货的物品，包括牛奶、纸尿裤等，联系客服都给退了，而且京东的纸尿裤打开后味道太大联系客服照样给退了，到了你亚马逊就不行。
规矩是死的，人是活的，联系你们客服，怎么处理的？
告诉我要么我自己收下，要么让派送员自己买下来，人家派送员本来就不容易了，我凭什么让人家掏钱买下不是自己购买的东西？
行，我也不退了，我自己收下了，但是必须给你们的服务打1分
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's okay for the product, but Amazon's after-sales service is really much worse than other websites." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"After placing the order, I found I made a mistake, but the order can't be cancelled now. The online customer service on the webpage is always showing an error link and I couldn't get in touch." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"After the goods arrived, the delivery man called me and said I didn't want it, but the cancellation of the order was not successful, so the delivery man took it back and asked me to sign for it first, then apply for a return." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It was only when I applied for a return that I was informed that food items cannot be returned once signed for, and when I called Amazon customer service, they said the same thing, that once signed for, it cannot be returned." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I have previously bought items that cannot be returned on JD and Suning, including milk and diapers, and I was able to return them after contacting customer service. Even when I opened the diapers from JD and the smell was too strong, I was still able to return them after contacting customer service, but Amazon is different." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The rules are rigid, but people are flexible, how will you handle this situation after I contact your customer service?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"You're telling me to either accept the delivery myself or have the delivery man buy it, but the delivery man is already having a hard time, why should I make him buy something that's not even something I purchased?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Fine, I won't return it, I'll take it myself, but I have to give your service a 1-star rating."

original: 劝大家不要白花钱
首先满怀期待购买，觉得都乐品牌的应该不会差到哪里去吧，收到了以后看包装觉得还可以，个头还不错，但是有一盒基本上都是软软的，外表看是看不出来的，要手感，吃到嘴里完全没有味道，寡淡无味，咬开来果肉一圈是暗黄色就是坏了那种，好坏参着卖的，能吃的也就不到三分之一，劝大家不要买，也不便宜，质量太差了！
吃一堑长一智，以后再也不在电商买水果了！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "劝大家不要白花钱" is:

"Don't waste your money." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"At first, I was full of expectations when buying, thinking that a well-known brand wouldn't be bad, but after receiving it, the packaging looked okay and the size was fine. However, when I opened the box, I found that most of the contents were soft and mushy, and you couldn't tell from the outside. When I took a bite, it was completely tasteless and flavorless. When I bit into the fruit, it was a dark yellow color, which indicated that it was spoiled. They were selling both good and bad products, and the edible ones were less than a third of the total. I strongly advise everyone not to buy it, and it's not even cheap, the quality is too bad!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I learned a lesson the hard way, and from now on, I'll never buy fruits online again!"

I strongly advise everyone not to buy it, and it's not even cheap, the quality is too bad!"

original: 产品防伪标识在哪里
瓶子底部一角凹陷的厉害，应该是经历过强烈的撞击才能导致的，从外包装袋看，感觉蹂躏的程度让人揪心，毕竟是食物类的包装太简单了，而且还是属于国际购的，还有没看到什么明显的防伪标识标志，开瓶非常轻松，关键是盖内的一层蜂蜜直接从里面冒出来了，有开口几乎是没有什么粘连性，外国产品都是这样的吗？
生在中国的我有点不理解了。
应该是正品吧？
还有拍下时提示二十几号到，这个是14号收到的，我第一次在这里海外购，只是把自己的疑惑写下来，或许这都是正常的？
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "产品防伪标识在哪里" is:

"Where is the product anti-counterfeiting mark?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The bottle is severely concave at the bottom corner, it's likely that it has experienced a strong impact. From the outer packaging bag, the degree of damage is quite disturbing. After all, it's a food packaging that's too simple, and it's an international purchase. Moreover, I didn't see any obvious anti-counterfeiting marks. The cap was very easy to open, and the inner layer of honey directly came out from inside. The opening has almost no adhesion, are foreign products like this?" The translation of the Chinese text "生在中国的我有点不理解了" is:

"I'm a bit puzzled as a Chinese person." The translation of the Chinese text "应该是正品吧" is:

"It should be the genuine product, right?" The translation of the Chinese text "还有拍下时提示二十几号到，这个是14号收到的，我第一次在这里海外购，只是把自己的疑惑写下来，或许这都是正常的？" is:

"There was a notice saying it would arrive in a few days, but I received it on the 14th. This is my first time buying from overseas, I just wrote down my doubts here, maybe everything is normal?"

original: 提货服务有待改进
我一共买了5份提货券，在提取时，第一次预约提取3份，结果只寄过来2份，经过多方沟通才确认是漏发、答应后需补发；第二次预约，刚好赶上休息日，网站和微信均无提示需要在工作日预约，造成了不必要的恐慌，建议以后改善。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "提货服务有待改进" is:

"Delivery service needs improvement." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I bought a total of 5 redemption vouchers. When I went to pick them up, I made an appointment to pick up 3 of them first, but only 2 were sent, after multiple communications, it was confirmed that it was an oversight and they agreed to make up for it; the second time I made an appointment, it coincided with a holiday, the website and WeChat did not prompt that an appointment on a working day was required, causing unnecessary panic, and I suggest improving it in the future."
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text "提货服务有待改进" is:

"Delivery service needs improvement."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I bought a total of 5 redemption vouchers. When I went to pick them up, I made an appointment to pick up 3 of them first, but only 2 were sent, after multiple communications, it was confirmed that it was an oversight and they agreed to make up for it; the second time I made an appointment, it coincided with a holiday, the website and WeChat did not prompt that an appointment on a working day was required, causing unnecessary panic, and I suggest improving it in the future."
reference: Improved pick-up service is required I purchased 5 delivery coupons in total, I had scheduled a time to pick up 3 coupons, but only 2 were delivered when I went to pick them up, after numerous communications, it was determined that they had been overlooked and that new copies of them were required, the second appointment arrived right on schedule, there was unnecessary worry produced because neither the website nor WeChat mentioned the need for an appointment on weekdays on the final rest day, it is advised to get better in the future.

original: 不错的购物
东西好评！
还是比较相信亚马逊自营的东西，现在海外购以后很方便，从国外买回来物流时间比国内也就多几天，不得不说亚马逊海外购到国内的清关能力还是很强的，比走转运要快很多，所以现在很多东西都在海外购上买。
希望国内商品的质量和价格能够更好一些，很多东西都是国内产的，但是出去转一圈买回来比在国内还便宜，希望改进。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "不错的购物" into English is: "Good shopping". The translation of the Chinese text "东西好评！" into English is: "Good stuff!" The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"I still trust Amazon's self-operated products more, and with cross-border shopping, it's very convenient to have the items delivered to my country. The logistics time is only a few days longer than domestic delivery, but Amazon's customs clearance ability is still very strong, much faster than shipping through a forwarding service. So, I'm buying most things on Amazon's cross-border shopping platform now." The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"I hope the quality and price of domestic products can be better, many of the products are made domestically, but after buying them abroad and bringing them back, they are cheaper than buying them domestically, I hope to improve this."
translation_split: The translation of the Chinese text "不错的购物" into English is: "Good shopping".
The translation of the Chinese text "东西好评！" into English is: "Good stuff!"

The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"I still trust Amazon's self-operated products more, and with cross-border shopping, it's very convenient to have the items delivered to my country. The logistics time is only a few days longer than domestic delivery, but Amazon's customs clearance ability is still very strong, much faster than shipping through a forwarding service. So, I'm buying most things on Amazon's cross-border shopping platform now."

The translation of the Chinese text into English is:

"I hope the quality and price of domestic products can be better, many of the products are made domestically, but after buying them abroad and bringing them back, they are cheaper than buying them domestically, I hope to improve this."
reference: Pleasant shopping Nice stuff! I still have faith in Amazon's autonomous products, the shipping period is now only a few days longer than domestic ones, making it incredibly simple to purchase internationally, I must admit that Amazon still has excellent customs clearance capabilities for purchases made outside of China; this is quicker than transshipment, nowadays so many products are bought abroad, which is much faster. I hope that domestic items' quality and cost can improve, even though many items are made domestically, buying them elsewhere rather than in China is more affordable, I want it to get better.
reference_split: Pleasant shopping
Nice stuff!

I still have faith in Amazon's autonomous products, the shipping period is now only a few days longer than domestic ones, making it incredibly simple to purchase internationally, I must admit that Amazon still has excellent customs clearance capabilities for purchases made outside of China; this is quicker than transshipment, nowadays so many products are bought abroad, which is much faster.
I hope that domestic items' quality and cost can improve, even though many items are made domestically, buying them elsewhere rather than in China is more affordable, I want it to get better.

original: 垃圾
看到这样的包裹，试问大家:觉不觉得是路边的垃圾?
一个塑料易碎的包装，就用一个塑料袋从所谓的德国发过来，这样的包装是负责的吗?
我看这样的包装是装垃圾一样的，购买这个产品，包装及其简陋，没有任何防止破损的措施，就一个简单的塑料袋包装，到手后，包裹完全变形了，里面的物品也有破损。
如果我只是碰到一个这样的，我认了，买了几个都是这样子，找亚马逊客服，客服就说可以退，但运费垫付，然后运费以礼品卡的形式返回给我。
我试问一下，我用现金支付运费，你们给我返礼品卡，这是要我自己买你们礼品卡就直说啊，还要自己把产品邮寄到德国仓库，这不是买个产品受罪啊!
而我一直跟客服说，出现这样的问题是谁的责任，客服却半句不说是他们的责任，连半句责任都不敢担当，这样的售后服务还有什么保障呢? 一句话:认栽!但我估计我这个评价，亚马逊都不会给公布的机会，直接回删除!
translation: The translation of the Chinese text "垃圾" is "trash" or "garbage". The translation of the Chinese text "看到这样的包裹，试问大家:觉不觉得是路边的垃圾?" is "Looking at this package, I ask you all: don't you think it's just trash on the street?" The translation of the Chinese text "一个塑料易碎的包装，就用一个塑料袋从所谓的德国发过来，这样的包装是负责的吗?" is "A fragile plastic packaging, sent from so-called Germany in a plastic bag, is this kind of packaging responsible?" The translation of the Chinese text "我看这样的包装是装垃圾一样的，购买这个产品，包装及其简陋，没有任何防止破损的措施，就一个简单的塑料袋包装，到手后，包裹完全变形了，里面的物品也有破损。" is "I think this packaging is like trash, the packaging of this product is very simple and has no measures to prevent damage, just a simple plastic bag packaging, after receiving it, the package is completely deformed, and the items inside are also damaged." The translation of the Chinese text "如果我只是碰到一个这样的，我认了，买了几个都是这样子，找亚马逊客服，客服就说可以退，但运费垫付，然后运费以礼品卡的形式返回给我。" is "If I just encountered one like this, I would have accepted it, but I bought several and they were all like this, I contacted Amazon customer service, the customer service said I could return it, but I would have to pay for the shipping, and then the shipping fee would be returned to me in the form of a gift card." The translation of the Chinese text "我试问一下，我用现金支付运费，你们给我返礼品卡，这是要我自己买你们礼品卡就直说啊，还要自己把产品邮寄到德国仓库，这不是买个产品受罪啊!" is "I'm asking, if I pay the shipping fee in cash, you return it to me in the form of a gift card, why don't you just say I have to buy the gift card myself? And I also have to send the product back to the German warehouse myself, is this not a torture to buy a product?" 6，如果你没有给予承诺的把握，请不要做出承诺。
7，实际上，我非常在意商家做出的承诺。
8，所以，我打了低分。

original: 并不是自营商品，亚马逊无耻了
页面明确标注自营，实际上由供应商配送，售后由供应商负责，出问题自行联系供货商。
想取消订单，对不起，订单信息已传递给供应商，不能取消；想退换货，在亚马逊成功申请了退换货，对不起，没有人理你，需要自行联系供货商退货。
这尼玛哪门子自营商品。
商品不是亚马逊配送，售后亚马逊不承担，客服竟然说“我帮你联系供应商”，还声称就是自营，太无耻了，赤裸裸的不要脸，赤裸裸的对消费者进行欺诈！
translation: The translation of the Chinese text is: "Not self-owned goods, Amazon is shameless." The translation of the Chinese text is: "The page clearly indicates that it's a self-owned product, but in reality, it's shipped by the supplier, and after-sales service is handled by the supplier. If there's an issue, please contact the supplier directly." The translation of the Chinese text is: "Sorry, the order information has been passed to the supplier and cannot be cancelled. If you want to return or exchange, Amazon has successfully applied for a return or exchange, but sorry, no one will help you, you need to contact the supplier yourself to return the goods." The translation of the Chinese text is: "What kind of self-owned product is this?" The translation of the Chinese text is: "The product is not shipped by Amazon, and Amazon does not bear the after-sales responsibility. The customer service actually said 'I'll help you contact the supplier', and they claim it's a self-owned product, which is shameless, completely shameless, and openly deceiving consumers!"

The translation of the Chinese text is: "What kind of self-owned product is this?"

The translation of the Chinese text is: "The product is not shipped by Amazon, and Amazon does not bear the after-sales responsibility. The customer service actually said 'I'll help you contact the supplier', and they claim it's a self-owned product, which is shameless, completely shameless, and openly deceiving consumers!"
reference: Amazon is shameless, and the product is not self-operated The self-operated label on the page is very obvious, In actuality, the provider delivers it, and the supplier is in charge of after-sales, make your own contact with the supplier if there is an issue. Sorry, but once the order information has been forwarded to the supplier, it cannot be changed, if you want to return the item, and you have successfully requested a return on Amazon, I'm sorry, but nobody is concerned; you must get in touch with the provider on your own to return the item. This damn self-operating thing. What kind of thing is it? Amazon does not deliver the item, and it also does not assume liability for the after-sale support, even the customer service stated that it was self-operated and said, "I will help you contact the supplier", It is clearly cheating customers and is shameless!

original: 郁闷的体验
之前在别家网购的滤芯，过滤效果不错，28天结束之后再用多一两天也一样没有水垢。
由于一直以来在亚马逊购置的东西品质都可以，这次就想着在这边买，第一次在亚马逊买滤芯，感觉不太好，不但早早就开始有水垢，而且滤芯一直用到第28天，都会有悬浮的小黑碳粉，真不知道是继续用下去，还是直接扔了好，非常郁闷~
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "郁闷的体验" is:

A stifling or oppressive experience The translation of the Chinese text is:

The water filter cartridge I bought from another website worked well, and it still didn't clog with mineral deposits even after using it for a day or two more than the recommended 28 days. The translation of the Chinese text is:

I've always bought good quality products from Amazon, so I thought I'd try buying it here this time. However, this is my first time buying a water filter cartridge from Amazon, and it didn't go well. Not only did it start clogging with mineral deposits early on, but even after using it for 28 days, there were still tiny black carbon particles floating around in the water. I'm not sure whether to continue using it or just throw it away, it's such a stifling experience.

Not only did it start clogging with mineral deposits early on, but even after using it for 28 days, there were still tiny black carbon particles floating around in the water. original: 亚马逊客服真烂
两天前下的订单，今天收到就发现降了40块钱，花了好多时间找到客服，客服说没法补差价，可以重买并退货。
这种客户体验和服务比某宝某东真是差一万倍。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "亚马逊客服真烂" is:

"Amazon customer service is really bad."

Note: "亚马逊" refers to Amazon, "客服" means customer service, and "真烂" is an idiomatic expression that can be translated to "really bad" or "terrible". The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I placed an order two days ago, and when I received it today, I found that the price had been reduced by 40 yuan. I spent a lot of time finding customer service, and the customer service said that it's not possible to refund the price difference, but I can return the item and buy it again."

Note: "两天前" means "two days ago", "下了订单" means "placed an order", "降了40块钱" means "the price was reduced by 40 yuan", "花了好多时间" means "spent a lot of time", "找到客服" means "found customer service", and "没法补差价" means "it's not possible to refund the price difference". The translation of the Chinese text is:

"This customer experience and service is a million times worse than Taobao and JD."

Note: "这种客户体验和服务" means "this customer experience and service", "比某宝某东" is a comparison to Taobao (a Chinese e-commerce platform) and JD (a Chinese e-commerce platform), and "差一万倍" means "a million times worse".

original: 一个顾客的告白
1 收到这样残次品，亚马逊客服告诉你不要急啊，我们54小时左右会跟你联系。
2 然后中间你联系客服人员，他们会告诉你这个问题会有专员处理，他会告知你结果。
你永远主动联系不上这个专员，也不知道她的工号，也没有直线联系电话，就是你联系不上她，只有她联系你。
3悲剧的是等了近3天，这个专员联系了我，我手机离开了一会，没有接到这个专员的电话。
我等了2个小时也没有等来那个专员的电话，期间我主动联系了亚马逊客服，并邮件发送了客服让她给我回电话。
4近3天过去了我都还不知道亚马逊对我收到这个残次品的咖啡机，会有什么处理结果！
5美国亚马逊的商品没有问题，海外购这种购物方式是好的，但是比对美亚的服务可就差远了。
6对我来说我只能继续等待...
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "一个顾客的告白" is:

"A customer's confession" The translation of the Chinese text "1 收到这样残次品，亚马逊客服告诉你不要急啊，我们54小时左右会跟你联系" is:

"1. Received such a defective product, Amazon customer service told you not to worry, we will contact you within 54 hours." The translation of the Chinese text "2 然后中间你联系客服人员，他们会告诉你这个问题会有专员处理，他会告知你结果" is:

"2. Then you contact the customer service staff, they will tell you that this issue will be handled by a specialist, who will inform you of the result." The translation of the Chinese text "你永远主动联系不上这个专员，也不知道她的工号，也没有直线联系电话，就是你联系不上她，只有她联系你" is:

"You can never contact this specialist proactively, you don't know her employee ID, and there's no direct contact phone number, it's just that you can't contact her, but she can contact you." The translation of the Chinese text "3 悲剧的是等了近3天，这个专员联系了我，我手机离开了一会，没有接到这个专员的电话" is:

"3. The tragedy is that after waiting for nearly 3 days, this specialist contacted me, but I left my phone for a while and didn't receive the specialist's call." The translation of the Chinese text "我等了2个小时也没有等来那个专员的电话，期间我主动联系了亚马逊客服，并邮件发送了客服让她给我回电话" is:

"I waited for 2 hours but didn't receive the specialist's call, during which I proactively contacted Amazon customer service and sent an email to the customer service asking her to call me back." The translation of the Chinese text "4 近3天过去了我都还不知道亚马逊对我收到这个残次品的咖啡机，会有什么处理结果！" is:

"4. After nearly 3 days, I still have no idea what Amazon will do with the defective coffee machine I received." The translation of the Chinese text "5 美国亚马逊的商品没有问题，海外购这种购物方式是好的，但是比对美亚的服务可就差远了" is:

"5. Amazon's products in the US are fine, but the overseas shopping method is good, but the service is far inferior to that of Meiya (a Chinese e-commerce platform)." The translation of the Chinese text "6 对我来说我只能继续等待..." is:

"6. As for me, I can only wait..."
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text "一个顾客的告白" is:

"A customer's confession"

The translation of the Chinese text "1 收到这样残次品，亚马逊客服告诉你不要急啊，我们54小时左右会跟你联系" is:

"1. Received such a defective product, Amazon customer service told you not to worry, we will contact you within 54 hours."

The translation of the Chinese text "2 然后中间你联系客服人员，他们会告诉你这个问题会有专员处理，他会告知你结果" is:

"2. Then you contact the customer service staff, they will tell you that this issue will be handled by a specialist, who will inform you of the result."

The translation of the Chinese text "你永远主动联系不上这个专员，也不知道她的工号，也没有直线联系电话，就是你联系不上她，只有她联系你" is:

"You can never contact this specialist proactively, you don't know her employee ID, and there's no direct contact phone number, it's just that you can't contact her, but she can contact you."

The translation of the Chinese text "3 悲剧的是等了近3天，这个专员联系了我，我手机离开了一会，没有接到这个专员的电话" is:

"3. The tragedy is that after waiting for nearly 3 days, this specialist contacted me, but I left my phone for a while and didn't receive the specialist's call."

The translation of the Chinese text "我等了2个小时也没有等来那个专员的电话，期间我主动联系了亚马逊客服，并邮件发送了客服让她给我回电话" is:

"I waited for 2 hours but didn't receive the specialist's call, during which I proactively contacted Amazon customer service and sent an email to the customer service asking her to call me back."

The translation of the Chinese text "4 近3天过去了我都还不知道亚马逊对我收到这个残次品的咖啡机，会有什么处理结果！" is:

"4. After nearly 3 days, I still have no idea what Amazon will do with the defective coffee machine I received."

The translation of the Chinese text "5 美国亚马逊的商品没有问题，海外购这种购物方式是好的，但是比对美亚的服务可就差远了" is:

"5. Amazon's products in the US are fine, but the overseas shopping method is good, but the service is far inferior to that of Meiya (a Chinese e-commerce platform)."

The translation of the Chinese text "6 对我来说我只能继续等待..." is:

"6. As for me, I can only wait..."
reference: A client's admission 1 Amazon customer support advises you to not worry if you receive a product with such an issue… we will get in touch with you in around 54 hours. 2 You then get in touch with the customer service team in the middle, who will let you know that a professional will handle this issue, and let you know the outcome. Since you don't know the commissioner's job number and there isn't a direct phone number to call, you'll never make the effort to get in touch with her, She is the only one who can reach you, You can't. 3 The tragedy is that I just heard from the commissioner after waiting for almost 3 days, I left my phone unattended for a bit, but the commissioner didn't call. After 2 hours of waiting, the specialist did not call, I made the decision to email Amazon customer support during this time to request a callback, I also took the initiative to contact Amazon customer service. 4 I still don't know what Amazon will do with the faulty coffee maker I received after almost 3 days have passed! 5 In the United States, there are no issues with Amazon's items, although the foreign purchasing process is good, it is still significantly inferior to the service in the United States and Asia. 6 I must simply continue to wait...

1 Amazon customer support advises you to not worry if you receive a product with such an issue… we will get in touch with you in around 54 hours.

Since you don't know the commissioner's job number and there isn't a direct phone number to call, you'll never make the effort to get in touch with her, She is the only one who can reach you, You can't.

5 In the United States, there are no issues with Amazon's items, although the foreign purchasing process is good, it is still significantly inferior to the service in the United States and Asia.
6 I must simply continue to wait...

original: 底不平
因为看点评里说的都很好，所有对这款锅很有期待，拿到手的时候也很喜欢，很轻巧，但开锅的时候就发现问题了，锅底不是平的，中间突起来，周边凹下去，油都跑到周边了，特意买来的开锅大肥肉炸出好多油都没法覆盖中央区域，糊了，开锅都开不了，这样的构造估计没法正常煮菜。
不知道是否我运气不好，刚好拿到个底子不平的锅，幸亏亚马逊提供一个月的退货服务，果断退了。
我把锅刷得干干净净地退了，白忙活了半天。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "底不平" is "uneven bottom" or "uneven ground". The translation of the Chinese text is:

Because the reviews I read were all very good, so I had high expectations for this pot, and when I got my hands on it, I liked it very much, it's very lightweight. However, when I started using it, I found a problem - the bottom of the pot is not flat, it's bulging in the middle and concave on the edges, and the oil all ran to the edges. The large amount of oil I deliberately bought to fry the fatty meat couldn't cover the central area, and it got all over the place, and I couldn't even open the pot. I guess this design won't allow for normal cooking. The translation of the Chinese text is:

I don't know if I just got unlucky, but I happened to get a pot with an uneven bottom. Luckily, Amazon provides a one-month return service, so I decided to return it right away. The translation of the Chinese text is:

I cleaned the pot thoroughly and returned it, but it was all for nothing, as I wasted half a day.

The large amount of oil I deliberately bought to fry the fatty meat couldn't cover the central area, and it got all over the place, and I couldn't even open the pot. I guess this design won't allow for normal cooking.

original: 好的产品设计需要匹配的制造工艺来实现
这是一款设计风格非常简洁的产品。
立方体的造型，设计师把顶部处理成微微的弧面。
本来应该是非常流畅的线条。
可惜最终效果没有能够实现。
因为顶部有两个部件，前面是控制面板，后面水盒顶盖。
顶盖的弧度和控制面板的弧度居然不一致，拼合之后出现了一个最高2mm左右的高差。
虽然看起来是一个很小的缝隙。
但是可以说是把整个设计感都摧毁了。
有点心疼那个产品设计师。
看来美的的产品经理还没有能力去打造这样的水准的产品。
（对于售后小姐的回馈当然不能要求太高，但当我听到售后说道这款产品所有的个体都是这样的，不是只有我买的这件有问题时，她的不以为然和如实重负的情绪让我明白对美的也不能要求太高） 2019-7-7水泵故障出水量少，已经第二次维修，第一次维修后两周又坏了。
translation:
The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"Good product design requires matching manufacturing processes to achieve." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"This is a product with a very simple design style." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"The cube-shaped design, the designer processed the top into a slight arc." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"It should be a very smooth line." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"Unfortunately, the final effect was not achieved." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"Because the top has two components, the front is the control panel, and the back is the water tank lid." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"The arc of the lid and the arc of the control panel surprisingly do not match, resulting in a maximum height difference of around 2mm after assembly." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"Although it looks like a very small gap." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"But it can be said that it completely destroyed the overall design feel." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"I feel a bit sorry for the product designer." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"It seems that the product manager of Haier (a Chinese electronics brand) does not have the ability to create a product of this level." The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"(I don't expect too much from the customer service, but when the customer service representative said that all units of this product are like this, not just the one I bought that has a problem, her indifference and heavy tone made me realize that I shouldn't expect too much from Haier either) On July 7, 2019, the water pump failed, and the water output was low. It has been repaired twice, and it broke again two weeks after the first repair."
translation_split:
The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"Good product design requires matching manufacturing processes to achieve."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"This is a product with a very simple design style."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"The cube-shaped design, the designer processed the top into a slight arc."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"It should be a very smooth line."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"Unfortunately, the final effect was not achieved."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"Because the top has two components, the front is the control panel, and the back is the water tank lid."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"The arc of the lid and the arc of the control panel surprisingly do not match, resulting in a maximum height difference of around 2mm after assembly."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"Although it looks like a very small gap."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"But it can be said that it completely destroyed the overall design feel."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"I feel a bit sorry for the product designer."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"It seems that the product manager of Haier (a Chinese electronics brand) does not have the ability to create a product of this level."

The English translation of the Chinese text is:

"(I don't expect too much from the customer service, but when the customer service representative said that all units of this product are like this, not just the one I bought that has a problem, her indifference and heavy tone made me realize that I shouldn't expect too much from Haier either) On July 7, 2019, the water pump failed, and the water output was low. It has been repaired twice, and it broke again two weeks after the first repair."
reference: To accomplish good product design, manufacturing processes must be compatible This product has a fairly straightforward design. The top of the cube was designed as a slightly curved surface by the designer. The lines ought to have been very slick. Unfortunately, the intended outcome was not realized. Since the top is divided into two halves, the control panel is on the front and the top cover for the water tank is on the back. When combined, there is a height variation of up to 2mm between the top cover's and the control panel's curvatures, which are truly inconsistent. despite appearing to be a modest opening. However, one could argue that the entire sense of design has been lost. The product designer is in my sympathy. It appears that the product managers at Midea are still unable to produce goods of this caliber. (Of course, I can't expect too much from the after-sales representative, but when I heard her say that not just the product I purchased has issues, but all individuals who use it do as well, I realized that you can't expect too much from Midea), The water pump stopped working on July 7, 2019, and there was little water output, following the second repair, which was made two weeks following the first, it broke once more.

The top of the cube was designed as a slightly curved surface by the designer.
The lines ought to have been very slick.
Unfortunately, the intended outcome was not realized.
Since the top is divided into two halves, the control panel is on the front and the top cover for the water tank is on the back.

despite appearing to be a modest opening.
However, one could argue that the entire sense of design has been lost.

(Of course, I can't expect too much from the after-sales representative, but when I heard her say that not just the product I purchased has issues, but all individuals who use it do as well, I realized that you can't expect too much from Midea), The water pump stopped working on July 7, 2019, and there was little water output, following the second repair, which was made two weeks following the first, it broke once more.

original: 优惠后很划算，亚马逊假优惠很伤心

original: Vitamix 维他美仕6300
已观望很久，看到美亚6300打折，中亚海外购同价，赶紧下手。
9月2号下单，预计到货是21号，结果12号就到了，提前了差不多10天，速度是真快！
包装箱不大，直接用的是Vitamix 的原包装，亚马逊也不怕漂洋过海的摔坏了！
机器看着挺新，配件齐全，就是杯子放在底座上晃动的厉害，我都害怕开机杯子直接飞出去！
问了一个有5200的朋友，听他描述好像没有我的这个这么松。
随机附带的食谱全英文，看得挺累，网上也没找到中文版，这是个麻烦事！
收到货后赶紧的买个了变压器，估计3天能到吧，到时候再好好折腾！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "Vitamix 维他美仕6300" into English is:

Vitamix 6300 The translation of the Chinese text "已观望很久，看到美亚6300打折，中亚海外购同价，赶紧下手" into English is:

I have been waiting for a long time, and I saw that the Vitamix 6300 is on sale, the price is the same as in Middle East for international purchase, so I quickly made a purchase. The translation of the Chinese text "9月2号下单，预计到货是21号，结果12号就到了，提前了差不多10天，速度是真快！" into English is:

I placed the order on September 2nd, and it was estimated to arrive on the 21st, but it actually arrived on the 12th, which is about 10 days ahead of schedule, the speed is really fast! The translation of the Chinese text "包装箱不大，直接用的是Vitamix 的原包装，亚马逊也不怕漂洋过海的摔坏了！" into English is:

The packaging box is not big, it's using the original Vitamix packaging directly, Amazon also doesn't worry about it getting damaged during shipping across the ocean! The translation of the Chinese text "机器看着挺新，配件齐全，就是杯子放在底座上晃动的厉害，我都害怕开机杯子直接飞出去！" into English is:

The machine looks quite new, and all the accessories are complete, but the cup shakes a lot when placed on the base, I'm even afraid that when it's turned on, the cup will fly out! The translation of the Chinese text "问了一个有5200的朋友，听他描述好像没有我的这个这么松。" into English is:

I asked a friend who has a Vitamix 5200, and he described it as not as loose as mine. The translation of the Chinese text "随机附带的食谱全英文，看得挺累，网上也没找到中文版，这是个麻烦事！" into English is:

The random recipe book that came with it is all in English, it's quite a hassle to read, and I couldn't even find a Chinese version online, what a nuisance! The translation of the Chinese text "收到货后赶紧的买个了变压器，估计3天能到吧，到时候再好好折腾！" into English is:

After receiving the goods, I quickly bought a variable speed controller, it's estimated to arrive in 3 days, then I'll have a good play with it!

Vitamix 6300

The translation of the Chinese text "已观望很久，看到美亚6300打折，中亚海外购同价，赶紧下手" into English is:

The packaging box is not big, it's using the original Vitamix packaging directly, Amazon also doesn't worry about it getting damaged during shipping across the ocean!

The translation of the Chinese text "随机附带的食谱全英文，看得挺累，网上也没找到中文版，这是个麻烦事！" into English is:

"For Royal, a popular camera strap for single-lens reflex cameras" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"This strap is designed in a scientific way, it's convenient to hang on both shoulders, and it's practical. The front part is fixed and protected the camera with soft materials, unlike other quick-draw camera straps that fix the camera with screws at the bottom and may damage the camera, and it's also very convenient to take down the camera."

The front part is secured and protected with soft materials, unlike other quick-draw straps that can potentially damage the camera with screws at the bottom. It's also very easy to remove the camera."

original: 垃圾售后
我一个半月前买的琴，缺个零件，通知亚马逊后给了我售后的电话，多次沟通后，零件现在还没收到，请问这是什么效率！
估计之后有问题维修更麻烦，期待好售后的朋友们还是绕道吧，太费心！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "垃圾售后" is "After-sales waste" or more accurately "Waste after sales". The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I bought a piano a half month ago, it's missing a part, after I notified Amazon, they gave me the after-sales phone number, after multiple communications, I still haven't received the part, what kind of efficiency is this!"

Or in a more idiomatic English translation:

"I bought a piano a half month ago, but it's missing a part. After I reported the issue to Amazon, they gave me their after-sales contact information. Despite multiple follow-ups, I still haven't received the part. What kind of service is this?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I estimate that after-sales maintenance will be more troublesome, I still expect that good after-sales friends will take the detour, it's too troublesome!"

Or in a more idiomatic English translation:

"I think after-sales maintenance will be a hassle, so I'd rather take a detour and avoid dealing with good after-sales service, it's just too much trouble!"

"I bought a piano a half month ago, but it's missing a part. After I reported the issue to Amazon, they gave me their after-sales contact information. Despite multiple follow-ups, I still haven't received the part. What kind of service is this?"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I estimate that after-sales maintenance will be more troublesome, I still expect that good after-sales friends will take the detour, it's too troublesome!"

Or in a more idiomatic English translation:

"I think after-sales maintenance will be a hassle, so I'd rather take a detour and avoid dealing with good after-sales service, it's just too much trouble!"
reference: Poor post-purchase support One of the parts on the piano I bought a month and a half ago was missing, they provided me with an after-sales phone number after alerting Amazon, the part has not yet been received despite numerous communications, what class of effectiveness is this! If an issue arises in the future, it is anticipated that it will be more difficult to fix, the after-sales service is too much bother, so friends who are looking forward to it should take a detour!
