original: 第一次买的时候，东西有问题，所有的灯在闪烁，无法用。
要求换货，结果货到上海都三天了，还不送过来。
给配送的打电话也不接。
快递公司说，他们只有那个联系方式。
亚马逊找不到投诉的地方。
没有要求过，延迟送货的情况下，莫名其妙按我的要求延迟送货－这样的短信过来。
后面又说什么中转问题。
反正极差的购物体验，开始怀疑亚马逊的物流系统及控制系统的有效性。
估计今天也拿不到。
translation: The first time I bought it, there were issues with it, all the lights were flickering and it wouldn't work. I requested an exchange, but it's been three days since the goods arrived in Shanghai and they still haven't sent it over. I even called the delivery person, but they're not answering. The delivery company said that's the only contact information they have. I couldn't find a place to complain on Amazon. I've never asked for it, but they sent me a message saying they're delaying the delivery as per my request, which is strange since I didn't ask for it. Then they said it's a transit issue. To be honest, the terrible shopping experience has made me start to doubt the effectiveness of Amazon's logistics and management system. I guess I won't be able to get it today.
translation_split: The first time I bought it, there were issues with it, all the lights were flickering and it wouldn't work.
I requested an exchange, but it's been three days since the goods arrived in Shanghai and they still haven't sent it over.
I even called the delivery person, but they're not answering.
The delivery company said that's the only contact information they have.
I couldn't find a place to complain on Amazon.
I've never asked for it, but they sent me a message saying they're delaying the delivery as per my request, which is strange since I didn't ask for it.
Then they said it's a transit issue.
To be honest, the terrible shopping experience has made me start to doubt the effectiveness of Amazon's logistics and management system.
I guess I won't be able to get it today.
reference: When I first purchased it, there was a problem, all of the lights were flickering, and it was inoperable. Although I requested a replacement, it took the items three days to reach Shanghai and they have still not been delivered. The delivery person is unresponsive to calls. The courier service claimed to have only that one contact. Amazon is unable to lodge a complaint anywhere. The delivery was delayed at my request, even though there was no request for it to be done - a text message confirming this appeared. About the transit issue, I'll speak later. Anyway, the incredibly bad purchasing experience led me to start questioning the efficiency of Amazon's logistics and control systems. I suppose I won't be able to collect it today.
reference_split: When I first purchased it, there was a problem, all of the lights were flickering, and it was inoperable.
Although I requested a replacement, it took the items three days to reach Shanghai and they have still not been delivered.
The delivery person is unresponsive to calls.
The courier service claimed to have only that one contact.
Amazon is unable to lodge a complaint anywhere.
The delivery was delayed at my request, even though there was no request for it to be done - a text message confirming this appeared.
About the transit issue, I'll speak later.
Anyway, the incredibly bad purchasing experience led me to start questioning the efficiency of Amazon's logistics and control systems.
I suppose I won't be able to collect it today.

However, I would like to provide a more idiomatic translation:

"It's not about quality, but if it's about writing, it's not as good as 925-25."

Or, in a more natural English expression:

"It's not about quality, but if it's about writing, it's not up to par."

The "925-25" likely refers to a famous Chinese phrase "925" which means "not bad" or "not bad at all", and "25" is likely a humorous exaggeration or a made-up number to emphasize the point that the writing is not good. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Let me give a thumbs up to Tiān Tiān Kuài Dì (天天快递) first, the air transportation is very fast, and the service attitude is also very good!"

Or, in a more natural English expression:

"I just want to give a shoutout to Tiān Tiān Kuài Dì (天天快递) - their air transportation is super fast and the service is also very good!"

Note: Tiān Tiān Kuài Dì is a Chinese courier service company, and "天天快递" means "everyday delivery" or "express delivery every day". The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I've been using 925-25 for a long time, it's very good. I just received 925-85, the quality of the pen is excellent, and the design is also very beautiful. I gave it 4 stars because the pen is a bit heavy, not suitable for fast writing, and the part where you adjust the lead length of the pen cap wobbles a bit. Personal opinion: 925-25 is more comfortable to use than 85."

Or, in a more natural English expression:

"I've been using the 925-25 for a while now, and it's been great. I just got the 925-85, and I'm really impressed with its quality and design. I gave it 4 stars because it's a bit too heavy for my liking, and the mechanism for adjusting the lead length can be a bit wobbly. In my opinion, the 925-25 is more comfortable to use than the 85."

original: 耳机偏音，还有杂音
这耳机是真垃圾，我不知道是我的耳朵出问题了，还是这个耳机确实不如从前了。
我两年前在某易购买过一个蓝色的，音质还不错没有杂音低音也不错，用了两年多用坏了打算再买一个（urbeats ），毕竟感觉还不错。
又看了出了个紫色的挺好看的，结果买来这个今天打开一听才感觉不对劲，一边声音大一边声音小。
开始我以为是那首歌音效的缘故没有多想，可后来听了半天我才发现这个问题很严重，不光偏音，低音效果也没我之前那个听起来好了，还有些许杂音，是只有我买的这个紫色的有这个现象吗？还是现在耳机制造工艺确实不行了呢?
相当差的评价，很失望。
明天白天一定要退货。
PS颜值不错
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "耳机偏音，还有杂音" into English is:

"Earphone sound distortion, and there's also noise." The translation of the Chinese text "这耳机是真垃圾，我不知道是我的耳朵出问题了，还是这个耳机确实不如从前了" into English is:

"This earphone is really trash, I don't know if it's my ear that's the problem or if this earphone is indeed not as good as it used to be." The translation of the Chinese text "我两年前在某易购买过一个蓝色的，音质还不错没有杂音低音也不错，用了两年多用坏了打算再买一个（urbeats），毕竟感觉还不错" into English is:

"I bought a blue one from Gome two years ago, the sound quality was good, no noise, and the bass was good too. It's been used for over two years and has worn out, I'm planning to buy another one (Urbeats), it still feels good." The translation of the Chinese text "又看了出了个紫色的挺好看的，结果买来这个今天打开一听才感觉不对劲，一边声音大一边声音小" into English is:

"I also saw a purple one that looked good, but after buying this one and opening it today, I felt it was off, the sound is loud on one side and quiet on the other." The translation of the Chinese text "开始我以为是那首歌音效的缘故没有多想，可后来听了半天我才发现这个问题很严重，不光偏音，低音效果也没我之前那个听起来好了，还有些许杂音，是只有我买的这个紫色的有这个现象吗？还是现在耳机制造工艺确实不行了呢" into English is:

"At first, I thought it was the song's audio effects, but after listening for half a day, I found that this problem is quite serious, not just the sound imbalance, but the bass effect is also not as good as my previous one, and there's some noise. Is it just this purple one I bought that has this phenomenon, or is the current earphone manufacturing process really not up to par?" The translation of the Chinese text "相当差的评价，很失望" into English is:

"Very poor evaluation, very disappointing." The translation of the Chinese text "明天白天一定要退货" into English is:

"I will definitely return it tomorrow during the day." The translation of the Chinese text "PS颜值不错" into English is:

"PS (Postscript): It looks good."

original: 此款AV功放机设置复杂，外表做工粗糙，发热量大。
声音要用过一段时间再评！
8月14日刚入手德版的DN1080.一看外做工好差。
1.前面板，旋钮都塑料的。
2.后板音频输入插口，喇叭输出端子都好差，随便找台1000-2000的CD功放一体机要比这款好太多了。
3.顶盖比较薄，我的变压器那边还凹下去了，不得已开箱用手恢复，顶盖和前面板结合松动。
4.整个机器重心偏向变压器端，搬动的时候很别扭。
感觉是SONY入门款机器，就那做工，马来西亚出品的。
感觉索尼要放在中国代工要比小马好多了。
5.机器发热大，看场电影用的两声道2个小时左右顶盖用手摸一下得有40-50℃，不知道是不是变压器太大发热量大。
现在多用开关电源，这个傻大的变压器估计得有4KG。
索尼应该在机器里面用主动散热的静音风扇，开箱后只看到管子上大型铝板散热片。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"This AV amplifier has a complex setting, rough workmanship, and high heat output." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The sound needs to be listened to for a while before evaluating!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I just got the German version of DN1080 on August 14. At first glance, the workmanship is very poor." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"1. The front panel and knobs are all made of plastic." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"2. The audio input and speaker output terminals on the back panel are very poor. Any CD amplifier unit worth 1000-2000 yuan is much better than this model." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3. The top cover is relatively thin, and my transformer side has even sunk in. I had to use my hands to adjust it back to its original position when I opened the box, and the top cover and front panel have become loose." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"4. The entire machine has a weight bias towards the transformer end, making it quite awkward to move." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It feels like a beginner model from SONY, with that kind of workmanship, made in Malaysia." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It feels like Sony would be better if it were made in China instead of Malaysia." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"5. The machine gets very hot. After watching a movie with 2-channel audio for about 2 hours, the top cover feels around 40-50°C when touched by hand. I'm not sure if it's because the transformer is too large and generates a lot of heat." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Nowadays, I use the power switch, and this big transformer is estimated to weigh around 4KG." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Sony should have used a main active cooling fan inside the machine for silent operation, but all I see is a large aluminum heat sink on the pipes after opening the box."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"3. The top cover is relatively thin, and my transformer side has even sunk in. I had to use my hands to adjust it back to its original position when I opened the box, and the top cover and front panel have become loose."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"4. The entire machine has a weight bias towards the transformer end, making it quite awkward to move."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It feels like a beginner model from SONY, with that kind of workmanship, made in Malaysia."

"5. The machine gets very hot. After watching a movie with 2-channel audio for about 2 hours, the top cover feels around 40-50°C when touched by hand. I'm not sure if it's because the transformer is too large and generates a lot of heat."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Nowadays, I use the power switch, and this big transformer is estimated to weigh around 4KG."

reference: This AV power amplifier has difficult settings, a rough exterior, and produces a lot of heat. Before making a remark, sound should be used for some time! On August 14, I only recently acquired the German version of DN1080. I observed shoddy workmanship. 1. The knobs and front panel are both composed of plastic. 2. The speaker output connector and the audio input connection on the back panel are both quite subpar, simply locate a 1000–2000 CD power amplifier all–in–one device, it is far superior to this one. 3. The side of my transformer was buried, and the top cover is comparatively thin, It needed to be manually opened up and restored, the top cover and front panel were not tightly fastened together. 4. The machine as a whole has a biased center of gravity toward the transformer end, which makes it difficult to move. It has the impression of being a basic Sony device that was only produced in Malaysia. In my opinion Sony would fare better as an OEM in China than Xiaoma. 5. The machine produces a lot of heat, and when you touch the top cover of the two-channel movie for around 2 hours, it's between 40 and 50 degrees Celsius, I'm not sure if the transformer produces a lot of heat or if it's just too big. The majority of power supplies used today are switching power supplies, and this ridiculously huge transformer weighs approximately 4KG. Sony needs to utilize a fan that actively removes heat from the device while remaining silent, Only the sizable aluminum heat sink on the tube is visible after the package has been opened.
reference_split: This AV power amplifier has difficult settings, a rough exterior, and produces a lot of heat.
Before making a remark, sound should be used for some time!
On August 14, I only recently acquired the German version of DN1080. I observed shoddy workmanship.
1. The knobs and front panel are both composed of plastic.
2. The speaker output connector and the audio input connection on the back panel are both quite subpar, simply locate a 1000–2000 CD power amplifier all–in–one device, it is far superior to this one.
3. The side of my transformer was buried, and the top cover is comparatively thin, It needed to be manually opened up and restored, the top cover and front panel were not tightly fastened together.
4. The machine as a whole has a biased center of gravity toward the transformer end, which makes it difficult to move.
It has the impression of being a basic Sony device that was only produced in Malaysia.
In my opinion Sony would fare better as an OEM in China than Xiaoma.

5. The machine produces a lot of heat, and when you touch the top cover of the two-channel movie for around 2 hours, it's between 40 and 50 degrees Celsius, I'm not sure if the transformer produces a lot of heat or if it's just too big.
The majority of power supplies used today are switching power supplies, and this ridiculously huge transformer weighs approximately 4KG.
Sony needs to utilize a fan that actively removes heat from the device while remaining silent, Only the sizable aluminum heat sink on the tube is visible after the package has been opened.

original: 小贵
梵盾吉普（FANDUN JEEP）服饰有限公司是一家集研发设计、加工生产、营销贸易为一体的服装企业，主要生产男士户外休闲服饰，是一家正在蓬勃发展的年轻企业。
梵盾吉普(FANDUN JEEP)服饰注重现代信息技术与传统产业的有效结合，引进国际先进生产设备、工艺设计和管理技术，建成国内一流的服装生产线。
在生产和服务、质量和品牌、效益和公益等方面保持卓越的追求。
在信息化建设方面，努力提升企业产品流、物流与信息流的速度与效率，使企业在综合管理能力方面得到了加强和提高，整体提升了企业的现代化管理水平。
公司秉持“诚信，和谐、品质、卓越”的经营理念，产品立足国内市场，深受广大客商的青睐。
梵盾吉普服饰，因为年轻，所以自信！
我们竭诚欢迎海内外客商前来合作，共创辉煌！
企业精神：积极进取、与时俱进，服务宗旨：客户至上、真诚奉献，企业使命：引领潮流、树立品牌。
translation:
The translation of "小贵" is "small expensive" or "cheap" in English, but it can also be interpreted as "small price" or "affordable". The translation of the Chinese text is:

Fandun Jeep Garment Co., Ltd. is a comprehensive enterprise integrating R&D, design, processing, production, and marketing trade. It mainly produces outdoor leisure wear for men and is a young and rapidly growing enterprise. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Fandun Jeep (FANDUN JEEP) Garment emphasizes the effective combination of modern information technology and traditional industries, introducing advanced international production equipment, process design, and management technology, and establishing a top-notch garment production line domestically. The translation of the Chinese text is:

In terms of production and service, quality and brand, benefits and public welfare, we strive for excellence. The translation of the Chinese text is:

In terms of informatization construction, we strive to improve the speed and efficiency of product flow, logistics, and information flow, thereby enhancing and improving the company's comprehensive management capabilities, and overall upgrading the company's modern management level. The translation of the Chinese text is:

The company adheres to the business philosophy of "credibility, harmony, quality, and excellence", and its products are well-received by the majority of customers in the domestic market. The translation of the Chinese text is:

Fandun Jeep Garment, because it's young, so it's confident! The translation of the Chinese text is:

We warmly welcome customers from home and abroad to come and cooperate with us, to create a brilliant future together! The translation of the Chinese text is:

Enterprise spirit: proactive and pioneering, keeping pace with the times; Service tenet: customer-oriented, sincere dedication; Enterprise mission: leading the trend, establishing a brand.

original: 没拆开过
电池在用。
很想解剖一下，看看它肚子里到底是什么。
后来想想，万一拆开后很失望，花那么多钱就太冤了；万一拆开后很满意，再装起来就难了，用着就不爽了。
算了，就算索尼用的是好电芯吧。
至于电量的详细说明，一般人看着心里会发虚。
我还好，长期在手机厂工作过，除了不懂电路外，也算是半个电池工程师了，能顶得住。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "没拆开过" is:

"Never opened" The translation of the Chinese text "电池在用" is:

"Battery in use." The translation of the Chinese text "很想解剖一下，看看它肚子里到底是什么" is:

"I really want to dissect it and see what's inside." The translation of the Chinese text "后来想想，万一拆开后很失望，花那么多钱就太冤了；万一拆开后很满意，再装起来就难了，用着就不爽了" is:

"Later on, I thought, what if I'm disappointed after opening it, it would be a waste of money; what if I'm satisfied after opening it, it would be hard to put it back together, and it would be annoying to use it." The translation of the Chinese text "算了，就算索尼用的是好电芯吧" is:

"Oh well, let's just assume Sony uses good battery cells." The translation of the Chinese text "至于电量的详细说明，一般人看着心里会发虚" is:

"As for the detailed explanation of the battery capacity, most people will feel uneasy when they see it." The translation of the Chinese text "我还好，长期在手机厂工作过，除了不懂电路外，也算是半个电池工程师了，能顶得住" is:

"I'm fine, I've worked in a mobile phone factory for a long time, except for not understanding the circuit, I can be considered a half-battery engineer, and I can handle it."

"Never opened"

The translation of the Chinese text "电池在用" is:

"Battery in use."

The translation of the Chinese text "很想解剖一下，看看它肚子里到底是什么" is:

"I really want to dissect it and see what's inside."

The translation of the Chinese text "后来想想，万一拆开后很失望，花那么多钱就太冤了；万一拆开后很满意，再装起来就难了，用着就不爽了" is:

"Later on, I thought, what if I'm disappointed after opening it, it would be a waste of money; what if I'm satisfied after opening it, it would be hard to put it back together, and it would be annoying to use it."

The translation of the Chinese text "算了，就算索尼用的是好电芯吧" is:

"Oh well, let's just assume Sony uses good battery cells."

The translation of the Chinese text "至于电量的详细说明，一般人看着心里会发虚" is:

"As for the detailed explanation of the battery capacity, most people will feel uneasy when they see it."

The translation of the Chinese text "我还好，长期在手机厂工作过，除了不懂电路外，也算是半个电池工程师了，能顶得住" is:

"I'm fine, I've worked in a mobile phone factory for a long time, except for not understanding the circuit, I can be considered a half-battery engineer, and I can handle it."
reference: Never been opened The battery is working. I really want to dissect it and see what is in its stomach. If you think about it afterwards, It would be unreasonable to spend that much money if you were unhappy after disassembling it; on the other hand, if you were satisfied after disassembling it, it would be challenging to rebuild and uncomfortable to use. Even though Sony is employing a quality battery cell, forget it. The majority of individuals will feel guilty after reading the in-depth description of the power. Fortunately, I have extensive experience working in a manufacturing producing mobile phones, I can be considered to be a half-battery engineer, and I can handle it, aside from the fact that I don't comprehend circuits.

The battery is working.
I really want to dissect it and see what is in its stomach.

If you think about it afterwards, It would be unreasonable to spend that much money if you were unhappy after disassembling it; on the other hand, if you were satisfied after disassembling it, it would be challenging to rebuild and uncomfortable to use.

The majority of individuals will feel guilty after reading the in-depth description of the power.

Fortunately, I have extensive experience working in a manufacturing producing mobile phones, I can be considered to be a half-battery engineer, and I can handle it, aside from the fact that I don't comprehend circuits.

original: 喜出望外
买之前心里真的没底，直到打开一看包装就感觉很正！
最后当我触碰到耳机线的时候，感觉特别柔韧，质量太好了，迫不及待插到手机上打开qq音乐。
我惊愕了，音质竟然是环绕3D立体！
我在实体通讯店问过了，差不多的30左右，但绝不是品胜牌子的，是杂牌的，因此说这款品胜虽然27块，但是性价比绝对的值得拥有！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "喜出望外" is: 

"Beyond one's wildest expectations" or "Surprisingly happy" The translation of the Chinese text "买之前心里真的没底，直到打开一看包装就感觉很正！" is:

"I wasn't sure about it beforehand, but once I opened the packaging, I felt it was really great!" The translation of the Chinese text "最后当我触碰到耳机线的时候，感觉特别柔韧，质量太好了，迫不及待插到手机上打开qq音乐。" is:

"Finally, when I touched the earphone cable, I felt it was very flexible, the quality was great, and I couldn't wait to plug it into my phone and open QQ music." The translation of the Chinese text "我惊愕了，音质竟然是环绕3D立体！" is:

"I was shocked, the sound quality is actually 3D surround sound!" The translation of the Chinese text "我在实体通讯店问过了，差不多的30左右，但绝不是品胜牌子的，是杂牌的，因此说这款品胜虽然27块，但是性价比绝对的值得拥有！" is:

"I asked about it in a physical communication store, and it's around 30 yuan, but it's not a well-known brand, it's a generic one. Therefore, saying that this product from Pinsheng is 27 yuan is a great value for the price!"

The translation of the Chinese text "喜出望外" is: 

"Beyond one's wildest expectations" or "Surprisingly happy"

The translation of the Chinese text "买之前心里真的没底，直到打开一看包装就感觉很正！" is:

"I wasn't sure about it beforehand, but once I opened the packaging, I felt it was really great!"

The translation of the Chinese text "最后当我触碰到耳机线的时候，感觉特别柔韧，质量太好了，迫不及待插到手机上打开qq音乐。" is:

"I was shocked, the sound quality is actually 3D surround sound!"

The translation of the Chinese text "我在实体通讯店问过了，差不多的30左右，但绝不是品胜牌子的，是杂牌的，因此说这款品胜虽然27块，但是性价比绝对的值得拥有！" is:

"I asked about it in a physical communication store, and it's around 30 yuan, but it's not a well-known brand, it's a generic one. Therefore, saying that this product from Pinsheng is 27 yuan is a great value for the price!"
reference: Delighted with the outcome I was pretty apprehensive before I bought it, but after I cracked open the box, I was certain! The headphone cable was incredibly flexible and of such high quality that when I finally touched it, I couldn't wait to connect it to my phone and launch QQ Music. I was astounded to discover that the sound quality was surround 3D! I inquired in the actual communication store and was told that it would be around 30 or so, but it is unmistakably not the Pinsent Masons brand; instead, it is a different brand, so even if this Pinsent Masons is 27 yuan, it is well worth the money!

I was pretty apprehensive before I bought it, but after I cracked open the box, I was certain!

I was astounded to discover that the sound quality was surround 3D!

I inquired in the actual communication store and was told that it would be around 30 or so, but it is unmistakably not the Pinsent Masons brand; instead, it is a different brand, so even if this Pinsent Masons is 27 yuan, it is well worth the money!

original: 最差的网购体验
9月28号下单后，系统显示已经发货，结果一直等到10月12号依然没有收到货。
查询亚马逊订单状态，卖家没有提供快递单号，查不到订单在哪儿。
于是发邮件给卖家问是否能提供快递单号，过了两天一直没有回复。
无奈之下，打亚马逊客服，客服告诉了卖家的手机号码，我再打电话问店家，打了几次之后，电话通了，被告知快递丢件了，可以立刻再重新发我一个。
虽然我特别生气，但是由于电脑急需要，所以也就没跟卖家多说，只要立刻发给我就好。
结果，第二天打电话问，发货了吗？
卖家说还没，下午才能发。
我下午又打电话问，卖家说一定发，下午五六点之后发货，结果等我晚上七点打电话，电话就没人接了。
第三天上午我又打，问货发出去了吗？
可以告诉我订单号了么？
卖家说没发，告诉我要是着急的话让我从别家订货，要是可以等的话下午就发。
没办法，从别家下单又要等好久。
就只能拜托卖家赶紧发货。
终于在无数个电话跟踪之后，我在10月16号收到了电脑。
至于电脑的质量怎样，我不知道，因为是给别人买的，后期再追加评论吧。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "最差的网购体验" is:

"Worst online shopping experience" The translation of the Chinese text "9月28号下单后，系统显示已经发货，结果一直等到10月12号依然没有收到货" is:

"After ordering on September 28, the system showed that the order had been shipped, but I still haven't received the goods until October 12." The translation of the Chinese text "查询亚马逊订单状态，卖家没有提供快递单号，查不到订单在哪儿" is:

"Checking the Amazon order status, the seller did not provide the tracking number, and I couldn't find where the order is." The translation of the Chinese text "于是发邮件给卖家问是否能提供快递单号，过了两天一直没有回复" is:

"So I sent an email to the seller asking if they could provide the tracking number, but there was no response for two days." The translation of the Chinese text "无奈之下，打亚马逊客服，客服告诉了卖家的手机号码，我再打电话问店家，打了几次之后，电话通了，被告知快递丢件了，可以立刻再重新发我一个" is:

"Out of desperation, I called Amazon customer service, and the customer service representative gave me the seller's phone number. I called the seller again, after several attempts, I finally got through, and was told that the package was lost, and they could send a new one to me immediately." The translation of the Chinese text "虽然我特别生气，但是由于电脑急需要，所以也就没跟卖家多说，只要立刻发给我就好" is:

"Although I was very angry, since I urgently needed the computer, I didn't say much to the seller, I just wanted them to send it to me as soon as possible." The translation of the Chinese text "结果，第二天打电话问，发货了吗" is:

"As a result, I called the next day and asked if it had been shipped." The translation of the Chinese text "卖家说还没，下午才能发" is:

"The seller said it hadn't been shipped yet, and would be sent in the afternoon." The translation of the Chinese text "我下午又打电话问，卖家说一定发，下午五六点之后发货，结果等我晚上七点打电话，电话就没人接了" is:

"I called the seller again in the afternoon and they said they would definitely ship it, and that it would be sent after 5-6 pm. However, I waited until 7 pm to call and the phone was not answered." The translation of the Chinese text "第三天上午我又打，问货发出去了吗" is:

"I called again in the morning of the third day and asked if the goods had been shipped." The translation of the Chinese text "可以告诉我订单号了么" is:

"Can you tell me the order number?" The translation of the Chinese text "卖家说没发，告诉我要是着急的话让我从别家订货，要是可以等的话下午就发" is:

"The seller said it hadn't been shipped, and told me that if I was in a hurry, I could buy it from somewhere else, but if I could wait, it would be shipped in the afternoon." The translation of the Chinese text "没办法，从别家下单又要等好久" is:

"There's no way, I'd have to order from somewhere else and wait for a long time." The translation of the Chinese text "就只能拜托卖家赶紧发货" is:

"I can only ask the seller to ship it as soon as possible." The translation of the Chinese text "终于在无数个电话跟踪之后，我在10月16号收到了电脑" is:

"After countless phone calls, I finally received the computer on October 16th." The translation of the Chinese text "至于电脑的质量怎样，我不知道，因为是给别人买的，后期再追加评论吧" is:

"As for the quality of the computer, I don't know because I bought it for someone else, I'll add a review later."

The translation of the Chinese text "最差的网购体验" is:

"Worst online shopping experience"

The translation of the Chinese text "9月28号下单后，系统显示已经发货，结果一直等到10月12号依然没有收到货" is:

"After ordering on September 28, the system showed that the order had been shipped, but I still haven't received the goods until October 12."

The translation of the Chinese text "查询亚马逊订单状态，卖家没有提供快递单号，查不到订单在哪儿" is:

The translation of the Chinese text "无奈之下，打亚马逊客服，客服告诉了卖家的手机号码，我再打电话问店家，打了几次之后，电话通了，被告知快递丢件了，可以立刻再重新发我一个" is:

The translation of the Chinese text "可以告诉我订单号了么" is:

The translation of the Chinese text "没办法，从别家下单又要等好久" is:

"There's no way, I'd have to order from somewhere else and wait for a long time."

The translation of the Chinese text "就只能拜托卖家赶紧发货" is:

The translation of the Chinese text "终于在无数个电话跟踪之后，我在10月16号收到了电脑" is:

reference: Worst experience with online purchasing The system said that the order had been dispatched after it was placed on September 28, but the products weren't received until October 12. Look at the Amazon order status, the vendor did not include an express tracking number, thus I am unable to determine the location of the order. So I emailed the vendor to ask whether I could share the tracking number, but after two days there was still no response. I dialed Amazon customer support out of desperation, the seller's mobile phone number was provided by customer support, I dialed the shop once more. Despite my intense rage, I didn't say much to the seller and simply asked for them to deliver the computer over right away because I needed it so badly. I called the following day to inquire as a result: Has it been shipped? Not yet, according to the vendor; it will be available in the afternoon. The seller told me it will be delivered after five or six in the afternoon when I called again in the afternoon, but when I called at seven in the evening, nobody picked up. I contacted once more on the morning of the third day and enquired as to whether the things had been dispatched? Could you let me know the order number? The vendor claimed he didn't ship it and advised me to get it from another store if I needed it right away, If I could wait, he said, I could send it in the afternoon. No way, placing an order from another store takes a lot of time. Just request rapid shipping from the seller. On October 16th, finally, after numerous phone calls, I got the computer. I don't know the computer's quality because I purchased it for someone else, but I will post remarks later.
reference_split: Worst experience with online purchasing
The system said that the order had been dispatched after it was placed on September 28, but the products weren't received until October 12.
Look at the Amazon order status, the vendor did not include an express tracking number, thus I am unable to determine the location of the order.
So I emailed the vendor to ask whether I could share the tracking number, but after two days there was still no response.
I dialed Amazon customer support out of desperation, the seller's mobile phone number was provided by customer support, I dialed the shop once more.
Despite my intense rage, I didn't say much to the seller and simply asked for them to deliver the computer over right away because I needed it so badly.
I called the following day to inquire as a result: Has it been shipped?
Not yet, according to the vendor; it will be available in the afternoon.
The seller told me it will be delivered after five or six in the afternoon when I called again in the afternoon, but when I called at seven in the evening, nobody picked up.
I contacted once more on the morning of the third day and enquired as to whether the things had been dispatched?
Could you let me know the order number?
The vendor claimed he didn't ship it and advised me to get it from another store if I needed it right away, If I could wait, he said, I could send it in the afternoon.
No way, placing an order from another store takes a lot of time.
Just request rapid shipping from the seller.
On October 16th, finally, after numerous phone calls, I got the computer.
I don't know the computer's quality because I purchased it for someone else, but I will post remarks later.

original: 刚买半年没用几次，现在已经接触不良了，询问可以给修吗？
因为有台式机，买了之后没怎么用过几次。
只是出差时装包里带上用几次。
最近发现接通电源时，不充电，需要用手左右扶几下充电器和线的连接处，才能充上电。
怀疑是接口处接触不良，不知道现在还能给修吗？
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Just bought it half a year ago and used it only a few times, now it's already malfunctioning, can it be repaired?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Because I have a desktop computer, I haven't used it (laptop) many times after buying it." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's only used a few times when I travel, carrying it in my bag." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Recently, I found that when I plug in the power, it doesn't charge, and I need to hold the charger and the cable in place for a few seconds before it starts charging." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I suspect it's a bad connection at the interface, I don't know if it can be repaired now?"
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Just bought it half a year ago and used it only a few times, now it's already malfunctioning, can it be repaired?"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Because I have a desktop computer, I haven't used it (laptop) many times after buying it."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's only used a few times when I travel, carrying it in my bag."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Recently, I found that when I plug in the power, it doesn't charge, and I need to hold the charger and the cable in place for a few seconds before it starts charging."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I suspect it's a bad connection at the interface, I don't know if it can be repaired now?"
reference: It has a horrible contact presently, despite the fact that I've only had it for six months and haven't used it much, Can I have it fixed? Since I acquired it, I've occasionally not used it because I have a desktop computer. I only keep it in my work bag and occasionally utilize it. Recently, it was discovered that it was not charging when the power was turned on, To charge it, you had to repeatedly hold the charger's cable connection in place with your hands. The interface may not be connected properly, according to speculation, can it be fixed right now, I wonder?

original: 强烈建议亚马逊停用EMS ！
商品五星，物流一星，平均三星。
不懂为什么亚马逊要寄EMS，业内公认的不靠谱，好嘛，电脑好歹也是贵重物品啊！
买后订单显示，预计20号送达，于是家里人在家等了三天！
从厦门寄到福州，为什么要四五天啊！
22号早上查物流终于到福州了，准备开开心心收货，结果，晚上在没收到任何电话、短信的情况下，一查物流，竟然中午就被签收了，还显示的本人签收！
我瞬间震惊了！
我是谁？我在哪儿？这电脑真是我买的吗？
简直怀疑人生了好么！
最后跑了一趟代收点才把电脑搬回来。
具体原因简单说就是因为快递小哥把两个单号弄反了，好在件没丢也就算了。
我强烈建议亚马逊不要用EMS了，以后亚马逊如果用EMS寄的快递，我一定不会再买了。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Strongly suggest Amazon stop using EMS!" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The product is five-star, logistics is one-star, overall three-star." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I don't understand why Amazon uses EMS, it's not reliable according to industry standards, and it's a high-value item, a computer, after all!" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"After placing the order, the order showed that it would be delivered on the 20th, so my family waited at home for three days!" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"It's sent from Xiamen to Fuzhou, why does it take four or five days?" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"On the 22nd morning, I checked the logistics and it finally arrived in Fuzhou, I was looking forward to receiving it happily, but the result was that I didn't receive any phone calls or messages, and when I checked the logistics, I found out that it was actually signed for at noon, and it even shows that it was signed for by the person themselves!" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I was shocked instantly!" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Who am I? Where am I? Is this really the computer I bought?" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I'm starting to question the meaning of life!" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I finally had to go to a delivery point to pick it up and bring it back myself." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The reason is quite simple, the delivery guy mixed up the two order numbers, but fortunately the package wasn't lost, so that's okay." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I strongly advise Amazon not to use EMS anymore. If Amazon uses EMS to ship in the future, I will definitely not buy from them again."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

reference: It is highly advised that Amazon turn off EMS! Three-star average, one-star logistics, five-star product. Why Amazon wants to dispatch EMS is a mystery to me, its unreliability is acknowledged in the sector, computers are, in any case, valuable! The family waited at home for three days after placing the order, which states that delivery is anticipated for the 20th! Why does sending it from Xiamen to Fuzhou take four or five days! I verified the logistics early on February 22nd and eventually made it to Fuzhou, I was happy and prepared to accept the gifts, So without getting any calls or texts, I reviewed the logistics at night! I was startled right away! My identity? My location? Have I truly purchased this computer? Just questioned life, okay! Finally, I returned the machine to the collecting location. The item is fortunately not lost, but specifically because the courier brother just switched the two tracking numbers. I firmly advise Amazon not to employ EMS, I won't buy it again from Amazon if they start using EMS for rapid shipping in the future.

I verified the logistics early on February 22nd and eventually made it to Fuzhou, I was happy and prepared to accept the gifts, So without getting any calls or texts, I reviewed the logistics at night!
I was startled right away!
My identity? My location? Have I truly purchased this computer?
Just questioned life, okay!
Finally, I returned the machine to the collecting location.
The item is fortunately not lost, but specifically because the courier brother just switched the two tracking numbers.
I firmly advise Amazon not to employ EMS, I won't buy it again from Amazon if they start using EMS for rapid shipping in the future.

original: 货还不错
首先说一句刚买了几天就发现降价了，差评，本还算不错，性价比高，cpu和显卡足够应付主流网游和相当一部分大型单机了，散热非常好，但屏幕有点漏光(ips屏的通病)，音响质量不太好，硬盘不好(建议自己花点钱加个固态)，昨天拿去售后检测了一下硬件，没有任何问题，自带的win8.1不太好用，建议升级成10，卖家发货很快，各项询问回答的也很快，收到电脑第二天发票就到了，不错，可惜什么赠品都没有。
(顺便提一句买键盘贴膜一定不要去某宝一家叫E酷数码中心的店买，发货慢质量差，产品有问题不退不换，老板还满嘴脏话，特别曝光一下)
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "货还不错" is: 

"Not bad, the goods are okay" or more commonly "The goods are not bad" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"First of all, I bought it a few days ago and found it was discounted, with a negative review. Overall, it's not bad, with a high price-performance ratio. The CPU and graphics card are sufficient for mainstream online games and a significant portion of large-scale single-player games. The heat dissipation is very good, but the screen has a bit of light leakage (a common issue with IPS screens). The sound quality is not very good, and the hard drive is not good (I suggest adding a solid-state drive). Yesterday, I took it to the after-sales service for a hardware check and found no issues. The pre-installed Windows 8.1 is not very user-friendly, I suggest upgrading to Windows 10. The seller shipped it very quickly, and their responses to my inquiries were also very fast. I received the invoice the next day after receiving the computer. It's good, but unfortunately, there were no free gifts." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"(By the way, I'd like to mention that when buying keyboard skins, please don't go to a store called E酷数码中心 on Taobao. Their shipping is slow, the quality is bad, and they don't accept returns or exchanges if there's a problem with the product. The boss is also very impolite and uses profanity. I'm exposing them here, especially for those who might be considering buying from them)."

original: 东西很好，平台官僚依旧
硬盘质量非常好，性价比绝对高，比香港买还便宜，不急着用和可以忍受物流的话绝对推荐购买。
但不得不说的是亚马逊平台之官僚依旧，与几年前我发誓绝对不用的时候没有改进，你永远查不到实际物流状况，信息永远是几个星期以后送到，永远不能投诉，就是这么官僚！
货收到几天了，物流信息还是10几天后你将会收到货！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Things are good, bureaucracy still exists." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"The hard drive quality is very good, the price-performance ratio is absolutely high, it's even cheaper than buying in Hong Kong. If you don't need it urgently and can tolerate the shipping, I absolutely recommend buying it." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"But I have to say that the bureaucracy on the Amazon platform is still the same as it was a few years ago when I swore I would never use it again. You can never check the actual shipping status, and the information is always delayed by several weeks. You can never complain, it's just so bureaucratic!" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"It's been a few days since I received the goods, but the shipping information still says you will receive the goods in 10-15 days!"

"It's been a few days since I received the goods, but the shipping information still says you will receive the goods in 10-15 days!"

But I must remark that the Amazon platform's bureaucracy remains unchanged, it hasn't improved since I said I'd never use it again a couple years ago, you will never learn the true logistical situation, you can never complain because the information is always supplied after a few weeks, that's all there is to it: bureaucracy! It has been a few days after the items were received, and the logistics information indicates that you will receive the goods in 10 days!

It has been a few days after the items were received, and the logistics information indicates that you will receive the goods in 10 days!

original: FYI
还没有试用，一贯信赖飞利浦，希望电池寿命比其它牌子要长一些。
上网查了，可能是进水的通病，而且没有保修。
郁闷！
现在裹上保鲜膜继续用，不知能用多久？
translation:
The translation of "FYI" is "For Your Information". The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Not tried yet, always trusted Philips, hoping the battery life will be longer than other brands."

Or a more idiomatic translation:

"I haven't tried it yet, but I've always trusted Philips and hope the battery life will be longer than other brands." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"After searching online, it seems to be a common issue with water ingress, and it's not under warranty."

Or a more idiomatic translation:

"After doing some research online, it appears that water ingress is a common problem, and it's not covered by the warranty." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Feeling suffocated!" or "Feeling stifled!"

This phrase is often used to express a feeling of being overwhelmed, frustrated, or trapped. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Now I've wrapped it in plastic wrap and continued to use it, but I don't know how long it will last."

Or a more idiomatic translation:

"Now that I've wrapped it in plastic wrap, how long will it keep?"

original: 买到别人拆开过的
三百多的机器要一百多的税确实比较高，看现在再六百多心里平衡多了。
收到的时候封口胶条状态看着就很不对，像是拆开过，赶紧先拍了照，果然一撕就开了，打开后里面的纸板还有损坏，担心是别人退的，还没到纪念日就赶紧先给老公试试了，结果机器一点电都没有，还好刀头里面没有胡渣，要不大老远的咋退啊！
好不好用或者短期会不会有什么问题还未知，如前面的评价，缺货时发出的东西确实不靠谱！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "买到别人拆开过的" is:

"Buying something that has been opened by someone else" The translation of the Chinese text "三百多的机器要一百多的税确实比较高，看现在再六百多心里平衡多了" is:

"A machine that costs over 300 is indeed quite expensive, but now that it's over 600, it's more balanced in my mind." The translation of the Chinese text "收到的时候封口胶条状态看着就很不对，像是拆开过，赶紧先拍了照，果然一撕就开了，打开后里面的纸板还有损坏，担心是别人退的，还没到纪念日就赶紧先给老公试试了，结果机器一点电都没有，还好刀头里面没有胡渣，要不大老远的咋退啊！" is:

"When I received it, the sealed tape looked suspicious, like it had been opened before, so I quickly took a photo, and sure enough, it opened easily. After opening, the inner cardboard was also damaged. I was worried it was a returned item, so I quickly tried it out with my husband before the anniversary, but it didn't work at all, fortunately the blade inside was clean, otherwise I would have had to go all the way back to return it!" The translation of the Chinese text "好不好用或者短期会不会有什么问题还未知，如前面的评价，缺货时发出的东西确实不靠谱！" is:

"It's unknown whether it's good or bad to use, or if there will be any problems in the short term, as the previous reviews mentioned, the items sent out during stock shortages are indeed unreliable!"

I was worried it was a returned item, so I quickly tried it out with my husband before the anniversary, but it didn't work at all, fortunately the blade inside was clean, otherwise I would have had to go all the way back to return it!"

The translation of the Chinese text "好不好用或者短期会不会有什么问题还未知，如前面的评价，缺货时发出的东西确实不靠谱！" is:

"It's unknown whether it's good or bad to use, or if there will be any problems in the short term, as the previous reviews mentioned, the items sent out during stock shortages are indeed unreliable!"
reference: Purchase the unwrapped products of others It is true that a machine costing more than three hundred will pay a tax of over one hundred, observing that it is now over six hundred and so more balanced. The sealing tape was in very poor shape when I got it, looking like it had been disassembled, I snapped a quick photo, and sure enough, it opened as soon as it was taken off, The cardboard inside was still harmed after being opened, I was concerned that someone else might have returned it, I soon tried it on my spouse on the anniversary, but there was no electricity at all in the machine, fortunately, the cutter head doesn't include any beard stubble, so why not send it back completely? It is unknown if there will be any immediate issues or if it will be simple to use, the items sent out while they are out of stock are highly unreliable, same as the previous review!

original: 体验感中偏上水平
差不多顶级电动了，有很多种洁牙模式，但是很少人会天天换不同模式刷吧。
用了半年没有啥问题，每天刷，差不多1个多星期一冲。
刷头配件在亚马逊买同样便宜。
App有点难用，除了改一下颜色那些，其他貌似兼容的问题是海外版的原因？
希望学学大法的。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "体验感中偏上水平" is: 

"Experience level above average" The translation of the Chinese text "差不多顶级电动了，有很多种洁牙模式，但是很少人会天天换不同模式刷吧" is:

"It's almost top-level electric, with many different cleaning modes, but few people will change modes every day." The translation of the Chinese text "用了半年没有啥问题，每天刷，差不多1个多星期一冲" is:

"It's been half a year with no issues, brush every day, almost once a week or more to charge." The translation of the Chinese text "刷头配件在亚马逊买同样便宜" is:

"The brush head accessories can be bought at a similar cheap price on Amazon." The translation of the Chinese text "App有点难用，除了改一下颜色那些，其他貌似兼容的问题是海外版的原因？" is:

"The app is a bit hard to use, except for changing the color, other compatibility issues seem to be due to the overseas version?" The translation of the Chinese text "希望学学大法的" is:

"I hope to learn from them."

The translation of the Chinese text "体验感中偏上水平" is: 

"Experience level above average"

The translation of the Chinese text "差不多顶级电动了，有很多种洁牙模式，但是很少人会天天换不同模式刷吧" is:

"It's almost top-level electric, with many different cleaning modes, but few people will change modes every day."

The translation of the Chinese text "用了半年没有啥问题，每天刷，差不多1个多星期一冲" is:

"It's been half a year with no issues, brush every day, almost once a week or more to charge."

The translation of the Chinese text "刷头配件在亚马逊买同样便宜" is:

"The brush head accessories can be bought at a similar cheap price on Amazon."

The translation of the Chinese text "App有点难用，除了改一下颜色那些，其他貌似兼容的问题是海外版的原因？" is:

"The app is a bit hard to use, except for changing the color, other compatibility issues seem to be due to the overseas version?"

The translation of the Chinese text "希望学学大法的" is:

"I hope to learn from them."

还有一点，鞋子透气可能不太好，现在穿感觉脚很热。

original: 压脚背

我的脚是很标准那种，跑鞋uk7.5,eu41.5,皮鞋uk6.5,亚马逊的爱步也买过几双，从来没有出现过不合脚，但是这双我参照评论，买大一号uk7,上脚后因为大了一码长度明显偏长，但因为鞋垫太厚，还是压脚背压的厉害，加上徒步鞋非常硬，导致上脚非常难受。
如果你的脚不是特别瘦那种，不推荐购买这款。
如果一定要买，换个鞋垫也能解决，但是原配鞋垫看起来很高级的样子，不用又可惜。

The translation of the Chinese text is: "If you still want to buy it, replacing the insole can solve the problem, but the original insole looks very high-end, it's a pity to replace it."

They handle problems patiently and efficiently, and resolve any concerns perfectly. The delivery is very convenient and secure, with the delivery personnel always considering the customers' needs. They remind me to pick up the packages from the delivery lockers on time. I would like to thank Amazon for providing such a comfortable shopping experience for customers." "In short, our whole family loves shopping on Amazon's international shopping!"

"I'm extremely satisfied and very fond of Amazon's international shopping. There's no doubt that the products are genuine, and the quality is excellent. The prices are reasonable, and I can shop with confidence. The after-sales service is very thoughtful, and the customer service staff are very friendly and approachable. They handle problems patiently and efficiently, and resolve any concerns perfectly. The delivery is very convenient and secure, with the delivery personnel always considering the customers' needs. They remind me to pick up the packages from the delivery lockers on time. I would like to thank Amazon for providing such a comfortable shopping experience for customers."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"In short, our whole family loves shopping on Amazon's international shopping!"
reference: A fantastic buying experience! I'm quite pleased with it and enjoy it a lot, there is little doubt that Amazon's overseas purchases are genuine, and the quality is excellent, it is of great quality and reasonably priced, you can be confident that you will be able to purchase it, he after-sales service is excellent, the rapid delivery service is really convenient and secure, and the delivery master is highly mindful to consumers, He will remind you to pick up the things from the express cabinet on schedule every time, thank you Amazon for making shopping so enjoyable for your customers. Overall, our entire family enjoys buying on Amazon from abroad!
reference_split: A fantastic buying experience!

I'm quite pleased with it and enjoy it a lot, there is little doubt that Amazon's overseas purchases are genuine, and the quality is excellent, it is of great quality and reasonably priced, you can be confident that you will be able to purchase it, he after-sales service is excellent, the rapid delivery service is really convenient and secure, and the delivery master is highly mindful to consumers, He will remind you to pick up the things from the express cabinet on schedule every time, thank you Amazon for making shopping so enjoyable for your customers.
Overall, our entire family enjoys buying on Amazon from abroad!

original: 绝对差评！
对这个代理公司和亚马逊实在是很无语。
以后电子产品在亚马逊上买还是要小心。
虽然说过去很久，但是还是要来吐吐槽。
冬天秒杀买的，不到200，放在家几个月没用。
春天要用的时候发现和手环怎么也连不上，两个设备说明书都表示支持对方，后来发现应该是心率带的问题，因为找来其它的设备还是连不上。
打电话亚马逊，让我联系代理公司，代理公司让我自费把设备寄去上海检测。
过了将近半个月，东西被原封原样的寄了回来，连快递盒子都是我寄过去时用的那个！
没有任何回复和回执以及检测报告！
你好歹告诉一声，到底是好的还是坏的啊！
打电话去问，说这样寄回来表示设备没问题，是好的。
但是我怎么还是连不上呢，代理公司回答：那就不是他们的事了。
算我倒霉，懒得为了个200块的东西被你们折腾。
translation: The translation of the Chinese text "绝对差评" is: "Absolutely terrible review" The translation of the Chinese text "对这个代理公司和亚马逊实在是很无语" is: "I'm speechless about this agency and Amazon." The translation of the Chinese text "以后电子产品在亚马逊上买还是要小心" is: "From now on, I'll be more careful when buying electronic products on Amazon." The translation of the Chinese text "虽然说过去很久，但是还是要来吐吐槽" is: "Although it's been a long time, I still want to vent my frustrations." The translation of the Chinese text "冬天秒杀买的，不到200，放在家几个月没用" is: "I bought it on sale during winter for under 200 yuan, but it's been sitting in my house for months without being used." The translation of the Chinese text "春天要用的时候发现和手环怎么也连不上，两个设备说明书都表示支持对方，后来发现应该是心率带的问题，因为找来其它的设备还是连不上" is: "When I tried to use it in the spring, I found that it couldn't connect with the smartwatch, and both devices' manuals said they supported each other. Later, I realized the problem was with the heart rate strap, because even when I tried other devices, they still couldn't connect." The translation of the Chinese text "打电话亚马逊，让我联系代理公司，代理公司让我自费把设备寄去上海检测" is: "I called Amazon, and they told me to contact the agency, and the agency asked me to send the device to Shanghai for testing at my own expense." The translation of the Chinese text "过了将近半个月，东西被原封原样的寄了回来，连快递盒子都是我寄过去时用的那个" is: "After nearly a month, the device was sent back to me in the same condition as when I sent it, even the shipping box was the same one I used to send it." The translation of the Chinese text "没有任何回复和回执以及检测报告" is: "There was no response, no receipt, and no test report." The translation of the Chinese text "你好歹告诉一声，到底是好的还是坏的啊" is: "At least tell me, is it good or bad?" The translation of the Chinese text "打电话去问，说这样寄回来表示设备没问题，是好的" is: "I called to ask, and they said that sending it back like this means the device is fine." The translation of the Chinese text "但是我怎么还是连不上呢，代理公司回答：那就不是他们的事了" is: "But I still can't connect it, and the agency replied: That's not their problem." The translation of the Chinese text "算我倒霉，懒得为了个200块的东西被你们折腾" is: "I'm unlucky, I don't want to go through all this trouble for something worth just 200 yuan."

reference: Definitely a poor review! As it relates to this agency and Amazon, I am truly stunned. Future electronic product purchases on Amazon should be cautious. I still want to voice my displeasure even if it's been a while. I paid less than 200 for it in winter spikes, but keeping it at home for a few months is pointless. I discovered that I couldn't connect to the bracelet when I attempted to use it in the spring, the user manuals for both devices endorsed one another, later I discovered that since I was still having trouble connecting to other devices, the issue should have been with the heart rate band. I called Amazon and requested them to put me in touch with the agency, who told me to pay for the shipping of the equipment to Shanghai for testing. The items were sent back undamaged after almost half a month, even the express box I used to send them over was there! There is no response, acknowledgement or test report! Tell me at least whether it's nice or awful! When I contacted to inquire, I was informed that sending it back in this manner indicates there is no issue with the apparatus, which is good. The agency responded, "That's not their business," when I asked why I still can't connect. I'm unfortunate because I'm too lazy to be hurled by you for 200 yuan stuff.
reference_split: Definitely a poor review!
As it relates to this agency and Amazon, I am truly stunned.
Future electronic product purchases on Amazon should be cautious.
I still want to voice my displeasure even if it's been a while.
I paid less than 200 for it in winter spikes, but keeping it at home for a few months is pointless.

I discovered that I couldn't connect to the bracelet when I attempted to use it in the spring, the user manuals for both devices endorsed one another, later I discovered that since I was still having trouble connecting to other devices, the issue should have been with the heart rate band.
I called Amazon and requested them to put me in touch with the agency, who told me to pay for the shipping of the equipment to Shanghai for testing.
The items were sent back undamaged after almost half a month, even the express box I used to send them over was there!
There is no response, acknowledgement or test report!
Tell me at least whether it's nice or awful!
When I contacted to inquire, I was informed that sending it back in this manner indicates there is no issue with the apparatus, which is good.
The agency responded, "That's not their business," when I asked why I still can't connect.
I'm unfortunate because I'm too lazy to be hurled by you for 200 yuan stuff.

original: 商品质量不错，亚马逊缺乏契约精神，送货员很好。
本人要求周六、周日送货！
亚马逊的规定不能周六，周日送货。
害得我，从外地驱车200公里赶回来取货！
亚马逊，我如何再爱你？
送货员很积极，很热情。
给个赞！
商品，简单试了一下，还不错。
但是以前没有买过类似商品，无法比价！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The product quality is good, Amazon lacks a sense of contract, the delivery personnel are very good."

However, a more idiomatic translation would be:

"The product quality is good, but Amazon lacks a sense of responsibility, the delivery personnel are very good."

In this translation, "契约精神" is translated as "a sense of contract" or more accurately "a sense of responsibility", as it implies a sense of reliability and accountability. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I require delivery on Saturday and Sunday!"

However, a more polite and common way to express this in English would be:

"I would like to request delivery on Saturday and Sunday."

Or, in a more formal context:

"I would like to schedule delivery for Saturday and Sunday." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Amazon's regulations do not allow for delivery on Saturday and Sunday."

Or, in a more idiomatic way:

"Amazon does not deliver on Saturdays and Sundays."

This translation is more concise and directly conveys the information. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's so frustrating that I drove 200 kilometers from out of town to come back and pick up the goods!"

Or, in a more idiomatic way:

"I went all the way from out of town, driving 200 kilometers just to pick up the goods!"

Or, in a more concise way:

"I drove 200 kilometers from out of town just to pick up the goods!"

The Chinese phrase "害得" is an idiomatic expression that conveys a sense of frustration or regret. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Amazon, how can I love you?"

However, this translation is likely to be humorous or ironic, as the speaker is expressing frustration or sarcasm towards Amazon.

A more literal translation would be:

"Amazon, how can I love you?"

But a more idiomatic translation would be:

"Amazon, how can I love you?!"

Or, in a more casual way:

"Amazon, I love you so much!"

However, considering the context, it's more likely that the speaker is expressing frustration or sarcasm, so a more suitable translation would be:

"Amazon, are you kidding me?!"

Or, in a more casual way:

"Amazon, come on!"

This translation captures the speaker's frustration and exasperation. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The delivery personnel are very enthusiastic and very friendly."

Or, in a more idiomatic way:

"The delivery staff are very energetic and very welcoming."

Or, in a more concise way:

"The delivery staff are very friendly and enthusiastic."

This translation conveys the positive qualities of the delivery personnel, emphasizing their energy and friendliness. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Give me a thumbs up!"

Or, in a more casual way:

"Give me a like!"

Or, in a more idiomatic way:

"Give me a thumbs up, please!"

The Chinese phrase "给个赞" is an idiomatic expression that is commonly used to ask for approval, appreciation, or agreement. The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The product, I tried it out and it's not bad."

Or, in a more idiomatic way:

"I tried the product and it's pretty good."

Or, in a more casual way:

"It's a decent product."

The Chinese phrase "简单试了一下" means to try something out briefly or to give it a quick test. The phrase "还不错" means "not bad" or "pretty good". The translation of the Chinese text is:

"But I've never bought a similar product before, can't compare the price!"

Or, in a more idiomatic way:

"I've never seen a product like this before, can't compare the price!"

Or, in a more concise way:

"I've never seen anything like this before, can't compare the price!"

The Chinese phrase "无法比价" means "can't compare the price" or "can't compete with the price".

original: 尺码 物流
做工还可以，就是物流太慢了，以前的鞋子什么都是DHL，这次Apex真是...国内买过很多UA，价格都不低，感觉搞的比NIKE ADIDAS档次高？
其实都一样好吧，所以海淘。
尺码：我身高176CM，68KG，我肩膀宽一般衣服都是180的，买的M，下摆略微长，其它穿了正好，我看有推荐S码的，身材那么纤细吗？还是喜欢紧身？我觉得帽衫还是宽松些好。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "尺码 物流" is "Measurement Logistics" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's okay to work, but the logistics are too slow. In the past, all shoes were shipped by DHL, but this time Apex is... I've bought many UAs from domestic sellers, and the prices are not low, it feels like they're on the same level as NIKE and ADIDAS?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Actually, they're all good, so I'll buy from Taobao (a Chinese e-commerce platform)." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Measurement: I'm 176CM tall and 68KG. I usually wear clothes with a shoulder width of 180, and I bought M size. The hem is a bit long, but other parts fit perfectly. I see that there are S size recommendations, are you that slender or do you like tight-fitting clothes? I think a loose-fitting hat is better."

original: 大小正好
胸围99，身高184，体重84公斤，购买前咨询了客服被告知应该买xxl的，然后看了评论果断入手L的，收货后发现大小正好，差点就被坑了。
双十一的价格比黑五贵不少。
衣服的质量非常好。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "大小正好" is: "Just the right size" The translation of the Chinese text is:

original: Z实惠的商品问题很麻烦！
18号下的单，25日才收到的货，广州到北京蜗牛的速度！
买的是Z实惠的商品，说明中告知有划痕，但是收到货后发现少了4个螺丝及螺母！
孩子不愿意退货，心想问题不大，但配件这种小零件，孩子爷爷跑了附近几家五金店都没有买到！
最后爷爷给粘上的！
看来以后不能买Z实惠的商品了！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "Z实惠的商品问题很麻烦！" is:

"The problem of cheap goods is very troublesome!" The translation of the Chinese text "18号下的单，25日才收到的货，广州到北京蜗牛的速度！" is:

"The order placed on the 18th arrived on the 25th, the speed of snail from Guangzhou to Beijing!" The translation of the Chinese text "买的是Z实惠的商品，说明中告知有划痕，但是收到货后发现少了4个螺丝及螺母！" is:

"I bought the cheap goods from Z, which was mentioned in the description to have scratches, but after receiving the goods, I found that 4 screws and nuts were missing!" The translation of the Chinese text "孩子不愿意退货，心想问题不大，但配件这种小零件，孩子爷爷跑了附近几家五金店都没有买到！" is:

"The child doesn't want to return the goods, thinking the problem is not big, but the spare parts are small parts, the child's grandfather went to several nearby hardware stores and couldn't find them!" The translation of the Chinese text "最后爷爷给粘上的！" is:

"It was finally stuck on by the grandfather!" The translation of the Chinese text "看来以后不能买Z实惠的商品了！" is:

"It seems like I won't be buying cheap goods from Z anymore!"
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text "Z实惠的商品问题很麻烦！" is:

"The problem of cheap goods is very troublesome!"

The translation of the Chinese text "18号下的单，25日才收到的货，广州到北京蜗牛的速度！" is:

"The order placed on the 18th arrived on the 25th, the speed of snail from Guangzhou to Beijing!"

The translation of the Chinese text "买的是Z实惠的商品，说明中告知有划痕，但是收到货后发现少了4个螺丝及螺母！" is:

"I bought the cheap goods from Z, which was mentioned in the description to have scratches, but after receiving the goods, I found that 4 screws and nuts were missing!"

The translation of the Chinese text "孩子不愿意退货，心想问题不大，但配件这种小零件，孩子爷爷跑了附近几家五金店都没有买到！" is:

"The child doesn't want to return the goods, thinking the problem is not big, but the spare parts are small parts, the child's grandfather went to several nearby hardware stores and couldn't find them!"

The translation of the Chinese text "最后爷爷给粘上的！" is:

"It was finally stuck on by the grandfather!"

The translation of the Chinese text "看来以后不能买Z实惠的商品了！" is:

"It seems like I won't be buying cheap goods from Z anymore!"
reference: Z inexpensive goods issue is problematic! On the 18th, the order was placed, and the products arrived on the 25th, from Guangzhou to Beijing, the speed is that of a snail! I purchased Z’s least expensive item, and the description stated that there were scratches, but when I received the item, I discovered that 4 screws and nuts were missing! The kid didn't want to return the item because he didn't believe it was a big deal, but when the kid's grandfather raced to several nearby hardware stores, he was unable to find such tiny accessories! Grandpa finally cemented it in place! Looks like I won't be purchasing Z's reasonably priced stuff in the future!
reference_split: Z inexpensive goods issue is problematic!
On the 18th, the order was placed, and the products arrived on the 25th, from Guangzhou to Beijing, the speed is that of a snail!
I purchased Z’s least expensive item, and the description stated that there were scratches, but when I received the item, I discovered that 4 screws and nuts were missing!

The kid didn't want to return the item because he didn't believe it was a big deal, but when the kid's grandfather raced to several nearby hardware stores, he was unable to find such tiny accessories!
Grandpa finally cemented it in place!
Looks like I won't be purchasing Z's reasonably priced stuff in the future!

original: 玩具加工质量不好
螺栓孔大部分都没对齐，上螺栓很费劲，可见加工质量不好，也不知道可以玩多长时间，因為是给孩子许诺的东西，也就不退了。
其他评论中说安装不费劲的，难道只有我买的这一件存在问题？
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "玩具加工质量不好" into English is:

"Toy manufacturing quality is poor." The translation of the Chinese text "螺栓孔大部分都没对齐，上螺栓很费劲，可见加工质量不好，也不知道可以玩多长时间，因為是给孩子许诺的东西，也就不退了" into English is:

"The screw holes are not aligned for the most part, making it hard to screw on, which shows the poor manufacturing quality, and I don't know how long it will last, because it's a gift for the child, so I won't return it." The translation of the Chinese text "其他评论中说安装不费劲的，难道只有我买的这一件存在问题？" into English is:

"Other reviews say it's easy to install, is it just my item that has a problem?"

The translation of the Chinese text "玩具加工质量不好" into English is:

"Toy manufacturing quality is poor."

The translation of the Chinese text "螺栓孔大部分都没对齐，上螺栓很费劲，可见加工质量不好，也不知道可以玩多长时间，因為是给孩子许诺的东西，也就不退了" into English is:

"The screw holes are not aligned for the most part, making it hard to screw on, which shows the poor manufacturing quality, and I don't know how long it will last, because it's a gift for the child, so I won't return it."

The translation of the Chinese text "其他评论中说安装不费劲的，难道只有我买的这一件存在问题？" into English is:

"Other reviews say it's easy to install, is it just my item that has a problem?"
reference: Poor manufacturing quality for toys The majority of the bolt holes are out of alignment, making it difficult to put the bolts, the processing quality is poor, as can be observed, and I'm not sure how long it can be played, it will not be returned because the child was promised it in the first place. Is there a problem with just the one I got when other reviews claim that installation is not difficult?

The majority of the bolt holes are out of alignment, making it difficult to put the bolts, the processing quality is poor, as can be observed, and I'm not sure how long it can be played, it will not be returned because the child was promised it in the first place.
Is there a problem with just the one I got when other reviews claim that installation is not difficult?

original: 很一般
难道是我运气不好？
包装旧到不行；做工很一般；音乐只有一种而且只有8秒长度然后不断重复；动作就是摇脑袋径自往前走，没任何变化。
不值这个价。
急用，就不退货了。
translation:
The translation of "很一般" is: 

"Pretty general" or "Quite ordinary" The translation of "难道是我运气不好？" is: 

"Could it be that I'm just unlucky?" The translation of "包装旧到不行；做工很一般；音乐只有一种而且只有8秒长度然后不断重复；动作就是摇脑袋径自往前走，没任何变化。" is: 

"The packaging is outdated to the point of being unusable; the craftsmanship is quite ordinary; the music only has one type and is only 8 seconds long and repeats continuously; the action is just shaking one's head and walking forward without any change." The translation of "不值这个价" is: 

"Not worth the price." The translation of "急用，就不退货了" is: 

"If it's urgent, I won't take it back."
translation_split:
The translation of "很一般" is: 

"Pretty general" or "Quite ordinary"

The translation of "难道是我运气不好？" is: 

"Could it be that I'm just unlucky?"

The translation of "包装旧到不行；做工很一般；音乐只有一种而且只有8秒长度然后不断重复；动作就是摇脑袋径自往前走，没任何变化。" is: 

"The packaging is outdated to the point of being unusable; the craftsmanship is quite ordinary; the music only has one type and is only 8 seconds long and repeats continuously; the action is just shaking one's head and walking forward without any change."

The translation of "不值这个价" is: 

"Not worth the price."

The translation of "急用，就不退货了" is: 

"If it's urgent, I won't take it back."
reference: Extremely average Is it my misfortune? The packaging is dated, the workmanship is mediocre, there is just one type of music that lasts for only 8 seconds before being replayed, and the action is to shake the head and go on in the same direction with no deviation. Cost is not justified. Immediately use, not for product return.

Is it my misfortune?

The packaging is dated, the workmanship is mediocre, there is just one type of music that lasts for only 8 seconds before being replayed, and the action is to shake the head and go on in the same direction with no deviation.
Cost is not justified.
Immediately use, not for product return.

original: 玩具质量不错，吐槽一下包装
昨天收到快递，亚马逊买的，标注的是EMS运送，最后是天猫的快递送过来的，这是转了多少个弯？亚马逊和天猫关系还不错？
再说一下包装，就是用保鲜膜包了几层，里面连个包装塑料泡泡纸都没有，打开一看，所有的零件就放在空荡荡的盒子里，还好玩具质量不错，没有坏掉的零件，就是比想象中的小太多了，因为不是带电池的，手推着经常脱轨，感觉轨道两边空隙太大，设计不合理。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Toys are of good quality, but I have some complaints about the packaging." The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I received a package yesterday, which was marked as EMS delivery from Amazon, but it was actually delivered by Tmall's courier. How many times did it change hands? The relationship between Amazon and Tmall is still good?" The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Speaking of the packaging, it was wrapped in several layers of plastic wrap, but there was no bubble wrap inside. When I opened it, I found that all the parts were just placed in an empty box. Fortunately, the toy quality is good and there are no broken parts, but it's much smaller than I expected, since it doesn't come with batteries. It often derails when pushed by hand, and the gap between the tracks is too large, which is an unreasonable design."
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Toys are of good quality, but I have some complaints about the packaging."

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"I received a package yesterday, which was marked as EMS delivery from Amazon, but it was actually delivered by Tmall's courier. How many times did it change hands? The relationship between Amazon and Tmall is still good?"

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"Speaking of the packaging, it was wrapped in several layers of plastic wrap, but there was no bubble wrap inside. When I opened it, I found that all the parts were just placed in an empty box. Fortunately, the toy quality is good and there are no broken parts, but it's much smaller than I expected, since it doesn't come with batteries. It often derails when pushed by hand, and the gap between the tracks is too large, which is an unreasonable design."
reference: Although the toy is of good quality, I must criticize the packing Yesterday, the courier arrived, I ordered it from Amazon, It has an EMS delivery label on it, in the end, a courier from Tmall brought it, how many turns were required? Do Amazon and Tmall still have a good relationship? Let's talk about the packaging once more, it's just wrapped in plastic wrap for a few layers, not even a package of plastic bubble wrap inside, when you open it, all the parts are placed in an empty box, fortunately the quality of the toy is good, no broken parts, however, it is much smaller than expected because it is not battery-operated, and it frequently derails when being pushed by hand, I feel that the gap on both sides of the track is too large, and the spacing between the wheels is too wide.
reference_split: Although the toy is of good quality, I must criticize the packing

Yesterday, the courier arrived, I ordered it from Amazon, It has an EMS delivery label on it, in the end, a courier from Tmall brought it, how many turns were required? Do Amazon and Tmall still have a good relationship?

Let's talk about the packaging once more, it's just wrapped in plastic wrap for a few layers, not even a package of plastic bubble wrap inside, when you open it, all the parts are placed in an empty box, fortunately the quality of the toy is good, no broken parts, however, it is much smaller than expected because it is not battery-operated, and it frequently derails when being pushed by hand, I feel that the gap on both sides of the track is too large, and the spacing between the wheels is too wide.

original: 质量好，好玩
很好玩，组件精度很高，做工精致，质量跟乐高差不多了，做活动时价格十分优惠。
拼装的过程挺有趣，我来拼，5岁儿子来玩，挺好。
他玩得惊笑连连～以后大概会继续买这个牌子的玩具。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "质量好，好玩" is:

"Good quality, fun" The translation of the Chinese text "很好玩，组件精度很高，做工精致，质量跟乐高差不多了，做活动时价格十分优惠" is:

"It's very fun, the component precision is very high, the craftsmanship is delicate, the quality is almost as good as Lego, and the price is very affordable when used." The translation of the Chinese text "拼装的过程挺有趣，我来拼，5岁儿子来玩，挺好" is:

"The assembly process is quite fun, I'm assembling it, my 5-year-old son is playing with it, it's great." The translation of the Chinese text "他玩得惊笑连连～以后大概会继续买这个牌子的玩具" is:

"He's laughing and having a great time nonstop ~ probably will continue to buy toys from this brand in the future."
translation_split:
The translation of the Chinese text "质量好，好玩" is:

"Good quality, fun"

The translation of the Chinese text "很好玩，组件精度很高，做工精致，质量跟乐高差不多了，做活动时价格十分优惠" is:

"It's very fun, the component precision is very high, the craftsmanship is delicate, the quality is almost as good as Lego, and the price is very affordable when used."

The translation of the Chinese text "拼装的过程挺有趣，我来拼，5岁儿子来玩，挺好" is:

"The assembly process is quite fun, I'm assembling it, my 5-year-old son is playing with it, it's great."

The translation of the Chinese text "他玩得惊笑连连～以后大概会继续买这个牌子的玩具" is:

"He's laughing and having a great time nonstop ~ probably will continue to buy toys from this brand in the future."
reference: High caliber and enjoyable It is a lot of fun, the parts are extremely precise, the craftsmanship is excellent, the quality is comparable to Lego, and the price is extremely advantageous when engaging in activities. Putting everything together is a fascinating process, my 5 year old son will join me in playing if I do it, very well done. He laughed and marveled while he played ~  will probably keep purchasing toys from this manufacturer.
reference_split: High caliber and enjoyable
It is a lot of fun, the parts are extremely precise, the craftsmanship is excellent, the quality is comparable to Lego, and the price is extremely advantageous when engaging in activities.
Putting everything together is a fascinating process, my 5 year old son will join me in playing if I do it, very well done.
He laughed and marveled while he played ~  will probably keep purchasing toys from this manufacturer.

original: 机子新，海淘不错
圣诞节有看了下，之前买的贵了150块钱，不过现发货比较慢一点。
机子还是不错的，都挺新。
内置的皮卡丘。
然后连接精灵球的话会送一个梦幻。
玩起来还不错，比ps4，便携性高。
已经买了塞尔达，等游戏了，再试一下。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "机子新，海淘不错" is:

"New machine, shopping online is good"

However, a more idiomatic translation would be:

"New gadget, online shopping is great"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 机子 (jī zǐ) means "machine" or "gadget"
- 新 (xīn) means "new"
- 海淘 (hǎi tāo) means "online shopping" or "sea shopping" (海淘 is a Chinese idiom that refers to online shopping)
- 不错 (bù cuò) means "good" or "great" The translation of the Chinese text "圣诞节有看了下，之前买的贵了150块钱，不过现发货比较慢一点" is:

"I checked the price for Christmas, it's 150 yuan more expensive than what I bought before, but the current shipping is a bit slower"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 圣诞节 (shèng dàn jié) means "Christmas"
- 有看了下 (yǒu kàn le xià) means "I checked" or "I looked"
- 之前 (zhī qián) means "before"
- 买的 (mǎi de) means "bought"
- 贵了 (guì le) means "expensive"
- 150块钱 (150 kuài qián) means "150 yuan"
-不过 (bù guò) means "but"
- 现 (xiàn) means "current" or "now"
- 发货 (fā huò) means "shipping"
- 比较 (bǐ jiào) means "a bit" or "slower"
- 慢一点 (màn yī diǎn) means "a bit slower" The translation of the Chinese text "机子还是不错的，都挺新" is:

"The machine is still good, it's still quite new"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 机子 (jī zǐ) means "machine"
- 还是 (hái shì) means "still" or "yet"
- 不错的 (bù cuò de) means "good"
- 都 (dōu) is a particle used to indicate that the statement applies to all or everything
-挺 (tǐng) means "quite" or "very"
- 新 (xīn) means "new" The translation of the Chinese text "内置的皮卡丘" is:

"Built-in Pikachu"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 内置 (nèi zhuì) means "built-in"
- 皮卡丘 (pí kǎ qiū) is the Chinese name for the Pokémon character Pikachu The translation of the Chinese text "然后连接精灵球的话会送一个梦幻" is:

"And then if you connect the Pokémon Ball, you'll get a Mew"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 然后 (rán hòu) means "and then"
- 连接 (lián jiē) means "connect"
- 精灵球 (jīng líng qiú) means "Pokémon Ball"
-的话 (wǎ de) is a particle used to indicate a condition or a clause
- 会 (huì) means "will" or "will get"
- 送 (sòng) means "send" or "give"
- 一个 (yī gè) means "one"
- 梦幻 (mèng huàn) is the Chinese name for the Pokémon character Mew The translation of the Chinese text "玩起来还不错，比ps4，便携性高" is:

"It's fun to play, and it's better than PS4 in terms of portability"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 玩起来 (wán qǐ lái) means "to play" or "to have fun"
- 还 (hái) means "still" or "yet"
- 不错 (bù cuò) means "good" or "not bad"
- 比 (bǐ) means "compared to" or "than"
- ps4 (PS4) is a reference to the PlayStation 4 gaming console
- 便携性 (biàn xié xìng) means "portability" or "portable"
- 高 (gāo) means "high" or "better" The translation of the Chinese text "已经买了塞尔达，等游戏了，再试一下" is:

"I've already bought Zelda, waited for the game, and tried it again"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 已经 (yǐ jīng) means "already"
- 买了 (mǎi le) means "bought"
- 塞尔达 (sè ěr dá) is the Chinese name for the character Link from the Zelda series
- 等 (děng) means "waited for"
- 游戏 (yóu xì) means "game"
- 了 (le) is a grammatical particle used to indicate completion or result
- 再 (zài) means "again"
- 试 (shì) means "try" or "test"
- 一下 (yī xià) means "a try" or "once"

- 还 (hái) means "still" or "yet"
- 不错 (bù cuò) means "good" or "not bad"
- 比 (bǐ) means "compared to" or "than"
- ps4 (PS4) is a reference to the PlayStation 4 gaming console
- 便携性 (biàn xié xìng) means "portability" or "portable"
- 高 (gāo) means "high" or "better"

The translation of the Chinese text "已经买了塞尔达，等游戏了，再试一下" is:

"I've already bought Zelda, waited for the game, and tried it again"

Here's a breakdown of the translation:

- 已经 (yǐ jīng) means "already"
- 买了 (mǎi le) means "bought"
- 塞尔达 (sè ěr dá) is the Chinese name for the character Link from the Zelda series
- 等 (děng) means "waited for"
- 游戏 (yóu xì) means "game"
- 了 (le) is a grammatical particle used to indicate completion or result
- 再 (zài) means "again"
- 试 (shì) means "try" or "test"
- 一下 (yī xià) means "a try" or "once"
reference: The device is new, and international shopping is good For Christmas, I took a look at it, the one I previously purchased cost 150 yuan more, but the shipping is now a little slower. The equipment is still in fantastic shape and is very new. Integrated Pikachu. After that, if you link the genie ball, a fantasy will be sent. It's more portable than a PS4 and not horrible to play. Zelda was already purchased, wait for the game, then play.
reference_split: The device is new, and international shopping is good
For Christmas, I took a look at it, the one I previously purchased cost 150 yuan more, but the shipping is now a little slower.
The equipment is still in fantastic shape and is very new.
Integrated Pikachu.
After that, if you link the genie ball, a fantasy will be sent.
It's more portable than a PS4 and not horrible to play.
Zelda was already purchased, wait for the game, then play.

original: 生产烂货，出售烂货，结果烂货服务，买了六块手表送孩子的，其中的一快数字显示不完全，六块的时间都不一致，相差十几个小时不等。
我联系厂家问手表在入库有核对时间吗?他们回复说“有”，既然有，那为啥时间相差那么多，那肯定是手表没有精确度，简单地说就是水货产品，不是我说的难听，看嘛，很明显的质量问题（数字显示不完全）都拿出来卖，是不是垃圾货。
我联系卖家，卖家说了一大堆的理由，还埋怨当初不应该买他们的东西，这样的产品，这样的卖家，这样的售后服务，以后谁还敢在亚马逊上买东西。
总之我建议不要跟此卖家买东西，买了也是垃圾东西。
translation:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"Selling defective products, providing defective services, and after buying six watches for the child, one of them displays an incomplete time, and the times on the six watches are all different, with a difference of several hours each." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"I asked the manufacturer if the watches had been checked for time accuracy when they were received, and they replied that they had. Since they did, why are the times so different? It's clear that the watches lack accuracy, which is to say they're counterfeit products (I'm not being rude, it's obvious). They're selling products with incomplete digital displays, are they selling trash?" Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"I contacted the seller, and the seller came up with a lot of excuses and complained that I shouldn't have bought their products in the first place. Products like this, sellers like this, and services like this, who would dare to buy anything on Amazon after this?" Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"In short, I advise not to buy from this seller, and even if you do, you'll end up with trash."

"In short, I advise not to buy from this seller, and even if you do, you'll end up with trash."
