I contacted the manufacturer and asked if there was a time check on the watch in the warehouse, they replied "yes", since there is, so then why is the time difference so much? That must be because the watch is not accurate, simply put, it is a water product, not what I said, look well, as there are very obvious quality problems (digital display is not complete) and are taken out to sell, are not junk goods. I got in touch with the vendor, who gave me a long list of excuses for why I shouldn't have bought their goods and lamented that no one would ever dare to purchase anything from them in the future on Amazon with such products, sellers, and after-sales service. To put it briefly, I advise against purchasing anything from this seller because it is also junk.

original: 亚马逊发货问题
收到货后检查发现：
1、表包装严重破旧。
2、表说明书有严重使用褶皱。
3、表不走，台灯充电也无发使用，无法调整时间。
4、分别联系亚马逊客服，只能自费邮寄至美国，后补邮费。
5、2分的原因是客服服务还不错。

"1. The outer packaging is severely damaged." The translation of the Chinese text "2、表说明书有严重使用褶皱" is:

"2. The instruction manual has severe creases." The translation of the Chinese text "3、表不走，台灯充电也无发使用，无法调整时间" is:

"3. The watch does not work, and the backlight also does not turn on even when charging, and the time cannot be adjusted." The translation of the Chinese text "4、分别联系亚马逊客服，只能自费邮寄至美国，后补邮费" is:

"4. Contacted Amazon customer service separately, and it can only be sent back to the US at the buyer's expense, with the shipping fee to be reimbursed later." The translation of the Chinese text "5、2分的原因是客服服务还不错" is:

"5. The reason for the 2-star rating is that the customer service was still good."

original: 只能说还凑合
时间不是非常准，每天约快一秒，用了才几个月已经快两分多了。
以前用过一块西铁城的，感觉一两年也不会差几秒。
万年历功能倒是蛮不错，计时功能有点鸡肋，基本用不到，偶尔会误触进入计时模式。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "只能说还凑合" is:

"It's just passable" or "It's just okay."

This phrase is often used to express that something is satisfactory, but not excellent or impressive. The translation of the Chinese text "时间不是非常准，每天约快一秒，用了才几个月已经快两分多了" is:

"The time isn't very accurate, it's about one second fast every day, and after a few months, it's already fast by over two minutes."

This phrase is often used to describe a clock or a time-keeping device that is not very accurate, and how its inaccuracy adds up over time. The translation of the Chinese text "以前用过一块西铁城的，感觉一两年也不会差几秒" is:

"I used to have a Seiko watch, and it wouldn't be off by a few seconds even after a year or two."

This phrase is often used to express that the speaker's previous watch was very accurate and reliable. The translation of the Chinese text "万年历功能倒是蛮不错，计时功能有点鸡肋，基本用不到，偶尔会误触进入计时模式" is:

"The perpetual calendar function is quite good, but the timer function is a bit useless, I rarely use it, and sometimes I accidentally enter the timer mode by mistake."

This phrase is often used to express that the speaker finds the perpetual calendar function useful, but the timer function is not very useful and can be annoying to use.

I've used Citizen previously, and I believe that it won't lag behind by a few seconds in a year or two. While the timing function is a bit bland and hardly ever utilized, the perpetual calendar function is pretty wonderful, on occasion, it will unintentionally switch to timing mode.

original: 很满意的手表
肯定是正品，去专柜验过货，表的外观很漂亮，做工精细，用料足，加上又是进口机械机芯，所以是有一定的分量的，是那些三四百所谓的机械表不能比的，这个是货真价实的。
表的走时是很准的，误差完全在可接受范围内，表的包装里有珠宝鉴定证书，表盘的12字那里是真钻石，这个自己戴很合适，作为礼品送出去也很有面子。
宾利表确实不错。

"It's definitely a genuine product, I checked it at the official store, the watch looks very beautiful, the craftsmanship is precise, and the materials are sufficient, plus it has an imported mechanical movement, so it has a certain weight to it, it's not comparable to those mechanical watches that cost three or four hundred, this one is truly worth its price." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The watch's timekeeping is very accurate, the error is completely within the acceptable range, the watch comes with a gemstone appraisal certificate in the packaging, the 12 o'clock mark on the dial is a real diamond, it fits me very well when I wear it, and it's also a great gift to give to others as it has a good face value." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The Breitling watch is indeed good."

original: 有史以来体验最差的一次购物
9月23日晚上老婆手机摔了，心血来潮立马来亚马逊订购了一台8p，有货但是不是自营的且没有加价（心里暗喜），由于不是自营的发货比较慢，系统显示预计最晚收货要到9月27日。
老婆没手机用难受死了，第二天一早6点多叫我在想想办法，后来上京东一看256G有货可以当天送到，只得立马再订购一台。
新的买好了，就想着马上把亚马逊的订单给取消。
由于订单是半夜下的，没可能凌晨来收快递，7点多打给客服要求取消订单，客服答复已经取消请等待短信通知。
好吧，我就耐心的等着，到了中午上手机一看，订单还在状态还处于未发货，就立马联系客服要求赶快取消订单，客服答复已经操作OK。
到了下午3点上手机一看订单还在，没办法只能再次联系客服明确告知已经第三次来电了，请取消订单并通知卖家务必不要发货！
客服在我要求下当场联系了卖家，并告知我卖家不熟悉系统，要等熟悉系统后再操作取消订单。
但是明确告诉我卖家已经知道了，绝对不会发货的请放心。
等到周一我再看订单显示，竟然已经发货了，我也是无语了。
由于无法直接联系卖家，只能再次致电客服。
后面的处理简直无语，基本都是我说一步，客服才接着操作一下。
订单到目前为止还是处于派件拒收状态，正准备再次派送！
亚马逊难道不会主动跟进下吗？
卖家公司反正也收了钱不跟进也无所谓了。
总结下以后大件绝对不会预付钱了，这个样子太麻烦了。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"the worst shopping experience in history" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"On the evening of September 23rd, my wife's phone fell, and I impulsively ordered an 8P on Amazon. The product is in stock, but it's not a self-sold product and there's no additional charge (I'm secretly happy about it). Since it's not a self-sold product, the shipping is slower, and the system shows that the estimated delivery date is as late as September 27th." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"My wife is extremely uncomfortable without a phone, and she called me early the next morning around 6 am, asking me to think of a solution. Later, I checked JD.com and found that the 256G model is in stock and can be delivered the same day, so I immediately ordered another one." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"As soon as I bought the new one, I was thinking of canceling the Amazon order right away." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Since the order was placed at midnight, it's impossible to receive the delivery in the early morning, so I called the customer service around 7 am to ask for cancellation, and the customer service replied that the order has been cancelled, please wait for a notification via SMS." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Okay, I just waited patiently, and when I checked my phone at noon, I saw that the order was still in the 'not shipped' status, so I immediately contacted customer service to ask them to cancel the order as soon as possible, and the customer service replied that the operation has been completed." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I checked my phone at 3 pm and the order was still there, so I had no choice but to contact customer service again to clearly inform them that this is the third time I'm calling, please cancel the order and also notify the seller not to ship it!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The customer service representative contacted the seller on the spot after I requested it, and informed me that the seller is not familiar with the system, and that I need to wait until the seller becomes familiar with the system before they can proceed with cancelling the order." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"But they assured me that the seller has been informed and will definitely not ship the order, so please rest assured." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I checked the order on Monday and was shocked to see that it had already been shipped, I was speechless." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Since I couldn't contact the seller directly, I had to call customer service again." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The subsequent handling was completely speechless, basically I would say one step and the customer service would follow up with one action." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The order is still in the state of being refused delivery, and it's about to be sent out again!" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Does Amazon not take the initiative to follow up on this?" The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The seller has already received the payment, so it doesn't matter if they don't follow up on it." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"In summary, I will never prepay for large items again, this is too troublesome."

The translation of the Chinese text is: 

"the worst shopping experience in history"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"On the evening of September 23rd, my wife's phone fell, and I impulsively ordered an 8P on Amazon. The product is in stock, but it's not a self-sold product and there's no additional charge (I'm secretly happy about it). Since it's not a self-sold product, the shipping is slower, and the system shows that the estimated delivery date is as late as September 27th."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"My wife is extremely uncomfortable without a phone, and she called me early the next morning around 6 am, asking me to think of a solution. Later, I checked JD.com and found that the 256G model is in stock and can be delivered the same day, so I immediately ordered another one."

"I checked my phone at 3 pm and the order was still there, so I had no choice but to contact customer service again to clearly inform them that this is the third time I'm calling, please cancel the order and also notify the seller not to ship it!"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The customer service representative contacted the seller on the spot after I requested it, and informed me that the seller is not familiar with the system, and that I need to wait until the seller becomes familiar with the system before they can proceed with cancelling the order."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"But they assured me that the seller has been informed and will definitely not ship the order, so please rest assured."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I checked the order on Monday and was shocked to see that it had already been shipped, I was speechless."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Since I couldn't contact the seller directly, I had to call customer service again."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The subsequent handling was completely speechless, basically I would say one step and the customer service would follow up with one action."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The order is still in the state of being refused delivery, and it's about to be sent out again!"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Does Amazon not take the initiative to follow up on this?"

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"The seller has already received the payment, so it doesn't matter if they don't follow up on it."

The translation of the Chinese text is:

"In summary, I will never prepay for large items again, this is too troublesome."
reference: One of the worst buying experiences I've ever had My wife dropped her phone on the night of September 23rd, I ordered an 8p from Amazon on the spur of the moment, It was available, but it was not self-operated, and there was no price increase (I was secretly relieved), because non-self-operated delivery is relatively delayed, the system indicates that it is expected to be the most recent, the delivery date is September 27th. My wife felt really uncomfortable with the absence of a mobile phone, I was requested to come up with a solution the next morning at 6:00 am Later, I returned to Jingdong and saw that the 256G was in stock and could be delivered the same day, so I ordered another one right away. I planned to cancel the Amazon order as soon as I purchased the new one. Because the order was placed in the middle of the night, the courier could not arrive in the early morning, I called customer service after 7 o'clock and requested that the order be cancelled, the customer support representative said that it has been canceled, and to wait for the SMS message. So I simply waited patiently, when I checked my phone at midday, the order was still in the status and had not been delivered, I immediately contacted the customer service and requested that the order be canceled as quickly as possible, customer service responded that the operation was well. I checked the order on my phone at 3:00 pm and saw that it was still there, I had no alternative but to contact the customer support again to inform them that this was the third call, please cancel the order and notify the seller that it will not be shipped! At my request, customer support contacted the seller on the spot and informed me that the seller is unfamiliar with the system and will cancel the order once he becomes acquainted with it. But please reassure me that the seller is aware and will never ship if you can. I was in awe when I noticed that the purchase had already been dispatched when I checked the order display on Monday. I can only phone customer service since I can't get in touch with the merchant directly. After that, I'm just at a loss for words, in essence, I say do this action, and customer service will continue to operate. The order is getting ready to send it again and is currently still in the delivery refusal phase! Wouldn't Amazon go out of their way to follow up? It makes no difference if the seller's company has already collected the money and does not follow up. To summarize, there will never again be prepayment for huge products, this is really too bothersome.

My wife felt really uncomfortable with the absence of a mobile phone, I was requested to come up with a solution the next morning at 6:00 am Later, I returned to Jingdong and saw that the 256G was in stock and could be delivered the same day, so I ordered another one right away.

original: 看起来很美好
很久以前就看中这个摄像头了，但是因为除了价格外，还有一些别的原因，所以没有购买，这次因为凑包邮，价格也还可以所以就买了。
买来之后其他的都没什么问题，就是在软件连接的时候，怎么都连不上，我家是TP的路由器，上网查了之后发现好多人都有这个问题，弄了两个多小时，各种改路由器的设置，最后我用360WIFI作为媒介给弄好的，期间给小米客服打电话，他们对这个问题也没有什么解决方法，直接就让我联系亚马逊进行售后。
另外一点值得注意的就是我在网上看到用户的评论说，这个摄像头支持的存储卡最小是8G，存储容量更小的就不能识别，希望大家注意这点。
用起来感觉还可以吧，画面还可以接受，但声音音质很差，机器有一定程度的发热，一直开启的话，感觉这种程度的发热有点让人难以接受。
综上所述，本产品还有诸多不足，希望大家买的时候要慎重。
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "看起来很美好" is:

"It looks very beautiful" or "It looks very good." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"I had been eyeing this camera for a long time, but I didn't buy it because of some other reasons besides the price. This time, since it's eligible for free shipping and the price is reasonable, I finally bought it." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"After buying it, everything else was fine, but I had trouble connecting it to the software. My home router is TP, and after searching online, I found that many people have the same problem. I spent over two hours trying to adjust the router settings, but nothing worked. I finally used 360WIFI as a mediator to solve the problem. During this time, I called the Xiaomi customer service, but they didn't have any solution to this problem. They simply told me to contact Amazon for after-sales service." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"Another thing worth noting is that I saw in online reviews that the camera requires a minimum of 8G storage card to work, and it won't recognize storage cards with smaller capacity. I hope everyone takes note of this." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"It's usable, the picture quality is acceptable, but the sound quality is very poor. The device also gets quite hot, and if it's always turned on, the level of heat it produces is a bit hard to accept." The translation of the Chinese text is:

"In summary, this product still has many shortcomings, so I hope everyone will be cautious when buying it."

original: 之所以给3星，是因为这个是和人生的初恋买的，交往了快3年，就这样于去年离我而去了，一直到现在。
之所以给3星，是因为这个是和人生的初恋买的，现在不知道用到什么程度了，或许扔掉了吧！
交往了快3年，就这样于去年离我而去了，到现在一想起她，就心痛的想要离开这个世界，人生中第一个女人，带给我一辈子的阴影和心痛，迄今还没能走出来。
买这个手机的时候，想想两个当时感觉，还是能一起同甘共苦，但现在却是不堪回首，人生或许就是这样吧，有些人一辈子都不想遇到，有些事儿一辈子都不想知道，可是有什么办法呢？
多少次一看到三星这个手机，脑海就想起她，那种痛苦就随之而来灌满全身，我从没舍得用过超过2千元的手机，可是买给她的时候，却毫不犹豫，对一个人再好，可是有天当她变心了，所有的山盟海誓也就烟消云散了。
translation:
Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It's a 3-star because this is the first love I bought in my life. We had been together for almost 3 years, and it left me last year, and it's still with me until now." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"It's a 3-star because this is the first love I bought in my life. Now I don't know how much I've used it, maybe I should just throw it away!" Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"We had been together for almost 3 years, and it left me last year. Even now, whenever I think of her, I feel a deep pain and want to leave this world. She was the first woman in my life, bringing me a lifelong shadow and pain, and I still haven't been able to get over it." Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"When I bought this phone, I thought about the two of us back then, we could share happiness and hardships together. But now, looking back, it's unbearable. Maybe that's just how life is - some people may never want to meet someone in their lifetime, and some things may never want to know, but what can you do?" Here's the translation of the Chinese text into English:

"How many times I see the Samsung phone, I'm immediately reminded of her, and the pain comes flooding back. I've never dared to spend more than 2,000 yuan on a phone, but when I bought it for her, I didn't hesitate at all. I thought I was giving it to the best person, but one day when she changed her heart, all our promises and vows were reduced to nothing."

original: 国产品牌中的精品
华为是国货中的精品。
低调的老总和企业，靠的是技术和质量取胜来赢得客户，这跟当下靠广告运作来提高知名度的营商风气截然不同！
没有实力的企业根本不可能做到这样，也不敢这么做！
正是源于此，我才选择了华为。
买来用了半年多了，感觉一直很好，非常不错。
之所以没有给满分，是因为有一次在用它的离线导航时，出现了不定位现象，我最终没有找出原因，其他时候都很好。
而且它的在线输入好了目的地，搜索之后自动设计出路线，离开wifi出发以后，它自动离线导航的功能很实用，不用跑流量，它直接跟卫星对话来实现定位及导航，非常好！
translation:
The translation of the Chinese text "国产品牌中的精品" is:

"National brand products" The translation of the Chinese text "华为是国货中的精品" is:

"Huawei is a national brand product." The translation of the Chinese text "低调的老总和企业，靠的是技术和质量取胜来赢得客户，这跟当下靠广告运作来提高知名度的营商风气截然不同！" is:

"The low-key CEO and company rely on technology and quality to win over customers, which is vastly different from the current business atmosphere where companies rely on advertising to boost their reputation." The translation of the Chinese text "没有实力的企业根本不可能做到这样，也不敢这么做！" is:

"Companies without real strength are not capable of doing so, nor dare to do so!" The translation of the Chinese text "正是源于此，我才选择了华为。" is:

"It is precisely because of this that I chose Huawei." The translation of the Chinese text "买来用了半年多了，感觉一直很好，非常不错。" is:

"I've used it for over half a year, and I feel it's been very good, extremely satisfactory." The translation of the Chinese text "之所以没有给满分，是因为有一次在用它的离线导航时，出现了不定位现象，我最终没有找出原因，其他时候都很好。" is:

"I didn't give it a full score because once when I used its offline navigation, it had a positioning failure, and I couldn't figure out the reason, but it was fine at other times." The translation of the Chinese text "而且它的在线输入好了目的地，搜索之后自动设计出路线，离开wifi出发以后，它自动离线导航的功能很实用，不用跑流量，它直接跟卫星对话来实现定位及导航，非常好！" is:

"Moreover, it has an online input feature to enter the destination, and after searching, it automatically designs a route. Once you leave the Wi-Fi, it uses its offline navigation function, which is very practical, as it doesn't consume data, and it directly communicates with the satellite to achieve positioning and navigation, which is very good!"

Unlike the current corporate climate, which depends on promotion to grow popularity, low-key CEOs and businesses win clients through technology and quality! This is difficult for a corporation lacking in strength, and it would be foolish to attempt it! I decided on Huawei because of this. Since I purchased it more than six months ago, it continues to feel excellent all the time, very good. It was fine, but I didn't give it a perfect score because there was a non-location occurrence once when I was using its offline navigation, and I never did figure out why. Additionally, it has entered the destination online and, after searching, creates the route automatically, after disconnecting from the Wi-Fi, its automated offline navigation feature is very helpful since it instantly communicates with the satellite to achieve positioning and navigation without having to navigate through traffic, which is excellent!

I decided on Huawei because of this.

Additionally, it has entered the destination online and, after searching, creates the route automatically, after disconnecting from the Wi-Fi, its automated offline navigation feature is very helpful since it instantly communicates with the satellite to achieve positioning and navigation without having to navigate through traffic, which is excellent!
